tika-s0104t0:244_16: tadubhayampi hi vacanaṃ na virujjhati atthato saṃsandanattā.
tika-s0104t0:244_17: Idha hi niravasesena therānaṃ paccekagamanavacanameva tattha nayavasena dasseti,
tika-s0104t0:244_18: idha attano attano parisāya gamanavacanañca tattha upaḍḍhasaṅghena saddhiṃ gamanavacanena.
tika-s0104t0:244_19: Upaḍḍhasaṅghoti hi sakasakaparisābhūto bhikkhugaṇo gayhati upaḍḍhasaddassa asamepi bhāge pavattattā.
tika-s0104t0:244_20: Yadi hi sannipatite saṅghe upaḍḍhasaṅghena saddhinti atthaṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-s0104t0:244_22: yadi ca saṅgāyanatthaṃ uccinitānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ majjhe upaḍḍhasaṅghena saddhinti atthaṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-s0104t0:244_23: evampi tesaṃ gaṇapāmokkhānaṃyeva uccinitattā na yujjateva.
tika-s0104t0:244_27: iti atthato saṃsandanattā tadetaṃ ubhayampi vacanaṃ aññamaññaṃ na virujjhatīti.
tika-s0104t0:245_3: Soyeva hi patto bhagavatā sadā paribhutto.
tika-s0104t0:245_5: dīpetukāmena pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā sunivatthanivāsano sugatacīvaraṃ pārupitvā selamayapattamādāya
tika-s0104t0:245_6: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā piṇḍāya caranto”ti gandhamālādayo nesaṃ hattheti
tika-s0104t0:246_10: Tathā hi ācariyasāriputtattherena vuttaṃ “gandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivaritvāti paribhogacetiyabhāvato gandhakuṭiṃ
tika-s0104t0:246_11: vanditvā gandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivarīti veditabba”nti milātā mālā,
tika-s0104t0:246_15: Yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvāti paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ anatikkamitvā yathāṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0104t0:246_16: Bhagavato ṭhitakāle karaṇīyaṃ vattaṃ sabbamakāsīti senāsane kattabbavattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:246_17: Kurumāno cāti taṃ sabbaṃ vattaṃ karonto ca.
tika-s0104t0:246_26: yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi pāde pādaṃ accādhāya sato sampajāno”ti, taṃ.
tika-s0104t0:247_12: Hetugabbhāni hi etāni padāni tadatthasseva tathākaraṇahetubhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:247_22: Evampi so iminā kāraṇena adhivāsesīti dassento “tamena”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:247_23: Tattha tamenanti taṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ. Eta-
tika-s0104t0:247_27: Saṃvejesīti “nanu bhagavatā paṭikacceva akkhātaṃ ‘sabbeheva piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo’tiādinā
tika-s0104t0:247_30: assāsessathāti paṭhamaṃ vatvā”ti saha pāṭhasesena yojanā assa.
tika-s0104t0:247_33: Yena kenaci hi vacanena saṃvegaṃ janesi,
tika-s0104t0:247_37: Pittasemhavātavasena hi tisso dhātuyo idha bhesajjakaraṇayogyatāya adhippetā, yā “dosā,
tika-s0104t0:247_39: pathavī āpo tejo vāyo ākāsoti ca bhedena paccekaṃ pañcavidhā.
tika-s0104t0:252_10: Manūti hi paṭhamakappikakāle manussānaṃ mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhito puriso,
tika-s0104t0:252_12: So hi sakalalokassa hitaṃ manabhi jānātīti manūti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:252_21: yebhuyyena ca sattā daharakāle mūḷhadhātukā hontīti tassevattho pakāsito”ti vadanti ācariyā.
tika-s0104t0:252_24: Vuttañhi cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ “māṇavoti pana taṃ taruṇakāle vohariṃsu,
tika-s0104t0:252_29: mahājano taṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamatī”ti sutvā “vihāraṃ kho pana gantvā mahājanamajjhe na sakkā sukhena paṭisanthāraṃ vā kātuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:252_31: gehamāgataṃyeva naṃ disvā sukhena paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmi,
tika-s0104t0:252_33: tampi naṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā ekaṃ māṇavakaṃ pesesi,
tika-s0104t0:252_34: taṃ sandhāyāha “pahitaṃ māṇavaka”nti khuddake cettha kapaccayo.
tika-s0104t0:253_6: saddo apekkho mantā nuññāyā”ti vajirabuddhittherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:253_8: “appeva nāmā”ti saṃsayamatte vutte anuññātabhāvo na siddho,
tika-s0104t0:253_10: tena imamatthaṃ dīpeti “appeva nāma sve mayaṃ upasaṅkameyyāma,
tika-s0104t0:254_1: Cetakattherenāti cetiyaraṭṭhe jātattā cetakoti evaṃ laddhanāmena therena.
tika-s0104t0:254_4: Subhena māṇavena puṭṭhoti “yesu dhammesu bhavaṃ gotamo imaṃ lokaṃ patiṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0104t0:254_5: te tassa accayena naṭṭhā nu kho,
tika-s0104t0:254_10: handa naṃ pucchāmī”ti evaṃ cintetvā “yesaṃ so bhavaṃ gotamo dhammānaṃ vaṇṇavādī ahosi,
tika-s0104t0:254_11: yattha ca imaṃ janataṃ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesi,
tika-s0104t0:254_12: katamesānaṃ kho bho ānanda dhammānaṃ so bhavaṃ gotamo vaṇṇavādī ahosī”tiādinā puṭṭho,
tika-s0104t0:254_13: athassa thero tīṇi piṭakāni sīlakkhandhādīhi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā dassento “tiṇṇaṃ kho māṇava khandhānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:254_14: so bhagavā vaṇṇavādī”tiādinā idha sīlakkhandhavagge dasamaṃ suttamabhāsi,
tika-s0104t0:255_8: Saṅgītipāḷiyaṃ sāmaññena vuttampi vacanaṃ evaṃ gateyeva sandhāya vuttanti saṃsandetuṃ sādhetuṃ vā āha “evañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:256_1: Chaḍḍitapatitauklāpāti chaḍḍitā ca patitā ca uklāpā ca.
tika-s0104t0:256_3: bhagavato parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantehi bhikkhūhi chaḍḍitā vissaṭṭhā,
tika-s0104t0:256_4: tatoyeva ca upacikādīhi khāditattā ito cito ca patitā,
tika-s0104t0:256_16: senāsanakkhandhake ca senāsanapaṭibaddhānaṃ bahūnampi vacanānaṃ vuttattā senāsanapaṭisaṅkharaṇampi tassa
tika-s0104t0:257_4: Yaṃ vā katikavattaṃ sandhāya “atha kho”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:257_7: vaṇṇitanti senāsanavattaṃ paññapentena senāsanakkhandhake ca senāsanapaṭibaddhavacanaṃ kathentena vaṇṇitaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:258_2: Therā hi āsaḷhipuṇṇamito pāṭipadadivaseyeva sannipatitvā vassamupagantvā evaṃ cintesunti.
tika-s0104t0:258_10: taṃ panidha desanāñāṇapaṭivedhañāṇavasena duvidhampi yujjati tadubhayeneva saṅgītiyā pavattanato.
tika-s0104t0:259_0: Vissakammunāti sakkassa devānamindassa kammākammavidhāyakaṃ devaputtaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0104t0:259_1: Suvibhattabhittithambhasopānanti ettha suvibhattapadassa dvandato pubbe suyyamānattā sabbehi dvandapadehi sambandho,
tika-s0104t0:259_10: Ekasmiṃyeva pānīyatitthe nipatantā pakkhino viya sabbesampi janānaṃ cakkhūni maṇḍapeyeva nipatantīti vuttaṃ “ekanipāta…pe…
tika-s0104t0:259_13: Lokarāmaṇeyyakamiva sampiṇḍitanti yadi loke vijjamānaṃ rāmaṇeyyakaṃ sabbameva ānetvā ekattha sampiṇḍitaṃ siyā,
tika-s0104t0:259_18: kasaṭavinimuttaṃ pasannaṃ viya ca daṭṭhumaraharūpesu sārabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:259_20: Apica daṭṭhabbo dassanīyo sārabhūto visiṭṭhataro maṇḍo maṇḍanaṃ alaṅkāro etassāti daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍo, taṃ.
tika-s0104t0:259_22: sabbesaṃ vā janānaṃ maṇḍaṃ pasannaṃ pāti rakkhati,
tika-s0104t0:259_23: maṇḍanamalaṅkāraṃ vā pāti pivati alaṅkarituṃ yuttabhāvenāti maṇḍapo, taṃ.
tika-s0104t0:260_0: Kusumadāmāni ca tāni olambakāni ceti kusumadāmolambakāni.
tika-s0104t0:260_3: tāni viniggalantaṃ visesena vamentaṃ nikkhāmentamiva cāru sobhanaṃ vitānaṃ etthāti tathā.
tika-s0104t0:260_9: Atha vā maṇiyo koṭṭetvā katatalattā maṇikoṭṭena nipphattanti maṇikoṭṭimaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:260_21: Saddavidū pana “vihe ākāse māyanti gacchanti devā yenāti vimāna”nti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:260_22: Visesena vā sucaritakammunā mīyati nimmīyatīti vimānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:260_24: taṃ saṇṭhānena mīyati nimmīyatīti vimānantiādināpi vattabbo.
tika-s0104t0:260_26: sobhātisayayogena ca visesato mānanīyatāya vimāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:260_33: Dhammopi satthāyeva satthukiccanipphādanatoti vuttaṃ “buddhassa bhagavato āsanārahaṃ dhammāsanaṃ paññapetvā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:260_36: tathāgatappaveditadhammadesakassa vā satthukiccāvahattā tathārūpe āsane nisīditumarahatīti dassetumpi evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:261_0: Idāni āyasmato ānandassa asekkhabhūmisamāpajjanaṃ dassento “tasmiñca panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:261_1: Tattha tasmiñca pana divasaeti tathā raññā ārocāpitadivase,
tika-s0104t0:261_5: Tathā hi so bhagavato parinibbānādīsu vilāpādimakāsi.
tika-s0104t0:261_18: Edisesu pana ṭhānesu tadaññesampi dhammasaṃvegoyeva adhippeto.
tika-s0104t0:261_20: so tassā bhagavato dassane uppajjī”ti rajjumālāvimānavaṇṇanāyaṃvuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:261_22: Itarathā hi cittutrāsavasena dosoyeva saṃvegoti āpajjati,
tika-s0104t0:261_23: evañca sati so tassa asekkhabhūmisamāpajjanassa ekaṃsakāraṇaṃ na siyā.
tika-s0104t0:261_24: Evamabhūto ca so idha na vattabboyevāti alamatipapañcena.
tika-s0104t0:261_27: Te na yuttanti tava na yuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:261_28: tayā vā sannipātaṃ gantuṃ na patirūpaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:262_7: ekavacanena ca yogyatā tathāyeva tattha tattha dassanato.
tika-s0104t0:262_8: Kiriyāya hi sabhāvato napuṃsakattamekattañca icchanti saddavidū.
tika-s0104t0:262_12: bimbohane na tāva ṭhapitanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:263_0: “Kāraṇe ceva citte ca, khaṇasmiṃ vivarepi ca;
tika-s0104t0:265_5: dhammato ca ā gotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato āsavasaññitehi kilesehi.
tika-s0104t0:265_7: Tadekaṭṭhatāya hi sabbehipi kilesehi sabbehipi pāpadhammehi cittaṃ vimuccatiyeva.
tika-s0104t0:265_8: Cittaṃ vimuccīti cittaṃ arahattamaggakkhaṇe āsavehi vimuccamānaṃ hutvā arahattaphalakkhaṇe vimucci.
tika-s0104t0:265_12: Vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṃ kataṃ upacitaṃ puññaṃ yenāti katapuñño,
tika-s0104t0:265_22: na panāhaṃ papañcaṃ karomīti vossaggaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t0:265_23: Vīriyasamataṃ yojemīti caṅkamanavīriyassa adhimattattā tassa hāpanavasena samādhinā samatāpādanena vīriyassa samataṃ samabhāvaṃ yojemi,
tika-s0104t0:265_24: vīriyena vā samathasaṅkhātaṃ samādhiṃ yojemītipi attho.
tika-s0104t0:265_27: Idāni tassa visesato pasaṃsanārahabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:266_3: Bhinnaliṅgampi hi tulyatthapadaṃ dissati yathā “guṇo pamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:266_8: Tattha hi purimapuṇṇamito yāva aparā puṇṇamī,
tika-s0104t0:267_0: “Ekaṃsaṃ cīvaranti ettha puna saṇṭhāpanavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:267_1: ekaṃsanti ca vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:267_2: Yato yathā vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:268_2: viyāti sitapītapabhāyuttapaṇḍuromajakambale ṭhapito jātimā maṇi viya,
tika-s0104t0:268_4: Samuggatapuṇṇacando viyāti juṇhapakkhapannarasuposathe samuggato soḷasakalāparipuṇṇo cando viya. Bālā…pe…
tika-s0104t0:268_13: tathārūpāya pana uttamalīḷāya gamanato passantā sabbepi tamatthaṃ jānanti,
tika-s0104t0:268_14: tasmā ārocento viya hotīti āha “attano arahattappattiṃ ārocayamāno viya agamāsī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:269_0: Kimatthaṃ panāyaṃ evamārocayamāno viya agamāsīti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t0:269_1: so hi “attupanāyikaṃ akatvā aññabyākaraṇaṃ bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇita”nti manasi karitvā “sekkhatāya dhammavinayasaṅgītiyā
tika-s0104t0:269_2: gahetumayuttampi bahussutattā gaṇhissāmā”ti nisinnānaṃ therānaṃ arahattappattivijānanena somanassuppādanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:269_3: “appamatto hohī”ti bhagavatā dinnaovādassa ca saphalatādīpanatthaṃ evamārocayamāno viya agamāsīti.
tika-s0104t0:269_4: Āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosi samasamaṭṭhapanādinā yathāvuttakāraṇena satthukappattā.
tika-s0104t0:269_6: “Sobhati vata te āvuso ānanda arahattasamadhigamatā”tiādinā sādhukāramadāsi.
tika-s0104t0:269_8: Khuddakabhāṇakesu ca suttanipātakhuddakapāṭhabhāṇakānaṃ vādotipi yujjati tadaṭṭhakathāsupi tathā vuttattā.
tika-s0104t0:270_7: Thero cintesi “kuhiṃ gato”ti pucchantānaṃ attānaṃ dassente ativiya pākaṭabhāvena bhavissamānattā,
tika-s0104t0:270_10: Ākāsena āgantvā attano āsaneyeva attānaṃ dassesītipi tesameva ekacce vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:270_11: Pulliṅgavisaye hi “eke”ti vutte sabbattha “ekacce”ti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:270_12: Tīsupi cettha vādesu tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ tena tenākārena āgatamattaṃ ṭhapetvā visuṃ visuṃ vacane aññaṃ visesakāraṇaṃ natthi.
tika-s0104t0:270_13: Sattamāsaṃ katāya hi dhammavinayasaṅgītiyā kadāci pakatiyāva,
tika-s0104t0:270_15: kadāci ākāsena āgatattā taṃ tadāgamanamupādāya tathā tathā vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:270_16: Apica saṅgītiyā ādidivaseyeva paṭhamaṃ pakatiyā āgantvā tato paraṃ ākāsamabbhuggantvā parisaṃ pattakāle
tika-s0104t0:270_17: tato otaritvā bhikkhupantiṃ apīḷento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā āsane attānaṃ dassesītipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:270_20: āgantvā gatakāle āyasmato mahākassapassa sādhukāradānameva pamāṇaṃ satthārā dātabbasādhukāradāneneva arahattappattiyā aññesampi ñāpitattā,
tika-s0104t0:270_21: bhagavati dharamāne paṭiggahetabbāya ca pasaṃsāya therassa paṭiggahitattā.
tika-s0104t0:271_0: Bhikkhū āmantesīti bhikkhū ālapīti ayamettha attho,
tika-s0104t0:271_1: aññatra pana ñāpanepi dissati yathā “āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t0:271_2: paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave”ti pakkosanepi dissati yathā “ehi tvaṃ bhikkhu mama vacanena sāriputtaṃ āmantehī”ti
tika-s0104t0:271_3: ālapanepi dissati yathā “tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘bhikkhavo’ti”,
tika-s0104t0:271_5: Ālapanamattassa pana abhāvato “kiṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyāmā”tiādinā vuttena viññāpiyamānatthantarena ca sahacaraṇato ñāpaneva vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t0:271_6: tasmā āmantesīti paṭivedesi viññāpesīti attho vattabbo.
tika-s0104t0:271_8: ‘bhaddante’ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”ntiādīsu hi ālapanamattameva dissati,
tika-s0104t0:271_11: Tasmā tādisesveva ālapane vaṭṭatīti no takko.
tika-s0104t0:271_16: Dhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ vāti ettha vā-
tika-s0104t0:272_6: yā tassa tassa atthassa vattabbassa liṅgānurūpena “yo aya”nti vā “yā aya”nti vā “yaṃ ida”nti vā yojetabbatā tathāyevassa tattha tattha dassitattā.
tika-s0104t0:273_0: Attanāva attānaṃ sammannīti sayameva attānaṃ sammataṃ akāsi.
tika-s0104t0:274_0: Bījaniṃ gahetvāti ettha bījanīgahaṇaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ dhammatāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:274_1: Tāya hi dhammakathikānaṃ parisāya hatthakukkuccamukhavikārādi paṭicchādīyati.
tika-s0104t0:274_2: Bhagavā ca dhammakathikānaṃ dhammatādassanatthameva vicitrabījaniṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:274_3: Aññathā hi sabbassapi lokassa alaṅkārabhūtaṃ paramukkaṃsagatasikkhāsaṃyamānaṃ buddhānaṃ mukhacandamaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetabbaṃ na siyā.
tika-s0104t0:274_4: “Paṭhamaṃ āvuso upāli pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”nti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:274_5: nanu tassa saṅgītiyā purimakāle paṭhamabhāvo na yuttoti?
tika-s0104t0:274_8: Yebhuyyena hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavato dharamānakāle ṭhitānukkameneva saṅgītāni,
tika-s0104t0:274_12: “Kattha paññatta”ntiādinā dassitena saha tadavasiṭṭhampi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “vatthumpi pucchī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:275_2: yathāsaṅgītasseva pamāṇabhāvaṃ dassanatthañca pucchaṃ samuddharitvā vissajjento “kiṃ panetthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:275_4: Tenevāha “na hi tathāgatā ekabyañjanampi niratthakaṃ vadantī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:275_9: Sāvakānaṃ pana devatānaṃ vā bhāsiteti bhagavato pucchāthomanādivasena bhāsitaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0104t0:275_12: na sabhāvāyuttiyā atthassāti dasseti “kiṃ pana ta”ntiādinā sambandhavacanamattanti pubbāparasambandhavacanameva.
tika-s0104t0:275_13: Idaṃ paṭhamapārājikanti vavatthapetvā ṭhapesuṃ imināva vācanāmaggena uggahaṇadhāraṇādikiccanipphādanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:275_17: tadidaṃ pana pathavīkampanaṃ therānaṃ dhammasajjhāyānubhāvenāti ñāpetuṃ “sādhukāraṃ dadamānā viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:276_1: saṅgītimāropitāni pana ettakānevāti dīpetuṃ “pañcasattati sikkhāpadānī”ti vuttaṃ “purimanayenevā”ti etena sādhukāraṃ dadamānā viyāti atthamāha.
tika-s0104t0:278_0: Gāthā cekā mato gantho, gantho bāttiṃsatakkharo.
tika-s0104t0:281_8: Pabbajjādīni hi bhagavatā paññattattā paññattiyoti vuccanti.
tika-s0104t0:281_12: Apica bhāgarāsaṭṭhatāpi yujjatiyeva tāsaṃ paññattīnaṃ bhāgato,
tika-s0104t0:281_14: taṃ pana vinayapiṭakaṃ bhāṇakehi rakkhitaṃ gopitaṃ saṅgahāruḷhanayeneva cirakālaṃ anassamānaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahissatīti
tika-s0104t0:281_15: āyasmantaṃ upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ “āvuso imaṃ tuyhaṃ nissitake vācehī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:282_0: Dhammaṃ saṅgāyitukāmoti suttantābhidhammasaṅgītiṃ kattukāmo “dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t0:283_0: Saṅghaṃ ñāpesīti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:283_1: Kataraṃ āvuso piṭakanti vinayāvasesesu dvīsu piṭakesu kataraṃ piṭakaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:283_2: Vinayābhidhammānampi khuddakasaṅgītipariyāpannattā tamantarena vuttaṃ “suttantapiṭake catasso saṅgītiyo”ti.
tika-s0104t0:283_3: Saṅgītiyoti ca saṅgāyanakāle dīghādivasena visuṃ visuṃ niyametvā saṅgayhamānattā nikāyāva vuccanti.
tika-s0104t0:283_6: nāññānīti dassetuṃ “catuttiṃsa suttāni tayo vaggā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:283_7: Tasmā catuttisaṃ suttāni tayo vaggā honti,
tika-s0104t0:283_12: taṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyāmā”ti vutte kasmāti codanāsambhavato “tividhasīlālaṅkata”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:283_14: Cūḷamajjhimamahāsīlavasena tividhassāpi sīlassa pakāsanattā tena alaṅkataṃ vibhūsitaṃ tathā nānāvidhe
tika-s0104t0:283_18: Lapanāti vihāraṃ āgate manusse disvā “kimatthāya bhonto āgatā,
tika-s0104t0:283_21: ahaṃ pacchato bhikkhū gahetvā āgacchāmī”ti evamādinā bhāsanā.
tika-s0104t0:283_24: Apicettha micchājīvasaddena kuhanalapanāhi sesaṃ anesanaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:283_25: Ādisaddena pana tadavasesaṃ mahicchatādikaṃ dussilyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:283_26: Dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo eva paliveṭhanaṭṭhena jālasarikkhatāya jālaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:284_0: Antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti ettha antarāsaddo vivare “apicāyaṃ bhikkhave tapodādvinnaṃ
tika-s0104t0:284_2: Tasmā rājagahassa ca nāḷandassa ca vivareti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:284_4: Īdisesu ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti,
tika-s0104t0:284_6: Ayojiyamāne hi upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarāsaddayogena upayogavacanassa icchitattā.
tika-s0104t0:284_10: Tassa kira dvārasamīpe taruṇo ambarukkho atthi,
tika-s0104t0:284_12: tassa samīpe pavattattā uyyānampi “ambalaṭṭhikā” tveva saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ yathā “varuṇanagara”nti,
tika-s0104t0:284_13: tasmā ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ nāma uyyāne rājāgāraketi attho.
tika-s0104t0:284_14: Aviññāyamānassa hi viññāpanatthaṃ etaṃ ādhāradvayaṃ vuttaṃ rājāgārametassāti vā rājāgārakaṃ, uyyānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:284_17: evaṃ sati rājāgāraṃ ādhāro na siyā.
tika-s0104t0:284_18: “Rājāgāraketi evaṃnāmake uyyāne abhiramanārahaṃ kira rājāgārampi. Tattha,
tika-s0104t0:284_19: yassa vasenetaṃ evaṃ nāmaṃ labhatī”ti vajirabuddhitthero.
tika-s0104t0:284_20: Evaṃ sati “ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti āsannataruṇambarukkhena visesetvā “rājāgārake”ti uyyānameva nāmavasena vuttanti attho āpajjati,
tika-s0104t0:284_22: Suppiyañca paribbājakanti suppiyaṃ nāma sañcayassa antevāsiṃ channaparibbājakañca.
tika-s0104t0:284_23: Brahmadattañca māṇavanti ettha taruṇo “māṇavo”ti vutto “ambaṭṭho māṇavo,
tika-s0104t0:284_25: tasmā brahmadattaṃ nāma taruṇapurisañca ārabbhāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:284_29: tesaṃ bhāsanaṃ uttarapadalopena tathā vuttaṃ yathā “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti.
tika-s0104t0:285_5: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sāmaññaphalassa nidānampi pucchi,
tika-s0104t0:285_7: Ettha hi “kaṃ ārabbhā”ti avatvā “kena saddhi”nti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:285_9: Na bhagavatā eva etaṃ suttaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:285_10: raññāpi “yathā nu kho imāni puthusippāyatanānī”tiādinā kiñci kiñci vuttamatthi,
tika-s0104t0:285_12: Imināva nayena sabbattha “kaṃ ārabbhā”ti vā “kena saddhi”nti vā yathārahaṃ vatvā saṅgītimakāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:285_14: Evañca katvā “tivaggasaṅgahaṃ catuttiṃsasuttapaṭimaṇḍita”nti vacanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:286_3: mahādhātukathāya vā saddhiṃ sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ vitaṇḍavādimataṃ paṭikkhipitvā
tika-s0104t0:287_2: yebhuyyena ca dhammaniddesabhūte tādise abhidhammapiṭakeva saṅgaṇhituṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:287_4: nāpi paññattiniddesabhūte vinayapiṭaketi dīghabhāṇakā jātakādīnaṃ abhidhammapiṭake saṅgahaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:287_7: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana aṭṭhuppattivasena desitānaṃ jātakādīnaṃ yathānulomadesanābhāvato tādise suttantapiṭake saṅgaho yutto,
tika-s0104t0:287_9: nāpi paññattiniddesabhūte yathāparādhasāsane vinayapiṭaketi jātakādīnaṃ suttantapiṭakapariyāpannataṃ vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:288_0: Evaṃ nimittapayojanakāladesakārakakaraṇappakārehi paṭhamaṃ saṅgītiṃ dassetvā idāni tattha vavatthāpitesu
tika-s0104t0:288_2: Tattha “eva”nti iminā etasaddena parāmasitabbaṃ yathāvuttasaṅgītippakāraṃ nidasseti.
tika-s0104t0:288_19: Ācariyadhammapālatthero pana taṃ kecivādaṃ katvā imamatthamāha “vimuccati vimuccitthāti vimutti,
tika-s0104t0:288_27: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “attharasassādīsu attharaso nāma cattāri sāmaññaphalāni,
tika-s0104t0:289_0: Kiñcāpi avisesena sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ kilesavinayanena vinayo,
tika-s0104t0:289_1: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyapatanādito dhāraṇena dhammo ca hoti,
tika-s0104t0:289_2: tathāpi idhādhippeteyeva dhammavinaye vatticchāvasena sarūpato niddhāretuṃ “tattha vinayapiṭaka”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:289_4: Atha vā yadipi vinayo ca dhammoyeva pariyattiyādibhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:289_5: tathāpi vinayasaddasannidhāne bhinnādhikaraṇabhāvena payutto dhammasaddo vinayatanti viparītaṃ tantimeva dīpeti yathā “puññañāṇasambhārā,
tika-s0104t0:289_9: teneva tesaṃ tathābhāvaṃ saṅgītikkhandhake āhāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:290_0: “Anekajātisaṃsāra”nti ayaṃ gāthā bhagavatā attano sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ arahattappattiṃ paccavekkhantena
tika-s0104t0:290_5: ahaṃ imassa attabhāvasaṅkhātassa gehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena taṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0104t0:290_6: tassa bodhiñāṇassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-s0104t0:290_7: saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ anibbisaṃ anibbisanto taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto alabhantoyeva sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ.
tika-s0104t0:290_8: Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā,
tika-s0104t0:290_9: na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati,
tika-s0104t0:290_11: Idāni bho attabhāvasaṅkhātassa gehassa kāraka taṇhāvaḍḍhaki tvaṃ mayā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena diṭṭho asi.
tika-s0104t0:290_12: Puna imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ na kāhasi na karissasi.
tika-s0104t0:290_13: Tava sabbā avasesakilesa phāsukā mayā bhaggā bhañjitā.
tika-s0104t0:290_14: Imassa tayā katassa attabhāvasaṅkhātassa gehassa kūṭaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ visaṅkhataṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:290_15: Idāni mama cittaṃ visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gataṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:290_18: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana visaṅkhāragataṃ cittameva taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:290_19: arahattaphalaṃ vā ajjhagā adhigatanti attho vutto.
tika-s0104t0:291_8: Ajjhagāti ca “ajjataniyamāttamiṃ vā aṃ vā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:291_13: “Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”ti ayaṃ pana vācāya pavattitadhammānanti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:292_1: Paṭhamaṃ vutto pana dhammapadabhāṇakānaṃ vādo. Yadā…pe…
tika-s0104t0:292_5: Nidassanena hi mariyādavacanena vinā padatthavipallāsakārināva attho paripuṇṇo na hoti.
tika-s0104t0:292_13: tatthāpi vā paṭhamagāthameva gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:293_0: Ettha ca khandhakabhāṇakā evaṃ vadanti “dhammapadabhāṇakānaṃ gāthā manasāva desitattā tadā mahato janassa upakārāya nāhosi,
tika-s0104t0:293_1: amhākaṃ pana gāthā vacībhedaṃ katvā desitattā tadā suṇantānaṃ devabrahmānaṃ upakārāya ahosi,
tika-s0104t0:293_3: Dhammapadabhāṇakā pana “desanāya janassa upakārānupakārabhāvo paṭhamabhāve lakkhaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0104t0:293_4: bhagavatā manasā paṭhamaṃ desitattā idameva paṭhamabuddhavacana”nti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:293_6: Nanu ca yadi “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti gāthā manasāva desitā,
tika-s0104t0:293_7: atha kasmā dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāra’nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bodhirukkhamūle nisinno
tika-s0104t0:293_8: udānavasena udānetvā aparabhāge ānandattherena puṭṭho kathesī”ti vuttanti?
tika-s0104t0:293_10: Tatthāpi hi manasā udānetvāti atthoyeva gahetabbo.
tika-s0104t0:293_11: Desanā viya hi udānampi manasā udānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:293_15: tasmā udānapāḷiyamanāruḷhabhāvoyeva vacasā anudānetvā manasā udānabhāve kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:293_18: Visākhapuṇṇamāyameva hi bhagavā paccūsasamaye sabbaññutaṃ patto.
tika-s0104t0:294_6: na catutthī”ti hi vatvā tamevudāharanti akkharacintakā.
tika-s0104t0:294_11: Lakkhaṇattayavibhāvananayeneva ca tadārammaṇaṃ vipassanaṃ dassento sabbatitthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ buddhāveṇikaṃ
tika-s0104t0:294_14: tāya catusaccakammaṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānāya aviparītanibbānagāminipaṭipadāya appamādena sampādethāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:294_15: Apica “vayadhammā saṅkhārā”ti etena saṅkhepena saṃvejetvā “appamādena sampādethā”ti saṅkhepeneva niravasesaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:294_16: Appamādapadañhi sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ sāsanaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0104t0:294_17: sikkhattayasaṅgahitāya kevalaparipuṇṇāya sāsanasaṅkhātāya sammāpaṭipattiyā appamādena sampādethāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:294_19: Ettha hi kālavatā kālopi nidassito tadavinābhāvittāti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:295_6: Paṭhamasaṅgītito puretarameva hi āyasmatā ānandattherena jetavane viharantena subhassa māṇavassa bhāsita”nti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:295_7: Subhasuttaṃ pana “evaṃ me suttaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa
tika-s0104t0:295_9: Tattha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādivacanaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ āyasmatā ānandatthereneva vattuṃ yuttarūpaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0104t0:295_10: Na hi ānandatthero sayameva subhasuttaṃ desetvā “evaṃ me suta”ntiādīni vadati.
tika-s0104t0:295_11: Evaṃ pana vattabbaṃ siyā “ekamidāhaṃ bhante samayaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ viharāmi jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:295_12: Tasmā dutiyatatiyasaṅgītikārakehi “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā subhasuttaṃ saṅgītimāropitaṃ viya dissati.
tika-s0104t0:295_13: Athācariyadhammapālattherassa evamadhippāyo siyā “ānandatthereneva vuttampi subhasuttaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītimāropetvā
tika-s0104t0:295_14: tantiṃ ṭhapetukāmehi mahākassapattherādīhi aññesu suttesu āgatanayeneva ‘evaṃ me suta’ntiādinā tanti
tika-s0104t0:295_17: Atha vā āyasmā ānando subhasuttaṃ sayaṃ desentopi sāmaññaphalādīsu bhagavatā desitanayeneva desesīti
tika-s0104t0:295_18: bhagavato sammukhā laddhanaye ṭhatvā desitattā bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ attani adahanto “evaṃ me suta”ntiādimāhāti
tika-s0104t0:296_3: Paccekaṃ soḷasahi vārehi upalakkhitattā soḷasa parivārāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:296_5: bhikkhunīvibhaṅge soḷasa vārā cāti bāttiṃsa vārā āgatā.
tika-s0104t0:296_8: abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyañca “soḷasa parivārā”ti evameva dissamānattā ayampi pāṭho na sakkā paṭibāhitunti tassevattho vutto.
tika-s0104t0:296_9: “Itī”ti yathāvuttaṃ buddhavacanaṃ nidassetvā “ida”nti taṃ parāmasati. Iti-
tika-s0104t0:296_12: iti idanti vā pariyāyadvayaṃ idamattheyeva vattati “idānetarahi vijjatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t0:296_14: Brahmajālādīni catuttiṃsa suttāni saṅgayhanti ettha, etena vā,
tika-s0104t0:296_15: tesaṃ vā saṅgaho gaṇanā etassāti brahmajālādicatuttiṃsasuttasaṅgaho.
tika-s0104t0:296_17: Heṭṭhā vuttesu dīghabhāṇakamajjhimabhāṇakānaṃ vādesu majjhimabhāṇakānaññeva vādassa yuttatarattā khuddakapāṭhādayopi
tika-s0104t0:296_21: gāthā atthūpanāyikāti vuttattā “theragāthā therīgāthā”ti ca pāṭho yutto.
tika-s0104t0:297_0: Evaṃ sarūpato piṭakattayaṃ niyametvā idāni nibbacanaṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:297_8: tathā ca sati vinayanatāguṇasamaṅginā vinayadabbeneva hetubhūtena vinayoti akkhāto,
tika-s0104t0:297_13: Ayaṃ vinayoti atthapaññattibhūto saññīsaṅkhāto ayaṃ tanti vinayo.
tika-s0104t0:297_14: Vinayoti akkhātoti saddapaññattibhūto saññāsaṅkhāto vinayo nāmāti kathito.
tika-s0104t0:298_0: Idāni imissā gāthāya atthaṃ vibhāvento āha “vividhā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:298_11: tena tathānisedhanameva pariyāyena kāyavācāvinayanaṃ nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:298_13: Yathāvuttā ca gāthā īdisassa nibbacanassa pakāsanatthaṃ vuttāti dassetuṃ “tenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:298_15: Apica “vividhā hī”tiādivākyassa yathāvuttassa guṇaṃ dassento “tenā”tiādimāhātipi sambandhaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:298_16: Evaṃ sati tenāti vividhanayattādinā hetubhūtenāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:298_17: Atha vā yathāvuttavacanameva sandhāya porāṇehi ayaṃ gāthā vuttāti saṃsandetuṃ “tenā”tiādi vuttantipi vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:298_22: “Vacanassa attho”ti hi sambandhe vuttepi tassa vacanasāmaññato visesaṃ dassetuṃ “etassā”ti puna vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:298_24: nāmasaddattā ca edisesu saddantarena visesitabhāvaṃ icchanti.
tika-s0104t0:299_3: Attatthaparatthādibhede attheti yo taṃ suttaṃ sajjhāyati, suṇāti, vāceti, cinteti,
tika-s0104t0:299_6: tena parassa sādhetabbato parassapīti tadubhayaṃ taṃ suttaṃ sūceti dīpeti,
tika-s0104t0:299_7: tathā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe lokiyalokuttaratthe cāti evamādibhede atthe ādi-
tika-s0104t0:299_17: tena sūcetabbassa paratthassa nivattetabbassa abhāvā attatthaggahaṇañca na kattabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:299_18: Attatthaparatthavinimuttassa bhāsitatthassa abhāvā ādiggahaṇañca na kattabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:299_19: tasmā yathāvuttassa hitapariyāyassa atthassa sutte asambhavato suttādhārassa puggalassa vasena attatthaparatthā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:300_0: Atha vā suttaṃ anapekkhitvā ye attatthādayo atthappabhedā “na ha’ññadattha’tthi pasaṃsalābhā”ti etassa padassa niddese vuttā “attattho, parattho,
tika-s0104t0:300_15: Kiñcāpi hi suttanirapekkhaṃ attatthādayo vuttā suttatthabhāvena aniddiṭṭhattā,
tika-s0104t0:300_16: tesu pana ekopi atthappabhedo suttena dīpetabbataṃ nātivattatīti.
tika-s0104t0:300_18: Ettha hi purimakā pañca atthappabhedā hitapariyāyā,
tika-s0104t0:300_24: Mūludakādayo viya paṃsunā akkharasannivesādinā tirohito paṭicchanno.
tika-s0104t0:301_0: Atha vā “attanā ca appiccho hotī”ti attatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:301_10: Vinayābhidhammehi ca visesetvā suttasaddassa attho vattabbo,
tika-s0104t0:301_11: tasmā veneyyajjhāsayavasappavattāya desanāya sātisayaṃ attahitaparahitādīni pakāsitāni honti tappadhānabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:301_13: vasappavattāyāti idameva “atthānaṃ sūcanato sutta”nti vuttaṃ. Sūca-
tika-s0104t0:301_15: “Evañca katvā ‘ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpanna’nti ca sakavāde pañca suttasatānī’ti
tika-s0104t0:301_16: ca evamādīsu suttasaddo upacaritoti gahetabbo”ti ācariyasāriputtattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:301_17: Aññe pana yathāvuttasadiseneva nibbacanena suttasaddassa vinayābhidhammānampi vācakattaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:302_2: tasmā veneyyānaṃ ekantahitapaṭilābhasaṃvattanikā suttantadesanāti āha “suvuttā cettha atthā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:302_3: “Ekantahitapaṭilābhasaṃvattanikā suttantadesanā”ti idampi veneyyānaṃ hitasampādane suttantadesanāya tapparabhāvameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:302_6: Etena ca hetunā nanu vinayābhidhammāpi suvuttā,
tika-s0104t0:302_7: atha kasmā idameva evaṃ vuttanti anuyogaṃ pariharati.
tika-s0104t0:303_0: Anupubbasikkhādivasena kālantarena atthābhinipphattiṃ dassetuṃ “sassamiva phala”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:303_2: yathā sassaṃ nāma vapanaropanādikkhaṇeyeva phalaṃ na pasavati,
tika-s0104t0:303_4: tathā idampi savanadhāraṇādikkhaṇeyeva atthe na pasavati,
tika-s0104t0:303_9: Upāyasamaṅgīnaññeva atthābhinipphattiṃ dassento “dhenu viya khīra”nti āha.
tika-s0104t0:303_11: yathā dhenu nāma kāle jātavacchā thanaṃ gahetvā duhataṃ upāyavantānameva khīraṃ paggharāpeti,
tika-s0104t0:303_13: Kālepi vā visāṇādikaṃ gahetvā duhataṃ anupāyavantānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:303_14: tathā idampi nissaraṇādinā savanadhāraṇādīni kurutaṃ upāyavantānameva sīlādiatthe paggharāpeti,
tika-s0104t0:303_17: tathāpi sakammikadhātuttā paggharāpetīti kāritavasena attho vutto yathā “taratī”ti etassa nipātetīti attho”ti.
tika-s0104t0:304_5: yathā kāḷasuttaṃ pasāretvā saññāṇe kate gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:304_8: evaṃ vivādesu uppannesu sutte ānītamatte “idaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:304_16: Na vikiriyantīti ito cito ca vippakiṇṇābhāvamāha,
tika-s0104t0:304_19: yathā thirasuttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni vātena na vikiriyanti na viddhaṃsīyanti,
tika-s0104t0:304_20: evaṃ suttena saṅgahitā atthā micchāvādena na vikiriyanti na viddhaṃsīyantīti.
tika-s0104t0:304_21: Veneyyajjhāsayavasappavattāya ca desanāya attatthaparatthādīnaṃ sātisayappakāsanato āṇādhammasabhāvehi
tika-s0104t0:304_23: “Tenā”tiādīsu vuttanayānusārena sambandho ceva attho ca yathārahaṃ vattabbo.
tika-s0104t0:304_24: Ettha ca “suttantapiṭaka”nti heṭṭhā vuttepi antasaddassa avacanaṃ tassa visuṃ atthābhāvadassanatthaṃ tabbhāvavuttito.
tika-s0104t0:304_25: Sahayogassa hi saddassa avacanena sesatā tassa tulyādhikaraṇataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:305_2: Ettha abhidhamme vuḍḍhimanto dhammā yena vuttā,
tika-s0104t0:305_3: tena abhidhammo nāma akkhātoti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Abhi-
tika-s0104t0:305_4: saddassa atthavasenāyaṃ pabhedoti tassa tadatthappavattatādassanena tamatthaṃ sādhento “ayañhī”tiādimāha. Abhi-
tika-s0104t0:305_5: saddo kamanakiriyāya vuḍḍhibhāvasaṅkhātamatirekatthaṃ dīpetīti vuttaṃ “abhikkamantītiādīsu vuḍḍhiyaṃ āgato”ti.
tika-s0104t0:305_8: Aḍḍhacandādibhāvo hi rattiyā upalakkhaṇavasena paññāṇaṃ hoti “yasmā aḍḍho,
tika-s0104t0:305_15: idaṃ pana mūlapaṇṇāsake bhayabheravasutte abhilakkhitasaddapariyāyo abhiññātasaddoti āha “abhiññātā abhilakkhitātiādīsu lakkhaṇe”ti.
tika-s0104t0:305_19: Vācakasaddasannidhāne hi upasagganipātā tadatthajotakamattāti lakkhitasaddena vācakabhāvena pakāsitassa
tika-s0104t0:306_0: Abhidhammeti “supinantena sukkavisaṭṭhiyā anāpattibhāvepi akusalacetanā upalabbhatī”tiādinā vinayapaññattiyā saṅkaravirahite dhamme.
tika-s0104t0:306_1: Pubbāparavirodhābhāvena yathāvuttadhammānameva aññamaññasaṅkaravirahato aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhammetipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:306_2: “Pāṇātipāto akusala”nti evamādīsu vā maraṇādhippāyassa jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā akusalo,
tika-s0104t0:306_4: Tathā “adinnassa parasantakassa ādānasaṅkhātā viññatti abyākato dhammo,
tika-s0104t0:306_5: taṃviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā akusalo dhammo”ti evamādināpi aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhammeti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:306_6: Abhivinayeti ettha pana “jātarūparajataṃ na paṭiggahetabba”nti vadanto vinaye vineti nāma.
tika-s0104t0:306_8: evaṃ pana dukkaṭa”nti vadanto abhivinaye vineti nāmāti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:306_9: Tasmā jātarūparajataṃ parasantakaṃ theyyacittena gaṇhantassa yathāvatthuṃ pārājikathullaccayadukkaṭesu aññataraṃ,
tika-s0104t0:306_13: rūpiyachaḍḍakasammatassa anāpattīti evaṃ aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite vinayepi paṭibalo vinetunti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:306_14: Evaṃ pana paricchinnataṃ sarūpato saṅkhepeneva dassento “aññamañña…pe…
tika-s0104t0:307_5: “abhikkantenā”ti ettha kantiyā adhikattaṃ visiṭṭhabhāvaṃ dīpetīti idaṃ tāva yuttaṃ kiriyāvisesakattā upasaggassa.
tika-s0104t0:307_10: Na hi asatvavācī saddo satvavācako sambhavatīti?
tika-s0104t0:307_12: tāhi ca kiriyāhi yuttesu rājavinayesupi pavattattā.
tika-s0104t0:307_13: Abhipūjito rājāti hi atthena kiriyākārakasambandhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā kammasādhanabhūtaṃ rājadabbaṃ abhi-
tika-s0104t0:307_16: Tathā abhiparicchinno vinayoti atthena kiriyākārakasambandhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā kammasādhanabhūtaṃ vinayadabbaṃ abhi-
tika-s0104t0:307_21: saddo ettha saha sādhanena kiriyaṃ vadatīti abhirājaabhivinayasaddā sopasaggāva siddhā.
tika-s0104t0:307_22: Evaṃ abhidhammasaddepi abhisaddo saha sādhanena vuḍḍhiyādikiriyaṃ vadatīti ayamattho dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:308_2: tappayogena pana dhammasaddena dīpitā vuḍḍhimantādayo dhammā ettha vuttā na bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:308_3: kathaṃ ayamattho yujjeyyāti anuyoge sati taṃ pariharanto “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:308_8: tasmā tāhi bhāvanāpharaṇavuḍḍhīhi vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:308_10: Ekantato lokuttaradhammānaññeva pūjārahattā “sekkhā dhammā”tiādinā teyeva pūjitāti dassitā.
tika-s0104t0:308_14: Pūjitabbāyeva hi dhammā kālavisesaniyamarahitā pūjārahā ettha vuttāti adhippāyo dassito.
tika-s0104t0:309_0: Yaṃ panetthāti etesu vinayādīsu tīsu aññamaññavisiṭṭhesu yaṃ avisiṭṭhaṃ samānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:309_2: Vinayādayo hi tayo saddā aññamaññāsādhāraṇattā visiṭṭhā nāma,
tika-s0104t0:309_3: piṭakasaddo pana tehi tīhipi sādhāraṇattā “avisiṭṭho”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:309_6: Apica pariyattibbhājanatthato pariyattibhājanatthanti āhūti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:309_11: saddamicchanti neruttikā yathā “aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantī”ti etena pariyāpuṇitabbato,
tika-s0104t0:309_12: taṃtadatthānaṃ bhājanato ca piṭakaṃ nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:309_14: Saddavidū pana “piṭa saddasaṅghāṭesū”ti vatvā idha vuttameva payogamudāharanti,
tika-s0104t0:309_15: tasmā tesaṃ matena piṭīyati saddīyati pariyāpuṇīyatīti piṭakaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:309_16: piṭīyati vā saṅghāṭīyati taṃtadattho etthāti piṭakanti nibbacanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:310_2: Tadaṭṭhakathāyañca “amhākaṃ piṭakatantiyā saddhiṃ sametīti mā gaṇhitthā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0104t0:310_6: tassā dālanato vidālanato ayomayaupakaraṇaviseso kudālaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t0:310_7: Tesaṃ tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ bhājanabhāvato tālapaṇṇavettalatādīhi kato bhājanaviseso piṭakaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t0:311_4: idha pana vatticchāya vuttassevāti katvā “vinayo ca so piṭakañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:311_7: tassa tassa atthassa bhājanato cā”ti ca vuttaṃ sabbamatidisati.
tika-s0104t0:312_0: Kathetabbānaṃ atthānaṃ desakāyattena āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā.
tika-s0104t0:312_2: Kathetabbassa saṃvarāsaṃvarādino atthassa kathanaṃ vacanapaṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ kathā,
tika-s0104t0:312_6: kathetabbassa atthassa vasena kathāti evamimesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbanti.
tika-s0104t0:312_7: Ettha ca kiñcāpi desanādayo desetabbādinirapekkhā na honti,
tika-s0104t0:312_8: āṇādayo pana visesato desakādiadhīnāti taṃ taṃ visesayogavasena desanādīnaṃ bhedo vutto.
tika-s0104t0:312_9: Yathā hi āṇāvidhānaṃ visesato āṇārahādhīnaṃ tattha kosallayogato,
tika-s0104t0:312_10: evaṃ vohāraparamatthavidhānāni ca vidhāyakādhīnānīti āṇādividhino desakāyattatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:312_11: Aparādhajjhāsayānurūpaṃ viya ca dhammānurūpampi sāsanaṃ visesato,
tika-s0104t0:312_13: Saṃvarāsaṃvaranāmarūpānaṃ viya ca vinibbeṭhetabbāya diṭṭhiyā kathanaṃ sati vācāvatthusmiṃ,
tika-s0104t0:312_15: tasmā kathetabbassa atthassa vasena kathā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:317_0: Padattayampetaṃ samodhānetvā tāsaṃ bhedoti katvā bhedasaddo visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbo dvandapadato paraṃ suyyamānattā “desanābhedaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:318_5: tathā tampi sabbaṃ tahiṃ vibhāvayeti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:318_8: tathā tampi sabbaṃ tahiṃ vibhāvayeti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:318_11: Santesupi ca aññesu tathā pāpuṇantesu jeṭṭhaseṭṭhāsannasadāsannihitabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:318_12: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ sammāpaṭipajjanena dhammādhiṭṭhānabhāvato ca bhikkhūti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:319_4: Vibhāvanāti evaṃ paridīpanāyapi sati gūḷhaṃ paṭicchannamakatvā sotūnaṃ suviññeyyabhāvena āvibhāvanā.
tika-s0104t0:319_7: Apica etaṃ padadvayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttānurūpato kathitaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:319_13: Hīti kāraṇe nipāto “akkharavipattiyaṃ hī”tiādīsu viya. Yasmā,
tika-s0104t0:319_17: mahākāruṇikatāya ca aviparītahitopadesakabhāvena pamāṇavacanattā āṇārahena bhagavatāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:319_21: Visesena sattānaṃ manaṃ avaharatīti vohāro, paññatti,
tika-s0104t0:320_0: Pacuro bahulo aparādho doso vītikkamo yesaṃ te pacurāparādhā,
tika-s0104t0:323_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā.
tika-s0104t0:323_1: Yathāha “dvayanissito kho panāyaṃ kaccāna loko yebhuyyena atthitañca natthitañcā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:323_9: Catubbidho peso āsayanti sattā ettha nivasanti,
tika-s0104t0:323_10: cittaṃ vā āgamma seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya.
tika-s0104t0:323_11: Yathā migo gocarāya gantvāpi paccāgantvā tattheva vanagahane sayatīti taṃ tassa “āsayo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0104t0:323_12: tathā cittaṃ aññathāpi pavattitvā yattha paccāgamma seti,
tika-s0104t0:323_15: Mūsikavisaṃ viya kāraṇalābhe uppajjamānārahā anāgatā, atītā,
tika-s0104t0:323_21: Atha vā cariyāti sucaritaduccaritavasena duvidhaṃ caritaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:324_1: ajjeva arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmī’tiādinā tanninnabhāvena pavattamānaṃ sanniṭṭhāna”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:324_2: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “adhimutti nāma sattānaṃ pubbacariyavasena abhiruci,
tika-s0104t0:324_4: Tathā hi yāya hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikeyeva satte sevanti,
tika-s0104t0:324_6: Sace hi ācariyupajjhāyā sīlavanto na honti,
tika-s0104t0:324_15: Evamayaṃ hīnādhimuttikādīnaṃ aññamañño pasevanādiniyamitā abhiruci ajjhāsayadhātu “adhimuttī”ti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:324_17: anekā vā ajjhāsayādayo yesanti tathā yathā “bahukattuko,
tika-s0104t0:324_23: Ghanavinibbhogābhāvato diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena “ahaṃ mama santaka”nti evaṃ pavattasaññino.
tika-s0104t0:325_4: kāro yathā “asekkhā dhammā”ti taṃyogatāya ca khuddako saṃvaro pārisesādinayena saṃvaro,
tika-s0104t0:325_9: atthato pana tassa ujuvipaccanikā sammādiṭṭhiādayo dhammā.
tika-s0104t0:326_4: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vacanato āha “vinayapiṭake adhisīlasikkhā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:326_5: Suttantapāḷiyaṃ “vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā samādhidesanābāhullato “suttanta piṭake adhicittasikkhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:326_7: adhipaññāya ca atthāya tadavasesanāmarūpadhammakathanato āha “abhidhammapiṭake adhipaññāsikkhā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:327_8: Anusayavasena santāne anuvattantā kilesā kāraṇalābhe pariyuṭṭhitāpi sīlabhedabhayavasena vītikkamituṃ
tika-s0104t0:327_10: Okāsādānavasena kilesānaṃ citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:327_12: cittasantāne uppattivasena kilesānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānassa pahānanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:327_14: taṃ pana pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ cittasamādahanavasena bhavatīti āha “pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkhattā samādhissā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:327_15: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayanakā anurūpakāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo satta kilesā anusayā,
tika-s0104t0:327_17: te pana sabbaso ariyamaggapaññāya pahīyantīti āha “anusayapaṭipakkhattā paññāyā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:328_0: Dīpālokena viya tamassa dānādipuññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena tassa tassa akusalassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:328_1: Idha pana adhisīlasikkhāya vuttaṭṭhānattā tena tena susīlyaṅgena tassa tassa dussīlyaṅgassa pahānaṃ “tadaṅgappahāna”nti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:328_2: Upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattinivāraṇena ghaṭappahārena viya jalatale sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:328_4: Catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃ taṃ maggavato santāne samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa accantamappavattisaṅkhāta
tika-s0104t0:328_12: Kāyavacīduccaritavasena pavattasaṃkilesassa tadaṅgavasena pahānaṃ vuttaṃ sīlassa duccaritapaṭipakkhattā.
tika-s0104t0:328_16: tassa vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṃ vuttaṃ samādhissa kāmacchandapaṭipakkhattā.
tika-s0104t0:328_18: tassa samucchedavasena pahānaṃ vuttaṃ paññāya attādivinimuttasabhāva dhammappakāsanato.
tika-s0104t0:329_0: Ekamekasmiñcetthāti etesu tīsu piṭakesu ekamekasmiṃ piṭake, ca-
tika-s0104t0:329_5: atha kho paccekaṃ tadavayavānampīti sampiṇḍanaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t0:329_11: buddhādīhi bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanānaṃ āḷi pantīti “pāḷī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:330_0: Idha pana vinayagaṇṭhipadakārādīnaṃ saddavādīnaṃ matena pubbe vavatthāpitā paramatthasaddappabandhabhūtā tanti dhammo nāma. Iti-
tika-s0104t0:330_3: Tassāyevāti tassā yathāvuttāya eva tantiyā attho.
tika-s0104t0:330_5: dhāraṇādivasappavattena manasā pubbe vavatthāpitāya yathāvuttāya paramatthasaddappabandhabhūtāya tassā tantiyā.
tika-s0104t0:330_6: Desanāti pacchā paresamavabodhanatthaṃ desanāsaṅkhātā paramatthasaddappabandhabhūtā tantiyeva.
tika-s0104t0:330_7: Apica yathāvuttatanti saṅkhātasaddasamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo desanā. Tantiyā,
tika-s0104t0:330_11: vohārassa ca dīpako saddoyeva tanti nāmāti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:330_12: Tesaṃ pana vāde dhammassāpi saddasabhāvattā dhammadesanānaṃ ko visesoti ce?
tika-s0104t0:330_14: uggahaṇādivasena ca pubbe vavatthāpito paramatthasaddappabandho dhammo,
tika-s0104t0:330_15: pacchā paresaṃ avabodhanatthaṃ pavattito taṃ tadatthappakāsako saddo desanāti ayamimesaṃ visesoti.
tika-s0104t0:330_16: Atha vā yathāvuttasaddasamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo desanā desīyati samuṭṭhāpīyati saddo etenāti katvā musāvādādayo
tika-s0104t0:330_17: viya tatthāpi hi musāvādādisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādādisaddehi voharīyatīti.
tika-s0104t0:330_19: tathāpi mūlakāraṇabhāvato “akkharasaññāto”tiādīsu viya tassāyeva atthoti paramatthasaddoyeva atthassa ñāpakabhāvena vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:330_20: “Tassā tantiyā desanā”ti ca sadisavohārena vuttaṃ yathā “uppannā ca kusalādhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:331_0: Abhidhammagaṇṭhipadakārādīnaṃ pana paṇṇattivādīnaṃ matena sammutiparamatthabhedassa atthassa anurūpavācakabhāvena
tika-s0104t0:331_1: paramatthasaddesu ekantena bhagavatā manasā vavatthāpitā nāmapaññattipabandhabhūtā tanti dhammo nāma,
tika-s0104t0:331_3: Tassāyevāti tassā nāmapaññattibhūtāya tantiyā eva attho.
tika-s0104t0:331_4: Manasā vavatthāpitāyāti sammutiparamatthabhedassa atthassānurūpavācakabhāvena paramatthasaddesu bhagavatā
tika-s0104t0:331_6: Desanāti paresaṃ pabodhanena atisajjanā vācāya pakāsanā vacībhedabhūtā paramatthasaddappabandhasaṅkhātā tanti. Tantiyā,
tika-s0104t0:331_11: sabhāvavohārassa ca anurūpavaseneva bhagavatā manasā vavatthāpitā paṇṇatti idha “tantī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:331_12: Yadi ca saddavādīnaṃ matena saddoyeva idha tanti nāma siyā. Tantiyā,
tika-s0104t0:331_14: manasā vavatthāpitāya ca tantiyā vacībhedakaraṇamattaṃ ṭhapetvā desanāya nānattaṃ natthi.
tika-s0104t0:331_15: Tathā hi desanaṃ dassentena manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanāti vacībhedakaraṇamattaṃ vinā tantiyā saha desanāya anaññatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:331_16: Tathā ca upari “desanāti paññattī”ti vuttattā desanāya anaññabhāvena tantiyāpi paṇṇattibhāvo kathito hoti.
tika-s0104t0:332_0: Apica yadi tantiyā aññāyeva desanā siyā,
tika-s0104t0:332_1: “tantiyā ca tantiatthassa ca desanāya ca yathābhūtāvabodho”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t0:332_2: Evaṃ pana avatvā “tantiyā ca tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho”ti vuttattā tantiyā,
tika-s0104t0:332_4: Evañca katvā upari “desanā nāma paññattī”ti dassentena desanāya anaññabhāvato tantiyā paṇṇattibhāvo kathito hotīti.
tika-s0104t0:332_5: Tadubhayampi pana paramatthato saddoyeva paramatthavinimuttāya sammutiyā abhāvā,
tika-s0104t0:332_6: imameva ca nayaṃ gahetvā keci ācariyā “dhammo ca desanā ca paramatthato saddo evā”ti voharanti,
tika-s0104t0:332_10: Na hi kāmāvacarapaṭisandhivipākā “nibbattitaparamatthavisayāyevā”ti sakkā vattuṃ itthipurisādiākāraparivitakkapubbakānaṃ rāgādiakusalānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:332_12: Paramatthadhammamūlakattā panassa parikappassa paramatthavisayatā sakkā paññapetuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:332_15: saddavādīnaṃ matepi dhammadesanānaṃ nānattaṃ vuttanayeneva ācariyadhammapālattherā dīhi pakāsitanti.
tika-s0104t0:333_0: “Saddo dhammo desanā ca, iccāhu apare garū;
tika-s0104t0:334_0: Dhammo paṇṇatti saddo tu, desanā vāti cāpare”ti.
tika-s0104t0:335_0: Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhāti ettha tantiattho,
tika-s0104t0:335_2: tantiatthapaṭivedho cāti ime tayo tantivisayā hontīti vinayapiṭakādīnaṃ atthadesanāpaṭivedhādhārabhāvo yutto,
tika-s0104t0:335_3: piṭakāni pana tantiyevāti tesaṃ dhammādhārabhāvo kathaṃ yujjeyyāti?
tika-s0104t0:335_5: Samudāyo hi avayavassa parikappanāmattasiddhena ādhārabhāvena vuccati yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:335_6: Ettha ca dhammādīnaṃ dukkhogāhabhāvato tehi dhammādīhi vinayādayo gambhīrāti vinayādīnampi catubbidho gambhīrabhāvo vuttoyeva,
tika-s0104t0:335_11: Tesaṃ visayo attho vācakabhūtānaṃ tesameva vāccabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:335_14: desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya ca dukkhogāhabhāvo veditabbo,
tika-s0104t0:335_17: Dhammatthadesanānaṃ gambhīrabhāvato tabbisayo paṭivedhopi gambhīro yathā taṃ gambhīrassa udakassa pamāṇaggahaṇe dīghena pamāṇena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:335_19: Piṭakāvayavānaṃ dhammādīnaṃ vuccamāno gambhīrabhāvo taṃsamudāyassa piṭakassāpi vuttoyeva,
tika-s0104t0:335_26: dukkho vā ogāho anto pavisanametesūti dukkhogāhā.
tika-s0104t0:335_34: Ekadesena ogāhantehipi mandabuddhīhi patiṭṭhā laddhuṃ na sakkāyevāti dassetuṃ etaṃ puna vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:336_0: Idāni hetuhetuphalādīnampi vasena gambhīrabhāvaṃ dassento “aparo nayo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:336_2: So ca attano phalaṃ dahati vidahatīti dhammo da-
tika-s0104t0:336_5: Dhammasaddassa cettha hetupariyāyatā kathaṃ viññāyatīti āha “vuttañheta”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t0:336_7: Nanu ca “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena dhammassa hetubhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti?
tika-s0104t0:336_8: “Dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti etassa samāsapadassa avayavapadatthaṃ dassentena “hetumhi ñāṇa”nti vuttattā.
tika-s0104t0:336_9: “Dhamme paṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti ettha hi “dhamme”ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena “hetumhī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:336_12: ñāṇapaṭisambhidā saddā cāti imamatthaṃ vadantena sādhito dhammassa hetubhāvoti.
tika-s0104t0:336_13: Tathā “hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena sādhito atthassa hetuphalabhāvoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:336_15: tañca hetuanusārena arīyati adhigamīyatīti atthoti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:337_0: Desanāti paññattīti ettha saddavādīnaṃ vāde atthabyañjanakā aviparītābhilāpadhammaniruttibhūtā paramatthasaddappabandhasaṅkhātā
tika-s0104t0:337_6: Tameva sarūpato dassetuṃ “yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:337_13: Tesaṃ tesaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārādidhammānaṃ anurūpaṃ vā yathādhammaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:337_14: Desanāpi hi paṭivedho viya aviparītasavisayavibhāvanato dhammānurūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0104t0:337_16: Dhammābhilāpoti hi atthabyañjanako aviparītābhilāpo dhammaniruttibhūto tantisaṅkhāto paramatthasaddappabandho.
tika-s0104t0:337_18: dhammo aviparīto sabhāvabhūto abhilāpo dhammābhilāpoti vuccati,
tika-s0104t0:337_19: etena “tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti ettha vuttaṃ dhammaniruttiṃ dasseti saddasabhāvattā desanāya.
tika-s0104t0:337_20: Tathā hi niruttipaṭisambhidāya parittārammaṇādibhāvo paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0104t0:337_21: Tadaṭṭhakathāya ca “taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”tiādinā tassā saddārammaṇatā dassitā.
tika-s0104t0:337_22: “Imassa atthassa ayaṃ saddo vācako”ti hi vacanavacanatthe vavatthapetvā taṃ taṃ vacanatthavibhāvanavasena pavattito saddo “desanā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:337_23: “Adhippāyo”ti etena “desanāti paññattī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ dhammaniruttābhilāpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:337_24: na tato vinimuttaṃ paññattiṃ sandhāyāti dasseti anekadhā atthasambhave attanā adhippetatthasseva vuttattāti ayaṃ saddavādīnaṃ vādato vinicchayo.
tika-s0104t0:338_0: Paññattivādīnaṃ vāde pana sammutiparamatthabhedassa atthassānurūpavācakabhāvena paramatthasaddesu bhagavatā
tika-s0104t0:338_1: manasā vavatthāpitā tantisaṅkhātā nāmapaññatti desanā nāma,
tika-s0104t0:338_3: Tadeva mūlakāraṇabhūtassa saddassa dassanavasena kāraṇūpacārena dassetuṃ “yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:338_4: Kiñcāpi hi “dhammābhilāpo”ti ettha abhilappati uccārīyatīti abhilāpoti saddo vuccati,
tika-s0104t0:338_6: tathāpi sadde vuccamāne tadanurūpaṃ vohāraṃ gahetvā tena vohārena dīpitassa atthassa jānanato sadde kathite
tika-s0104t0:338_8: Apica “dhammābhilāpoti attho”ti avatvā “dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo”ti vuttattā desanā nāma saddo na hotīti dīpitameva.
tika-s0104t0:338_10: na idha gahetabbo “desanā”ti etassa atthoti ayaṃ paññattivādīnaṃ vādato vinicchayo.
tika-s0104t0:338_13: etena heṭṭhā vuttaṃ desanāsamuṭṭhāpakaṃ cittuppādaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:339_7: sabhāvato ca pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “so cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:339_14: Tattha visayato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho nāma avijjādidhammārammaṇo,
tika-s0104t0:339_17: Asammohato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho nāma nibbānārammaṇo maggasampayutto yathāvuttadhammatthapaññattīsu
tika-s0104t0:339_21: ayaṃ tadubhayānurūpo vohāro”ti evaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena lokiyañāṇaṃ visayato paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0104t0:339_22: lokuttarañāṇaṃ pana tesu hetuhetuphalādīsu sammohassañāṇena samucchinnattā asammohato paṭivijjhati.
tika-s0104t0:340_2: saṅkhāre uppādeti avijjā”ti evaṃ kāriyānurūpaṃ kāraṇesūti attho.
tika-s0104t0:340_3: Atha vā “puññābhisaṅkhāraapuññābhisaṅkhāraāneñjābhisaṅkhāresu tīsu apuññābhisaṅkhārassa avijjā sampayuttapaccayo,
tika-s0104t0:340_4: itaresaṃ yathānurūpa”ntiādinā kāriyānurūpaṃ kāraṇesu paṭivedhotipi attho.
tika-s0104t0:340_10: Paṭivijjhīyatīti paṭivedhoti hi taṃtaṃrūpādidhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvo vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:341_7: Yo cetthāti yo etāsu taṃ taṃ piṭakāgatāsu dhammatthadesanāsu paṭivedho,
tika-s0104t0:341_8: yo ca etesu piṭakesu tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvoti attho.
tika-s0104t0:341_10: so sammā anupacito yehi te anupacitakusalasambhārā,
tika-s0104t0:341_14: paññāya vā duṭṭhubhāvo dūsitabhāvo ca sambhavatīti nippaññattāyeva duppaññā yathā “dussīlo”ti.
tika-s0104t0:341_15: Ettha ca avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ dhammatthānaṃ duppaṭivijjhatāya dukkhogāhatā,
tika-s0104t0:341_21: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya anūnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paridīpitatthabhāvaṃ dassento “ettāvatā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:341_23: niyamāya vā”ti iminā punārambhavacanena anūnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paridīpitatthabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:341_26: Etaṃ vā parimāṇaṃ yassāti ettāvaṃ, tena,
tika-s0104t0:341_28: “Sadde hi vutte tadatthopi vuttoyeva nāmā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:342_6: Atha vā vatticchānupubbikattā saddapaṭipattiyā niddhāraṇamidha avattukāmena ādhāroyeva vutto.
tika-s0104t0:342_7: Na cettha codetabbaṃ “tīsuyeva piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo siyā”ti samudāyavasena vuttassāpi vākyassa avayavādhippāyasambhavato.
tika-s0104t0:342_17: Atha vā tīhi pakārehi pariyāpuṇitabbā pāḷiyo eva “pariyattī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0104t0:342_18: Tathā ceva abhidhammaṭṭhakathāya sīhaḷagaṇṭhipade vuttanti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:342_19: Evampi hi alagaddūpamāpariyāpuṇanayogato “alagaddūpamā pariyattī”ti pāḷipi sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0104t0:342_20: Evañca katvā “duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā alagaddūpamā”ti parato niddesavacanampi upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:343_4: veṇikoti ettha vīṇāsaddena vīṇāvādanaggahaṇaṃ viya ca.
tika-s0104t0:343_7: “Alagaddaggahaṇūpamā”ti vā vattabbe majjhepadalopaṃ katvā “alagaddūpamā”ti vuttaṃ “oṭṭhamukho”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t0:343_11: tasmā alaṃ pariyatto paripuṇṇo gado assāti alagaddo anunāsikalopaṃ, da-
tika-s0104t0:343_13: alaṃ vā jīvitaharaṇe samattho gado yassāti alagaddo vuttanayena.
tika-s0104t0:345_1: catuparisamajjhe vā maṃ jānissantī’ti lābhasakkārahetu pariyāpuṇāti,
tika-s0104t0:345_3: Evaṃ pariyāpuṇanato hi buddhavacanaṃ apariyāpuṇitvā niddokkamanaṃ varatara”nti.
tika-s0104t0:346_1: evañca sati suggahitāpi pariyatti “alagaddūpamā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati tatthāpi alagaddaggahaṇassa upamābhāvena pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā.
tika-s0104t0:347_5: ajapadena daṇḍena suniggahitaṃ niggahitvā gīvāya suggahitaṃ gaṇheyya.
tika-s0104t0:347_7: alagaddo tassa purisassa hatthaṃ vā bāhaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ bhogehi paliveṭheyya.
tika-s0104t0:347_8: Atha kho so neva tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:347_13: idhekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ geyya”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t0:348_0: Tasmā idha duggahitā eva pariyatti alagaddūpamāti ayaṃ viseso kuto viññāyati,
tika-s0104t0:348_4: Tathā hi nissaraṇatthabhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīnaṃ visuṃ gahitattā pārisesato alagaddassa duggahaṇūpamāyeva pariyatti “alagaddūpamā”ti viññāyati.
tika-s0104t0:348_5: Alagaddassa suggahaṇūpamā hi pariyatti nissaraṇatthā vā hoti,
tika-s0104t0:349_16: katthaci pana kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva agganakhā “hattho”ti vuttaṃ bāhāya visuṃ anāgatattā.
tika-s0104t0:349_17: Vuttalakkhaṇaṃ hatthañca bāhañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sarīraṃ aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:349_20: Taṃ hatthādīsu ḍaṃsanaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ etassāti “tannidāna”nti hi vattabbe “tatonidāna”nti purimapade paccattatthe nissakkavacanaṃ katvā,
tika-s0104t0:349_24: Apica “tatonidāna”nti etaṃ “maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkha”nti ettha vuttanayena visesanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:349_25: Taṃ kissa hetūti yaṃ vuttaṃ hatthādīsu ḍaṃsanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:349_27: taṃ kissa hetu kena kāraṇenāti ce?
tika-s0104t0:350_4: sajjhāyanti ceva vācuggataṃ karontā dhārenti cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:350_6: Na hi suttādinavaṅgato añño dhammo nāma atthi.
tika-s0104t0:350_12: Yañhi padaṃ sutisāmaññena anekadhā atthaṃ dīpeti,
tika-s0104t0:350_15: Na upaparikkhantīti na pariggaṇhanti na vicārenti.
tika-s0104t0:350_16: Ikkhasaddassa hi dassanaṅkesu idha dassanameva attho,
tika-s0104t0:350_26: mayañca taṃ pūressāmā”ti evaṃ bhāsitatthavīmaṃsañceva “sīlaṃ samādhissa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:350_27: samādhi vipassanāyā”tiādinā payojanatthavīmaṃsañca na karontīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:350_29: Na nijjhānakkhamantīti nijjhānaṃ nissesena pekkhanaṃ paññaṃ na khamanti. Jhe-
tika-s0104t0:350_36: tasmā paññāya disvā rocetvā gahetabbā na hontīti adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:350_40: tena imamatthaṃ dīpeti “tesaṃ paññāya atthassa anupaparikkhanato te dhammā na upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0104t0:350_43: vivaṭṭhaṃ kathitanti evaṃ jānituṃ na sakkā hontī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:351_0: Upārambhānisaṃsā cevāti paresaṃ vāde dosāropanānisaṃsā ca hutvā.
tika-s0104t0:351_1: Bhuso ārambhanañhi paresaṃ vāde dosāropanaṃ upārambho,
tika-s0104t0:351_4: Iti vādappamokkhānisaṃsā cāti iti evaṃ etāya pariyattiyā vādappamokkhānisaṃsā attano upari parehi āropitassa vādassa niggahassa attato,
tika-s0104t0:351_11: attano upari āropitassa pamokkho ānisaṃso yesaṃ tathā.
tika-s0104t0:351_12: Āropitavādo hi “vādo”ti vutto yathā “devena datto datto”ti.
tika-s0104t0:351_17: nindaṃ vā evañca evañca mocessāmāti iminā ca kāraṇena pariyāpuṇantīti.
tika-s0104t0:351_18: Atha vā so so vādo iti vādo iti-
tika-s0104t0:351_27: bhedyabhedakaṃ vā etaṃ yathā “kathinassatthāya ābhataṃ dussa”nti.
tika-s0104t0:351_32: Dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti hi jātiācāravasena duvidhāpi kulaputtā ñāyena dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:351_33: Tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhontīti assa dhammassa sīlādipūraṇasaṅkhātaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:351_34: maggaphalanibbānabhūtaṃ vā anupādāvimokkhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ ete duggahitagāhino nānubhonti na vindantiyeva.
tika-s0104t0:352_2: itivādappamokkhassa vā atthāya ye moghapurisā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
tika-s0104t0:352_3: te parehi “ayamattho na hotī”ti vutte duggahitattāyeva “tadatthova hotī”ti paṭipādanakkhamā na honti,
tika-s0104t0:352_4: tasmā parassa vāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ attano vādaṃ pamocetuñca asakkontāpi taṃ atthaṃ nānubhonti ca na vindantiyevāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:352_7: “Tesa”ntiādīsu tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitattā upārambhamānadabbamakkhapalāsādihetubhāvena dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:352_11: Ettha ca kāraṇe phalavohāravasena “te dhammā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī’ti vuttaṃ yathā “ghatamāyu,
tika-s0104t0:352_13: Tathā hi kiñcāpi na te dhammā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti,
tika-s0104t0:352_15: vivādakāle ca tammūlakānaṃ upārambhādīnaṃ anekesaṃ akusalānaṃ uppattisambhavato “te…pe…
tika-s0104t0:352_17: Taṃ kissa hetūti ettha nti yathāvuttassatthassa ananubhavanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:352_18: tesañca dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanaṃ parāmasati.
tika-s0104t0:353_0: Yā panāti ettha kiriyā pāḷivasena vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:353_1: Tattha kiriyāpakkhe yā suggahitāti abhedepi bhedavohāro “cārikaṃ pakkamati,
tika-s0104t0:353_5: Yo hi buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā,
tika-s0104t0:353_10: tasseva sā pariyatti nissaraṇatthā nāma hoti.
tika-s0104t0:353_13: Dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantīti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne sīlādīni pūrentānampi arahattaṃ patvā
tika-s0104t0:353_14: parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desetvā dhammadesanāya pasannehi upanīte cattāro paccaye paribhuñjantānampi paresaṃ
tika-s0104t0:353_15: vāde sahadhammena upārambhaṃ āropentānampi sakavādato parehi āropitadosaṃ pariharantānampi dīgharattaṃ
tika-s0104t0:353_17: Tathā hi na kevalaṃ suggahitapariyattiṃ nissāya maggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyādīniyeva,
tika-s0104t0:353_19: Tathā ca vuttaṃ parinibbānasuttā dīsu “uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desessantī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:354_0: Yaṃ panāti etthāpi vuttanayena duvidhena attho.
tika-s0104t0:354_6: catunnañca phalānaṃ avinassanabhāve sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ sakasakanāmapariccāgena uparūpari nāmantarappattito
tika-s0104t0:354_8: Arahā pana sabbadāpi arahāyeva nāmāti tasseva phalaṃ puggalanāmavasena “akuppa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:354_9: iminā ca imamatthaṃ dasseti “khīṇāsavasseva pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāmā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:354_13: tasmā so buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇantopi tantidhārako paveṇīpālako vaṃsānurakkhakova hutvā pariyāpuṇāti,
tika-s0104t0:354_15: Paveṇī cettha dhammasantati dhammassa avicchedena pavatti.
tika-s0104t0:355_0: Nanu ca yadi paveṇīpālanatthāya buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti,
tika-s0104t0:355_2: Ekaccassa hi puthujjanassāpi ayaṃ nayo labbhati.
tika-s0104t0:355_3: Tathā hi ekacco puthujjano bhikkhu chātakabhayādinā ganthadhuresu ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasitumasakkontesu sayaṃ
tika-s0104t0:355_8: Tasmā tassāpi pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāma kasmā na hotīti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t0:355_9: evaṃ santepi hi puthujjanassa pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāma na hoti.
tika-s0104t0:355_10: Kiñcāpi hi puthujjano “paveṇiṃ pālessāmī”ti ajjhāsayena pariyāpuṇāti,
tika-s0104t0:355_11: attano pana bhavakantārato avitiṇṇattā tassa sā pariyatti nissaraṇatthāyeva nāma hoti,
tika-s0104t0:355_12: tasmā puthujjanassa pariyatti alagaddupamā vā hoti,
tika-s0104t0:355_17: Yathā hi bhaṇḍāgāriko alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā pasādhanakāle tadupiyaṃ alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ rañño upanāmetvā taṃ alaṅkaroti,
tika-s0104t0:355_18: evaṃ khīṇāsavopi dhammaratanabhaṇḍaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mokkhādhigamāya bhabbarūpe sahetuke satte passitvā
tika-s0104t0:355_19: tadanurūpaṃ dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggaṅgabojjhaṅgādisaṅkhātena lokuttarena alaṅkārena alaṅkarotīti.
tika-s0104t0:356_0: Evaṃ tisso pariyattiyo vibhajitvā idāni tīsupi piṭakesu yathārahaṃ sampattivipattiyo niddhāretvā vibhajanto “vinaye panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:356_1: “Sīlasampadaṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇātī”tiādīsu yasmā sīlaṃ visujjhamānaṃ satisampajaññabalena,
tika-s0104t0:356_5: ñāṇabalañca paccupaṭṭhapetīti tassā vijjattayūpanissayatā veditabbā sabhāgahetusampādanato.
tika-s0104t0:356_7: Sampajaññabalena sabbakiccesu sudiṭṭhakāritāparicayena cutūpapātañāṇānubaddhāya dutiyavijjāya siddhi.
tika-s0104t0:356_9: Puretarasiddhānaṃ samādhipaññānaṃ pāripūriṃ vinā sīlassa āsavakkhayañāṇūpanissayatā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavehi dīpetabbā.
tika-s0104t0:356_10: “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vacanato samādhisampadā chaḷabhiññatāya upanissayo.
tika-s0104t0:356_11: “Yogā ve jāyate bhūrī”ti vacanato pubbayogena garuvāsadesabhāsākosallauggahaṇaparipucchādīhi ca paribhāvitā
tika-s0104t0:356_13: Ettha ca “sīlasampadaṃ nissāyā”ti vuttattā yassa samādhivijambhanabhūtā anavasesā cha abhiññā na ijjhanti,
tika-s0104t0:356_14: tassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena na samādhisampadā atthīti satipi vijjānaṃ abhiññekadesabhāve sīlasampadāsamudāgatā eva tisso vijjā gahitā,
tika-s0104t0:356_15: yathā ca paññāsampadāsamudāgatā catasso paṭisambhidā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhanti maggakkhaṇeyeva tāsaṃ paṭiladdhattā.
tika-s0104t0:356_17: samādhisampadāsamudāgatā ca cha abhiññā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhantīti maggādhigameneva tāsaṃ adhigamo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:356_19: sammāsambuddhānañca paccekabodhisammāsambodhisamadhigamasadisā hi imesaṃ ariyānaṃ ime visesādhigamāti.
tika-s0104t0:357_0: Tāsaṃyeva ca tattha pabhedavacanatoti ettha “tāsaṃyevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ pāpuṇitabbānaṃ chaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:357_3: Casaddena samuccinanañca tāsaṃ ettha ekadesavacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ abhiññāpaṭisambhidānampi ekadesānaṃ tattha vuttattā.
tika-s0104t0:357_4: Dutiye “tāsaṃyevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ catasso paṭisambhidā apekkhitvā kataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:357_6: Tā hi chasu abhiññāsu antogadhattā sutte vibhattāyevāti. Ca-
tika-s0104t0:357_14: tattheva ca sammā vibhattabhāvaṃ dīpetukāmo heṭṭhā vuttanayena avadhāraṇamakatvā “tatthevā”ti parivattetvā avadhāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti.
tika-s0104t0:357_17: catasso ca paṭisambhidā aññe ca sammappadhānādayo guṇavisesā vibhattā.
tika-s0104t0:357_19: visesato pana paññājātikattā catassova paṭisambhidā pāpuṇātīti dassanatthaṃ ‘tāsañca tatthevā’ti avadhāraṇavipallāso kato”ti vajirabuddhitthero.
tika-s0104t0:358_2: tesaṃ phassasāmaññato sukho vā samphasso tathā,
tika-s0104t0:358_8: So hi bahussuto dhammakathiko kammakilesavipākaupavādaāṇāvītikkamavasena pañcavidhesu antarāyikesu āṇāvītikkamantarāyikaṃ na jānāti,
tika-s0104t0:358_10: tasmā so rahogato evaṃ cintesi “ime agārikā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi honti,
tika-s0104t0:358_16: etepi vaṭṭantiyevā”ti anavajjena paccayaparibhogarasena sāvajjaṃ kāmaguṇaparibhogarasaṃ saṃsanditvā sachandarāgaparibhogañca
tika-s0104t0:358_17: nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thullavākehi saddhiṃ atisukhumasuttaṃ ghaṭento viya,
tika-s0104t0:358_18: sāsapena saddhiṃ sineruno sadisataṃ upasaṃharanto viya ca pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppādetvā “kiṃ bhagavatā
tika-s0104t0:358_19: mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya mahatā ussāhena paṭhamapārājikaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:358_20: natthi ettha doso”ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanto vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhanto ariyamagge
tika-s0104t0:358_21: khāṇukaṇṭakādīni pakkhipanto “methunadhamme doso natthī”ti jinacakke pahāramadāsi,
tika-s0104t0:359_7: ye ime dhammā antarāyikā iti bhagavatā vuttā desitā ceva paññattā ca,
tika-s0104t0:359_8: te dhamme paṭisevato paṭisevantassa yathā yena pakārena te dhammā antarāyāya saggamokkhānaṃ antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ nālaṃ samatthā na honti,
tika-s0104t0:359_9: tathā tena pakārena ahaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ ājānāmīti.
tika-s0104t0:359_10: Tato dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇātīti tato anavajjasaññibhāvahetuto vītikkamitvā dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0104t0:369_0: Na hi lokasammutiṃ buddhā bhagavanto vijahanti,
tika-s0104t0:369_1: lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyā lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti.
tika-s0104t0:369_3: kammassakatādīpanattha”nti evamādīhipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ kathetī”ti evaṃ adhippāyamajānanto.
tika-s0104t0:369_5: Duggahitaṃ gaṇhātīti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
tika-s0104t0:369_6: yathā tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”ntiādinā duggahitaṃ katvā gaṇhāti,
tika-s0104t0:369_8: Duggahitanti hi bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso kiriyāyavisesanabhāvena napuṃsakaliṅgena niddisitabbattā.
tika-s0104t0:369_15: Majjhimanikāye mūlapaṇṇāsake mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasutte tathāvādīnaṃ sādhināmakaṃ kevaṭṭaputtaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhagavatā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:369_23: Attano kusalamūlāni khananto attānaṃ khanati nāma.
tika-s0104t0:370_3: sabbampi cittaṃ sabhāvadhammārammaṇameva hotī”ti ca evamādinā atikkamitvā pavattayamāno.
tika-s0104t0:370_13: imāni vā cattāri acinteyyāni nāma na cintetabbāni,
tika-s0104t0:370_15: tasmā na cintetabbāni acintetabbabhūtāni imāni cattāri acinteyyāni nāmāti yojanā. Iti-
tika-s0104t0:371_1: Buddhānaṃ bhikkhave buddhavisayo acinteyyo na cintetabbo,
tika-s0104t0:371_2: yaṃ cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assa.
tika-s0104t0:372_0: Caturaṅguttare vuttaṃ acinteyyasuttaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ acinteyyabhāvadīpakaṃ pāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:372_3: imāni pana evaṃ na honti aphalabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:376_1: Gāthāya pana yassa nikāyassa suttagaṇanato catuttiṃseva suttantā.
tika-s0104t0:376_2: Vaggasaṅgahavasena tayo vaggā assa saṅgahassāti tivaggo saṅgaho.
tika-s0104t0:376_3: Paṭhamo esa nikāyo dīghanikāyoti anulomiko apaccanīko,
tika-s0104t0:376_6: Tattha “tivaggo saṅgaho”ti etaṃ “yassā”ti antarikepi samāsoyeva hoti,
tika-s0104t0:376_7: na vākyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ “navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhenā”ti ettha “navaṃcīvaralābhenā”ti padaṃ viya.
tika-s0104t0:376_17: atthato ca vākye yuttiyāabhāvato samāsoyeva sambhavati.
tika-s0104t0:376_21: tathā ca sati napuṃsakaliṅgameva siyā “tiloka”ntiādipadaṃ viya.
tika-s0104t0:376_22: Tathā “tivaggo”ti etassa “saṅgaho”ti padamantarena aññatthāsambandho na sambhavati,
tika-s0104t0:376_23: tattha ca tādisena vākyena sambajjhanaṃ na yuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:376_24: tasmā samānepi padantarantarike saddatthāvirodhabhāvoyeva samāsatākāraṇanti samāso eva yutto.
tika-s0104t0:376_25: Tayo vaggā assa saṅgahassāti hi tivaggosaṅgaho akārassa okārādesaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:376_29: assa saṅgahassāti ca saṅgahitassa assa nikāyassāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:376_30: Apare pana “tayo vaggā yassāti katvā ‘saṅgaho’ti padena tulyādhikaraṇameva sambhavati,
tika-s0104t0:376_32: Ṭīkācariyehi pana ‘tayo vaggā assa saṅgahassā’ti padadvayassa tulyādhikaraṇatāyeva dassitā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:377_4: nikāyasaddo ca ruḷhivasena samūhanivāsatthesu vattatīti dasseti “dīghappamāṇāna”ntiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:377_5: Saṅketasiddhattā vacanīyavācakānaṃ payogato tadatthesu tassa saṅketasiddhataṃ ñāpento “nāha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:377_8: Yathayidanti yathā ime tiracchānagatā pāṇā. Poṇikā,
tika-s0104t0:377_17: Tathā hi manorathapūraṇiyaṃ vuttaṃ “pañcagarujātakaṃ pana sakkhibhāvatthāya āharitvā kathetabba”nti sāsanatoti sāsanapayogato,
tika-s0104t0:379_10: “Suttantānaṃ sahassāni satta suttasatāni cā”ti pāṭhe suttantānaṃ satta sahassāni,
tika-s0104t0:380_0: Ekekehi aṅgehi uparūpari uttaro adhiko etthāti aṅguttaroti āha “ekekaaṅgātirekavasenā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:380_1: Tattha hi ekekato paṭṭhāya yāva ekādasa aṅgāni kathitāni.
tika-s0104t0:381_1: Vuttameva pakārantarena saṅkhipitvā avisesetvā dassetuṃ “ṭhapetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:381_2: “Sakalaṃ vinayapiṭaka”ntiādinā vuttameva hi iminā pakārantarena saṅkhipitvā dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:381_3: Apica yathāvuttato avasiṭṭhaṃ yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā dinnanaye ṭhatvā desitaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:381_5: taṃ sabbampi ettheva pariyāpannanti anavasesapariyādānavasena dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:381_6: Siddhepi hi sati ārambho atthantaraviññāpanāya vā hoti,
tika-s0104t0:381_9: evaṃ “khuddakappamāṇāna”ntiādimavatvā sarūpasseva kathanaṃ vinayābhidhammādīnaṃ dīghappamāṇānampi tadantogadhatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:381_10: tena ca viññāyati “na sabbattha khuddakapariyāpannesu tassa anvatthasamaññatā,
tika-s0104t0:382_0: Navappabhedanti ettha kathaṃ panetaṃ navappabhedaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:382_1: Tathā hi navahi aṅgehi vavatthitehi aññamaññasaṅkararahitehi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:382_2: tathā ca sati asuttasabhāvāneva geyyaṅgādīni siyuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:382_4: evaṃ sati suttanti visuṃ suttaṅgameva na siyā,
tika-s0104t0:382_10: tasmā aṅgadvayeneva tadubhayaṃ saṅgahitanti tadubhayavinimuttaṃ suttaṃ udānādivisesasaññārahitaṃ natthi,
tika-s0104t0:382_13: maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ viya.
tika-s0104t0:382_14: Geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya.
tika-s0104t0:387_0: Sabbassāpi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi.
tika-s0104t0:387_1: Tathā hi “ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:387_3: sakavāde pañca suttasatānī”tiādi vacanato vinayābhidhammapariyatti visesesupi suttavohāro dissati.
tika-s0104t0:387_4: Teneva ca āyasmā mahākaccāyano nettiyaṃ āha “navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhī”ti tattha hi suttādivasena navaṅgassa
tika-s0104t0:387_5: sāsanassa pariyeṭṭhi pariyesanā atthavicāraṇā “navavidha suttantapariyeṭṭhī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:387_6: Tadekadesesu pana pare geyyādayo sanimittā visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā.
tika-s0104t0:387_8: Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ “geyya”nti vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:387_9: gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:387_12: Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
tika-s0104t0:387_16: Yathādhippetassa hi atthassa anadhippetato byavacchedakaṃ visesanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:387_20: abbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṃ gāthāudānaitivuttaka abbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā.
tika-s0104t0:387_21: Ettha hi satipi saññāntaranimittayoge anokāsasaññānaṃ balavabhāveneva gāthādisaññā patiṭṭhitā,
tika-s0104t0:387_22: tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā patiṭṭhitā,
tika-s0104t0:387_24: sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitā,
tika-s0104t0:387_25: evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo,
tika-s0104t0:387_28: Nanu ca evaṃ santepi sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:387_29: niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti tadubhayavinimuttassa suttassa abhāvato visuṃ suttaṅgameva na siyāti codanā tadavatthā evāti?
tika-s0104t0:387_31: Sodhitañhi pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittanti.
tika-s0104t0:388_0: Yañca vuttaṃ “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, tampi na,
tika-s0104t0:388_3: Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena saññitāni,
tika-s0104t0:388_6: Yañca pana vuttaṃ “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:388_10: Sahabhāvo hi nāma attato aññena hoti.
tika-s0104t0:388_12: na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttapadeso atthi,
tika-s0104t0:388_14: nanu ca gāthāsamudāyo tadekadesāhi gāthāhi añño hoti,
tika-s0104t0:388_15: yassa vasena “saha gāthāhī”ti sakkā vattunti? Taṃ na.
tika-s0104t0:388_16: Na hi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci atthi,
tika-s0104t0:388_18: Katthaci pana “dīghasuttaṅkitassā”tiādīsu samudāyekadesānaṃ vibhāgavacanaṃ vohāramattaṃ pati pariyāyavacanameva,
tika-s0104t0:388_20: Yampi vuttaṃ “ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṃ geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā”ti, tampi na, aññato.
tika-s0104t0:389_0: Idāni etāni navaṅgāni vibhajitvā dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Niddeso nāma suttanipāte –
tika-s0104t0:391_0: Addhā pītimano hoti, laddhā macco yadicchatī”tiādinā. ; –
tika-s0104t0:402_0: Āgatassa khaggavisāṇasuttassa ca atthavibhāgavasena satthukappena āyasmatā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherena kato niddeso,
tika-s0104t0:402_6: Apare pana niddesassa gāthāveyyākaraṇaṅgesu dvīsu saṅgahaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:404_0: Ettha tāva katthaci pucchāvissajjanasabbhāvato niddesekadesassa veyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho yujjatu,
tika-s0104t0:404_2: Dhammāpadādīnaṃ viya hi kevalaṃ gāthābandhabhāvo gāthaṅgassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:404_3: Dhammapadādīsu hi kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu gāthāsamaññā patiṭṭhitā,
tika-s0104t0:404_4: niddese ca na koci kevalo gāthābandappadeso upalabbhati.
tika-s0104t0:404_5: Sammāsambuddhena bhāsitānaṃyeva hi aṭṭhakavaggādisaṅgahitānaṃ gāthānaṃ niddesamattaṃ dhammasenāpatinā kataṃ.
tika-s0104t0:404_6: Atthavibhajanatthaṃ ānītāpi hi tā aṭṭhakavaggādisaṅgahitā niddisitabbā mūlagāthāyo suttanipātapariyāpannattā
tika-s0104t0:404_7: aññāyevāti na niddesasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu āgatāpi taṃ vohāramalabhamānā jātakādipariyāpannā
tika-s0104t0:405_0: Nālakasuttaṃ nāma dhammacakkappavattita divasato sattame divase nālakattherassa “moneyyaṃ te upaññissa”ntiādinā
tika-s0104t0:405_2: Tuvaṭṭakasuttaṃ nāma mahāsamayasuttantadesanāya sannipatitesu devesu “kā nu kho arahattappattiyā paṭipattī”ti
tika-s0104t0:405_3: uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā “mūlaṃ papañcasaṅkhāyā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t0:405_5: Evamidha suttanipāte āgatānaṃ maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho dassito,
tika-s0104t0:405_6: tattheva āgatānaṃ asuttanāmikānaṃ suddhikagāthānaṃ gāthaṅgasaṅgahañca dassayissati,
tika-s0104t0:408_4: aññathā suttanipāte niggāthakassa suttasseva abhāvato veyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho na codetabbo siyā,
tika-s0104t0:408_6: aññāsu ca vinayaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttanayeneva tassa suttaṅgagāthaṅgasaṅgaho dassitoti.
tika-s0104t0:409_0: “Aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ nāma paṭisambhidādī”ti tīsupi kira gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:409_4: No suttanāmikāti asuttanāmikā saṅgītikāle suttasamaññāya apaññātā.
tika-s0104t0:409_5: “Suddhikagāthā nāma vatthugāthā”ti tīsupi kira gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:409_6: vatthugāthāti ca pārāyanavaggassa nidānamāropentena āyasmatā ānandattherena saṅgītikāle vuttā chappaññāsa gāthāyo,
tika-s0104t0:409_7: nālakasuttassa nidānamāropentena teneva tadā vuttā vīsatimattā gāthāyo ca vuccanti.
tika-s0104t0:409_8: Suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “parinibbute bhagavati saṅgītiṃ karontenāyasmatā mahākassapena tameva moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puṭṭho āyasmā ānando yena,
tika-s0104t0:409_9: yadā ca samādapito nālakatthero bhagavantaṃ pucchi,
tika-s0104t0:409_10: taṃ sabbaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetukāmo ‘ānandajāte’tiādikā vīsati vatthugāthāyo vatvā vissajjesi,
tika-s0104t0:409_11: taṃ sabbampi ‘nālakasutta”nti vuccatī”ti āgatattā nālakasuttassa vatthugāthāyo nālakasuttaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0104t0:409_12: gahitāti pārāyanavaggassa vatthugāthāyo idha suddhikagāthāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:409_13: Tattheva ca pārāyanavagge ajitamāṇavakādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ pucchāgāthā,
tika-s0104t0:409_14: bhagavato vissajjanagāthā ca pāḷiyaṃ suttanāmena avatvā ‘ajitamāṇavakapucchā,
tika-s0104t0:409_16: cuṇṇiyaganthe hi asammissattā ca “no suttanāmikā suddhikagāthā nāmā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t0:410_0: “Somanassañāṇamayikagāthāpaṭisaṃyuttā”ti etena udānaṭṭhena udānanti anvatthasaññataṃ dasseti kimidaṃ udānaṃ nāma?
tika-s0104t0:410_2: Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t0:410_5: Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t0:410_8: evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ antohadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t0:410_9: so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi vacīdvārena nikkhanto paṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāraviseso “udāna”nti
tika-s0104t0:410_10: vuccati “uda mode kīḷāyañcā”ti hi akkharacintakā vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:410_11: idañca yebhuyyena vuttaṃ dhammasaṃvegavasena uditassāpi “sace bhāyatha dukkhassā”tiādiudānassa udānapāḷiyaṃ āgatattā,
tika-s0104t0:410_15: na āpo”tiādikassa cuṇṇiyavākyavasena uditassāpi tattha āgatattā.
tika-s0104t0:410_23: Nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttañhi bhagavā dhammaṃ desetvā nibbānaguṇānussaraṇena uppannapītisomanassena udānaṃ udānento
tika-s0104t0:410_24: “ayaṃ nibbānadhammo kathamapaccayo upalabbhatī”ti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetoparivitakkamaññāya tesaṃ tamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t0:410_26: na pana ekantato te paṭiggāhake katvāti veditabbanti.
tika-s0104t0:411_0: Tayidaṃ sabbaññubuddhabhāsitaṃ paccekabuddhabhāsitaṃ sāvakabhāsitanti tibbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:422_1: Aññānipi sakkādīhi devehi bhāsitāni “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:422_3: Soṇadaṇḍabrāhmaṇādīhi manussehi ca bhāsitāni “namo tassa bhagavato”tiādīni tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāni udānāni santi eva,
tika-s0104t0:422_5: Yaṃ pana sammāsambuddhena sāmaṃ āhaccabhāsitaṃ jinavacanabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:422_7: tadeva ca sandhāya bhagavatā pariyattidhammaṃ navadhā vibhajitvā uddisantena “udāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:422_8: Yā pana “anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādikā gāthā bhagavatā bodhimūle udānavasena pavattitā,
tika-s0104t0:422_10: tā aparabhāge dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa bhagavatā desitattā dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ anāropetvā dhammapade saṅgahitā,
tika-s0104t0:422_11: yañca “aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño”ti udānavacanaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuyā devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:422_13: tadapi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ sabbesaṃ eva bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattipaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ “ārādhayiṃsu vata maṃ
tika-s0104t0:422_14: bhikkhū ekaṃ samaya”ntiādivacanaṃ viya dhammacakkappavattanasuttantadesanāpariyosāne attanāpi adhigatadhammekadesassa
tika-s0104t0:422_15: yathādesitassa ariyamaggassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ sāvakesu therena adhigatattā attano parissamassa saphalabhāvapaccavekkhaṇahetutaṃ
tika-s0104t0:422_17: na pana “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”tiādivacanaṃ viya pavattiyā,
tika-s0104t0:422_18: nivattiyā vā pakāsananti dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ na saṅgītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:422_19: Udānapāḷiyaṃ pana aṭṭhasu vaggesu dasa dasa katvā asītiyeva suttantā saṅgītā.
tika-s0104t0:424_4: atha kho aññāsupi vinayābhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu tathāyeva vuttattā “appakaṃ pana ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotī”ti pariyāyena anekaṃsena vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t0:424_5: Yathā vā tathā vā anumānena gaṇanameva hi tattha tattha ūnādhikasaṅkhyā,
tika-s0104t0:425_8: ahaṃ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā”ti evamādinā ekadukatikacatukkanipātavasena vuttaṃ dvādasuttarasatasuttasamūhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:425_9: Tathā hi itivuttakapāḷiyameva udānagāthāhi dvādasuttarasatasuttāni gaṇetvā saṅgītāni,
tika-s0104t0:425_12: yathāvuttanayena vā anekaṃsato vuttantipi vattuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0104t0:425_13: tathāpi īdise ṭhāne pamāṇaṃ dassentena yāthāvatova niyametvā dassetabbanti “dasuttarasatasuttantā”ti
tika-s0104t0:425_20: vuttamarahatāti me sutanti nidānavacanena saṅgītaṃ yathāvuttasuttasamūhaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:426_0: Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ purāvutthaṃ bhagavato pubbacaritaṃ kāyati katheti pakāseti etenāti jātakaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:426_2: Tattha “paññāsādhikāni pañcajātakasatānī”ti idaṃ appakaṃ pana ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti katvā anekaṃsena,
tika-s0104t0:426_4: Ekaṃsato hi sattacattālīsādhikāniyeva yathāvuttagaṇanato tīhi ūnattā.
tika-s0104t0:426_26: mahānipāte dasāti sattacattālīsādhikāneva pañca jātakasatāni saṅgītānīti.
tika-s0104t0:427_0: Abbhuto dhammo sabhāvo vutto yatthāti abbhutadhammaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:429_0: Evamādinayappavattaṃ tattha tattha bhāsitaṃ sabbampi acchariyabbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ suttantaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:430_0: Cūḷavedallādīsu visākhena nāma upāsakena puṭṭhāya dhammadinnāya nāma bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ cūḷavedallaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t0:430_1: Mahākoṭṭhikattherena pucchitena āyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitaṃ mahāvedallaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t0:430_4: Sakkapañhaṃ pana sakkena puṭṭho bhagavā abhāsi,
tika-s0104t0:430_6: Mahāpuṇṇamasuttaṃ pana tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇamāya rattiyā aññatarena bhikkhunā puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ,
