tika-s0104t0:430_8: Evamādayo sabbepi tattha tatthāgatā vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitasuttantā “vedalla”nti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:430_10: Tuṭṭhinti yathābhāsitadhammadesanaṃ viditvā “sādhu ayye sādhāvuso”tiādinā abbhanumodanavasappavattaṃ pītisomanassaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:430_16: vedamhi nissitaṃ tassa labhāpanavasenāti vedallanti ca dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:431_0: Evaṃ aṅgavasena sakalampi buddhavacanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni dhammakkhandhavasena vibhajitukāmo “katha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:431_3: Evaṃ paridīpitadhammakkhandhavasenāti gopakamoggallānena nāma brāhmaṇena puṭṭhena gopakamoggallānasutte
tika-s0104t0:431_4: attano guṇappakāsanatthaṃ vā theragāthāyaṃ āyasmatā ānandattherena samantato dīpitadhammakkhandhavasena
tika-s0104t0:431_5: iminā evaṃ tena aparidīpitāpi dhammakkhandhā santīti pakāseti,
tika-s0104t0:431_6: tasmā kathāvatthuppakaraṇa mādhuriyasuttādīnaṃ vimānavatthādīsu kesañci gāthānañca vasena caturāsītisahassatopi dhammakkhandhānaṃ adhikatā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:432_1: gopakamoggallānasuttañca parinibbute bhagavati ānandattherena bhāsitattā caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassesu antogadhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:432_3: Paṭisambhidāgaṇṭhipade tāva idaṃ vuttaṃ “sayaṃ vuttadhammakkhandhānampi bhikkhuto gahiteyeva saṅgahetvā evamāhāti daṭṭhabba”nti,
tika-s0104t0:432_4: bhagavatā pana dinnanaye ṭhatvā bhāsitattā “sayaṃ vuttampi cetaṃ suttadvayaṃ bhagavato gahiteyeva saṅgahetvā
tika-s0104t0:432_5: vutta”nti evampi vattuṃ yuttataraṃ viya dissati.
tika-s0104t0:432_6: Bhagavatā hi dinnanaye ṭhatvā sāvakā dhammaṃ desenti,
tika-s0104t0:432_7: teneva sāvakabhāsitampi kathāvatthādikaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ nāma jātaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:432_8: tatoyeva ca attanā bhāsitampi subhasuttādikaṃ saṅgītimāropentena āyasmatā ānandattherena “evaṃ me suta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:433_2: maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādinā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne ārabhitvā tesaṃyeva vibhāgadassanavasena pavattattā “ekānusandhika”nti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:433_3: Anekānusandhikaṃ parinibbānasuttādi parinibbānasuttañhi nānāṭhānesu nānādhammadesanānaṃ vasena pavattattā “anekānusandhika”nti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:434_0: “Kati chinde kati jahe, kati cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-s0104t0:437_0: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-s0104t0:440_1: Tasmā yaṃ kusalattikamātikāpadassa vibhajanavasena nikkhepakaṇḍe vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t0:442_0: Ayameko dhammakkhandho. Esa nayo sesattikadukapadavibhajanesupi. Yadapi aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t0:443_7: Catūsu bhūmīsu vipāko tīsu bhūmīsu kiriyābyākataṃ rūpañca nibbānañca.
tika-s0104t0:444_0: Ayaṃ kusalattikamātikāpadassa vibhajanavasena pavatto eko dhammakkhandho.
tika-s0104t0:445_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
tika-s0104t0:446_2: Eko dhammakkhandhoti (ekameko dhammakkhandho chaḷa aṭṭha.) ca ekeko dhammakkhandhoti attho.
tika-s0104t0:446_4: ekamekaṃ cittavārabhājana”nti ca vacanato hi “ekeko”ti avuttepi ayamattho sāmatthiyato viññāyamānova hoti.
tika-s0104t0:447_1: Mātikā nāma “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”tiādinā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ajjhācāre paññattaṃ uddesa sikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:447_2: Padabhājaniyanti tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa “yo panāti yo yādiso”tiādi nayappavattaṃ padavibhajanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:447_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evamādinā sikkhāpadantaresu paññattā āpatti.
tika-s0104t0:447_6: Anāpattīti “anāpatti ajānantassa asādiyantassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassā”tiādi nayappavatto anāpattivāro.
tika-s0104t0:447_9: dasāhātikkante anatikkantasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti evamādinayappavatto tikapācittiya- tika-
tika-s0104t0:448_2: imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti buddhavacanaṃ dhammavinayādibhedena vavatthapetvā saṅgāyantena
tika-s0104t0:448_3: mahākassapappamukhena vasīgaṇena anekacchariyapātubhāvapaṭimaṇḍitāya saṅgītiyā imassa dīghāgamassa dhammabhāvo,
tika-s0104t0:448_6: soyeva padhānavasena dassito”ti ācariyehi ayaṃ sambandho vutto.
tika-s0104t0:448_8: heṭṭhā vuttesu ekavidhādibhedabhinnesu pakāresu dhammavinayādibhāvo saṅgītikārake heva saṅgītikāle vavatthāpito,
tika-s0104t0:448_12: Udānasaṅgaho nāma paṭhamapārājikādīsu āgatānaṃ vinītavatthuādīnaṃ saṅkhepato saṅgahadassanavasena dhammasaṅgāhakehi ṭhapitā –
tika-s0104t0:449_0: “Makkaṭī vajjiputtā ca, gihī naggo ca titthiyā;
tika-s0104t0:450_0: Dārikuppalavaṇṇā ca, byañjanehi pare duve”ti. ādikā ; –
tika-s0104t0:451_1: Vuccamānassa hi vuttassa vā atthassa vippakiṇṇabhāvena pavattituṃ adatvā uddhaṃ dānaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ udānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:451_4: Vaggoti hi dhammasaṅgāhakeheva katā suttasamudāyassa samaññā.
tika-s0104t0:451_15: paññāsa paññāsa suttāni gaṇetvā saṅgahoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:451_16: Ādisaddena tassaṃ tassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ dissamānaṃ saṅgītikārakavacanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:451_19: Sattahi māsehīti kiriyāpavagge tatiyā “ekāheneva bārāṇasiṃ pāyāsi.
tika-s0104t0:452_9: taṃ vā udakaṃ āhaccāti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:452_11: Saṅkampīti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gacchantī suṭṭhu kampi.
tika-s0104t0:452_12: Sampakampīti uddhamadho ca gacchantī sammā pakārena kampi.
tika-s0104t0:452_13: Sampavedhīti catūsu disāsu gacchantī suṭṭhu bhiyyo pavedhi.
tika-s0104t0:452_14: Evaṃ etena padattayena chappakāraṃ pathavīcalanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:453_5: pariyantato unnamati majjhimato onamatīti evaṃ chappakāraṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t0:454_1: pupphavassacelukkhepādīni aññāyapi sā samaññāya pākaṭāti dassento āha “yā loke”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:454_2: Yā paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti dhammasaṅgāhakehi mahākassapādīhi pañcahi satehi yena katā saṅgītā,
tika-s0104t0:454_3: tena pañca satāni etissāti “pañcasatā”ti ca thereheva katattā therā mahākassapādayo etissā,
tika-s0104t0:454_4: therehi vā katāti “therikā”ti ca loke pavuccati,
tika-s0104t0:455_0: Evaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti dassetvā yadatthaṃ sā idha dassitā,
tika-s0104t0:455_2: Ādinikāyassāti suttantapiṭakapariyāpannesu pañcasu nikāyesu ādibhūtassa dīghanikāyassa.
tika-s0104t0:455_6: iminā yathāvuttapaṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ tathāvacanameva sandhāya mayā heṭṭhā evaṃ vuttanti pubbāparasambandhaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:456_3: mahādhammarājādhirājagarunā katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā bāhiranidānavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0104t0:460_2: dassetvā idāni abbhantaranidānaṃ saṃvaṇṇento atthādhigamassa sunikkhittapadamūlakattā,
tika-s0104t0:460_3: sunikkhittapadabhāvassa ca “idameva”nti sabhāvavibhāvanena padavibhāgena sādhetabbattā paṭhamaṃ tāva padavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha eva”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:460_4: Padavibhāgena hi “idaṃ nāma etaṃ pada”nti vijānanena taṃtaṃpadānurūpaṃ liṅgavibhatti vacana kālapayogādikaṃ
tika-s0104t0:460_17: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassentena hi nidānapāḷiyā sambandho dassito,
tika-s0104t0:460_20: padavibhāgato ca saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karoti padānaṃ tabbisesānañca dassitattā.
tika-s0104t0:460_24: Atha vā padavibhāgo ca padaviggaho ca padavibhāgoti ekasesavasena padapadaviggahāpi padavibhāgasaddena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:460_25: Padaviggahato pana “bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho”tiādinā upari saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissati,
tika-s0104t0:460_28: saddo ādiattho antarāsadda ca saddādīnampi saṅgahitattā,
tika-s0104t0:460_31: Itarathā hi antarāsaddaṃ ca saddādīnampi nipātabhāvo vattabbo siyā.
tika-s0104t0:461_0: Idāni atthuddhārakkamena padatthato saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karonto “atthato panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:461_1: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne sotūnaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayakosallatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāppakārā vattabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t0:462_0: Ekanāḷikā kathā ca, caturassā tathāpi ca;
tika-s0104t0:464_0: Tattha pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanaṃ ekāya nāḷiyā minitasadisattā,
tika-s0104t0:464_2: ekamekaṃ padaṃ vā nāḷikā atthaniggamanamaggo etissāti katvā ekanāḷikā nāma.
tika-s0104t0:464_8: cattāro vā rassā sallakkhaṇūpāyā etissāti katvā caturassā nāma,
tika-s0104t0:464_9: visabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānaṃ gantvā puna sabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānagamanaṃ nisīdāpetvā patiṭṭhāpetvā āvattanayuttattā,
tika-s0104t0:464_10: niyamato vā nisinnassa āraddhassa vatto saṃvatto etissāti katvā nisinnavattikā nāma,
tika-s0104t0:464_11: yathāraddhassa atthassa visuṃ visuṃ pariyosānāpi niyuttāti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:464_12: sodāharaṇā pana kathā aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāya taṭṭīkāyaṃ ekādasanipāte gopālakasuttavaṇṇanāto gahetabbā.
tika-s0104t0:466_0: Iti atthakkame vidvā, tidhā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ vade.
tika-s0104t0:467_1: Sarūpavicāraṇā tatvakathā yathā “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:467_2: Vevacanavicāraṇā pariyāyakathā yathā “buddho bhagavā sabbaññū lokanāyako”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:469_0: Parihāro ca sabbattha, pañcadhā vaṇṇanaṃ vade.
tika-s0104t0:470_2: Piṇḍattho nāma vippakiṇṇassa atthassa suvijānanatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā kathanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:479_0: Codanā sodhanā ceti, aṭṭhadhā vaṇṇanaṃ vade.
tika-s0104t0:480_3: evamādinā tattha tatthāgate saṃvaṇṇanāppakāre ñatvā sabbattha yathārahaṃ vicetabbāti.
tika-s0104t0:481_0: Evamanekatthappabhedatā payogatova ñātabbāti tabbasena taṃ samatthetuṃ “tathā hesā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:481_1: Atha vā ayaṃ saddo imassatthassa vācakoti saṅketavavatthitāyeva saddā taṃ tadatthassa vācakā,
tika-s0104t0:481_2: saṅketo ca nāma payogavasena siddhoti dassetumpi idaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:483_0: Evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti. ;
tika-s0104t0:484_4: “Evaṃ byā kho”tiādīsu hi ākāramattavācakoyeva ākāratthoti adhippeto,
tika-s0104t0:484_6: Ettha hi kiñcāpi puppharāsisadisato manussūpapatti sappurisūpanissaya saddhammasavana yonisomanasikārabhogasampattiādidānādipuññakiriyāhetusamudāyato
tika-s0104t0:484_7: sobhāsugandhatādiguṇayogena mālāguṇasadisiyo bahukā puññakiriyā maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena sattena
tika-s0104t0:484_8: kattabbāti atthassa jotitattā puppharāsimālāguṇāva upamā nāma upamīyati etāyāti katvā,
tika-s0104t0:484_9: tesaṃ upamākāro ca yathāsaddena aniyamato jotito,
tika-s0104t0:484_12: tathāpi so upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamāva hoti nissayabhūtaṃ tamantarena nissitabhūtassa upamākārassa
tika-s0104t0:484_14: Atha vā upamīyanaṃ sadisīkaraṇanti katvā puppharāsimālāguṇehi sadisabhāvasaṅkhāto upamākāroyeva upamā nāma.
tika-s0104t0:485_0: Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya ākappasampattiyā upadisanākāropi atthato upadesoyevāti āha “evaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t0:485_2: Evametanti ettha pana bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:485_5: Evameva panāyanti ettha ca dosavibhāvanena gārayhavacanaṃ garahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:485_10: yathā cettha evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:485_13: Ayaṃ vasalaguṇayogato vasalī kāḷakaṇṇī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā ṭhāne bhāsatīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:485_16: Ettha pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāre sanniyojitehi bhikkhūhi tattha attano ṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanameva vacanasampaṭiggaho,
tika-s0104t0:486_0: Evaṃ byā khoti evaṃ viya kho.
tika-s0104t0:486_1: Evaṃ khoti hi imesaṃ padānamantare viyasaddassa byāpadesoti neruttikā “va- kārassa, ba- kāraṃ, ya-
tika-s0104t0:486_9: Vitthāro dasama subhasuttaṭṭhakathāya meva āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0104t0:486_20: Saṃvattanti vā no vā saṃvattanti ettha vacanadvaye kathaṃ vo tumhākaṃ mati hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:486_21: Evaṃ noti evameva amhākaṃ mati ettha hoti,
tika-s0104t0:486_23: Ettha ca tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatiggahaṇavasena “saṃvattanti no vā,
tika-s0104t0:486_24: kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-
tika-s0104t0:486_26: so ca tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno atthato avadhāraṇamevāti vuttaṃ “avadhāraṇe”ti.
tika-s0104t0:487_6: “Evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassū āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalābharaṇā odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti,
tika-s0104t0:487_14: tadākāropi atthato pucchā ca parimāṇañca nāma,
tika-s0104t0:488_3: kena kimatthaṃ dīpetīti ca anuyogaṃ pariharanto “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:488_22: attajjhāsayādayo eva vā samuṭṭhānamuppattihetu etassāti tathā,
tika-s0104t0:488_23: upanetabbābhāvato atthabyañjane hi sampannaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ tathā.
tika-s0104t0:488_25: akkharapadabyañjanaākāraniruttiniddesavasena chahi byañjanapadehi ca sampannaṃ samannāgataṃ tathā.
tika-s0104t0:489_1: Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi,
tika-s0104t0:489_3: Puthujjanānampi ca vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe satiyeva iddhividhaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0104t0:489_4: tasmā puthujjanesu pavattavohārenapi na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:489_5: sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatāva kilesā paṭipakkhā saṃsārapaṅkanimuggassa sattanikāyassa samuddharitukāmato,
tika-s0104t0:489_6: tasmā tesaṃ veneyyagatakilesasaṅkhātānaṃ paṭipakkhānaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyanti vuttaṃ assa,
tika-s0104t0:490_0: Atha vā bhagavato sāsanassa paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
tika-s0104t0:490_1: tesaṃ titthiyabhūtānaṃ paṭipakkhānaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyantipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:490_3: tesaṃ pana santānagatadiṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthatākāraṇena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīsaṅkhātehi
tika-s0104t0:490_4: tīhipi pāṭihāriyehi te haritā apanītā nāma honti.
tika-s0104t0:490_5: Paṭīti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,
tika-s0104t0:490_7: tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpaklese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:490_10: attano vā upaklesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā tadaññesaṃ haraṇaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ vuttanayena.
tika-s0104t0:490_13: hatesu ca attano upaklesesu parasattānaṃ upaklesaharaṇāni ca hontīti tadubhayampi nibbacanaṃ yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:491_0: Apica yathāvuttehi nibbacanehi iddhiādesanānusāsanīsaṅkhāto samudāyo paṭihāriyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t0:491_1: Ekekaṃ pana tasmiṃ bhavaṃ “pāṭihāriya”nti vuccati visesatthajotakapaccayantarena saddaracanāvisesasambhavato,
tika-s0104t0:491_9: visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāya labbhamānattā “vividhapāṭihāriyanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:491_10: Bhagavā hi kadāci iddhivasenāpi desanaṃ karoti nimmitabuddhena saha pucchāvissajjanādīsu,
tika-s0104t0:491_15: Ayamattho upari ekādasamassa kevaṭṭasuttassa vaṇṇanāya āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0104t0:491_16: Atha vā tassa vividhassāpi pāṭihāriyassa bhagavato desanāya saṃsūcanato “vividhapāṭihāriya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:492_0: Dhammaniruttiyāva bhagavati dhammaṃ desente sabbesaṃ suṇantānaṃ nānābhāsitānaṃ taṃtaṃbhāsānurūpato desanā sotapathamāgacchatīti āha “sabba…pe…
tika-s0104t0:492_11: tena saddhāsatidhitivīriyādibalasaṅkhātena sabbathāmena ekaṃseneva sotukāmatāsaṅkhātakusalacchandassa jananaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:492_13: saddo vā sambhāvanattho “buddhopi buddhabhāvaṃ bhāvetvā”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0104t0:492_14: tena “sabbathāmena ekaṃseneva sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi nāma ekenākārena sutaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:492_15: kimaṅgaṃ pana aññathā”ti tathāsute dhamme sambhāvanaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t0:492_19: “Nānānayanipuṇa”ntiādinā hi sabbappakārena sotumasakkuṇeyyabhāvena dhammassa idha sambhāvanameva karoti,
tika-s0104t0:492_21: ratiṃ so nādhigacchatī”tiādīsuyeva garahatthasambhavesu garahattho veditabboti. Api-
tika-s0104t0:492_26: yattha kiriyāvācakato pubbo na hotī”ti akkharacintakā vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:492_27: Mayāpīti ettha pana na kevalaṃ mayāva,
tika-s0104t0:492_28: atha kho aññehipi tathārūpehīti sampiṇḍanattho gahetabbo.
tika-s0104t0:493_2: Na mayaṃ idaṃ sacchikatanti ettha pana “na attano ñāṇeneva attanā sacchikata”nti pakaraṇato attho viññāyati.
tika-s0104t0:493_6: idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī”ti vuttadosato parimocāpanahetu.
tika-s0104t0:493_9: Imassa suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāppakāravicāraṇena attano ñāṇassa paccakkhataṃ sandhāya “idāni vattabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:494_6: ayaṃ panāyasmā buddhavacanaṃ gaṇhanto dasabalassa sāsane bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattiyaṃ ṭhatvā gaṇhi,
tika-s0104t0:494_8: Imassa ca therassa buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā dhāraṇasati aññehi therehi balavatarā ahosi,
tika-s0104t0:494_10: Ayamevāyasmā ekapade ṭhatvā saṭṭhipadasahassāni gaṇhanto satthārā kathitaniyāmena sabbapadāni jānāti,
tika-s0104t0:494_15: Tathāgataṃ upaṭṭhahanto cesa na aññesaṃ upaṭṭhākabhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhahanākārena upaṭṭhahati.
tika-s0104t0:494_17: na ca pana buddhānaṃ manaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhahituṃ sakkonti,
tika-s0104t0:494_18: ayaṃ pana thero upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya āraddhavīriyo hutvā tathāgatassa manaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhahi,
tika-s0104t0:494_25: Padena hi byañjitopi attho akkharamūlakattā padassa “akkharena byañjito”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:494_26: Atthassa viyañjanato vā vākyampi idha byañjanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t0:494_31: Tesampi hi saddaracanāvisesena atthādhigamahetuto idha gahaṇaṃ yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:494_34: Bhagavatā ca pañcavidhaetadaggaṭṭhānena dhammasenāpatinā ca pañcavidhakosallena pasaṭṭhabhāvānurūpanti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:494_40: Tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikanti avadhāraṇaphalamāha.
tika-s0104t0:494_42: Na aññathāti ca bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathā,
tika-s0104t0:494_45: evañca katvā “sabbappakārena ko samattho viññātu”nti heṭṭhā vuttavacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:494_46: itarathā bhagavatā desitākāreneva sotuṃ samatthattā tadetaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t0:494_47: Yathāvuttena pana atthena dhāraṇabaladassanañca na virujjhati sutākārāvirujjhanavasena dhāraṇassa adhippetattā,
tika-s0104t0:494_48: aññathā bhagavatā desitākāreneva dhārituṃ samatthanato heṭṭhā vuttavacanena virujjheyya.
tika-s0104t0:494_49: Na hettha dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ atthantaratāparihāro yutto tesaṃ dvinnampi atthānaṃ sutabhāvadīpanena ekavisayattā,
tika-s0104t0:494_50: itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe pacchimatthavasena samattho,
tika-s0104t0:495_1: so attā”ti vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya santatiyā pavattanako tividhopi me- saddo,
tika-s0104t0:495_2: tasmā kiñcāpi niyakajjhattasantativasena ekasmiṃ yevatthe me-
tika-s0104t0:495_4: tathāpi karaṇasampadānasāminiddesavasena vijjamānavibhattibhedaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti,
tika-s0104t0:495_5: tīsu vibhattiyatthesu attanā saññuttavibhattito dissatīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:495_10: Sutasaddassa kammabhāvasādhanavasena dvādhippāyikapadattā yathāyogaṃ “mayā suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:496_1: jotakamattabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ sutasaddoyeva taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa sutasaddassa
tika-s0104t0:496_2: atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ na virujjhatīti āha “saupasaggo ca anupasaggo cā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:496_4: Upasaggavasenapi dhātusaddo visesatthavācako yathā “anubhavati parābhavatī”ti vuttaṃ “gacchantoti attho”ti.
tika-s0104t0:496_5: Tathā anupasaggopi dhātusaddo saupasaggo viya visesatthavācakoti āha “vissutadhammassāti attho”ti.
tika-s0104t0:496_19: anupapanno”ti vā na viññātabboti codanāya pubbāparapadasambandhavasena etadatthassa upapannataṃ dassetuṃ “me-
tika-s0104t0:496_21: Mayāti atthe satīti kattutthe karaṇaniddesavasena mayāti atthe vattabbe sati, yadā me-
tika-s0104t0:496_24: Mamāti atthe satīti sambandhīyatthe sāminiddesavasena mamāti atthe vattabbe sati,
tika-s0104t0:497_0: Evaṃ saddato ñātabbamatthaṃ viññāpetvā idāni tehi dassetabbamatthaṃ nidassento “evametesū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:497_2: saddena savanakiriyājotakeneva bhavitabbaṃ vijjamānatthassa jotakamattattā nipātānanti vuttaṃ “evanti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassana”nti.
tika-s0104t0:497_7: saddassa tividhopi attho savanakiriyājotakabhāvena idhādhippetoti. Ādi-
tika-s0104t0:497_12: tasmā “suta”nti etassa sutamevāti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti.
tika-s0104t0:497_13: Etena hi vacanena avadhāraṇena nirākataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:497_14: Yathā pana yaṃ sutaṃ sutamevāti niyametabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:497_15: tathā ca taṃ sutaṃ sammā sutaṃ hotīti avadhāraṇaphalaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “anūnādhikāviparītaggahaṇanidassana”nti.
tika-s0104t0:497_16: Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadati,
tika-s0104t0:497_17: tasmā “suta”nti etassa asutaṃ na hotīti ayamattho labbhatīti sandhāya “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:497_18: iminā diṭṭhādinivattanaṃ karoti diṭṭhādīnaṃ “asuta”nti saddantaratthabhāvena nivattetabbattā.
tika-s0104t0:497_20: na idaṃ mayā attano ñāṇena diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:500_1: sadde ayamatthayojanā karīyatīti tadapekkhassa sutasaddassa sāvadhāraṇattho vutto “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti,
tika-s0104t0:500_4: saddo cettha bhāvasaddena yogato kammasādhano veditabbo “suyyatī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:500_8: iti savanahetu suṇantapuggalasavanavisesavasena ayaṃ yojanā katā.
tika-s0104t0:501_0: Evaṃ padattayassa ekena pakārena atthayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni pakārantarenāpi taṃ dassetuṃ “tathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:501_1: Tattha tassāti yā bhagavato sammukhā dhammassavanākārena pavattā manodvārikaviññāṇavīthi, tassā.
tika-s0104t0:501_2: Sā hi nānāppakārena ārammaṇe pavattituṃ samatthā,
tika-s0104t0:501_6: Nānappakārenāti vakkhamānena anekavihitena byañjanatthaggahaṇākārasaṅkhātena nānāvidhena ākārena,
tika-s0104t0:501_10: Yasmiṃ pakāre vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi nānappakārena pavattā,
tika-s0104t0:501_14: Tassā hi viññāṇavīthiyā ārammaṇameva “ayaṃ dhammo suto”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:501_15: Tañca niyamiyamānaṃ yathāvuttāya viññāṇavīthiyā ārammaṇabhūtaṃ suttameva.
tika-s0104t0:501_18: Viññāṇavīthiyā karaṇabhūtāya mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:501_25: so atthato sotadvārānusāraviññāṇavīthiyā nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattibhāvoyeva,
tika-s0104t0:501_26: tena ca tadārammaṇabhūtassa dhammasseva savanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:501_28: Evaṃ savanakiriyāya karaṇakattukammaviseso imissā yojanāya dassito.
tika-s0104t0:502_2: saddaṃ gahetvā nidassanena ca nidassitabbassāvinābhāvato “evanti nidassitabbappakāsana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:502_3: Iminā hi tadavinābhāvato evaṃsaddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti dasseti,
tika-s0104t0:502_5: savanakiriyāya ca sādhāraṇaviññāṇappabandhapaṭibaddhattā tasmiñca viññāṇappabandhe puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ “puggalakiccappakāsana”nti.
tika-s0104t0:502_6: Sādhāraṇaviññāṇappabandho hi paṇṇattiyā idha puggalo nāma,
tika-s0104t0:502_8: Na hi puggalavohārarahite dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhati vohāravisayattā tassā kiriyāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:503_1: saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathāpi atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ “tathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:503_6: tatoyeva sā “ākārapaññattī”ti vuttāti tadevatthaṃ samattheti “evanti hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:503_8: dhammānaṃ pana pavattiākāramupādāya paññattattā tadaññāya upādāpaññattiyā visesanatthaṃ “ākārapaññattī”ti vuttā visayaniddesoti uppattiṭṭhānaniddeso.
tika-s0104t0:503_9: Sotabbabhūto hi dhammo savanakiriyākattubhūtassa puggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānaṃ kiriyāya
tika-s0104t0:503_10: kattukammaṭṭhattā tabbasena ca tadādhārassāpi dabbassa ādhārabhāvassa icchitattā,
tika-s0104t0:503_11: idha pana kiriyāya kattupavattiṭṭhānabhāvo icchitoti kammameva ādhāravasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:503_22: Cittasantānavinimuttassa kassaci kattu paramatthato abhāvepi saddavohārena buddhiparikappitabhedavacanicchāya
tika-s0104t0:503_23: cittasantānato aññamiva taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā abhedepi bhedavohārena “cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:503_24: Vohāravisayo hi saddo nekantaparamatthikoti (kārakarūpasiddhiyaṃ yo kāreti sahetusuttaṃ passitabbaṃ)
tika-s0104t0:503_25: savanakiriyāvisayopi sotabbadhammo savanakiriyāvasena pavattacittasantānassa idha paramatthato kattubhāvato
tika-s0104t0:504_0: Apica savanavasena cittappavattiyā eva savanakiriyābhāvato taṃvasena tadaññanāmarūpadhammasamudāyabhūtassa
tika-s0104t0:504_1: taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:504_14: Sutākārassa ca therassa sammā nicchitabhāvato “gahaṇasanniṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:505_2: saddena yojanaṃ katvā tadeva avadhāraṇatthampi gahetvā imasmiṃyeva naye yojetuṃ “gahaṇaṃ kataṃ” icceva
tika-s0104t0:505_6: saddaṃ gahetvā ayameva yojanā katāti dassetīti veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:505_7: imissā pana yojanāya gahaṇākāragāhakatabbisayavisesanidassanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:506_1: Pubbe attanā sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa nidassanassa,
tika-s0104t0:506_4: vuttaṃ attanā sutānañhi atthabyañjanānaṃ puna upadhāraṇaṃ ākārādittayaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:506_7: So pana yaṃ dhammappabandhaṃ upādāya puggalapaññatti pavattā,
tika-s0104t0:506_13: Tathā hi puggalavādīnampi savanakiriyā viññāṇanirapekkhā natthi savanādīnaṃ visesato viññāṇabyāpārabhāvena icchitattā.
tika-s0104t0:506_15: viññāṇakiccassa ca sattaviññāṇānamabhedakaraṇavasena tattheva samodahitabbato “ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:506_19: taṃ pana puggalassa savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅgībhāvena puggalakiccaṃ nāmāti dassetuṃ “puggalakiccasamaṅginā”ti
tika-s0104t0:506_23: laddhasavanakiccavohārenāti ca sutasaddena niddiṭṭhaṃ viññāṇakiccaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:506_29: savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena mayā laddhasavanakiccavohārena viññāṇavasena karaṇabhūtena sutanti.
tika-s0104t0:507_2: tasmā te tathārūpapaññatti upādānabhūtapuggalabyāpārabhāveneva dassento āha “evanti puggalakiccaniddeso.
tika-s0104t0:507_4: Na hi paramatthatoyeva niyamiyamāne sati puggalakiccaviññāṇakiccavasena ayaṃ vibhāgo labbhatīti.
tika-s0104t0:507_5: Imissā pana yojanāya kattubyāpārakaraṇabyāpārakattuniddeso katoti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:508_1: sabbāsañca paññattīnaṃ vijjamānādivasena chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tāsu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ
tika-s0104t0:508_3: Tattha “eva”nti ca “me”ti ca vuccamānassa atthassa ākārādibhūtassa dhammānaṃ asallakkhaṇabhāvato avijjamānapaññattibhāvoti
tika-s0104t0:508_8: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti,
tika-s0104t0:508_15: Etena ca visesanena bālajanehi “atthī”ti parikappitaṃ paññattimattaṃ nivatteti.
tika-s0104t0:508_19: atthajātaṃ vā “eva”nti vā “me”ti vā niddesaṃ labhetha,
tika-s0104t0:508_31: Tena hi saddāyatanamidha gahitaṃ kammasādhanenāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:509_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathānayena paññattisarūpaṃ niddhāretvā idāni aṭṭhakathāmuttakenāpi nayena vuttesu chasu paññattibhedesu
tika-s0104t0:509_2: Upādāpaññatti ādayo hi porāṇaṭṭhakathāto muttā saṅgahakāreneva ācariyena vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:509_5: sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākāranidassanāvadhāraṇassa paccāmasanavasena evanti ca
tika-s0104t0:509_6: sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe upādāya meti ca vattabbattāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:509_7: Rūpavedanādibhedehi dhamme upādāya nissāya kāraṇaṃ katvā paññatti upādāpaññatti yathā “tāni tāni aṅgāni upādāya ratho gehaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:509_8: te te rūparasādayo upādāya ghaṭo paṭo,
tika-s0104t0:509_14: Diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbatoti diṭṭhamutaviññāte upanidhāya upatthambhaṃ katvā apekkhitvā vattabbattā.
tika-s0104t0:509_15: Diṭṭhādisabhāvavirahite saddāyatane vattamānopi hi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko viya paṭhamādīni
tika-s0104t0:509_17: Sā panesā anekavidhā tadaññapekkhūpanidhā hatthagatūpanidhā sampayuttūpanidhāsamāropitūpanidhā avidūragatūpanidhā
tika-s0104t0:509_19: Tāsu ayaṃ “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādikā viya paṭhamādīnaṃ diṭṭhādīnaṃ aññamaññamapekkhitvā vuttattā tadaññapekkhūpanidhāpaññatti nāma.
tika-s0104t0:510_0: Evaṃ paññattiyāpi atthādhigamanīyatāsaṅkhātaṃ dassetabbatthaṃ dassetvā idāni saddasāmatthiyena dīpetabbamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t0:510_6: saddena pakāsitā attanā paṭividdhasuttassa pakāravisesā “eva”nti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti tena evaṃ-
tika-s0104t0:510_11: byatirekena ca samatthehi “na hī”tiādinā vakkhamānañca suttaṃ nānappakāraṃ duppaṭividdhañca.
tika-s0104t0:510_12: Evaṃ nānappakāre duppaṭividdhe sutte kathaṃ sammūḷho nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho bhavissati.
tika-s0104t0:510_14: iminā ca byatirekena therassa tattha asammūḷhabhāvasaṅkhāto dīpetabbo attho viññāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:510_16: Bhagavato sammukhā sutākārassa yāthāvato upari therena dassiyamānattā “suttassa asammosaṃ dīpetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:510_19: therassa pana suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya anassamānaṃ asammuṭṭhaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0104t0:510_20: tasmā so evaṃ paṭijānātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:510_21: Evaṃ dīpitena pana atthena kiṃ pakāsitanti āha “iccassā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:510_24: asammosassa ca dīpitattā assa therassapaññāsiddhītiādinā sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:510_26: Paññāvajjitasamādhiādidhammajātena taṃsampayuttāya paññāya siddhi sahajātādisattiyā sijjhanato.
tika-s0104t0:510_28: Savanakālasambhūtāya hi paññāya taduttarikālapaññāsiddhi upanissayādikoṭiyā sijjhanato.
tika-s0104t0:511_0: Evaṃ pakāsitena pana atthena kiṃ vibhāvitanti āha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:511_8: Apica yathā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādayo pubbaṅgamā samānāpi tadārammaṇassa avijānanato appadhānabhūtā,
tika-s0104t0:511_9: evaṃ pubbaṅgamāyapi appadhānatte sati paññāpubbaṅgamā etissāti nibbacanampi yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:511_11: Iti sahajātapubbaṅgamo purejātapubbaṅgamoti duvidhopi pubbaṅgamo idha sambhavati,
tika-s0104t0:511_13: evaṃ sati “pubbaṅgamāyā”ti etthāpi yathāsambhavamesa nayo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:511_20: dasavidhassa vā ratanassa sannidhāno koso viyāti dhammakoso,
tika-s0104t0:511_23: Atha vā nānārājabhaṇḍarakkhako bhaṇḍāgāriko viyāti bhaṇḍāgāriko,
tika-s0104t0:511_24: dhammassa anurakkhako bhaṇḍāgārikoti tameva sadisatākāraṇadassanena visesetvā “dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko”ti vutto. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t0:513_0: Ānando nāma nāmena, dhammārakkho tavaṃ mune”ti. ;
tika-s0104t0:514_1: evaṃ saddena vuccamānānaṃ ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthānaṃ aviparītasaddhammavisayattā tabbisayehi tehi
tika-s0104t0:514_2: atthehi yoniso manasikārassa dīpanaṃ yuttanti vuttaṃ “yoni…pe…
tika-s0104t0:514_9: iminā vacaneneva yoniso manasikaroto nānappakārapaṭivedhasambhavato aggi viya dhūmena kāriyena kāraṇabhūto
tika-s0104t0:514_12: “Brahmajālaṃ āvuso kattha bhāsita”ntiādi pucchāvasena adhunā pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa
tika-s0104t0:514_13: “suta”nti padena vuccamānaṃ bhagavato sammukhā savanaṃ samādhānamantarena na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t0:514_15: “Vikkhittacittassā”tiādinā byatirekakāraṇena ñāpakahetuṃ dassetvā tadeva samattheti “tathā hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:514_17: Kiṃ iminā pakāsitanti āha “yoniso manasikārena cetthā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:514_20: sappurisūpanissayena ca phalabhūtassa saddhammassavanassa siddhiyā eva samatthanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:514_21: avikkhepena pana sappurisūpanissayassa siddhiyā samatthanaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:514_24: Atthavaseneva hi so pākaṭoti na vutto.
tika-s0104t0:515_1: yathā yoniso manasikārena phalabhūtena attasammāpaṇidhipubbekatapuññatānaṃ kāraṇabhūtānaṃ siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:515_2: evaṃ avikkhepena phalabhūtena saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ kāraṇabhūtānaṃ siddhi vattabbā siyā assutavato,
tika-s0104t0:515_5: sappurisūpanissayena ca kāraṇabhūtena saddhammassavanasseva phalabhūtassa siddhi vuttā,
tika-s0104t0:515_9: saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ bāhirakāraṇattā,
tika-s0104t0:515_10: avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa ekantakāraṇaṃ ajjhattikakāraṇattā,
tika-s0104t0:515_11: tasmā ekantakāraṇe honte kimatthiyā anekantakāraṇaṃ pati phalabhāvaparikappanāti tathāyevetassa siddhi vuttāti.
tika-s0104t0:515_12: Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ phalena kāraṇassa siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa,
tika-s0104t0:515_13: dutiyaṃ kāraṇena phalassa siddhidassanaṃ ekantavassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhipavattiyā.
tika-s0104t0:516_4: so ca ākāroti sotadvārānusāraviññāṇavīthisaṅkhātassa cittasantānassa nānākārena ārammaṇe pavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇasaṅkhāto
tika-s0104t0:516_6: Evaṃ bhaddakoti niravasesaparahitapāripūribhāvakāraṇattā evaṃ yathāvuttena nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇena sundaro seṭṭho,
tika-s0104t0:516_7: samāsapadaṃ vā etaṃ evaṃ īdiso bhaddo yassāti katvā.
tika-s0104t0:516_9: sammā appaṇi hito attā yassāti tathā, tassa.
tika-s0104t0:516_15: yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattatī”tiādi pacchimabhāvo cettha desanākkamavaseneva.
tika-s0104t0:516_18: Tasmāti purimakāraṇaṃ purimassevāti idha kāraṇamāha “na hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:517_6: maggañāṇasaṅkhātassa yathābhūtañāṇassa cāti duvidhassāpi āsayassa asuddhihetubhūtānaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvena suddhi.
tika-s0104t0:517_7: Tadeva hi dvayaṃ vivaṭṭanissitānaṃ suddhasattānaṃ āsayo.
tika-s0104t0:517_8: Sammāpaṇihitatto hi pubbe ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti.
tika-s0104t0:517_14: tadayuttameva “tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā adhigamabyattisiddhī”ti vacanena virodhato.
tika-s0104t0:517_15: Evampi maggañāṇasaṅkhātassa āsayassa suddhi na yuttā tāya adhigamabyattisiddhiyā avattabbatoti?
tika-s0104t0:517_24: vippaṭisārābhāvāvahena ca kāyavacīpayogena avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hoti,
tika-s0104t0:517_26: tena viññāyati purimacakkadvayasiddhiyā therassa payogasuddhi siddhāvāti.
tika-s0104t0:517_29: Adhigametabbato hi paṭivijjhitabbato paṭivedho “adhigamo”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vutto,
tika-s0104t0:517_30: āgamoti ca pariyatti āgacchanti attatthaparatthādayo etena,
tika-s0104t0:518_4: dhammato ca siddhāya upamāya tamatthaṃ ñāpetuṃ “aruṇuggaṃ viyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:518_8: tassa uggaṃ uggamanaṃ udayato udayantassa udayāvāsamuggacchato sūriyassa pubbaṅgamaṃ purecaraṃ bhavituṃ arahati viyāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:518_10: āgamādhigamabyattiyā īdisassa therassa vuttanidānavacanaṃ bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitumarahati,
tika-s0104t0:519_0: Idāni aparampi pubbe vuttassa asammohāsammosasaṅkhātassa dīpetabbassatthassa dīpakehi evaṃ-
tika-s0104t0:519_4: sotabbappabhedapaṭivedhadīpakenā”ti ca iminā tehi saddehi pubbe dīpitaṃ asammohāsammosasaṅkhātaṃ dīpetabbatthamāha
tika-s0104t0:519_10: saddānaṃ therassa atthabyañjanesu asammohāsammosadīpanato catupaṭisambhidāvasena atthayojanaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:519_14: paṭivedhasaṅkhātassa ca dīpetabbatthassa dīpakattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:519_24: vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva vuttepi sotabbadhammavisesaṃ āmasatīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:519_25: Ettha ca sotabbadhammasaṅkhātāya pāḷiyā nidassetabbānaṃ bhāsitatthapayojanatthānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:519_26: tīsu ca ñāṇesu pavattañāṇassa nānappakārabhāvato tabbhāvapaṭivedhadīpakena evaṃ-
tika-s0104t0:520_2: saddehi pakāsetabbamatthaṃ pakāsetvā idāni yonisomanasikārāvikkhepasaṅkhātassa dīpetabbassatthassa dīpakehipi
tika-s0104t0:520_7: bhāsamāno”ti ca iminā tehi saddehi pubbe dīpitaṃ yonisomanasikārāvikkhepasaṅkhātaṃ dīpetabbatthamāha,
tika-s0104t0:520_8: “ete mayā”tiādīhi pana pakāsetabbatthaṃ savanayogadīpakanti ca avikkhepavasena savanayogassa sijjhanato tadeva sandhāyāha.
tika-s0104t0:520_9: Tathā hi ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ “savanadhāraṇavacīparicariyā pariyattidhammānaṃ visesena sotāvadhāraṇapaṭibaddhāti
tika-s0104t0:520_12: tasmā taddīpakavacaneneva ete mayā dhammā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti imamatthaṃ pakāsetīti vuttaṃ “evanti ca…pe…
tika-s0104t0:520_19: ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:521_1: tasmā taddīpakavacaneneva bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitāti imamatthaṃ pakāsetīti vuttaṃ “sutanti idaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t0:521_4: Dhātāti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya manasi suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena upadhāritā.
tika-s0104t0:521_5: Vacasā paricitāti paguṇatāsampādanena vācāya paricitā sajjhāyitā.
tika-s0104t0:521_8: pacchimanaye ca yathāvuttassa pakāsetabbassatthassa pakāsakena tena dubbidhena saddena.
tika-s0104t0:522_0: Etena pana vibhāvetabbatthadīpakena saddadvayena anubhāvetabbatthamanubhāvento “evaṃ me sutanti iminā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:522_1: Pubbe visuṃ visuṃ atthe yojitāyeva ete saddā idha ekassevānubhāvatthassa anubhāvakabhāvena gahitāti ñāpetuṃ “sakalenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:522_13: so ca atthato apakataññutāsaṅkhātā “idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā
tika-s0104t0:522_14: attano dahatī”ti evaṃ mahācoradīpakena bhagavatā vuttā anariyavohārāvatthā,
tika-s0104t0:522_20: mahākassapattherādīnañca tadāsaṅkāya abhāvato asappurisabhūmisamatikkamādivacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyāti?
tika-s0104t0:522_21: Nayidamevaṃ “evaṃ me suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho anubhāvitoti atthasseva dassanato.
tika-s0104t0:522_27: Tasmiṃ kira samaye ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bhagavā ca parinibbuto,
tika-s0104t0:522_32: kiṃ nu kho so sayaṃ sacchikataṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-s0104t0:522_37: Evaṃ sati pariyāyantarena purimatthameva dassetīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:522_43: Apica satthukappādikiriyato attānaṃ parimoceti takkiriyāsaṅkāya sambhavato.
tika-s0104t0:522_44: “Satthu bhagavatoyeva vacanaṃ mayāsuta”nti satthāraṃ apadisatīti atthantaramanubhāvanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:523_2: Purimavacanaṃ vivarantoti bhagavatā desitavasena purimataraṃ saṃvijjamānaṃ bhagavatā vacanameva uttāniṃ karonto,
tika-s0104t0:523_8: usabhassa idanti vā atthena āsabhasaṅkhāte akampanasabhāvabhūte ṭhāne ṭhitassa.
tika-s0104t0:523_11: so dhammaṃ desetī”tiādinā sīhopamasuttādīsu āgatena anekanayena sīhanādanadino.
tika-s0104t0:523_27: tameva dhammaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā upanissāya vihareyya”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:523_29: saddhammānametassa vā āṇācakkavarassa pavattino sammāsambuddhassa tassa bhagavato idaṃ vacanaṃ sammukhāva mayā paṭiggahitanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:523_31: Kaṅkhā vā vimati vāti ettha daḷhataraṃ niviṭṭhā vicikicchā kaṅkhā.
tika-s0104t0:523_34: Attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimavacanaṃ vivarantoti pana assaddhiyavināsanassa,
tika-s0104t0:524_0: “Evaṃ me suta”nti evaṃ vadanto gotamagottassa sammāsambuddhassa sāvako,
tika-s0104t0:524_1: gotamagottasambandho vā sāvako āyasmā ānando bhagavatā bhāsitabhāvassa,
tika-s0104t0:524_3: tathāsūcaneneva ca khalitadunniruttādigahaṇadosābhāvassa sijjhanato sāsane assaddhaṃ vināsayati,
tika-s0104t0:524_5: Ettha ca pañcamādayo tisso atthayojanā ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-
tika-s0104t0:529_2: Tathā hesa “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0104t0:529_3: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati,
tika-s0104t0:529_7: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhyāyaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:529_8: idhāpi saṅkhyāyamevāti dassento āha “ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso”ti ekoyevesa samayo,
tika-s0104t0:529_9: na dve vā tayo vāti ūnādhikābhāvena gaṇanassa paricchedaniddeso ekanti ayaṃ saddoti attho,
tika-s0104t0:529_10: tena kassa paricchindananti anuyoge sati “samaya”nti vuttanti dassento āha “samayanti paricchinnaniddeso”ti.
tika-s0104t0:529_11: Evaṃ paricchedaparicchinnavasena vuttepi “ayaṃ nāma samayo”ti sarūpato aniyamitattā aniyamitavacanamevāti dasseti “ekaṃ…pe….
tika-s0104t0:530_0: Idāni samayasaddassa anekatthavuttitaṃ atthuddhāravasena dassetvā idhādhippetamatthaṃ niyamento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:530_3: Na pana dissatīti tesvekasmiṃyeva atthe idha pavattanato.
tika-s0104t0:530_9: Kālañca samayañca upādāyāti ettha kālo nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttakālo.
tika-s0104t0:530_13: tasmā yathāvuttaṃ kālañca samayañca paññāya gahetvā upadhāretvāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:530_15: sace amhākaṃ sve gamanassa yuttakālo bhavissati,
tika-s0104t0:530_17: gamanapaccayā ca añño aphāsuvihāro na bhavissati,
tika-s0104t0:530_18: athetaṃ kālañca gamanakāraṇasamavāyasaṅkhātaṃ samayañca upadhāretvā appeva nāma svepi āgaccheyyāmāti.
tika-s0104t0:530_30: Samayopi khoti ettha samayoti sikkhāpadapūraṇassa hetu.
tika-s0104t0:530_33: tayā bhaddāli paṭivijjhitabbayuttakaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-s0104t0:530_34: tampi te na paṭividdhaṃ na sallakkhitanti.
tika-s0104t0:531_1: kiñci kiñci pana sippaṃ uggahetuṃ samatthatāya “uggahamāno”ti naṃ sañjānanti,
tika-s0104t0:531_5: Samayaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pakārena vadanti etthāti samayappavādako, tasmiṃ,
tika-s0104t0:531_8: nigaṇṭhācelakaparibbājakādayo ca pabbajitā sannipatitvā attano attano samayaṃ pakārena vadanti kathenti dīpenti,
tika-s0104t0:531_12: Yasmā panettha paṭhamaṃ ekā sālā ahosi,
tika-s0104t0:531_13: pacchā pana mahāpuññaṃ poṭṭhapādaparibbājakaṃ nissāya bahū sālā katā,
tika-s0104t0:531_14: tasmā tameva paṭhamaṃ kataṃ ekaṃ sālaṃ upādāya laddhapubbanāmavasena “ekasālako”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:531_15: Mallikāya nāma pasenadirañño deviyā uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasacchanno ārāmo,
tika-s0104t0:532_2: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā pāpuṇitabbato samparāyo, paraloko,
tika-s0104t0:532_6: Samparāyikopi hi attho kāraṇassa nipphannattā paṭiladdho nāma hotīti taṃ atthadvayamekato katvā “atthābhisamayā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:532_10: Sā hi sukhumesupi atthesu paḍati gacchati,
tika-s0104t0:532_13: Atha vā itā sañjātā paṇḍā etassa,
tika-s0104t0:532_28: Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa attho gocaro abhisamayaṭṭhoti tāniyeva tabbisaya-
tika-s0104t0:532_31: Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā tassa tassa atthassa vācako samayasaddo evāti samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayo vutto.
tika-s0104t0:533_1: sahakārīkāraṇavasena sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo.
tika-s0104t0:533_2: Sameti samāgacchati maggabrahmacariyamettha tadādhārapuggalavasenāti samayo, khaṇo.
tika-s0104t0:533_7: Dhammappavattimattatāya hi atthato abhūtopi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:533_8: karaṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyati. Samaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:533_9: sammā vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo,
tika-s0104t0:533_12: na pana avayavavinimutto samūho nāma koci paramatthato atthi.
tika-s0104t0:533_16: So hi paccayantarasamāgamaneneva attano phalaṃ uppādaṭṭhitisamaṅgībhāvaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t0:533_17: Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho hutvā eti attano visaye pavattati,
tika-s0104t0:533_18: daḷhaggaṇabhāvato vā taṃsaññuttā sattā ayanti etena yathābhinivesaṃ pavattantīti samayo, diṭṭhi.
tika-s0104t0:533_23: sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo appavatti samayo, pahānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:533_24: Abhimukhaṃ ñāṇena sammā etabbo abhigantabboti abhisamayo,
tika-s0104t0:533_26: Abhimukhabhāvena taṃ taṃ sabhāvaṃ sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
tika-s0104t0:534_0: Nanu ca atthamattaṃ yathādhippetaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantīti na ekena saddena aneke atthā abhidhīyanti,
tika-s0104t0:534_1: atha kasmā idha samayasaddassa anekadhā attho vuttoti?
tika-s0104t0:534_2: Saccametaṃ saddavisese apekkhite saddavisese hi apekkhite na ekena saddena anekatthābhidhānaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0104t0:534_3: Na hi yo kālādiattho samaya- saddo,
tika-s0104t0:534_5: Ettha pana tesaṃ tesamatthānaṃ samayasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññamupādāya anekatthatā samaya-
tika-s0104t0:536_0: Atthaṃ vade na hi saddo, eko nekatthako siyā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:537_1: kālasseva ca apadisitabbattā “idha panassa kālo attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:537_2: Desadesakādīnaṃ viya hi kālassa nidānabhāvena adhippetattā sopi idha apadisīyati.
tika-s0104t0:538_4: Vacasā dhāretuṃ vā sayaṃ uddisituṃ vā parena uddisāpetuṃ vā na sakkā nānappakārabhāvato bahu ca vattabbaṃ hoti yāva kālappabhedo,
tika-s0104t0:538_6: “Ekaṃ samaya”nti vutte pana na so kālappabhedo atthi,
tika-s0104t0:538_7: yo etthānantogadho siyāti dasseti “ekeneva padena tamatthaṃ samodhānetvā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:538_8: Evaṃ lokiyasammatakālavasena samayatthaṃ dassetvā idāni sāsane pākaṭakālavasena samayatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ye vā ime”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:538_9: Apica utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamaṃ akatvā samayasaddassa vacane ayampi guṇo laddhoyevāti dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:538_10: Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhati tassā visesaparihāravisayattā.
tika-s0104t0:538_20: “Ekaṃ samaya”nti vutte tadaññepi samayā santīti atthāpattito tesu samayesu idha desanāsamayasaṅkhāto
tika-s0104t0:539_0: Yathāvuttappabhedesuyeva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “yo cāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:539_5: tasmā tesu vuttappabhedesu samayesu ekadesova pakārantarena dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:539_6: “Sannipatitānaṃ vo bhikkhave dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī kathā vā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti vuttasamaye sandhāya
tika-s0104t0:539_9: Aññataraṃ samayaṃ sandhāya “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttaṃ atthato abhedattā.
tika-s0104t0:540_0: Aññattha viya bhummavacanena ca karaṇavacanena ca niddesamakatvā idha upayogavacanena niddesapayojanaṃ
tika-s0104t0:541_6: Kena samayatthena idaṃ atthadvayaṃ sambhavatīti anuyoge sati tadatthadvayasambhavānurūpena samayatthena,
tika-s0104t0:541_13: ‘samūhasaddassa vā attho yassāti samūhattho, ko so? Samayo.
tika-s0104t0:541_15: samūhattho ca samayo tattha abhidhamme vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ādhāroti,
tika-s0104t0:541_17: dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:541_19: dhammapuñje vā phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho.
tika-s0104t0:541_22: so kathaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ siyā tattha vuttadhammānanti?
tika-s0104t0:541_24: Yathā hi kālo sayaṃ paramatthato avijjamānopi sabhāvadhammaparicchinnattā ādhārabhāvena paññāto,
tika-s0104t0:541_28: samūho ca avayavavinimutto visuṃ avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddhattā avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati “rukkhe sākhā,
tika-s0104t0:541_31: kappanāmattasiddhattā ca tadubhayaṃ tattha vuttadhammānaṃ adhikaraṇabhāvena paññāpīyatīti.
tika-s0104t0:542_1: Tattha khaṇo nāma aṭṭhakkhaṇavinimutto navamo buddhuppādakkhaṇo,
tika-s0104t0:542_3: yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī”ti ettha patirūpadesavāso sappurisūpanissayo attasammāpaṇīdhi
tika-s0104t0:542_7: Samavāyo nāma “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādinā niddiṭṭhā cakkhuviññāṇādisādhāraṇaphalanipphādakattena
tika-s0104t0:542_13: hetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa sattāsaṅkhātena bhāvena tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ sattāsaṅkhāto bhāvo lakkhīyati viññāyatīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:542_16: duddhāsu āgato”ti ettha dohanakiriyāya gamanakiriyā lakkhīyati,
tika-s0104t0:542_17: evamidhāpi yathāvuttassa samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā,
tika-s0104t0:542_21: tathāpi “yasmiṃ samaye”ti ca vutte satīti ayamattho viññāyamāno evahoti aññakiriyāsambandhābhāve padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:542_22: tasmā atthato gamyamānāya tāya sattākiriyāya lakkhīyatīti.
tika-s0104t0:542_26: hetumhi vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:542_30: Ayaṃ pana attho abhidhammeyeva nidassanavasena vutto,
tika-s0104t0:542_34: Tadatthajotanatthanti tadubhayatthassa samayasaddatthabhāvena vijjamānasseva bhummavacanavasena dīpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:542_35: Vibhattiyo hi padīpo viya vatthuno vijjamānasseva atthassa jotakāti,
tika-s0104t0:543_4: kudālena khaṇatī”tiādīsu viya karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
tika-s0104t0:543_5: Kathaṃ pana sambhavatīti āha “yo hi so”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:543_6: Vinaye āgatasikkhāpadapaññattiyācanavatthuvasena theraṃ mariyādaṃ katvā “sāriputtādīhipi duviññeyyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:543_7: Tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenāti ettha pana taṃtaṃvatthuvītikkamova sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetu ceva karaṇañca.
tika-s0104t0:543_8: Tathā hi yadā bhagavā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā paṭhamameva tesaṃ tesaṃ tattha tattha sikkhāpadapaññattihetubhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t0:543_10: tadā taṃ taṃ vītikkamaṃ apekkhitvā tadatthaṃ vasatīti siddho vatthuvītikkamassa sikkhāpadapaññattihetubhāvo
tika-s0104t0:543_11: “annenavasatī”tiādīsu annamapekkhitvā tadatthaṃ vasatītiādinā kāraṇena annādīnaṃ hetubhāvo viya.
tika-s0104t0:543_12: Sikkhāpadapaññattikāle pana teneva pubbasiddhena vītikkamena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti,
tika-s0104t0:543_13: tasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sādhakatamattā karaṇabhāvopi vītikkamasseva siddho “asinā chindatī”tiādīsu
tika-s0104t0:543_14: asinā chindanakiriyaṃ sādhetītiādinā kāraṇena asiādīnaṃ karaṇabhāvo viya.
tika-s0104t0:543_15: Evaṃ santepi vītikkamaṃ apekkhamāno teneva saddhiṃ tannissitampi kālaṃ apekkhitvā viharatīti kālassāpi idha hetubhāvo vutto,
tika-s0104t0:543_16: sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento ca taṃ taṃ vītikkamakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti vītikkamanissayassa kālassāpi karaṇabhāvo vutto,
tika-s0104t0:543_18: karaṇabhāvo ca labbhatīti vuttaṃ “tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:543_21: So hi vītikkamakkhaṇe hetu hutvā pacchā sikkhāpadapaññāpanakkhaṇe karaṇampi hotīti.
tika-s0104t0:543_22: Sikkhāpadāni paññāpayantoti vītikkamaṃ pucchitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthuṃ taṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā,
tika-s0104t0:543_23: vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuotiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena karaṇabhūtena sikkhāpadāni paññapento.
tika-s0104t0:543_24: Sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamānoti tatiyapārājikādīsu viya sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetubhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ
tika-s0104t0:543_25: vatthuvītikkamasamayaṃ apekkhamāno tena samayena hetubhūtena bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:544_3: tasmā tadanurūpaṃ “tenasamayena karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtenā”ti evaṃ vattabbepi paṭhamaṃ “hetubhūtenā”ti
tika-s0104t0:544_4: uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ tattha hetubhāvassa sātisayamadhippetattā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:544_5: “Bhagavā hi verañjāyaṃ viharanto dhammasenāpatittherassa sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanahetubhūtaṃ parivitakkasamayaṃ
tika-s0104t0:544_6: apekkhamāno tena samayena hetubhūtena vihāsī”ti tīsupi kira gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:544_8: ācariyassa idha kamavacanicchā natthīti evametaṃ gahetabbaṃ –
tika-s0104t0:544_9: aññāsupi hi aṭṭhakathāsu ayameva anukkamo vutto,
tika-s0104t0:544_10: na ca tāsu ‘tena samayena verañjāyaṃ viharatī’ti vinayapāḷipade hetuatthasseva sātisayaṃ adhippetabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vutto avisayattā,
tika-s0104t0:544_13: sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno hetubhūtena samayena vihāsīti evamettha yathālābhaṃ sambandhabhāvato evaṃ vutto”tipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:544_17: Ettha ca sikkhāpadapaññattiyā eva vītikkamasamayassa sādhakatamattā tassa karaṇabhāve “sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto”ti ajjhāharitapadena sambandho,
tika-s0104t0:544_21: sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:545_10: Tathā hi karuṇānidānattā desanāya idha parahitapaṭipatti “karuṇāvihāro”ti vuttā,
tika-s0104t0:545_12: Na hi desanākāle desetabbadhammavisayassa desanāñāṇassa sattavisayāya mahākaruṇāya sahuppatti sambhavati bhinnavisayattā,
tika-s0104t0:545_13: tasmā karuṇāya pavatto vihāroti katvā parahitapaṭipattivihāro idha “karuṇāvihāro”ti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:545_15: Tadatthajotanatthanti vuttanayena upayogavibhattiyā tadatthassa jotanatthaṃ upayoganiddeso kato yathā “māsaṃ sajjhāyati,
tika-s0104t0:545_18: ito aññesu ca suttapadesu bhummavacanassa adhikaraṇattho,
tika-s0104t0:545_21: karaṇattho ca idha upayogavacanassa accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati,
tika-s0104t0:545_23: Etanti yathā vuttassatthassa saṅgahagāthāpadaṃ aññatrāti abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu,
tika-s0104t0:546_0: Evaṃ attano matiṃ dassetvā idāni porāṇācariyamatiṃ dassetuṃ “porāṇā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:546_7: sabbesupi atthato ādhāro eva atthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:546_8: Iminā ca vacanena suttavinayesu vibhattivipariṇāmo kato,
tika-s0104t0:547_1: Tadevatthaṃ saṅketato samattheti “garuṃ hī”tiādinā saṅketavisayo hi saddo taṃvavatthitoyeva cesa atthabodhakoti.
tika-s0104t0:547_6: atha ayameva sātisayaṃ bhagavā nāmāti dassento “ayañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:547_9: pajāya accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānanti.
tika-s0104t0:547_13: Seṭṭhavācakavacanampi seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato seṭṭhamevāti vuttaṃ “bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭha”nti.
tika-s0104t0:547_23: Yena kāraṇattayena so tathāgato garu bhāriyaṭṭhena,
tika-s0104t0:548_0: Apicāti atthantaravikappatthe nipāto, aparo nayoti attho. Tattha –
tika-s0104t0:553_1: “pisodarādīni yathopadiṭṭha”nti vuttasaddanayena vā pisodarādiākatigaṇapakkhepalakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā lokiya
tika-s0104t0:553_5: saṅkhepato vā pañcamāre abhañjīti “bhaggavā”ti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vuttanti dasseti “bhaggavā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:553_8: te ca bhagasaṅkhātā dhammā assa santīti bhagavāti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yutto bhagehi cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:553_9: Kusalādīhi anekabhedehi sabbadhamme vibhaji vibhajitvā vivaritvā desesīti “vibhattavā”ti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vuttanti āha “vibhattavā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:553_13: aññe ca lokiyalokuttare uttarimanussadhamme bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti “bhattavā”ti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vuttanti dasseti “bhattavā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:553_14: Tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanamanena vantaṃ vamitanti “bhavesu vantagamano”ti vattabbe bhavasaddato bha-
tika-s0104t0:553_18: tassa ca dīghaṃ katvā vaṇṇavipariyāyena “bhagavā”ti vuttanti dassetuṃ “vantagamano bhavesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:553_25: na pana idha pana vattabbo visuddhimaggassa imissā aṭṭhakathāya ekadesabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:554_2: So hi bhage sīlādiguṇe vani bhaji sevi,
tika-s0104t0:554_3: te vā bhagasaṅkhāte sīlādiguṇe vineyyasantānesu “kathaṃ nu kho uppajjeyyu”nti vani yāci patthayi,
tika-s0104t0:554_12: tehi samaṃ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā ākārassa rassaṃ katvā,
tika-s0104t0:554_15: evaṃ bhage vamīti bhagavāti evamādīhi tattha tatthāgatanayehi cassa attho vattabbo,
tika-s0104t0:555_0: Evametesaṃ avayavatthaṃ dassetvā idāni samudāyatthaṃ dassento purimapadattayassa samudāyatthena vuttāvasesena
tika-s0104t0:555_2: Ettāvatāti etassa “evaṃ me suta”nti vacanena “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā” tivacanenāti imehi sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:555_10: satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo vijjatevāti katvā “dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:555_11: Dhammakāyanti hi bhagavato sambandhībhūtaṃ dhammasaṅkhātaṃ kāyanti attho.
tika-s0104t0:555_16: Idaṃ adhunā vakkhamānasuttaṃ pāvacanaṃ pakaṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ buddhassa bhagavato vacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t0:555_17: Tasmā tumhākaṃ atikkantasatthukaṃ atītasatthukabhāvo na hotīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:555_21: satthuadassanena pana ukkaṇṭhitassa janassa atikkantasatthukabhāvoti attho āpajjeyya,
tika-s0104t0:555_22: evañca sati “ayaṃ vo satthāti satthuadassanena ukkaṇṭhitaṃ janaṃ samassāsetī” tivacanena saha virodho bhaveyyāti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:555_23: Idaṃ pāvacanaṃ satthukiccanipphādanena na atītasatthukanti pana attho.
tika-s0104t0:555_30: anabhiratiyā vā pīḷito vikkhittacitto hutvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā uddhaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ katvā ito cito ca olokento āhiṇḍati,
tika-s0104t0:556_2: idha pana avijjamāneyeva tasmiṃ evaṃ vadati,
tika-s0104t0:556_3: tasmā sandhāyabhāsitavasena tadatthaṃ dassetīti āha “avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento”ti.
tika-s0104t0:556_8: saddo garahāyaṃ nipāto “atthi nāma ānanda theraṃ bhikkhuṃ vihesiyamānaṃ ajjhupekkhissathā”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0104t0:556_10: kā nāma kathā aññesanti garahatthaṃ joteti.
tika-s0104t0:556_15: Vajirassa nāma maṇivisesassa saṅghāto samūho ekagghano,
tika-s0104t0:556_18: yathā vajirasaṅghāto nāma na aññena maṇinā vā pāsāṇena vā bhejjo,
tika-s0104t0:556_19: api tu soyeva aññaṃ maṇiṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā bhindati.
tika-s0104t0:556_20: Teneva vuttaṃ “vajirassa natthi koci abhejjo maṇi vā pāsāṇo vā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:556_22: Na hi bhagavato rūpakāye kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ sakkāti.
tika-s0104t0:556_26: Ettha ca evaṃguṇasamannāgatattā aparinibbutasabhāvena bhavituṃ yuttopi esa parinibbuto evāti pakaraṇānurūpamatthaṃ
tika-s0104t0:556_35: sukhaṃ jīvissāmī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno jīvitamado nāma,
tika-s0104t0:556_38: tatoyeva assa janassa saddhamme ussāhaṃ janeti.
tika-s0104t0:557_1: Sāvakasampattinti suṇantapuggalasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāppattena pañcasu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitena,
tika-s0104t0:557_2: pañcasu ca kosallesu āyasmatā dhammasenāpatinā pasaṃsitena mayā mahāsāvakena sutaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:557_3: tañca kho sayameva sutaṃ na anussutaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:557_5: Kālasampattiṃ niddisati bhagavātisadasannidhāne payuttassa samayasaddassa buddhuppāda-
tika-s0104t0:560_1: kappasaṅkhātakālasañcayassa lekhanavasena pavatte kaliyugasaṅkhāte sakarājasammate vassādisamūhe jāto
tika-s0104t0:560_2: buddhuppādakhaṇasaṅkhāto dinasamūho andhassa pabbatārohanamiva kadāci pavattanaṭṭhena,
tika-s0104t0:560_3: accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttaṭṭhena ca mahacchariyaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:560_5: Hutavahasaṅkhātassa pāvakassa majjhe sammā uditamadhumantaṃ aravindasaṅkhātaṃ vārijamiva jātanti.
tika-s0104t0:561_0: Evaṃ padachakkassa padānukkamena nānappakārato atthavaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni “antarā ca rājagaha”ntiādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t0:561_2: Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti ettha samabhiniviṭṭho antarā-
tika-s0104t0:561_4: Evaṃ panassa nānatthabhāvo payogato avagamīyatīti dasseti “tadantara”ntiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:561_12: Antarā vosānanti ārambhanipphattīnaṃ vemajjhe pariyosānaṃ āpādi.
tika-s0104t0:561_18: Tattha dvinnaṃ mahālohakumbhīnirayānaṃ antarena ayaṃ tapodā nadī āgacchati,
tika-s0104t0:561_24: antarantarā kathaṃ opātetī”tiādīsu viya kāraṇavemajjhesu vattamānā antarāsaddāyeva udāharitabbā siyuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:561_30: tesu antarāsaddopīti samānatthattā antarāsaddatthe vattamāno antarikasaddo,
tika-s0104t0:561_33: Atha vā antarāsaddoyeva “yassantarato”ti ettha gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vutto –
tika-s0104t0:566_2: saddena sakatthapavattena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “antarikāyā”ti ca vutto,
tika-s0104t0:566_7: sambandhīyatthe vā kasmā upayogavacanaṃ katanti anuyogasambhavato taṃ pariharituṃ “antarāsaddena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:566_8: tena sambandhīyatthe sāmivacanappasaṅge saddantarayogena laddhamidaṃ upayogavacananti dasseti,
tika-s0104t0:566_14: Dvīhi pana yoge kā kathāti atthassa sijjhanato.
tika-s0104t0:566_19: atthato pana so dvikkhattuṃ yojetabbo ekassāpi padassa āvuttiyādinayena anekadhā sampajjanatoti dasseti “dutiyapadenapī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:566_20: Ko pana doso ayojiteti āha “ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:566_21: Dutiyapadaṃ na pāpuṇātīti attho saddantarayogavasā saddeyeva sāmivacanappasaṅge upayogavibhattiyā icchitattā.
tika-s0104t0:567_2: Kittāvatā pana so dīgho nāma tadatthabhūtoti codanamapaneti “addhānagamanasamayassa hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:567_3: Addhānagamanasamayassa vibhaṅgeti gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadādīsu addhānagamanasamayasaddassa padabhājanīyabhūte vibhaṅge.
tika-s0104t0:568_5: So bhikkhusaṅghoti idha āgato tadā parivārabhūto bhikkhusaṅgho.
tika-s0104t0:568_11: Majjhimāgamaṭīkākāro pana ācariyadhammapālatthero evamāha “appasaddassa parittapariyāyaṃ manasi katvā
tika-s0104t0:568_13: Appasaddo panettha ‘abhāvattho’ tipi sakkā viññātuṃ ‘appābādhatañcasañjānāmī’tiādīsu viyā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:568_18: yadidaṃ vibhattiyānapekkhāvasena yathārahaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbapadatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā puna tattha vijjamānavibhattivasena parivattetvā nikkhipananti.
tika-s0104t0:568_19: Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatattā saṅghoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento āha “diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghātena samaṇagaṇenā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:568_20: Ettha pana “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
tika-s0104t0:568_21: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā.
tika-s0104t0:568_22: “Yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni,
tika-s0104t0:568_23: tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttānañca sīlānaṃ sāmaññena saṅghāto saṅghaṭito sametoti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghāto,
tika-s0104t0:568_28: Tathā hi diṭṭhisīlādīnaṃ niyatasabhāvattā sotāpannāpi aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatā,
tika-s0104t0:568_33: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañciccapāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-s0104t0:568_35: Ariyapuggalassa hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatatāyeva,
tika-s0104t0:568_37: tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti vacanato pana puthujjanānampi diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvo labbhatiyeva. Saddhiṃ-
tika-s0104t0:569_3: atha kho suppiyopi paribbājako brahmadattena māṇavena saddhinti puggalaṃ sampiṇḍeti,
tika-s0104t0:569_12: saddo yutto “assosi kho verañjo brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0104t0:569_14: nāssa maggapaṭipattiyā koci antarāyo ahosīti ayamattho dīpito hoti.
tika-s0104t0:569_16: yassa santike paṭhamaṃ upatissakolitāpi pabbajiṃsu channaparibbājakova,
tika-s0104t0:569_18: tadā”ti ca etena samakālameva addhānamaggapaṭipannataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:570_4: Coditā devadūtehīti daharakumāro jarājiṇṇasatto gilāno kammakāraṇā,
tika-s0104t0:570_5: kammakāraṇikā vā matasattoti imehi pañcahi devadūtehi coditā ovaditā saṃvegaṃ uppāditā samānāpi.
tika-s0104t0:570_18: Tato paraṃ vīsativassāni ‘yuvāno”’ti vuttaṃ. Taruṇo, māṇavo,
tika-s0104t0:571_0: Tesu vā dvīsu janesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:571_1: Yo vā “ekaṃ samaya”nti pubbe adhigato kālo,
tika-s0104t0:571_2: tassa paṭiniddeso tatrāti yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā antarā rājagahañca nāḷandañca addhānamaggapaṭipanno,
tika-s0104t0:571_3: tasmiṃyeva samaye suppiyopi taṃ addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
tika-s0104t0:571_5: Nipātamattanti ettha mattasaddena visesatthābhāvato padapūraṇattaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:571_6: Madhupiṇḍikapariyāyoti madhupiṇḍikadesanā nāma iti naṃ suttantaṃ dhārehi,
tika-s0104t0:571_10: Pariyāyati attano phalaṃ paṭiggahetvā pavattatīti pariyāyo, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:571_11: Anekasaddeneva anekavidhenāti attho viññāyati adhippāyamattenāti āha “anekavidhenā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:572_2: Buddhassa bhagavato avaṇṇaṃ dosaṃ nindanti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:572_12: taṃ sabbaṃ gūthaṃ viya maṇḍanajātiyo puriso jegucchī.
tika-s0104t0:572_14: Tadakaraṇena vayovuḍḍhe tāpeti tadācāravirahitatāya vā kapaṇapuriso.
tika-s0104t0:572_16: tadakaraṇato vā so hīnagabbho cāti evaṃ tadeva abhivādanādiakaraṇaṃ arasarūpatādīnaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:572_18: viseso”ti etassa pana “sundarikāya nāma paribbājikāya maraṇānavabodho,
tika-s0104t0:572_22: sayampaṭibhāna”nti etassa “anācariyakena sāmaṃ paṭivedhena tattha tattha tathā tathā dhammadesanā,
tika-s0104t0:572_26: na aggapuggalo”ti etesaṃ pana “sabbadhammānaṃ kameneva anavabodho,
tika-s0104t0:572_35: Ariyañāṇadassanameva vā visesaṃ vuttanayena alaṃ pariyattaṃ yassa,
tika-s0104t0:572_45: Na hi arasarūpatādayo dosā bhagavati saṃvijjanti,
tika-s0104t0:572_46: dhammasaṅghesu ca durakkhātaduppaṭipannādayo akāraṇanti vā yuttikāraṇarahitaṃ attanā paṭiññāmattaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:572_48: Imasmiñca atthe kāraṇaṃ vatvāti ettha kāraṇaṃ ivāti iva-
tika-s0104t0:572_50: Tathā tathāti jātivuḍḍhānamanabhivādanādinā tena tena ākārena.
tika-s0104t0:572_51: Vaṇṇasaddassa guṇapasaṃsāsu pavattanato yathākkamaṃ “avaṇṇaṃ dosaṃ ninda”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:573_9: saddo hi bahulā kattuabhidhāyako”ti saddavidū vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:573_17: nanu saṅgītikālato so avaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ bhāsanakālo atītoti?
tika-s0104t0:573_22: Atha vā yasmiṃ kāle tehi avaṇṇo vaṇṇo ca bhāsīyati,
tika-s0104t0:573_24: evañca katvā “tatrā”ti padassa kālapaṭiniddesavikappanaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttampi supapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:574_7: Hatthena vā pādena vā yena kenaci vā aṅgapaccaṅgena paharitvā kīḷamāno viya.
tika-s0104t0:574_8: Akkhikaṇṇakosasaṅkhātaṭṭhānavasena tīhi pakārehi bhinno mado yassāti pabhinnamado, taṃ.
tika-s0104t0:579_1: attano ācariye ca kāruññappavattiṃ dassetvā kiñcāpi antevāsinā ācariyassa anukūlena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:579_2: ayaṃ pana paṇḍitajātikattā na īdisesu ṭhānesu tamanuvattatīti idānissa kammassakatāñāṇappavattiṃ dassento “ācariye kho panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:579_8: etena ca aññe aṭṭhavidhe vise nivatteti.
tika-s0104t0:582_0: Dārado vacchanābho ca, visabhedā ime navā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:583_4: Māṇavakāti attānameva ovadituṃ ālapati “samayopi kho te bhaddāli appaṭividdhoahosī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t0:583_5: “Kammassakā”ti kammameva attasantakabhāvaṃ vatvā tadeva vivarati “attano kammānurūpameva gatiṃ gacchantī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:583_7: Ummujjitvāti ācariyo viya ayoniso ariyūpavāde animmujjanto yoniso ariyūpavādato ummujjitvā,
tika-s0104t0:583_14: yathā añño paṇḍitasabhāvo jāti ācāravasena kulaputto anekapariyāyena tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitumārabhati,
tika-s0104t0:583_16: tañca kho api nāmāyamācariyo ettakenāpi ratanattayāvaṇṇabhāsato orameyyāti.
tika-s0104t0:584_3: Vārijaṃ kamalaṃ na paharāmi na bhañjāmi,
tika-s0104t0:584_14: Vaṇṇīyati phalametena yathāsabhāvato vibhāvīyatīti vaṇṇo, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:584_24: “Guṇūpasañhitaṃ pasaṃsa”nti pana vadanto pasaṃsāya eva guṇabhāsanaṃ siddhaṃ tassā tadavinābhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:585_1: Eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo.
tika-s0104t0:585_6: So hi paṭhamābhinīhārakāle dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ paṭipāṭiyā āvajjanaṃ ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhārasambharaṇaguṇehi
tika-s0104t0:585_13: “Uppajjamāno uppajjatī”ti pana idaṃ ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva uppādakiriyāya vattamānakālikattā.
tika-s0104t0:585_15: na aññena kāraṇenāti evaṃ panettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:585_17: evarūpañcettha lakkhaṇaṃ na sakkā aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṃ.
tika-s0104t0:585_21: Esa hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya yāva anāgāmiphalaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:585_25: Buddhānañhi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni uppajjanti,
tika-s0104t0:585_26: saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññuguṇarāsi āgatova nāma hoti,
tika-s0104t0:585_28: tadanibbattattā tadaññakkhaṇe yathārahaṃ “uppajjamāno uppajjati” cceva vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:585_30: Atītakālikassāpi vattamānapayogassa katthaci diṭṭhattā uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho.
tika-s0104t0:585_33: Yāvatā sāmatthiyena mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave uppatti icchitabbā,
tika-s0104t0:585_34: tāvatā sāmatthiyena bodhisambhārabhūtena paripuṇṇena samannāgato hutvāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:585_37: asamehi purimabuddheheva samo majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇa nikkhaṃ viya nibbisiṭṭho,
tika-s0104t0:586_1: “Pañcanikāye”ti vatvāpi anekāvayavattā tesaṃ na ettakena sabbathā pariyādānanti “navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:586_4: niravasesānañca tesaṃ idha pakāsanena pāḷisaṃvaṇṇanāya eva sampajjanato,
tika-s0104t0:586_7: Kiṃ pana so tathā ogāhetvā bhāsatīti āha.
tika-s0104t0:586_12: Tattha “sundaramidaṃ kāraṇa”nti evaṃ sayameva kāraṇaparivitakkanaṃ ākāraparivitakko.
tika-s0104t0:586_13: Attano diṭṭhiyā nijjhāyitvā khamanaṃ ruccanaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:592_3: Aññamaññassā”ti idaṃ ruḷhipadaṃ “eko ekāyā”ti padaṃ viyāti dassento “aññoaññassā”ti ruḷhipadeneva vivarati.
tika-s0104t0:592_4: “Ujumevā”ti sāvadhāraṇasamāsataṃ vatvā tena nivattetabbatthaṃ āha “īsakampi apariharitvā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:592_7: Pubbe ekavāramiva avaṇṇavaṇṇabhāsane niddiṭṭhepi “ujuvipaccanīkavādā”ti vuttattā anekavārameva te evaṃ
tika-s0104t0:592_8: bhāsantīti veditabbanti dassetuṃ “puna itaro avaṇṇaṃ itaro vaṇṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:593_2: Tasmiṃ kāleti yamhi saṃvacchare, utumhi, māse,
tika-s0104t0:593_3: pakkhe vā bhagavā taṃ addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno,
tika-s0104t0:593_5: Tena hi aniyamato saṃvaccharautumāsaḍḍhamāsāva niddisitā “taṃ divasa”nti divasassa visuṃ niddiṭṭhattā,
tika-s0104t0:593_8: Teneva hi kiriyāvicchedadassanavasena “rājagahe piṇḍāya caratī”ti saha pubbakālakiriyāhi vattamānaniddeso kato,
tika-s0104t0:593_9: itarathā tasmiṃ kāle rājagahe piṇḍāya carati,
tika-s0104t0:593_11: Na hi asamānavisayā kiriyā ekādhārā sambhavanti,
tika-s0104t0:593_16: Soti evaṃ rājagahe vasamāno so bhagavā.
tika-s0104t0:593_17: Piṇḍāya caraṇenapi hi tattha paṭibaddhabhāvavacanato sannivāsattameva dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:593_18: Yadi pana “piṇḍāya caramāno so bhagavā”ti paccāmaseyya,
tika-s0104t0:593_20: Taṃ divasanti yaṃ divasaṃ addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno,
tika-s0104t0:593_27: Taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipannoti “nāḷandāyaṃ veneyyānaṃ vividhahitasukhanipphattiṃ ākaṅkhamāno imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā
tika-s0104t0:593_29: brahmajālasuttaṃ desessāmī”ti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ dīghamaggaṃ paṭipanno,
tika-s0104t0:593_30: idaṃ pana kāraṇaṃ pakaraṇatova pākaṭanti na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:593_31: Ettāvatā “kasmā pana bhagavā taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno”ti codanā visodhitā hoti.
tika-s0104t0:594_2: taṃ divasaṃ anubandhoti ca vuttanayena sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:594_8: Tena vuttaṃ “bhagavato taṃ maggaṃ paṭipannabhāvaṃ ajānantovā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:594_9: tathā ajānanto eva hutvā anubandhoti attho.
tika-s0104t0:594_10: Na hi so bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhumeva icchati,
tika-s0104t0:594_13: Ettāvatā “kasmā ca suppiyo anubandho”ti codanā visodhitā hoti.
tika-s0104t0:594_15: Kadāci pana bhagavā aññataraveseneva gacchati aṅgulimāladamanapakkusātiabhiggamanādīsu,
tika-s0104t0:594_17: idhāpi īdisāya buddhasiriyāti dassetuṃ “buddhasiriyā sobhamāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:595_2: porāṇaṭṭhakathāyañca anāgatattā anussavasiddhā ayaṃ kathāti dassetuṃ “kirā”ti vuttanti vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:595_8: Asītihatthappamāṇeti tesaṃ rasmīnaṃ pakatiyā pavattiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:595_10: upari ca paccekaṃ asītihatthamatte padese pakatiyāva ghanībhūtā rasmiyo tiṭṭhantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:595_12: Yato chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo taḷākato mātikā viya dasasu disāsu dhāvanti,
tika-s0104t0:595_15: saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana vakkhati “puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:595_18: Vāmahatthato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:595_19: Upari kesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvaṭṭehi moragīvavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:595_20: Heṭṭhā pādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:595_21: Evaṃ samantā asītihatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā vidhāvantī”ti keci pana aññathāpi parikappanāmattena vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:595_22: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ tathā aññattha anāgatattā,
tika-s0104t0:595_24: Tāsaṃ pana buddharasmīnaṃ tadā aniggūhitabhāvadassanatthaṃ “tasmiṃ kira samaye”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:595_25: Pakkusātiabhiggamanādīsu viya hi tadā tāsaṃ niggūhane kiñci kāraṇaṃ natthi.
tika-s0104t0:596_0: Tasmiṃ vanantare dissamānākārena tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ sobhā viññāyatīti āha “ratanāveḷā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:596_1: Ratanāveḷā nāma ratanamayavaṭaṃsakaṃ muddhaṃ avati rakkhatīti hi aveḷā, āveḷā vā,
tika-s0104t0:596_13: Vāyuno vegena ito cito ca khittaṃ tanti tathā.
tika-s0104t0:596_16: Kuṭilaṃ aciraṭṭhāyittā virūpaṃ hutvā javati dhāvatīti vijju,
tika-s0104t0:597_4: Vikasitaṃ phullitaṃ tadubhayaṃ yassa sarassa tathā.
tika-s0104t0:597_5: Sabbena pakārena parito samantato phullati vikasatīti sabbapāliphullaṃ a-
tika-s0104t0:597_14: Dvattiṃsacandādīnaṃ mālā kenaci ganthetvā paṭipāṭiyā ca ṭhapitāti na vattabbā “yadi siyā”ti parikappanāmattena
tika-s0104t0:600_0: Dvattiṃsacandamālāya siriṃ attano siriyā abhibhavantī ivāti sambandho. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0104t0:601_0: Evaṃ bhagavato tadā sobhaṃ dassetvā idāni bhikkhusaṅghassāpi sobhaṃ dassento “tañca panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:601_6: Pāpe akusale garahino paresaṃ hitapaṭipattiyā vattāro.
tika-s0104t0:601_29: Yesaṃ kucchigataṃ sabbampi tiṇapalāsādi gandhajātameva hoti,
tika-s0104t0:601_37: Tepi hi ekadesena bhagavatā paṭividdhapaṭibhāgeneva cattāri saccāni bujjhanti.
tika-s0104t0:601_45: Channaṃ haṃsakulānaṃ seṭṭho dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā viya,
tika-s0104t0:602_1: bhikkhū ca disvā attano parisaṃ olokesīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:602_5: agge ca tidhā kato daṇḍo tidaṇḍo.
tika-s0104t0:602_9: Sā hi kaṃ udakaṃ udeti pasaveti,
tika-s0104t0:602_17: Evaṃ idaṃ vacanamādi yassa vacanassa tathā,
tika-s0104t0:602_24: Mukhena vā amanāpaṃ kammaṃ rāti gaṇhātīti mukharā.
tika-s0104t0:603_9: mahāmoggallānassa ca bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ sandhāya “tesu pana pakkantesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:603_11: tato parampi tadanupabbajitā paribbājakaparisā aparimāṇāti dasseti “sāpi tesaṃ parisā bhinnā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:603_12: Yāya kāyaci hi paribbājakaparisāya pabbajitāya tassa parisā bhinnāyeva nāma samānagaṇattāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:603_14: Usūyasaṅkhātassa visassa uggāro uggilanaṃ usūyavisuggāro, taṃ.
tika-s0104t0:603_15: Ettha ca “yasmā panesā”tiādināva “kasmā ca so ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti codanaṃ visodheti,
tika-s0104t0:603_16: “sace”tiādikaṃ pana sabbampi tapparivāravacanamevāti tehipi sā visodhitāyeva nāma.
tika-s0104t0:603_17: Bhagavato virodhānunayābhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ ete avaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
tika-s0104t0:603_18: “Mārena anvāviṭṭhā evaṃ bhāsantī”ti ca keci vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:604_0: 2. Yasmā atthaṅgato sūriyo, tasmā akālo dāni gantunti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:605_3: saddo rukkhavisaye yathā “mahāvanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdī”tiādīsūti dasseti” “taruṇambarukkho”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:605_4: Keci pana “ambalaṭṭhikā nāma vuttanayena eko gāmo”ti vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:605_6: Chāyūdakasampannanti chāyāya ceva udakena ca sampannaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:606_3: tadānubhāvato nipparissayatthāya idāni upagantvā sve gamissāmīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:606_4: “Saddhiṃ antevāsinā brahmadattena māṇavenā” ticceva sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:606_6: na pana tadā suppiyassa parisāya abhāvatoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhiṃ attano parisāyā”ti idha vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:606_11: evaṃ aññampi edisaṃ payojanābhāvato saṅgītikārakehi na saṅgītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:606_12: Keci pana “pāḷiyaṃ vutta”nti ādhāraṃ vatvā ‘tadetaṃ na sīhaḷaṭṭhakathānayadassanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:606_18: Evañhi tadā aññāyapi parisāya vijjamānabhāvadassanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:606_19: pāḷiyamāruḷhavasena pana aññathāpi idha vattabbanti adhippāyo yutto”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:607_0: Idāni “tatrāpi suda”ntiādipāḷiyā sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ vāsaṃ upagato panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:608_1: Sammā pahonti taṃ taṃ kammanti sampahulā, bahavo,
tika-s0104t0:608_3: Sabbantimena paricchedena catuvaggasaṅgheneva vinayakammassa kattabbattā “vinayapariyāyenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:608_4: Tayo janāti cesa upalakkhaṇaniddeso dvinnampi sampahulattā.
tika-s0104t0:608_6: Taṃ taṃ pāḷiyā āgatavohāravasena hi ayaṃ bhedo.
tika-s0104t0:608_8: tato paṭṭhāya uttari catupañcajanādikā sampahulāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:608_11: idha pana īdisāya evāti niyamento āha “katthacī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:608_22: idha pana tathā katā nisīdanasālāyevāti dasseti “idha panā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:608_31: kāyasāmaggīvasena ca samodhānaṃ sandhāya padadvayametaṃ vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:608_32: Saṅkhiyā vuccati kathā sammā khiyanato kathanato.
tika-s0104t0:609_3: saddasatthaṃ anugato nayo saddanayo”ti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:609_4: Nīyati attho etenāti vā nayo, upāyo,
tika-s0104t0:609_16: etena na bhūtaṃ abhūtanti nibbacanaṃ, bhūta-
tika-s0104t0:609_18: Yāvañcidanti sandhivasena niggahitāgamoti āha “yāva ca ida”nti,
tika-s0104t0:609_20: Yāva cayattakaṃ idaṃ ayaṃ nānādhimuttikatā suppaṭividitā,
tika-s0104t0:610_0: “Bhagavatā”tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttattā tenāti ettha ta-
tika-s0104t0:610_2: tasmā yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato samāno supākaṭo nāma hoti,
tika-s0104t0:610_3: tadabhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya tassa atthabhāvena dassento “yo so”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:610_4: Na hettha so pubbe vutto atthi,
tika-s0104t0:610_7: Tasmā yathāvuttaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ sakatthaṃyevesa padhānabhāvena parāmasatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:610_11: sammā vā pasaṭṭhā sundaraṃ bujjhatīti sammāsambodhi.
tika-s0104t0:610_12: Sā pana buddhānaṃ sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko viya rañño sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:610_16: Satipi ñāṇadassanānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ visayavisesappavattiṃ dassento “tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:611_7: Kuṭṭassa bhittiyā tiro paraṃ, anto vā,
tika-s0104t0:611_9: Ativisuddhenāti ativiya visuddhena pañcavaṇṇasamannāgatena sunīlapāsādikaakkhilomasamalaṅkatena rattiñceva
tika-s0104t0:611_10: divā ca samantā yojanaṃ passantena maṃsacakkhunā.
tika-s0104t0:611_16: Vipassanāsahagato samādhi padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇametissāti samādhipadaṭṭhānā, tāya.
tika-s0104t0:611_22: ajjhupekkhanañca majjhimapaṇṇāsake pañcamavagge saṅgītaṃ caṅkīsuttañcettha nidassanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:611_23: etena arayo hatā anenāti niruttinayena padasiddhimāha.
tika-s0104t0:611_29: paṭiggahituṃ vā arahatīti arahanti dasseti “paccayādīnañca arahattā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:611_35: visesatthinā ca visesassa anupayojetabbato yajjevaṃ “dhammāna”nti visesovānupayojito siyā,
tika-s0104t0:611_38: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatā viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti,
tika-s0104t0:612_0: Idāni ca catūhi padehi catuvesārajjavasena attanā adhippetataraṃ chaṭṭhamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “antarāyikadhamme vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:612_8: yassa ñāṇassa vasena sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā bhagavā sammāsambuddho nāma jāto,
tika-s0104t0:612_9: kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ bujjhanavasena pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati,
tika-s0104t0:612_12: yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati,
tika-s0104t0:612_14: asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ pekkhantassa viya paṭibhāgenāvabodho na siyā,
tika-s0104t0:612_15: tathā ca sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbe dhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇavisayā hontīti āpajjati.
tika-s0104t0:612_16: Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitilakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0104t0:615_0: Idampi sabbadā ñāṇappavattidīpakaṃ aṅguttarāgame nāgopamasuttavacanaṃ suvuttaṃ nāma hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:615_2: Ṭhitilakkhaṇārammaṇatāya ca atītānāgatadhammānaṃ tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā,
tika-s0104t0:615_3: tasmā sakiññeva sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:615_4: Atha kamena sabbasmimpi visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0104t0:615_7: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho sambhavati apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa.
tika-s0104t0:615_8: Ye pana “atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū nāma bhagavā jāto,
tika-s0104t0:615_9: tañca ñāṇaṃ na anumānikaṃ nāma saṃsayābhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:615_12: Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā
tika-s0104t0:615_23: yaṃ cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ –
tika-s0104t0:615_26: tattha tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya paccakkhato ñāṇaṃ pavattati niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:615_27: ñātuṃ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā,
tika-s0104t0:615_29: sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanapaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhā manasikārapaṭibaddhā cittuppādapaṭibaddhāti vacanato.
tika-s0104t0:616_0: Nanu ca etasmimpi pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:616_1: tadā sakiṃyeva sakalavisayatāya anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosā nātivattiyevāti? Na,
tika-s0104t0:616_4: Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā,
tika-s0104t0:616_5: tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha acinteyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:616_15: yathā dvinnaṃ samuggapaṭalānaṃ sammā phusitānaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ uparimaṃ nātivattati,
tika-s0104t0:616_18: evameva buddhassa bhagavato neyyañca ñāṇañca aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino…pe…
tika-s0104t0:616_20: kamena vā icchānurūpaṃ pavattassa tassa ñāṇassa vasena sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā bhagavā sammāsambuddho nāma jātoti.
tika-s0104t0:617_10: evaṃ aṭṭhārasāveṇikabuddhadhammavasena catūhākārehi thomitenāti evamādinā tesaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇadassanapahānabodhanatthehi
tika-s0104t0:618_2: Yadipi hīnapaṇītabhedena duvidhāva adhimutti pāḷiyaṃ vuttā,
tika-s0104t0:618_7: Tathā hi vakkhati “nānādhimuttikatā nānajjhāsayatā nānādiṭṭhikatā nānakkhantitā nānārucitā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:618_11: tassattho pana pākaṭoyevāti āha “yāva ca suṭṭhu paṭividitā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:619_0: “Yā ca aya”ntiādinā dhātusaṃyuttapāḷiṃ dassento tadeva saṃyuttaṃ manasi karitvā tesaṃ avaṇṇavaṇṇabhāsanena
tika-s0104t0:619_1: saddhiṃ ghaṭetvā therānamayaṃ saṅkhiyadhammo udapādīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:619_2: Ato assa bhagavato dhātusaṃyuttadesanānayena tāsaṃ suppaṭividitabhāvaṃ samatthanavasena dassetuṃ “ayaṃ hī”tiādimāhāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:620_6: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana tampi tato avasesampi jānāti.
tika-s0104t0:620_17: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca jānāti,
tika-s0104t0:620_18: etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t0:620_19: Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t0:620_21: maggo hutvā kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0104t0:620_22: Apica paravādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma etaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ,
tika-s0104t0:620_38: tasmā pañcamabalañāṇasaṅkhātena nānādhimuttikatāñāṇena ca sabbaññutaññāṇena ca viditāti attho veditabbo. Ca-
tika-s0104t0:620_41: “Dvepi nāmā”tiādinā yathāvuttasuttassatthaṃ saṅkhepena dassetvā “imesu cāpī”tiādinā tassa saṅkhiyadhammassa tadabhisambandhataṃ āvi karoti.
tika-s0104t0:620_42: Iti ha meti ettha evaṃsaddatthe iti- saddo, ha-
tika-s0104t0:621_1: “Viditvā”ti ettha pakatiyatthabhūtā vijānanakiriyā sāmaññena abhedavatīpi samānā taṃtaṃkaraṇayogyatāya
tika-s0104t0:621_5: Na hi tena dassanato aññaṃ jānanaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-s0104t0:621_6: Tadidaṃ ñāṇaṃ āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhaṃ manasikārapaṭibaddhaṃ cittuppādapaṭibaddhaṃ hutvā pavattati.
