tika-s0104t0:621_7: Kiṃ nāma karonto bhagavā tena ñāṇena āvajjanādipaṭibaddhena aññāsīti sotūnamatthassa suviññāpanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t0:621_8: parammukhā viya codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti “kiṃ karonto aññāsī”ti iminā,
tika-s0104t0:621_9: pacchimayāmakiccaṃ karonto taṃ ñāṇaṃ āvajjanādipaṭibaddhaṃ hutvā tena tathā aññāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:621_10: Sāmaññasmiṃ sati visesavacanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyāti anuyogenāha “kiccañcanāmeta”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t0:622_1: sarīraphāsukatthañcā”ti etena anekakappasamupacitapuññasambhārajanitaṃ bhagavato mukhavaraṃ duggandhādidosaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0104t0:622_3: Sabbopi hi buddhānaṃ kāyo bāhirabbhantarehi malehi anupakkiliṭṭho sudhotamaṇi viya hoti.
tika-s0104t0:622_8: Surattadupaṭṭaṃ antaravāsakaṃ vihāranivāsanaparivattanavasena nivāsetvā vijjulatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ
tika-s0104t0:622_9: bandhitvā meghavaṇṇaṃ sugatacīvaraṃ pārupitvā selamayapattaṃ ādāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:622_11: “Kadāci ekako”tiādi tesaṃ tesaṃ vineyyānaṃ vinayanānukūlaṃ bhagavato upasaṅkamanadassanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:622_12: Gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vāti ettha vā-
tika-s0104t0:622_15: Yathāruci vattamānehi anekehi pāṭihāriyehi pavisatīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:623_1: Seyyathidanti ca taṃ katamanti atthe nipāto,
tika-s0104t0:623_7: Reṇuṃ vūpasametvāti rajaṃ sannisīdāpetvā upari vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti caṇḍa- vātātapa-
tika-s0104t0:623_10: tato tato himavantādīsu pupphūpagarukkhato upasaṃharitvāti atthassa viññāyamānattā tathā na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:623_21: tathā pana asatiyeva paṭiggaṇhantī”ti bhagavato yathāruci pavattanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:623_22: Sabbadāva bhagavato gamanaṃ paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇapāduddharaṇasaṅkhātānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitanti āha “ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde”ti.
tika-s0104t0:623_28: Idañca yāvadeva vineyyajanavinayanatthaṃ satthu pāṭihāriyanti tesaṃ dassanaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:623_29: “Chabbaṇṇarasmiyo”ti vatvāpi “suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāni viyā”ti vacanaṃ bhagavato sarīre pītābhāya yebhuyyatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Rasa-
tika-s0104t0:623_32: suvaṇṇajaladhārā viya suvaṇṇavaṇṇānīti attho”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:623_33: Pāsādakūṭāgārādīni tesu tesu gāmanigamādīsu saṃvijjamānāni alaṅkarontiyo hutvā.
tika-s0104t0:624_4: Na hi bhagavā loluppacārapiṇḍacāriko viya yattha katthaci gacchati.
tika-s0104t0:624_6: ye vā tadanucchavikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dātuṃ samatthā,
tika-s0104t0:624_21: Tathā hi vuttaṃ āyasmatā nāgasenattherena “visamaṃ mahārāja,
tika-s0104t0:624_23: visame liṅge liṅgadubbalatāya arahattaṃ patto gihī tasmiṃyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā neso mahārāja,
tika-s0104t0:624_25: gihiliṅgasseveso doso yadidaṃ liṅgadubbalatā”ti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:624_27: appāṭihīrappavesanena ca pana “te sunivatthā supārutā”tiādivacanaṃ yathārahaṃ sambandhitvā mahājanānuggahaṇaṃ atthato vibhāvetabbaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:624_30: Tattha gantvā maṇḍalamāḷeti idha pāṭho likhito.
tika-s0104t0:625_0: Atha khoti evaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisituṃ gamanakāle.
tika-s0104t0:625_2: “Pāde pakkhāletvā pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadatī”ti ettha pāde pakkhālentova pādapīṭhe tiṭṭhanto ovadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:625_3: Etadatthaṃyeva hi bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosānaṃ āgamayamāno nisīdi.
tika-s0104t0:625_4: Dullabhā sampattīti satipi manussattapaṭilābhe patirūpadesavāsaindriyāvekallasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo sampattisaṅkhātā guṇā dullabhāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:625_14: Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā pacchābhattaṃ tayo bhāge katvā paṭhamabhāge sace ākaṅkhati,
tika-s0104t0:625_18: atha yathākālaparicchedaṃ tato vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge pacchimayāmassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse viya lokaṃ voloketi veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ passituṃ,
tika-s0104t0:625_26: Tassā parisāya cittācāraṃ ñatvā katabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha “sampattaparisāyaanurūpena pāṭihāriyenā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:625_29: Kālayuttanti “imissā velāya imassa evaṃ vattabba”nti taṃtaṃkālānurūpaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:625_35: na yāva samandhakārā dhammaṃ desetīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:625_36: “Samayaṃ viditvā parisaṃ uyyojesī”tipi katthaci pariyāyavacanapāṭho dissati,
tika-s0104t0:626_3: Na hi bhagavato kāye rajojallaṃ upalimpatīti.
tika-s0104t0:627_0: Pañhākathanādivasena adhippāyaṃ sampādento “dasasahassilokadhātū”ti evaṃ avatvā tassā anekāvayavasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ “sakaladasasahassilokadhātū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:627_1: Purebhattapacchābhattapurimayāmesu manussaparisābāhullato okāsaṃ alabhitvā idāni majjhimayāmeyeva okāsaṃ labhamānā,
tika-s0104t0:627_2: bhagavatā vā katokāsatāya okāsaṃ labhamānāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:627_3: Kīdisaṃ pana pucchantīti āha “yathābhisaṅkhataṃ antamaso caturakkharampī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:627_6: etena yathā tathā attano paṭibhānānurūpaṃ pucchantīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:628_0: Pacchābhattakālassa tīsu bhāgesu paṭhamabhāge sīhaseyyākappanaṃ ekantaṃ na hotīti āha “purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāya pīḷitassa sarīrassā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:628_1: Teneva hi pubbe “sace ākaṅkhatī”ti tadā sīhaseyyākappanassa anibaddhatā vibhāvitā.
tika-s0104t0:628_3: Sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthaṃ caṅkamena vītināmeti sīhaseyyaṃ kappetīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:628_6: idañca pacchimayāme bhagavato bahulaṃ āciṇṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:629_0: “Pacchimayāmakiccaṃ karonto aññāsī”ti pubbe vuttamatthaṃ samatthento “tasmiṃ pana divase”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:629_1: Buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ yattha katthaci vasantānaṃ idaṃ pañcavidhaṃ kiccaṃ avijahitameva hoti sabbakālaṃ suppatiṭṭhitasatisampajaññattā,
tika-s0104t0:629_2: tasmā tadahepi tadavijahanabhāvadassanatthaṃ idha pañcavidhakiccapayojananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:629_5: Pubbe vutte atthadvaye pacchimatthaññeva gahetvā “sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:630_0: “Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ saṅkhiyadhammaṃ viditvā yena maṇḍalamāḷo,
tika-s0104t0:630_3: evaṃ cintetvā ca upasaṅkamīti attho veditabboti dassetuṃ “ñatvā ca panassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:630_4: Tattha assa etadahosīti assa bhagavato etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:630_11: Taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvāti taṃ yathārocitaṃ vacanaṃ imassa suttassa uppattikāraṇaṃ katvā,
tika-s0104t0:630_12: imassa vā suttassa desanāya uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ katvātipi attho. Attha-
tika-s0104t0:630_14: tena imassa suttassa aṭṭhuppattikaṃ nikkhepaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:630_16: Appaṭivattiyanti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ anivattiyaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:633_3: Yathā vā kesaro migarājā sahanato, hananato,
tika-s0104t0:633_7: Tasmā sīhassa tathāgatassa nādaṃ nadantotipi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:633_8: Yathā hi sīho sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati,
tika-s0104t0:633_9: evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso “ime diṭṭhiṭṭhānā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t0:633_17: Tesaṃ “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”tiādinā vakkhamānanayena paccayākārassa samodhānampi veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:633_19: viya cāti upamādvayena brahmajāladesanāya anaññasādhāraṇattā sudukkarataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:633_21: Ratananikūṭena viya agāraṃ arahattanikūṭena brahmajālasuttantaṃ niṭṭhapento,
tika-s0104t0:633_23: Idañca arahattaphalapariyosānattā sabbaguṇānaṃ tadeva sabbesaṃ uttaritaranti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:633_25: saddo desanāpekkhoti parinibbutassāpi me sā desanā aparabhāge pañcavassasahassānīti attho yutto.
tika-s0104t0:633_27: tathā ca paṭipanne nibbānaṃ sampāpikā bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:634_7: Upasaṅkamīti ca upasaṅkamantoti attho paccuppannakālassa adhippetattā,
tika-s0104t0:634_8: tadupasaṅkamanassa pana atītabhāvassa sūcanato “upasaṅkamī”ti takkālāpekkhanavasena atītapayogo vutto.
tika-s0104t0:634_10: Itarathā dvinnampi vacanānaṃ atītakālikattā tathāvattabbameva na siyā.
tika-s0104t0:634_14: Sampattukāmatāya hi yaṃ kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃ taṃ padesātikkamanavasena “taṃ ṭhānaṃ upasaṅkami upasaṅkamanto”ti vattabbataṃ labhati,
tika-s0104t0:634_22: Anupasaggopi hi saddo saupasaggo viya atthantaraṃ vadati saupasaggopi anupasaggo viyāti.
tika-s0104t0:634_23: Ato “upasaṅkamitvā”ti padassa evaṃ upagato tato āsannataraṃ bhikkhūnaṃ samīpasaṅkhātaṃ pañhaṃ vā kathetuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:634_24: dhammaṃ vā desetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṭṭhānaṃ upagantvāti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:634_26: Yena kāraṇena bhagavatā so maṇḍalamāḷo upasaṅkamitabbo,
tika-s0104t0:635_0: Paññatte āsane nisīdīti ettha kenidaṃ paññattanti anuyoge sati bhikkhūhīti dassetuṃ “buddhakāle kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:635_10: Īdisesu hi bhummattho eva yujjatīti udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:635_11: Bhāroti taṅkhaṇeyeva bhagavato anucchavikāsanassa dullabhattā garukammaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:635_16: kevalaṃ tesu eva nisīditumananucchavikattā tathā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:635_18: Evaṃ sati saṅkaḍḍhitvā paññapentīti atthavasā vibhattiṃ vipariṇāmetvā sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:635_21: “Amhākaṃ īdisā kathā aññatarissā desanāya kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttā,
tika-s0104t0:635_22: avassaṃ bhagavā āgamissatī”ti ñatvā yathānisīdanaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:635_23: Ettha ca “idhāgato samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā tāvakālikaṃ gaṇhitvā paribhuñjatū”ti raññā ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:635_24: tena ca āgatakāle paribhuttaṃ āsanaṃ rañño nisīdanāsananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:635_25: Na hi tathā aṭṭhapitaṃ bhikkhūhi paribhuñjituṃ,
tika-s0104t0:635_27: Tasmā tādisaṃ rañño nisīdanāsanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ kathitanti dassetuṃ “taṃ sandhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:636_1: “Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ime saṅkhiyadhammaṃ viditvā”ti vuttattā jānantoyeva pucchīti ayamattho siddhoti āha “jānantoyevā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:636_2: Asati kathāvatthumhi tadanurūpā uparūpari vattabbā visesakathā na samūpabrūhatīti kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ pucchanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Nu-
tika-s0104t0:636_6: Etthāti etasmiṃ ṭhāne sandhivasena ukārassa okārādesova,
tika-s0104t0:636_7: na paṭhamāya pāḷiyā atthato visesoti dasseti “tassāpi purimoyeva attho”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:636_8: Purimoyevatthoti ca “katamāya nu bhavathā”ti evaṃ vutto attho.
tika-s0104t0:637_3: Byatireko ca nāma pubbe vuttatthāpekkhako visesātirekattho,
tika-s0104t0:637_4: so ca taṃ pubbe yathāpucchitāya kathāya vakkhamānaṃ vippakatabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ byatirekatthaṃ joteti. Pana-
tika-s0104t0:637_6: Tādiso pana attho saddasatthatova suviññeyyoti katvā tadaññesameva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “antarākathāti kammaṭṭhāna…pe…
tika-s0104t0:637_10: Yāya hi kathāya te bhikkhū sannisinnā,
tika-s0104t0:637_11: sā eva antarākathā vippakatā visesena puna pucchīyati,
tika-s0104t0:637_21: tehi ca asammissattā visuṃ ekāyevāti adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ “aññā,
tika-s0104t0:637_35: saddena cettha coramahāmattasenābhayakathādikaṃ anekavihitaṃ niratthakakathaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:637_41: Nanu ca tehi bhikkhūhi sā kathā “iti ha me”tiādinā yathādhippāyaṃ niṭṭhāpitāyevāti?
tika-s0104t0:637_43: Yadi hi bhagavā tasmiṃ khaṇe na upasaṅkameyya,
tika-s0104t0:638_1: nidānavaṇṇanāya vā pariniṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dassento tassa bhagavato vacanassānukūlabhāvampi samatthetuṃ “ettāvatā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:638_2: Ettāvatāti hi ettakena “evaṃ me suta”ntiādivacanakkamena yaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitanti vā ettakena “tattha evanti
tika-s0104t0:638_3: nipātapada”ntiādivacanakkamena atthavaṇṇanā samattāti vā dvidhā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:638_5: salilāyā”tiādinā pana tassa nidānassa bhagavato vacanassānukūlabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0104t0:638_8: Nimmalasilātalaracanavilāsasobhitaratanasopānanti nimmalena silātalena racanāya vilāsena līlāya sobhitaratanasopānavantaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:638_12: Vippakiṇṇamuttātalasadisavālukācuṇṇapaṇḍarabhūmibhāganti vividhena pakiṇṇāya muttāya talasadisānaṃ vālukānaṃ cuṇṇehi paṇḍaravaṇṇabhūmibhāgavantaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:638_19: kañcanamayāhi latāhi vinaddhānaṃ maṇīnaṃ gaṇappabhāsamudāyena samujjalasobhāsampannaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:638_22: sammissitakathitasarahasitasarasaṅkhātena madhurassarena sampannānaṃ gehanivāsīnaṃ naranārīnaṃ vicaritaṭṭhānabhūtassa.
tika-s0104t0:639_0: Tividhasīlādidassanavasena buddhassa guṇānubhāvaṃ sammā sūcetīti buddhaguṇānubhāvasaṃsūcakaṃ, tassa.
tika-s0104t0:639_1: Kālo ca deso ca desako ca vatthu ca parisā ca,
tika-s0104t0:640_0: Kimatthaṃ panettha dhammavinayasaṅgahe kariyamāne nidānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:640_1: nanu bhagavatā bhāsitavacanasseva saṅgaho kātabboti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t0:640_3: Kāladesadesakavatthuparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti,
tika-s0104t0:640_5: saddheyyā ca desakālavatthuhetunimittehi upanibandho viya vohāravinicchayo,
tika-s0104t0:640_6: teneva cāyasmatā mahākassapena “brahmajālaṃ āvuso ānanda kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā desādipucchāsu katāsu
tika-s0104t0:640_7: tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena āyasmatā ānandattherena nidānaṃ bhāsitanti tadevidhāpi
tika-s0104t0:641_6: āgamantaraṃ nissāya parivitakkassa ca abhāvo sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya ekappamāṇattā ñeyyadhammesu.
tika-s0104t0:641_12: Tatoyeva ca antarāyikaniyyānikesu sammohābhāvasiddhito pacchimavesārajjadvayasiddhīti bhagavato catuvesārajjasamannāgamo,
tika-s0104t0:641_13: attahitaparahitapaṭipatti ca nidānavacanena pakāsitā hoti sampattaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena dhammadesanādīpanato,
tika-s0104t0:642_1: Ñāṇakaruṇāpariggahitasabbakiriyassa hi bhagavato natthi niratthikā pavatti,
tika-s0104t0:642_3: tasmā paresaṃyeva hitāya pavattasabbakiriyassa sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ yathāpavattaṃ
tika-s0104t0:642_4: vuccamānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ sattānaṃ anusāsanaṭṭhena sāsanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:642_6: Tayidaṃ satthu caritaṃ kāladesadesakavatthuparisāpadesehi saddhiṃ tattha tattha nidānavacanehi yathāsambhavaṃ pakāsīyati.
tika-s0104t0:642_7: Atha vā satthuno pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:642_9: ceva “jānatā passatā”tiādinā āsayānusayañāṇādipayogadīpanena ca vibhāvitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:642_11: Ko hi samattho buddhānubuddhena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitassa nidānassa payojanāni niravasesato vibhāvitunti.
tika-s0104t0:647_3: mahādhammarājādhirājagarunā katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā abbhantaranidānavaṇṇanāya
tika-s0104t0:649_1: Evaṃ abbhantaranidānasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni yathānikkhittassa suttassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karonto anupubbāvirodhinī
tika-s0104t0:649_4: āgatabhāro ca avassaṃ āvahitabboti saṃvaṇṇakassa sampattabhārāvahanena paṇḍitācārasamatikkamābhāvavibhāvinī,
tika-s0104t0:649_7: “desanā nikkhepo”ti hi etaṃ atthato bhinnampi sarūpato ekameva,
tika-s0104t0:649_8: desanāpi hi desetabbassa sīlādiatthassa veneyyasantānesu nikkhipanato “nikkhepo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:649_11: suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā saṃvaṇṇanā “ayaṃ desanā evaṃsamuṭṭhānā”ti suttassa sammadeva nidānaparijjhānena
tika-s0104t0:649_17: Idha pana tasmiṃ vicārite yassā aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ nikkhittaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:649_20: “atthi bhikkhave”tiādinā ca vuttānaṃ suttapadesānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā vuccamānā taṃtaṃanusandhidassanasukhatāya suviññeyyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:649_21: Tattha yathā anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttantāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādisāsanapaṭṭhānanayena soḷasavidhabhāvaṃ nātivattanti,
tika-s0104t0:649_28: hi aṭṭhuppattiyā ca parajjhāsayapucchāvasikehi saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati.
tika-s0104t0:649_31: attajjhāsayo ca parajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko ca,
tika-s0104t0:649_32: aṭṭhuppattiko ca parajjhāsayo ca aṭṭhuppattiko ca pucchāvasiko ca,
tika-s0104t0:649_33: aṭṭhuppattiko ca parajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko cā”ti ajjhāsayapucchānusandhisabbhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:649_35: tasmā niravasesaṃ patthāranayena saṃsaggabhedassa alabbhanato evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:650_0: Atha vā aṭṭhuppattiyā attajjhāsayenapi siyā saṃsaggabhedo,
tika-s0104t0:650_1: tadantogadhattā pana saṃsaggavasena vuttānaṃ sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepeyeva sandhāya “cattāro suttanikkhepā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:650_2: Imasmiṃ pana atthavikappe yathārahaṃ ekakadukatikacatukavasena sāsanapaṭṭhānanayena suttanikkhepā vattabbāti nayamattaṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:650_11: attano ajjhāsayo vā etassa yathāvuttanayenāti attajjhāsayo.
tika-s0104t0:650_15: Araṇīyato avagantabbato attho vuccati suttadesanāya vatthu,
tika-s0104t0:650_23: Etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo.
tika-s0104t0:650_27: Tassā pucchāya vasena pavattaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ vacanaṃ pucchāvasikaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:650_29: Vuttanayena aṭṭhuppattiyeva aṭṭhuppattikoti evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:651_0: Ettha ca paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇaṃ nirapekkhitvā attano ajjhāsayeneva dhammatantiṭhapanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t0:651_3: Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanānimittabhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattattā kathaṃ aṭṭhuppattike anavarodho siyā,
tika-s0104t0:651_4: pucchāvasikaṭṭhuppattikānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena pavattitadesanattā kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodho siyāti na codetabbametaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:651_5: Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinimuttasseva suttadesanākāraṇuppādassa aṭṭhuppattivasena gahitattā parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:651_7: Paresaṃ pucchaṃ vinā ajjhāsayameva nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo.
tika-s0104t0:652_5: Anupubbena hi saṃyuttake niddiṭṭhānaṃ sammappadhānapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ suttantānaṃ āvaḷi “sammappadhānasuttantahārako”ti vuccati,
tika-s0104t0:655_2: vaṇṇasaddena cettha “acchariyaṃ āvuso”tiādinā bhikkhusaṅghena vuttopi vaṇṇo saṅgahito.
tika-s0104t0:655_3: Tampi hi aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā “atthi bhikkhave aññe dhammā”tiādinā upari desanaṃ ārabhissati.
tika-s0104t0:655_6: pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”nti imissā desanāya brahmadattena vuttaṃ vaṇṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā desitattā āha “antevāsī vaṇṇa”nti.
tika-s0104t0:655_8: Desanākusaloti “imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā ayaṃ desanā sambhavatī”ti desanāya kusalo,
tika-s0104t0:655_11: yadidaṃ tattha tattha pakaraṇādhigataguṇena bhagavato thomanā. Vā-
tika-s0104t0:655_13: Tathā hesa “paṇḍitovāpi tena so”tiādīsu upamāne dissati,
tika-s0104t0:655_17: “Ayaṃ vā (ayañca) imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu vacanavossagge.
tika-s0104t0:655_24: Mama vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vāti vividhā visuṃ vikappanassa jotakattāti āha “vā-
tika-s0104t0:655_26: saddo pana attheva aññattho “ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:655_27: pare ca me na ājāneyyu”ntiādīsu atthi adhikattho “indriyaparopariyatta”ntiādīsu atthi pacchābhāgattho “parato āgamissatī”tiādīsu.
tika-s0104t0:655_28: Atthi paccanīkattho “uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā”tiādīsu idhāpi paccanīkatthoti dasseti “paṭiviruddhā sattā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:655_29: Sāsanassa paccanīkabhūtā paccatthikā sattāti attho. Ta-
tika-s0104t0:655_30: saddo pareti vuttamatthaṃ avaṇṇabhāsanakiriyāvisiṭṭhaṃ parāmasatīti vuttaṃ “ye avaṇṇaṃ vadanti, tesū”ti.
tika-s0104t0:656_1: atha kasmā evaṃ vuttanti codanālesaṃ dassetvā tadapaneti “kiñcāpī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:656_17: kopeyeva panāyaṃ niruḷhoti dasseti “kopassetaṃ adhivacana”nti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:656_18: Avayavatthañhi dassetvā tattha pariyāyena atthaṃ dassento evamāha.
tika-s0104t0:656_23: Ettha ca sabhāvadhammato aññassa kattuabhāvajotanatthaṃ “āhanatī”ti kattutthe āghātasaddaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:656_28: tammukhena pana na pacceti tenāti appaccayoti kātabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:656_34: na ca sakkā tepi aggahituṃ ekuppādādisabhāvattāti codanaṃ visodhetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:657_3: bhāvalakkhaṇe vā etaṃ bhummanti āha “tasmiṃ vā avaṇṇe”ti.
tika-s0104t0:657_5: nindā vā kopadomanassānaṃ ādhāro sambhavati tabbhāsakāyattattā tesaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:657_9: yadi bhaveyyāthā’ti ca vadanto ‘yathākkamaṃ pubbāparayogino ete saddā’ti ñāpetī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:657_10: “Kupitā kopena anattamanā domanassenā”ti iminā “evaṃ paṭhamena nayenā”tiādinā vuttavacanaṃ atthantarābhāvadassanena samattheti.
tika-s0104t0:657_11: “Tumhāka”nti iminā samānattho “tumha”nti eko saddo “amhāka”nti iminā samānattho “amha”nti saddo viya
tika-s0104t0:657_12: yathā “tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti āha “tumhākaṃyevā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:657_13: Atthavasā liṅgavipariyāyoti katvā “tāya ca anattamanatāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:657_15: viññāyamānatthassa ca saddassa payoge kāmacārattā “paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ antarāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:657_16: Ettha ca “antarāyo”ti idaṃ manopadosassa akaraṇīyatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:657_17: Yasmā tumhākameva tena kopādinā paṭhamajjhānādīnamantarāyo bhaveyya,
tika-s0104t0:657_18: tasmā te kopādipariyāyena vuttā āghātādayo na karaṇīyāti adhippāyo,
tika-s0104t0:657_19: tena “nāhaṃ sabbaññū”ti issarabhāvena tumhe tato nivāremi,
tika-s0104t0:657_21: Taṃ pana kāraṇavacanaṃ yasmā ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:658_0: So pana manopadoso na kevalaṃ kālantarabhāvinoyeva hitasukhassa antarāyakaro,
tika-s0104t0:658_1: atha kho taṅkhaṇapavattanārahassapi hitasukhassa antarāyakaroti manopadose ādīnavaṃ daḷhataraṃ katvā
tika-s0104t0:658_5: na pana “pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādīsu viya paṭiviruddhasattānanti āha “yesaṃ kesañcī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:658_7: Pāḷiyaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitavacanajānanampi tadatthajānaneneva siddhanti āha “subhāsitadubbhāsitassa attha”nti.
tika-s0104t0:659_15: Tato ca kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti,
tika-s0104t0:660_2: Avaṇṇabhāsakānamavisayattā “tatrā”ti padassa tasmiṃ avaṇṇeti atthova dassito.
tika-s0104t0:660_19: suppaṭipannattā na duppaṭipannoti imināpi kāraṇena nibbeṭhetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:660_20: “Kasmā pana sabbaññū”tiādipaṭicodanāyapi taṃkāraṇadassanena nibbeṭhetabbamevāti āha “tatra idañcidañca kāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0104t0:660_22: Idañca idañca kāraṇanti anekavidhena kāraṇānukāraṇaṃ dassetvā “na sabbaññū”tiādivacanaṃ nibbeṭhetabbanti attho.
tika-s0104t0:660_34: Catutthanti “na ca panetaṃ amhesu saṃvijjatī”ti padaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:660_38: vacananti vā attho saddena vacanīyattā “bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:660_40: Nānāsabhāvato vigataṃ vacanaṃ yassāti vevacanaṃ vuttanayena,
tika-s0104t0:661_3: evaṃ siddhe sati kimete tena pariyāyavacanena.
tika-s0104t0:661_9: hi āyatiñca kassaci kathañci tadatthapaṭivedhanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:661_10: Desanāpaṭiggāhakesu hi yo tesaṃ pariyāyavacanānaṃ yaṃ pubbe saṅketaṃ karoti “idamimassatthassa vacana”nti,
tika-s0104t0:661_12: Apica tasmiṃ khaṇe vikkhittacittānaṃ aññavihitānaṃ vipariyāyānaṃ aññena pariyāyena tadatthāvabodhanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:661_14: tapparihāyanavasena tesaṃ sabbathā paripuṇṇassa yathāvuttassa atthassa anavabodho siyā,
tika-s0104t0:661_15: pariyāyavacane pana vutte tabbasena paripuṇṇamatthāvabodho hoti.
tika-s0104t0:661_16: Atha vā mandabuddhīnaṃ punappunaṃ tadatthalakkhaṇena asammohanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:661_17: Mandabuddhīnañhi ekeneva padena ekatthassa sallakkhaṇena sammoho hoti,
tika-s0104t0:661_18: anekena pariyāyena pana ekatthassa sallakkhaṇena tathāsammoho na hoti anekappavattinimittena ekattheyeva
tika-s0104t0:662_1: “anekepi atthā samānabyañjanā hontī”ti yā atthantaraparikappanā siyā,
tika-s0104t0:662_3: Anekesampi hi atthānaṃ ekapadavacanīyatāvasena samānabyañjanattā yathāvuttassa padassa “ayamattho nu kho adhippeto,
tika-s0104t0:662_4: udāhu ayamatthovā”ti pavattaṃ sotūnamatthantaraparikappanaṃ vevacanaṃ aññamaññaṃ bhedakavasena parivajjeti.
tika-s0104t0:664_0: Pariyāyena yutto tu, pariyāyo ca bhedako”ti.
tika-s0104t0:665_1: anaññassāpi pariyāyavacanassa vacane anekāhi tāhi tāhi nāmapaññattīhi tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ paññāpanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ vattabbaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:665_2: Tathā hi pariyāyavacane vutte “imassatthassa idamidampi nāma”nti sotūnaṃ anekadhā nāmapaññattivijānanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:665_3: Tato ca taṃtaṃpaññattikosallaṃ hoti seyyathāpi nighaṇṭusatthe paricayataṃ.
tika-s0104t0:665_5: Tabbacanena hi dhammadesakānaṃ tantiatthassa attano citte upanibandhanena ṭhapanena paresaṃ sotūnamavabodhanaṃ sukhasiddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:665_6: Atha vā sammāsambuddhassa attano dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsampattiyā vibhāvanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:665_7: veneyyānañca tattha bījavāpanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ bhagavā niddisati.
tika-s0104t0:665_9: Tena ca pariyāyavacanena yathāsutena tassaṃ dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsampattiyaṃ tapparicaraṇena,
tika-s0104t0:665_10: tadaññasucaritasamupabrūhanena ca puññasaṅkhātassa bījassa vapanaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0104t0:665_11: Ko hi īdisāya sampattiyā viññāyamānāya tadetaṃ nābhipattheyyāti,
tika-s0104t0:665_13: Yassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā sammāsambuddho yathā sabbasmiṃ atthe appaṭihatañāṇacāro,
tika-s0104t0:665_14: tathā sabbasmiṃ saddavohāreti ekampi atthaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi bodheti,
tika-s0104t0:665_18: Sabbaññutaññāṇassa hi suppaṭividitabhāvena paṭisambhidāñāṇehi viya tenapi ñāṇena atthe, dhamme,
tika-s0104t0:665_19: niruttiyā ca appaṭihatavuttitāya buddhalīḷāya ekampi atthaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi bodheti,
tika-s0104t0:665_22: na ca tena atthassa vitthārabhāvo ekassevatthassa desetabbassa subbijānanakāraṇattā,
tika-s0104t0:665_26: Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “yadi ca taṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-s0104t0:665_30: Tadeva hi avatvā tadaññassa vacanena desanākkhaṇe samāhitacittānampi sammadeva paṭiggaṇhantānaṃ taṃtaṃpadantogadhapavattinimittamārabbha
tika-s0104t0:665_32: itarathā tasmiṃyeva pade punappunaṃ vutte tesaṃ tadatthānadhigatatā siyāti.
tika-s0104t0:676_4: Na sabbatthāti na kevalaṃ akkosanakhuṃsanavambhanādīsu sabbattha nibbeṭhanaṃ kātabbanti attho.
tika-s0104t0:676_8: Jātināmagottakammasippaābādha liṅga kilesa āpatti akkosanasaṅkhātehi dasahi akkosavatthūhi.
tika-s0104t0:677_1: Evaṃ avaṇṇabhūmiyā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni vaṇṇabhūmiyāpi saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātumāha “eva”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t0:677_7: taṃniddesā tādī”ti niddesanayena pañcasu atthesu idha paṭhamenatthena tādī.
tika-s0104t0:679_9: Ānandanti bhusaṃ pamodanti taṃsamaṅgino sattā etenāti ānandasaddassa karaṇatthataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:679_13: Nanu ca cittavācakabhāve sati cetasikasukhassa bhāvatthatā yuttā,
tika-s0104t0:679_16: sumanasaddassa dabbanimittaṃ pati pavattattā yathā “daṇḍittaṃ sikhitta”ntiādīti?
tika-s0104t0:679_18: idha pana tadanapekkhitvā tena dabbena yuttaṃ mūlanimittabhūtaṃ cetasikasukhameva apekkhitvā sumanasaddo pavatto,
tika-s0104t0:679_22: cittakiriyattā ca yathāsambhavaṃ somanassabhāvo āpajjatīti codanaṃ nāpajjateva ruḷhisaddattā tassa yathā “paṅkaja”nti pariharati.
tika-s0104t0:679_26: Uddhaṃ palavatīti vā ubbilāvitaṃ akārānaṃ ikāraṃ,
tika-s0104t0:679_29: Taddhite pana siddhe taṃ abyatirittaṃ tasmiṃ pade vacanīyassa sāmaññabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:679_31: tasmā kassāti sambandhīvisesānuyoge “cetaso”ti vuttanti dassetuṃ “kassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:679_33: Yāya uppannāya kāyacittaṃ vātapūritabhastā viya uddhumāyanākārappattaṃ hoti tassā gehasitāya odagyapītiyā
tika-s0104t0:679_41: idha ca kiñcāpi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ubbilāvitameva natthi,
tika-s0104t0:679_42: atha kho āyatiṃ kulaputtānaṃ edisesupi ṭhānesu akusaluppattiṃ paṭisedhento dhammanettiṃ ṭhapetīti.
tika-s0104t0:679_44: ekena vedanākkhandho vuttoti etthāpi “tesaṃ vasena sesānaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ karaṇaṃ paṭikkhittamevā”ti
tika-s0104t0:679_45: ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena sakkā viññātunti na vuttaṃ. “Pi-
tika-s0104t0:679_46: saddo sambhāvanattho”tiādinā vuttanayena cettha attho yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:680_0: Tumhaṃyevassa tena antarāyoti etthāpi “antarāyo”ti idaṃ “ubbilāvitattassa akaraṇīyatākāraṇavacana”tiādinā
tika-s0104t0:680_1: heṭṭhā avaṇṇapakkhe amhehi vuttanayānusārena attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:680_2: Ettha ca “ānandino ubbilāvitā”ti dīpitaṃ pītimeva gahetvā “tena ubbilāvitattenā”ti vacanaṃ somanassarahitāya
tika-s0104t0:680_3: pītiyā abhāvato tabbacaneneva “sumanā”ti dīpitaṃ somanassampi siddhamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:680_5: na tathā pītiyāti evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:680_6: Kasmā panetanti yathāvuttaṃ atthaṃ avibhāgato manasi katvā codeti.
tika-s0104t0:680_7: Ācariyo “sacca”nti tamatthaṃ paṭijānitvā “taṃ panā”tiādinā vibhajjabyākaraṇavasena pariharati.
tika-s0104t0:681_2: Buddhoti kittayantassāti “buddho”ti vacanaṃ guṇānussaraṇavasena kathentassa sādhujanassa.
tika-s0104t0:682_4: apica udāyi ānando diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyissatī”tiādisuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t0:683_4: Gehassitanti gehavāsīnaṃ samudāciṇṇato gehasaṅkhāte kāmaguṇe nissitaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:683_10: Parinibbānakāleti parinibbānāsannakāle bhagavatā paññattena tajjitoti vā sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:683_11: Parinibbānakāleti vā bhagavato parinibbutakāle saṅghena tajjito nibbattetīti vā sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:683_16: Tasmāti yasmā gehassitapītisomanassaṃ jhānādīnaṃ antarāyakaraṃ, tasmā.
tika-s0104t0:684_2: Ettha pana “idañhi rāgasañhitaṃ pītisomanassa”nti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-s0104t0:684_3: tathāpi pītiggahaṇena somanassampi gahitameva hoti somanassarahitāya pītiyā abhāvatoti heṭṭhā vuttanayena pītiyeva gahitā.
tika-s0104t0:684_4: Apica sevitabbāsevitabbavibhāgassa sutte vacanato somanassassa pākaṭo antarāyakarabhāvo,
tika-s0104t0:684_5: na tathā pītiyāti sāyeva rāgasahitatthena visesetvā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:684_6: Avaṇṇabhūmiyā saddhiṃ sambandhitvā pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “lobho cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:685_3: tatra ce tumhe assatha ānandino sumanā ubbilāvitā,
tika-s0104t0:685_4: api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthāti?
tika-s0104t0:685_5: No hetaṃ bhante”ti ayaṃ tatiyavāro nāma avaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ vuttanayavasena tatiyavāraṭṭhāne nīharitabbattā,
tika-s0104t0:685_6: so desanākāle tena vārena bodhetabbapuggalābhāvato desanāya anāgatopi tadatthasambhavato atthato āgatoyeva.
tika-s0104t0:685_7: Yathā taṃ vitthāravasena kathāvatthuppakaraṇanti dassetuṃ “tatiyavāro panā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:685_8: etena saṃvaṇṇanākāle tathābujjhanakasattānaṃ vasena so vāro ānetvā saṃvaṇṇetabboti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:685_10: Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti yathevāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:686_0: Paṭipajjitabbākāradassanavāreti yathāvuttaṃ tatiyavāraṃ upādāya vattabbe catutthavāre.
tika-s0104t0:686_1: “Tumhākaṃ satthā”ti vacanato pabhuti yāva “imināpi kāraṇena taccha”nti vacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:686_5: Vitthāro visuddhimagge “anāpatti upasampannassa bhūtaṃ ārocetī”ti vuttepi sabhāgānameva ārocanaṃ yuttanti
tika-s0104t0:686_9: tato ca “sāsanassa amoghatā dīpitā hotī”ti vuttatthasamatthanaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t0:686_15: Vuttanayenāti “tatra tumhehīti tasmiṃ vaṇṇe tumhehī”tiādinā ceva “dutiyaṃ padaṃ paṭhamassa padassa,
tika-s0104t0:688_1: Ko anusandhīti pucchā “nanu ettakeneva yathāvuttehi avaṇṇavaṇṇehi sambandhā desanāmatthakaṃ pattā”ti anuyogasambhavato katā.
tika-s0104t0:688_6: Avaṇṇena ca vaṇṇena cāti pana aguṇaguṇavasena,
tika-s0104t0:688_9: Taṃ vitthāretvā desanāya bodhetabbapuggalābhāvato ettakāva sā yuttarūpāti bhagavato ajjhāsayeneva adesanābhāvena nivatto,
tika-s0104t0:688_15: Ettāvatā ayaṃ vaṇṇānusandhīti dassetvā duvidhesu pana tesu vaṇṇesu brahmadattassa vaṇṇānusandhīti dassento “so panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:689_0: Evaṃ pucchāvissajjanāmukhena samudāyatthataṃ vatvā idāni avayavatthataṃ dasseti “tatthā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:689_1: Appameva parito samantato khaṇḍitattā parittaṃ nāmāti āha “appamattakanti parittassa nāma”nti.
tika-s0104t0:689_2: Mattā vuccati pamāṇaṃ mīyate parimīyateti katvā.
tika-s0104t0:689_6: sā etassāti appamattaka”ntiādinā kapaccayassa sātthakatampi dasseti atthato abhinnattā.
tika-s0104t0:689_9: Na hi saddā kevalaṃ anatthakā bhavantīti akkharacintakā.
tika-s0104t0:689_10: Nanu ca bhagavato pāramitānubhāvena niratthakamekakkharampi mukhavaraṃ nārohati,
tika-s0104t0:689_11: sakalañca pariyattisāsanaṃ pade pade catusaccappakāsananti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:689_13: tampi padantarābhihitassa atthassa visesanavasena tadabhihitaṃ atthaṃ vadati eva,
tika-s0104t0:689_14: so pana attho vināpi tena padantareneva sakkā viññātunti anatthakamicceva vuttanti.
tika-s0104t0:689_18: vineyyā ca anādimatisaṃsāre lokiyesuyeva saddesu paribhāvitacittā,
tika-s0104t0:689_19: loke ca asatipi atthantarāvabodhe vācāsiliṭṭhatādivasena saddapayogo dissati “labbhati palabbhati,
tika-s0104t0:689_22: Tathāparicitānañca tathāvidheneva saddapayogena atthāvagamo sukho hotīti anatthakasaddapayogo vuttoti.
tika-s0104t0:692_1: saddo visesanivattiattho “avitakkavicāramattā dhammā manomattā dhātu manodhātū”ti ca ādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t0:692_2: “Appamattakaṃ oramattaka”nti padadvayena sāmaññato vuttoyeva hi attho “sīlamattaka”nti padena visesato vutto,
tika-s0104t0:692_4: tadeva sīlamattakanti nibbacanaṃ kātabbanti dassetuṃ “sīlameva sīlamattaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:693_1: oramattakanti ettha oranti apārabhāgo “orato bhogaṃ oraṃ pāra”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t0:693_2: Atha vā heṭṭhāattho orasaddo oraṃ āgamanāya ye paccayā,
tika-s0104t0:693_8: Atha vā sīlepi tadekadesasseva saṅgahaṇatthaṃ amahatthavācako ettha mattasaddo vutto.
tika-s0104t0:693_9: Tathā hi indriyasaṃvarapaccayasannissitasīlāni idha desanaṃ anāruḷhāni.
tika-s0104t0:693_11: Yasmā tāni pātimokkhasaṃvaraājīvapārisuddhisīlāni viya na sabbaputhujjanesu pākaṭānīti.
tika-s0104t0:694_0: “Idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādinā saha yojanāya piṇḍatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:694_3: “Vaṇṇaṃ vadāmīti ussāhaṃ katvāpī”ti idaṃ “vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno”ti etassa vivaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:694_5: loke uppajjamāno uppajjatī”tiādīsu viya mānasaddassa sāmatthiyatthataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:694_6: “Ussāhaṃ kurumāno”ti avatvā “katvā”ti ca vacanaṃ tvādipaccayantapadānamiva mānantapaccayantapadānampi parakiriyāpekkhamevāti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:694_7: “Tattha siyā”tiādinā sandhāyabhāsitamatthaṃ ajānitvā nītatthameva gahetvā suttantaravirodhitaṃ maññamānassa kassaci īdisī codanā siyāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:695_18: Kathañhi ekavacananiddiṭṭhato ubbāhanakaraṇaṃ yuttaṃ siyā ekasmiṃ yevatthe ubbāhitabbassa aññassatthassa abhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:695_19: Tasmā vipallāsavasena bahvatthe idaṃ ekavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:702_2: Candanaṃ tagaraṃ mallikāti hi taṃsahacaraṇato tesaṃ gandhova vutto.
tika-s0104t0:702_3: Pupphagandhoti ca pupphañca tadavaseso gandho cāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:702_5: Satañca gandhoti ettha sīlameva sadisavohārena vā taddhitavasena vā gandho.
tika-s0104t0:702_9: Sappuriso pavāyati pakārehi gandhati tassa gandhūpagarukkhapaṭibhāgattā.
tika-s0104t0:704_2: Maggaṃ na vindatīti kāraṇaṃ na labhati,
tika-s0104t0:705_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāyā”ti gāthāya paṭisandhipaññāya sapañño ātāpī vīriyavā pārihārikapaññāya nipako narasaṅkhāto
tika-s0104t0:705_1: bhikkhu sīle patiṭṭhāya cittaṃ tappadhānena vuttaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayaṃ bhāvayanto bhāvanāhetu tathā paññaṃ
tika-s0104t0:705_2: vipassanañca imaṃ antojaṭābahijaṭāsaṅkhātaṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭaye vijaṭeyya vijaṭituṃ samattheyyāti saṅkhepattho.
tika-s0104t0:706_1: sīlasmiṃ pana paripūraṇavasena nissāya patiṭṭhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:707_0: Appakamahantatāya pārāpārādi viya upanidhāpaññattibhāvato aññamaññaṃ upanidhāya āhāti vissajjetuṃ “upari guṇe upanidhāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:707_3: tenidaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasseti “yasmā sīlaṃ kiñcāpi patiṭṭhābhāvena samādhissa bahūpakāraṃ,
tika-s0104t0:707_4: pabhāvādiguṇavisese panassa upanidhāya kalampi bhāgaṃ na upeti,
tika-s0104t0:708_3: titthiyamaddana”nti idaṃ pana tassa yamakapāṭihāriyassa supākaṭabhāvadassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:708_4: aññehi bodhimūle ñātisamāgamādīsu ca katapāṭihāriyehi visesadassanatthañca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:708_5: Sambodhito hi aṭṭhamepi divase devatānaṃ “buddho vā no vā”ti uppannakaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpetvā caṅkamanto pāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi,
tika-s0104t0:708_6: tato dutiyasaṃvacchare kulanagaragato kapilavatthupure nigrodhārāme ñātīnaṃ samāgamepi tesaṃ mānamadappahānatthaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi.
tika-s0104t0:708_9: Kaṇḍambarukkhamūleti kaṇḍena nāma pasenadirañño uyyānapālena ropitattā kaṇḍambanāmakassa rukkhassa mūle.
tika-s0104t0:708_10: Yamakapāṭihāriyakaraṇatthāya bhagavato citte uppanne “tadanucchavikaṃ ṭhānaṃ icchitabba”nti ratanamaṇḍapādi
tika-s0104t0:708_11: sakkena devaraññā āṇattena vissakammunā katanti vadanti keci.
tika-s0104t0:708_13: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anekāsu “sakkena devānamindena āṇāpitena vissakammadevaputtena maṇḍapo kato,
tika-s0104t0:708_15: Dibbasetacchatte devatāhi dhāriyamāneti attho viññāyati aññesamasambhavato.
tika-s0104t0:708_16: “Dvādasayojanāya parisāyā”ti idaṃ catūsu disāsu paccekaṃ dvādasayojanaṃ manussaparisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:708_17: Tadā kira dasasahassilokadhātuto cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ paripūretvā devabrahmānopi sannipatiṃsu.
tika-s0104t0:708_18: Yo koci evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattho ce,
tika-s0104t0:708_20: Attādānañhi anuyogo paṭipakkhassa attassa ādānaṃ gahaṇanti katvā.
tika-s0104t0:708_21: Titthiyamaddananti “pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti kuhāyanavasena pubbe uṭṭhitānaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:708_24: Rājagahaseṭṭhino candanaghaṭikuppattito paṭṭhāya sabbameva cettha vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:712_0: Channaṃ vaṇṇānanti etthāpi nīlānaṃ pītakānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjiṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānanti ayaṃ sabbopi pāḷiseso peyyālanayena, ādi-
tika-s0104t0:712_2: Ettha ca channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ ubbāhanabhūtānaṃ yamakā yamakā vaṇṇā pavattantīti pāṭhasesena sambandho,
tika-s0104t0:712_4: Tattha hi tāsaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ pavattanākārena saha āvajjanaparikammādhiṭṭhānānaṃ visuṃ pavatti dassitā.
tika-s0104t0:712_5: Keci pana “channaṃ vaṇṇāna”nti etassa “aggikkhandho udakadhārā”ti purimehi padehi sambandhaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:712_6: tadayuttameva aggikkhandhaudakadhārānaṃ atthāya tejokasiṇavāyokasiṇānaṃ samāpajjanassa vakkhamānattā.
tika-s0104t0:712_7: Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ chabbaṇṇā pavattantīti kattuvasena vā sambandho yathā “ekassa cepi bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apasādetu”nti.
tika-s0104t0:712_8: Kattukammesu hi bahulā sāmivacanaṃ ākhyātapayogepi icchanti neruttikā.
tika-s0104t0:713_0: Evaṃ pāḷinayena yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ aṭṭhakathānayena vivaranto paccāsattinayena “channaṃ
tika-s0104t0:713_3: “Suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo”ti idaṃ tāsaṃ pītābhānaṃ yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:713_5: Tāpi hi cakkavāḷagabbhato uggantvā brahmalokamāhacca paṭinivattitvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭimeva gaṇhiṃsu.
tika-s0104t0:713_6: Ekacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ vaṅkagopānasikaṃ viya bodhigharaṃ ahosi ekālokaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:713_7: Dutiyā dutiyā rasmiyoti purimapurimato pacchā pacchā nikkhantā rasmiyo.
tika-s0104t0:713_9: Dvinnañca cittānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti nāma natthi,
tika-s0104t0:713_11: tathāpi iminā kāraṇadvayena evameva khāyantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:713_16: Nanu ca ekassāpi cittassa pavattiyā dve kisso rasmiyopi sambhaveyyunti anuyogamapaneti “tassā tassā pana rasmiyā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:713_19: Āvajjanāvasāne tikkhattuṃ pavattajavanāni parikammanāmeneva idha vuttāni.
tika-s0104t0:714_2: pabhassararasmiatthāya pītakasiṇa”nti idaṃ lohitapītarasmīnaṃ kāraṇeyeva vutte siddhanti na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:714_5: Aggikkhandhaudakakkhandhāpi aññamaññaasammissā yāva brahmalokā uggantvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ patiṃsu,
tika-s0104t0:714_6: taṃ divasaṃ pana satthā yo yo yasmiṃ yasmiṃ dhamme ca pāṭihāriye ca pasanno,
tika-s0104t0:714_7: tassa tassa ajjhāsayavasena taṃ taṃ dhammañca kathesi,
tika-s0104t0:714_10: pāṭihāriye ca kariyamāne mahājano dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
tika-s0104t0:714_11: Tasmiñca samāgame attano manaṃ gahetvā pañhaṃ pucchituṃ samatthaṃ adisvā nimmitaṃ buddhaṃ māpesi,
tika-s0104t0:714_14: satthu caṅkamanakāle nimmito ṭhānādīsu aññataraṃ kappesi,
tika-s0104t0:714_15: tassa caṅkamanakāle satthā ṭhānādīsu aññataraṃ kappesīti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “satthā caṅkamatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:714_17: nimmito caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappetī”tiādinā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekekamūlakā satthupakkhe cattāro,
tika-s0104t0:714_18: nimmitapakkhe cattāroti sabbe aṭṭha vārā vitthāretvā vattabbāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:714_19: Yasmā sīlaṃ samādhissa patiṭṭhāmattameva hutvā nivattati,
tika-s0104t0:714_20: samādhiyeva tattha patiṭṭhāya yathāvuttaṃ sabbaṃ pāṭihāriyakiccaṃ pavatteti,
tika-s0104t0:715_4: “Kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti idaṃ dīpaṅkarapādamūle katapaṭhamābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:715_5: tato pubbepi yattakena tasmiṃ bhave icchanto sāvakabodhiṃ pattuṃ sakkuṇeyya,
tika-s0104t0:715_8: hetu satthāradassana”ntiādinā vuttesu aṭṭhadhammesu hetusampannatā ahosi.
tika-s0104t0:715_9: Keci pana manopaṇidhānavacīpaṇidhānavasena anekadhā asaṅkhyeyyaparicchedaṃ katvā pubbasambhāraṃ vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:715_11: Tāsu hi yathāvuttanayena paṭhamābhinīhārato pubbe hetusampannatāyeva dassitā.
tika-s0104t0:715_13: Cakkaratanārahapuññavantatāya bodhisatto cakkavattisirisampannoti tassa nivāsabhavanaṃ “cakkavattisirinivāsabhūta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:716_0: Uruvelāyaṃ kira senānigame kuṭumbikassa dhītā sujātā nāma dārikā vayappattā nerañjarāya tīre nigrodhamūle
tika-s0104t0:716_1: patthanamakāsi “sacāhaṃ samajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ gantvā paṭhamagabbhe puttaṃ labhissāmi,
tika-s0104t0:716_4: Sā satta dhenuyo laṭṭhivane khādāpetvā tāsampi dhītaro gāviyo laddhā tatheva khādāpetvā puna tāsampi
tika-s0104t0:716_5: dhītaro tathevāti sattaputtinattipanattiparamparāgatāhi dhenūhi khīraṃ gahetvā khīrapāyāsaṃ pacitumārabhi.
tika-s0104t0:716_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahābrahmā tiyojanikaṃ setacchattaṃ upari dhāresi,
tika-s0104t0:716_10: taṃ sā suvaṇṇapātiyā satasahassagghanikāya saheva bodhisattassa datvā pakkāmi.
tika-s0104t0:716_11: Atha bodhisatto taṃ gahetvā nerañjarāya tīre suppatiṭṭhite nāma titthe ekatālaṭṭhippamāṇe ekūnapaññāsapiṇḍe karonto paribhuñji,
tika-s0104t0:716_12: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “visākhāpuṇṇamāyaṃ uruvelagāme sujātāya dvinnaṃ pakkhittadibbojaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:716_13: Tattha sujātāyāti āyasmato yasattherassa mātubhūtāya pacchā saraṇagamanaṭṭhāne etadaggappattāya sujātāya nāma seṭṭhibhariyāya.
tika-s0104t0:716_14: Aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sāro upatthambhabalakaro bhūtanissito eko viseso ojā nāma,
tika-s0104t0:716_15: sā divi bhavā pakkhittā etthāti pakkhittadibbojo, taṃ.
tika-s0104t0:716_16: Pātabbo ca so asitabbo cāti pāyāso,
tika-s0104t0:716_18: ālopaṃ katvā ca bhuñjituṃ yutto bhojanaviseso,
tika-s0104t0:717_0: Tato nerañjarāya tīre mahāsālavane nānāsamāpattīhi divāvihārassa katattā “sāyanhasamaye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:717_3: ujukaṃ dakkhiṇuttaragatena devatāhi alaṅkatena maggenāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:717_4: Evampi vadanti “dakkhiṇuttarenāti dakkhiṇapacchimuttarena ādiavasānagahaṇena majjhimassāpi gahitattā,
tika-s0104t0:717_6: Evañhi sati ‘dakkhiṇapacchimuttaradisābhāgena bodhimaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā tiṭṭhatī’ti jātakanidāne vuttavacanena sametī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:717_17: Atha antarāmagge sotthiyena nāma tiṇahārakabrāhmaṇena dinnā aṭṭha kusatiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā asitañcanagirisaṅkāsaṃ
tika-s0104t0:717_18: sabbabodhisattānamassāsajananaṭṭhāne samāviruḷhaṃ bodhiyā maṇḍanabhūtaṃ bodhimaṇḍamupagantvā tikkhattuṃ
tika-s0104t0:717_20: so pana padeso paduminipatte udakabindu viya pakampittha,
tika-s0104t0:717_22: uttaradisābhāgañca gantvā tiṭṭhantepi mahāpurise tatheva te akampiṃsu,
tika-s0104t0:717_23: tato “nāyaṃ sabbopi padeso mama guṇaṃ sandhāretuṃ samattho”ti puratthimadisābhāgamagamāsi,
tika-s0104t0:717_26: mahāpuriso “idaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā pubbuttaradisābhāge ṭhito tattha akampanappadese tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā sañcālesi,
tika-s0104t0:717_28: tānipi tiṇāni vicittākārena tūlikāya lekhā gahitāni viya ahesuṃ.
tika-s0104t0:717_29: So tattha tisandhipallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā caturaṅgikaṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nisīdi,
tika-s0104t0:718_2: sā maṇḍati thāmagatatāya pasīdati etthāti bodhimaṇḍo,
tika-s0104t0:718_5: Tathā hi ācariyānandattherena vuttaṃ “bodhimaṇḍasaddopaṭhamābhisambuddhaṭṭhāne eva daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0104t0:718_6: na yattha katthaci bodhirukkhassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne”ti, taṃ.
tika-s0104t0:719_7: assattho ca so dumarājā cāti assatthadumarājā taṃ.
tika-s0104t0:719_10: saṇṭhānavasena vā tayo koṇā yassāti tisandhi,
tika-s0104t0:719_11: sveva pallaṅko ūrubaddhāsanaṃ parisamantato aṅkanaṃ āsananti atthena ra-
tika-s0104t0:719_14: tīhi vā sandhīhi lakkhito pallaṅko tisandhipallaṅko, taṃ.
tika-s0104t0:719_16: ubho pāde samañchite katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:720_0: Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
tika-s0104t0:720_2: yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:720_3: na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti –
tika-s0104t0:722_1: Parisamantato aṅkīyate lakkhīyate paricchedavasenāti pallaṅko ra-
tika-s0104t0:722_4: Apica “idaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti aṭṭhakathāsu vacanato pallaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanaṃ karoti etthāti pallaṅko niggahitāgamavasena,
tika-s0104t0:722_7: sveva uttamaṭṭhena patthanīyaṭṭhena ca varoti cuddasahatthapallaṅkavaro,
tika-s0104t0:722_10: Tāniyeva hi tiṇāni aparimitapuññānubhāvato cuddasahatthavitthatapallaṅkabhāvena pavattāni,
tika-s0104t0:722_11: na ca tāni aṭṭhamuṭṭhippamāṇāni cuddasahatthaaccuggatāni sambhavanti.
tika-s0104t0:722_16: Keci pana “accuggatabhāveneva cuddasahattho”ti yathā tathā parikappanāvasena vadanti,
tika-s0104t0:722_19: Kāmañca manorathapūraṇiyā caturaṅguttaravaṇṇanāya “tikkhattuṃ bodhiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha
tika-s0104t0:722_20: cuddasahatthubbedhe ṭhāne tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisinnakālato”ti pāṭho dissati,
tika-s0104t0:722_24: Tathā hi tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “tiriyaṃ soḷasubbedhoti vitthārato soḷasakaṇḍapātavitthāro ahosī”ti (jātaka aṭṭha. 2-
tika-s0104t0:722_26: Aññathā hi ākāseyeva ukkhipitvā tiṇasantharaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:722_27: na acalapadeseti attho āpajjeyya santharaṇakiriyādhārabhāvato tassa,
tika-s0104t0:723_7: “Kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā jarāmaraṇamukhena paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā.
tika-s0104t0:723_8: Ānāpānacatutthajjhānanti etthāpi “sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇa”nti vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:723_13: Sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya anupadadhammavipassanāvasena anekākāravokāre saṅkhāre sammasato chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena
tika-s0104t0:723_20: Tassā pādakaṃ katvā samādhi nivattoti vuttaṃ “idamassa paññākicca”nti.
tika-s0104t0:724_14: Yassā pāḷiyā atthavibhāvanatthāya yā saṃvaṇṇanā vuttā,
tika-s0104t0:725_1: na pana mūlapariyāyasaṃvaṇṇanādīsu viya puthujjanavisesaniddhāraṇatthaṃ niravasesaputhujjanasseva idha adhippetattā.
tika-s0104t0:725_2: Sabbopi hi puthujjano bhagavato upariguṇe vibhāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t0:727_1: Ādiccassa bandhunā gottena samāno gottasaṅkhāto bandhu yassa,
tika-s0104t0:727_2: buddho ca so ādiccabandhu cāti katvā.
tika-s0104t0:727_3: Yasmā pana khandhakathādikosallenāpi upakkilesānupakkilesānaṃ jānanahetubhūtaṃ bāhusaccaṃ hoti, yathāha –
tika-s0104t0:728_1: Yato kho bhikkhu khandhakusalo hoti. Dhātu…pe…
tika-s0104t0:730_2: Puthujjanantogadhattāti bahūnaṃ janānaṃ abbhantare samavarodhabhāvato puthujjanoti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:730_3: Puthucāyaṃ janoti puthu eva visuṃyeva ayaṃ saṅkhyaṃ gato.
tika-s0104t0:730_5: Evaṃ gāthābandhena saṅkhepato dassitamatthaṃ “so hī”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-s0104t0:731_2: tadatthassa ca sādhakaṃ ambasecanagarusinānanayena niddesapāḷiyā dassento “yathāhā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:731_6: puthūhi vā sakkāyadiṭṭhīhi janitāti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:731_8: tasmā puthu sakkāyadiṭṭhiyo janenti na vihananti,
tika-s0104t0:731_9: janā vā avihatā puthu sakkāyadiṭṭhiyo etesanti atthaṃ dassetītipi vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t0:731_11: “Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhullokikā”ti etena puthu bahavo janā satthāro etesanti nibbacanaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:731_12: Puthu sabbagatīhi avuṭṭhitāti ettha pana kammakilesehi janetabbā,
tika-s0104t0:731_13: jāyanti vā sattā etthāti janā, gatiyo,
tika-s0104t0:731_14: puthu sabbā eva janā gatiyo etesanti vacanattho.
tika-s0104t0:731_15: “Puthu nānābhisaṅkhāre abhisaṅkharontī”ti etena ca jāyanti etehi sattāti janā,
tika-s0104t0:731_17: puthu nānāvidhā janā saṅkhārā etesaṃ vijjanti,
tika-s0104t0:731_18: puthu vā nānābhisaṅkhāre janenti abhisaṅkharontīti atthamāha.
tika-s0104t0:731_19: Tato paraṃ pana “puthu nānāoghehi vuyhantī”tiādiatthattayaṃ janenti etehi sattāti janā,
tika-s0104t0:732_0: Api ca rattāti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmakarena chandarāgena rattā.
tika-s0104t0:732_2: Gathitāti ganthitā viya dummocanīyabhāvena tattha paṭibaddhā.
tika-s0104t0:732_3: Mucchitāti kilesāvisanavasena visaññībhūtā viya anaññakiccamohaṃ samāpannā.
tika-s0104t0:732_4: Ajjhosannāti anaññāsādhāraṇe viya katvā gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0104t0:732_6: mahāpalipe vā patanena nāsikaggapalipannapuriso viya uddharitumasakkuṇeyyabhāvena nimuggā.
tika-s0104t0:732_7: Laggitāti makkaṭālepena viya makkaṭo pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena āsaṅgitā,
tika-s0104t0:732_13: puthūsu vā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu janā rattā giddhā…pe…
tika-s0104t0:733_8: Ettha ca janenti etehīti janā, nīvaraṇā,
tika-s0104t0:733_14: puthu vā bahuko janoti atthaṃ dasseti “puthūna”ntiādinā,
tika-s0104t0:733_18: Puthu visaṃsaṭṭho eva jano puthujjanoti ayañhettha vacanattho.
tika-s0104t0:734_0: Yehi guṇavisesehi nimittabhūtehi bhagavati “tathāgato”ti ayaṃ samaññā pavattā,
tika-s0104t0:734_1: taṃ dassanatthaṃ “aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:734_2: Ekopi hi saddo anekapavattinimittamadhikicca anekadhā atthappakāsako,
tika-s0104t0:734_3: bhagavato ca sabbepi nāmasaddā anekaguṇanemittikāyeva. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t0:737_0: Kāni pana tānīti anuyoge sati paṭhamaṃ tassarūpaṃ saṅkhepato uddisitvā “katha”ntiādinā niddisati.
tika-s0104t0:737_1: Tathā āgatoti ettha ākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā- saddo.
tika-s0104t0:737_3: visesatthinā ca sāmaññasaddassāpi visesattheyeva anupayujjitabbato paṭipadāgamanattho āgata saddo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0104t0:737_7: Tattha yassa ākārassa niyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā- saddo,
tika-s0104t0:737_8: tadākāraṃ karuṇāpadhānattā tassa mahākaruṇāmukhena purimabuddhānaṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya udāharaṇavasena sāmaññato dassento “yathā sabbaloke”tiādimāha. Yaṃtaṃ-
tika-s0104t0:737_13: vipassīādīnañcettha channaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ mahāpadānasuttādīsu sampahulaniddesena supākaṭattā,
tika-s0104t0:737_14: āsannattā ca tesaṃ vasena taṃ paṭipadaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:737_20: Sabbesañhi buddhānaṃ paṭhamapaṇidhānaṃ imināva nīhārena samijjhati.
tika-s0104t0:738_0: Evaṃ mahābhinīhāravasena “tathāgato”ti padassa atthaṃ dassetvā idāni pāramīpūraṇavasenapi dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:738_1: “Ettha ca suttantikānaṃ mahābodhiyānapaṭipadāya kosallajananatthaṃ pāramīsu ayaṃ vitthārakathā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t0:738_3: kiñcāpi sā amhehi idha vuccamānā ganthavitthārakarā viya bhavissati,
tika-s0104t0:738_4: yasmā panāyaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā etissaṃ pacchā pamādalekhavisodhanavasena,
tika-s0104t0:738_6: tasmā sāpi pāramīkathā idha vattabbāyevāti tato ceva cariyāpiṭakaṭṭhakathāto ca āharitvā yathārahaṃ gāthābandhehi
tika-s0104t0:740_0: Ko ca tāsaṃ kamo kāni, lakkhaṇādīni sabbathā.
tika-s0104t0:743_0: Kittakena sampādanaṃ, ānisaṃso ca kiṃ phalaṃ;
tika-s0104t0:749_0: Taṇhāmānādinā hi anupahatā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā dānādayo guṇasaṅkhātā etā kiriyā “pāramī”ti vibhāvitā.
tika-s0104t0:752_0: Kammaṃ bhāvoti dānādi, taddhitato tidhā matā.
tika-s0104t0:753_0: Pūreti mavati pare, paraṃ majjati mayati;
tika-s0104t0:754_0: Munāti minoti tathā, minātīti vā paramo.
tika-s0104t0:755_0: Pāre majjati sodheti, mavati mayatīti vā;
tika-s0104t0:756_0: Māyeti taṃ vā munāti, minoti mināti tathā.
tika-s0104t0:759_4: Atha vā parati pūretīti paramo niruttinayena,
tika-s0104t0:759_9: Apica pare satte mavati attani bandhati guṇavisesayogena,
tika-s0104t0:759_11: paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ visesena mayati gacchati,
tika-s0104t0:759_12: paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇavisesena idhalokamiva munāti paricchindati,
tika-s0104t0:759_13: paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipati,
tika-s0104t0:759_15: paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti paramo,
tika-s0104t0:759_20: tattha vā satte mavati bandhati yojeti,
tika-s0104t0:759_25: tattha vā sattānaṃ kilesāriṃ mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī,
tika-s0104t0:761_4: sīlaṃ nekkhammaṃ paññā vīriyaṃ khanti saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ mettā upekkhā buddhakārako dhammo,
tika-s0104t0:761_5: ime kho sāriputta dasa buddhakārakā dhammāti.
tika-s0104t0:761_7: idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā –
tika-s0104t0:764_2: So pana saṅgaho parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0104t0:765_0: Ko ca tāsaṃ kamoti ettha kamo nāma desanākkamo,
tika-s0104t0:768_2: Dānaṃ pana sīlapariggahitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:768_10: mettā upekkhāpariggahitā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti mettānantaraṃ upekkhā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:768_13: Kathaṃ pana mahākāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu upekkhakā hontīti?
tika-s0104t0:768_17: Apare pana na ca sattesu upekkhakā,
tika-s0104t0:771_0: Dānaṃ ādimhi sesā tu, purimepi apekkhakā.
tika-s0104t0:772_5: bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānassānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:772_10: vītikkamappahāne ṭhitassa pariyuṭṭhānappahānavacanato ca sīlassānantaraṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:772_16: parahitajjhānena parahitakaraṇūpāyakosallavacanato ca nekkhammassānantaraṃ paññā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:772_21: Nisammakārino hi uṭṭhānaṃ phalavisesamāvahatīti paññāyānantaraṃ vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:773_1: Vīriyavā hi āraddhavīriyattā sattasaṅkhārehi upanītaṃ dukkhaṃ abhibhuyya viharati.
tika-s0104t0:773_10: Yāthāvato dhammanijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti.
tika-s0104t0:773_11: Parahitārambhe paramepi parakatadukkhasahanatāvacanato ca vīriyassānantaraṃ khanti vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:773_16: nijjhānakkhantiṃ vatvā tadupabrūhitañāṇasaccassa vacanato ca khantiyānantaraṃ saccaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:773_20: Saccasandho hi dānādīsu paṭiññānurūpaṃ niccalo pavattati.
tika-s0104t0:773_24: Paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvato ca saccassānantaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:773_28: Acalādhiṭṭhānassa samādānāvikopanena samādānasambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassānantaraṃ mettā vuttā.
tika-s0104t0:773_32: “hitakāmasattepi upekkhako”ti acchariyaguṇatāvacanato ca mettāyānantaraṃ upekkhā vuttāti evametāsaṃ kamo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:774_0: Kāni lakkhaṇādīni sabbathāti ettha pana avisesena –
tika-s0104t0:776_0: Upakāro akampo ca, raso hitesitāpi ca.
tika-s0104t0:780_0: Visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā attupakaraṇapariccāgacetanā dānapāramī.
tika-s0104t0:780_6: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito sattasaṅkhārāparādhasahanasaṅkhāto adosappadhāno tadākārappavatto cittuppādo khantipāramī.
tika-s0104t0:780_9: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito lokassa hitasukhūpasaṃhāro atthato abyāpādo mettāpāramī.
tika-s0104t0:780_10: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā anunayapaṭighaviddhaṃsanasaṅkhātā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu sattasaṅkhāresu samappavatti upekkhāpāramī.
tika-s0104t0:782_22: Ettha ca karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitatā dānādīnaṃ pariccāgādilakkhaṇassa visesanabhāvena vattabbā,
tika-s0104t0:782_24: Na hi sammāsambodhiyādipatthanamaññatra akaruṇūpāyakosallapariggahitāni vaṭṭagāmīni dānādīni pāramīsaṅkhyaṃ labhantīti.
tika-s0104t0:784_0: Abhinīhāro ca tāsaṃ, dayā ñāṇañca paccayo;
tika-s0104t0:786_1: Yo hi ayaṃ “manussattaṃ liṅgasampattī”tiādi aṭṭhadhammasamodhānasampādito “tiṇṇo tāreyyaṃ mutto moceyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:786_8: Tappavattiyā hi uddhaṃ pāramīnaṃ pavicayupaṭṭhānasamādānādhiṭṭhānanipphattiyo mahāpurisānaṃ sambhavanti,
tika-s0104t0:786_9: abhinīhāro ca nāmesa atthato bhesamaṭṭhaṅgānaṃ samodhānena tathāpavatto cittuppādo,
tika-s0104t0:786_12: aparimāṇaṃ lokahitañca ārabbha pavattiyā sabbabuddhakārakadhammamūlabhūto paramabhaddako paramakalyāṇo aparimeyyappabhāvo puññavisesoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:787_0: Tassa ca uppattiyā saheva mahāpuriso mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiṃ otiṇṇo nāma hoti,
tika-s0104t0:787_5: Yathāvuttābhinīhārasamijjhanena hi mahāpurisā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamanapubbaliṅgena sayambhuñāṇena sammadeva
tika-s0104t0:789_0: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā;
tika-s0104t0:792_4: Idha mahāpuriso passati tathāgataṃ mahatā buddhānubhāvena acchariyabbhutaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karontaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:792_5: tassa taṃ nissāya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā mahābodhiyaṃ cittaṃ santiṭṭhati “mahānubhāvā vatāyaṃ dhammadhātu,
tika-s0104t0:792_8: so tameva mahānubhāvadassanaṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti,
tika-s0104t0:793_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:793_1: apica kho suṇāti “ediso ca ediso ca bhagavā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:793_2: so taṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti,
tika-s0104t0:794_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:794_2: apica kho tathāgatassa dhammaṃ desentassa “dasabalasamannāgato bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t0:795_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:795_3: apica kho uḷārajjhāsayo kalyāṇādhimuttiko “ahametaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ buddhatantiṃ buddhapaveṇiṃ buddadhammataṃ
tika-s0104t0:795_4: paripālessāmī”ti yāvadeva dhammaññeva sakkaronto garuṃ karonto mānento pūjento dhammaṃ apacayamāno taṃ
tika-s0104t0:796_1: Idha mahāpuriso pakatiyā upanissayasampanno hoti purimakesu buddhesu katādhikāro,
tika-s0104t0:796_3: Puna caparaṃ mahāpuriso pakatiyāpi karuṇājjhāsayo hoti karuṇādhimutto sattānaṃ dukkhaṃ apanetukāmo,
tika-s0104t0:796_6: Puna caparaṃ mahāpuriso sakalatopi vaṭṭadukkhato sattahitāya dukkaracariyato sucirampi kālaṃ ghaṭento vāyamanto anibbinno hoti anutrāsī,
tika-s0104t0:797_1: ekantenevassa yathā ajjhāsayo sambodhininno hoti sambodhipoṇo sambodhipabbhāro,
tika-s0104t0:797_3: yato anena purimabuddhānaṃ santike sambodhiyā paṇidhānaṃ kataṃ hoti manasā,
tika-s0104t0:797_4: vācāya ca “ahampi ediso sammāsambuddho hutvā sammadeva sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ nipphādeyya”nti.
tika-s0104t0:797_5: Evaṃ sampannūpanissayassa panassa imāni upanissayasampattiyā liṅgāni sambhavanti,
tika-s0104t0:797_7: paccekabodhisattehi ca mahāviseso mahantaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati indriyato,
tika-s0104t0:797_10: Idha hi upanissayasampanno mahāpuriso yathā visadindriyo hoti visadañāṇo,
tika-s0104t0:797_14: Tathā hi so yathā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ paṭipajji,
tika-s0104t0:798_0: Tathā mahāpuriso pakatiyā dānajjhāsayo hoti dānābhirato,
tika-s0104t0:798_6: mahantampi dānaṃ datvā neva dānena santuṭṭho hoti,
tika-s0104t0:798_8: Paresañca ussāhaṃ janento dāne vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
tika-s0104t0:798_10: aññe ca paresaṃ dente disvā attamano hoti,
tika-s0104t0:798_11: bhayaṭṭhānesu ca paresaṃ abhayaṃ detīti evamādīni dānajjhāsayassa mahāpurisassa dānapāramiyā liṅgāni.
tika-s0104t0:799_2: sorato sukhasīlo asaṭho amāyāvī ujujātiko subbaco sovacassakaraṇīyehi dhammehi samannāgato mudujātiko athaddho anatimānī,
tika-s0104t0:799_4: attano hatthe nikkhittaṃ iṇaṃ vā gahetvā paraṃ na visaṃvādeti,
tika-s0104t0:799_6: vissarite vā taṃ saññāpetvā paṭipādeti yathā taṃ na parahatthagataṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:799_10: saccavādī saccasandho bhinnānaṃ sandhātā sahitānaṃ anuppadātā piyavādī mihitapubbaṅgamo pubbabhāsī atthavādī
tika-s0104t0:799_14: paresampi dhamme samādapetā sabbena sabbaṃ akiccato satte nivāretā kiccesu patiṭṭhapetā attanā ca tattha kicce yogaṃ āpajjitā,
tika-s0104t0:799_15: katvā vā pana sayaṃ akattabbaṃ sīghaññeva tato paṭivirato hotīti evamādīni sīlajjhāsayassa mahāpurisassa sīlapāramiyā liṅgāni.
tika-s0104t0:800_0: Tathā mandakileso hoti mandanīvaraṇo pavivekajjhāsayo avikkhepabahulo,
tika-s0104t0:800_5: satimā ca hoti cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi susaritā anussaritā,
tika-s0104t0:800_7: nipako ca hoti tāsu tāsu itikattabbatāsu,
tika-s0104t0:800_11: ajjhupekkhako ca hoti upekkhāṭhānīyesu dhammesūti evamādīni mahāpurisassa nekkhammajjhāsayādīnaṃ vasena nekkhammapāramiyādīnaṃ liṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0104t0:801_0: Evametehi bodhisambhāraliṅgehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa yaṃ vuttaṃ “mahābhinīhārāya kalyāṇamittasannissayo hetū”ti,
tika-s0104t0:801_2: idha kalyāṇamitto saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgavīriyasatisamādhipaññāsampanno.
tika-s0104t0:801_3: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ kammaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:801_5: tena sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitesitaṃ na pariccajati.
tika-s0104t0:801_6: Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahiko vattā vacanakkhamo.
tika-s0104t0:801_7: Sutasampattiyā sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ gambhīraṃ dhammakathaṃ kattā hoti.
tika-s0104t0:801_8: Cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti samāhito santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho.
tika-s0104t0:801_13: So satiyā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā samādhinā
tika-s0104t0:801_14: tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena ahitā satte nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. Tenāha –
tika-s0104t0:803_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. ;
tika-s0104t0:804_0: Evaṃ guṇasamannāgataṃva kalyāṇamittaṃ upanissāya mahāpuriso attano upanissayasampattiṃ sammadeva pariyodapeti.
tika-s0104t0:804_1: Suvisuddhāsayapayogova hutvā catūhi balehi samannāgato nacireneva aṭṭhaṅge samodhānetvā mahābhinīhāraṃ
tika-s0104t0:804_2: karonto bodhisattabhāve patiṭṭhahati anivattidhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
tika-s0104t0:805_0: Tassimāni cattāri balāni ajjhattikabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ attasannissayā dhammagāravena abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā,
tika-s0104t0:805_2: abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0104t0:805_3: Bāhirabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ parasannissayā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā,
tika-s0104t0:805_5: abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0104t0:805_6: Upanissayabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ upanissayasampattiyā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā,
tika-s0104t0:805_10: abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0104t0:805_11: Payogabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyā tajjā payogasampadā sakkaccakāritā sātaccakāritā,
tika-s0104t0:805_14: abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0104t0:805_17: catūhi ca balehi sampannasamudāgamo aṭṭhaṅgasamodhānasampādito abhinīhāro pāramīnaṃ paccayo hoti mūlakāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:806_0: Yassa ca pavattiyā mahāpurise cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā patiṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0104t0:806_1: sabbaṃ sattanikāyaṃ attano orasaputtaṃ viya piyacittena pariggaṇhāti,
tika-s0104t0:806_2: na cassa cittaṃ puna saṃkilesavasena saṃkilissati,
tika-s0104t0:806_7: yato mahāpuriso uḷāratarena puññābhisandena kusalābhisandena pavaḍḍhiyā [pavattiyā ] paccayena sukhassāhārena
tika-s0104t0:806_10: Evamanekaguṇo anekānisaṃso mahābhinīhāro pāramīnaṃ paccayoti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:807_3: Tattha upāyakosallaṃ nāma dānādīnaṃ bodhisambhārabhāvassa nimittabhūtā paññā,
tika-s0104t0:807_21: karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbesamanuggahāya pavatto,
tika-s0104t0:807_23: paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto.
tika-s0104t0:808_9: balavesārajjanipphattīti sabbassāpi pāramitāphalassa visesena upāyabhāvato paññā karuṇā pāramīnaṃ paccayo.
tika-s0104t0:808_10: Idaṃ pana dvayaṃ pāramīnaṃ viya paṇidhānassāpi paccayo.
tika-s0104t0:809_0: Tathā ussāhaummaṅgaavatthānahitacariyā ca pāramīnaṃ paccayoti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:812_3: Alobha…pe… lobhe…pe… adosa…pe… dose…pe… amoha…pe… mohe…pe…
tika-s0104t0:813_0: Tasmā ete ca cha ajjhāsayāpi pāramīnaṃ paccayāti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:813_2: alobhādīnaṃ adhikabhāvena ca vinā dānādipāramiyo sambhavanti.
tika-s0104t0:814_0: “Kati pana bhante bodhāya carantānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ajjhāsayāti?
tika-s0104t0:815_1: byāpādasukhadukkhasaṅkhātesu ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamā dānādininnacittatāsaṅkhātā dānajjhāsayatādayo dānādipāramīnaṃ nibbattiyā paccayo.
tika-s0104t0:815_2: Tathā apariccāgapariccāgādīsu yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇampi dānādipāramīnaṃ paccayo hoti.
tika-s0104t0:816_9: tesaṃ pariccāgoyeveko sotthibhāvoti pariccāge appamādo karaṇīyo.
tika-s0104t0:817_0: Apica “yācako yācamāno attano guyhassa ācikkhanato mayhaṃ vissāsiko”ti ca “pahāya gamanīyaṃ attano santakaṃ
tika-s0104t0:817_1: gahetvā paralokaṃ yāhītiupadisanato mayhaṃ upadesako”ti ca “āditte viya agāre maraṇagginā āditte loke
tika-s0104t0:817_2: tato mayhaṃ santakassa apaharaṇato apavāhakasahāyo”ti ca “apavāhitassa cassa ajjhāpananikkhepaṭṭhānabhūto”ti
tika-s0104t0:817_4: sabbasampattīnaṃ aggabhūtāya paramadullabhāya buddhabhūmiyā sampattihetubhāvato ca paramo kalyāṇamitto”ti ca paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:818_1: tasmā sā sambhāvanā avitathā kātabbā”ti ca “ekantabheditāya jīvitassa āyācitenāpi mayā dātabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:818_3: [dātabbato ] sayamevāgato mama puññenā”ti ca “yācakassa dānāpadesena mayhamevāyamanuggaho”ti ca “ahaṃ
tika-s0104t0:818_4: viya ayaṃ sabbopi loko mayā anuggahetabbo”ti ca “asati yācake kathaṃ mayhaṃ dānapāramī pūreyyā”ti ca
tika-s0104t0:818_5: “yācakānamevatthāya mayā sabbopi pariggahetabbo”ti ca “ayācitvāpi maṃ mama santakaṃ yācakā kadā sayameva
tika-s0104t0:818_6: gaṇheyyu”nti ca “kathamahaṃ yācakānaṃ piyo cassaṃ manāpo”ti ca “kathaṃ vā te mayhaṃ piyā cassu manāpā”ti
tika-s0104t0:818_7: ca “kathaṃ vāhaṃ dadamāno datvāpi ca attamano assaṃ pamudito pītisomanassajāto”ti ca “kathaṃ vā me yācakā
tika-s0104t0:818_9: uḷāro ca dānajjhāsayo”ti ca “kathaṃ vāhamayācito eva yācakānaṃ hadayamaññāya dadeyya”nti “sati dhane,
tika-s0104t0:818_10: yācake ca apariccāgo mahatī mayhaṃ vañcanā”ti ca “kathamahaṃ attano aṅgāni,
tika-s0104t0:819_0: Apica “attho nāmāyaṃ nirapekkhaṃ dāyakamanugacchati yathā taṃ nirapekkhaṃ khepakaṃ kiṭako”ti atthe nirapekkhatāya cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:819_1: Yācamāno pana yadi piyapuggalo hoti “piyo maṃ yācatī”ti somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:819_2: Atha udāsīnapuggalo hoti “ayaṃ maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena mitto hotī”ti somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:819_6: ayaṃ maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena verīpi piyo mitto hotī”ti visesato somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:819_7: Evaṃ piyapuggale viya majjhattaverīpuggalesupi mettāpubbaṅgamaṃ karuṇaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva dātabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:820_0: Sace panassa cirakālaṃ paribhāvitattā lobhassa deyyadhammavisayā lobhadhammā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:820_1: tena bodhisattapaṭiññena iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “nanu tayā sappurisa sambodhāya abhinīhāraṃ karontena sabbasattānamupakārāya ayaṃ kāyo nissaṭṭho,
tika-s0104t0:820_3: tattha nāma te bāhirepi vatthusmiṃ abhisaṅgappavatti hatthisinānasadisī hoti,
tika-s0104t0:820_4: tasmā tayā na katthaci abhisaṅgo uppādetabbo.
tika-s0104t0:820_5: Seyyathāpi nāma mahato bhesajjarukkhassa tiṭṭhato mūlaṃ mūlatthikā haranti,
tika-s0104t0:820_6: papaṭikaṃ, tacaṃ, khandhaṃ, viṭapaṃ, sākhaṃ, palāsaṃ, pupphaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:820_8: na tassa rukkhassa ‘mayhaṃ santakaṃ ete harantī’ti vitakkasamudācāro hoti,
tika-s0104t0:820_9: evameva sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpajjantena mayā mahādukkhe akataññuke niccāsucimhi kāye paresaṃ upakārāya
tika-s0104t0:820_11: Ko vā ettha viseso ajjhattikabāhiresu mahābhūtesu ekantabhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammesu.
tika-s0104t0:820_16: tasmā bāhiresu mahābhūtesu viya ajjhattikesupi karacaraṇanayanādīsu,
tika-s0104t0:820_17: maṃsādīsu ca anapekkhena hutvā ‘taṃ tadatthikā harantū’ti nissaṭṭhacittena bhavitabba”nti.
tika-s0104t0:820_18: Evaṃ paṭisañcikkhato cassa sambodhāya pahitattassa kāyajīvitesu nirapekkhassa appakasireneva kāyavacīmanokammāni suvisuddhāni honti,
tika-s0104t0:820_19: so visuddhakāyavacīmanokammanto visuddhājīvo ñāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito āyāpāyupāyakosallasamannāgamena bhiyyoso mattāya deyyadhammapariccāgena,
tika-s0104t0:820_20: abhayadānasaddhammadānehi ca sabbasatte anuggaṇhituṃ samattho hoti,
tika-s0104t0:821_1: “idañhi sīlaṃ nāma gaṅgodakādīhi visodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa dosamalassa vikkhālanajalaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:821_4: sabbadisāvāyanako atikittimo [sabbadisāvāyanato akittimo ] sabbakālānurūpo ca surabhigandho,
tika-s0104t0:821_12: tassa tassa samijjhanūpāyabhāvato cintāmaṇikapparukkhādike ca atiseti.
tika-s0104t0:821_16: bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti,
tika-s0104t0:821_20: ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”tiādisuttānañca vasena sīlaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t0:822_6: Sīlavato hi attano sīlasampadāhetu mahantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati “kataṃ vata mayā kusalaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:823_3: “sīlavā purisapuggalo kalyāṇadhammo”ti viññūnaṃ pāsaṃso ca hoti.
tika-s0104t0:823_4: Tathā sīlavato yvāyaṃ “kataṃ vata mayā pāpaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:823_12: Nihīnajaccopi sīlavā khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ pūjanīyo hotīti kulasampattiṃ atiseti sīlasampadā,
tika-s0104t0:823_14: idha te assa dāso kammakaro”tiādi vakkhamānasāmaññasuttavacanañcettha sādhakaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:823_18: samathādiguṇādhiṭṭhānato ca bāhiradhanaṃ sāpateyyaṃ atiseti sīlaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:823_19: Paramassa cittissariyassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato khattiyādīnamissariyaṃ atiseti sīlaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:823_21: vassasatādidīghappamāṇato ca jīvitato ekāhampi sīlavato jīvitassa visiṭṭhatāvacanato,
tika-s0104t0:823_22: satipi jīvite sikkhānikkhipanassa maraṇatāvacanato ca sīlaṃ jīvitato visiṭṭhataraṃ.
tika-s0104t0:823_24: jarārogavipattīhi anabhibhavanīyato ca rūpasampattiṃ atiseti sīlaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:823_25: Pāsādahammiyādiṭṭhānappabhede rājayuvarājasenāpatiādiṭhānavisese ca sukhavisesādhiṭṭhānabhāvato atiseti sīlaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:823_29: “Na taṃ mātā pitā kayirā”tiādi vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:823_35: Evamanekaguṇasamannāgataṃ sīlanti paccavekkhantassa aparipuṇṇā ceva sīlasampadā pāripūriṃ gacchati,
tika-s0104t0:824_0: Sace panassa dīgharattaṃ paricayena sīlapaṭipakkhadhammā dosādayo antarantarā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:824_1: tena bodhisattapaṭiññena evaṃ paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “nanu tayā bodhāya paṇidhānaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:824_2: sīlavekallena ca na sakkā na ca sukarā lokiyāpi sampattiyo pāpuṇituṃ,
tika-s0104t0:824_4: Sabbasampattīnamaggabhūtāya sammāsambodhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhūtena sīlena paramukkaṃsagatena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:824_5: tasmā “kikīva aṇḍa”ntiādinā vuttanayena sammadeva sīlaṃ rakkhantena suṭṭhu tayā pesalena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:825_0: Apica tayā dhammadesanāya yānattaye sattānamavatāraṇaparipācanāni kātabbāni,
tika-s0104t0:825_1: sīlavekallassa ca vacanaṃ na paccetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:825_3: tasmā “kathāhaṃ saddheyyo hutvā sattānamavatāraṇaparipācanāni kareyya”nti sabhāvaparisuddhasīlena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:825_5: paññāpāramīādiparipūraṇañca jhānādayo guṇā ca sīlapārisuddhiṃ vinā na sambhavantīti sammadeva sīlaṃ sodhetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:826_2: “seyyathāpi puriso iṇaṃ ādāya kammante payojeyyā”tiādinā kāmacchandādīsu ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamā,
tika-s0104t0:826_3: vuttavipariyāyena “abbhokāso pabbajjā”tiādinā pabbajjādīsu ānisaṃsāpaṭisaṅkhāvasena nekkhammapāramiyaṃ paccavekkhaṇā kātabbā.
tika-s0104t0:827_0: Tathā “paññāya vinā dānādayo dhammā na visujjhanti,
tika-s0104t0:827_1: yathāsakaṃ byāpārasamatthā ca na hontī”ti paññāya guṇā manasi kātabbā.
tika-s0104t0:827_2: Yatheva hi jīvitena vinā sarīrayantaṃ na sobhati,
tika-s0104t0:827_3: na ca attano kiriyāsu paṭipattisamatthaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:827_4: Yathā ca cakkhādīni indriyāni viññāṇena vinā yathāsakaṃ visayesu kiccaṃ kātuṃ nappahonti,
tika-s0104t0:827_5: evaṃ saddhādīni indriyāni paññāya vinā sakakiccapaṭipattiyamasamatthānīti pariccāgādipaṭipattiyaṃ paññā padhānakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:827_6: Ummīlitapaññācakkhukā hi mahāsattā bodhisattā attano aṅgapaccaṅgānipi datvā anattukkaṃsakā,
tika-s0104t0:827_9: Paññāvasena hi upāyakosallayogato pariccāgo parahitapavattiyā dānapāramibhāvaṃ upeti.
tika-s0104t0:828_0: Tathā paññāya abhāvena taṇhādisaṃkilesāviyogato sīlassa visuddhiyeva na sambhavati,
tika-s0104t0:828_2: Paññavā eva ca gharāvāse kāmaguṇesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:828_3: pabbajjāya jhānasamāpattiyaṃ nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkhento pabbajitvā jhānasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā nibbānaninno,
tika-s0104t0:829_0: Vīriyañca paññārahitaṃ yathicchitamatthaṃ na sādheti durārambhabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:829_2: paññāsahitena pana vīriyena na kiñci duradhigamaṃ upāyapaṭipattito.
tika-s0104t0:829_5: Paññāvirahitassa ca parehi upanītā apakārā khantiyā paṭipakkhameva anubrūhenti.
tika-s0104t0:829_6: Paññavato pana te khantisampattiyā anubrūhanavasena assā thirabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0104t0:829_7: Paññavā eva tīṇipi saccāni tesaṃ kāraṇāni paṭipakkhe ca yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā paresaṃ avisaṃvādako hoti.
tika-s0104t0:829_8: Tathā paññābalena attānamupatthambhetvā dhitisampadāya sabbapāramīsu acalasamādānādhiṭṭhāno hoti.
tika-s0104t0:829_9: Paññavā eva ca piyamajjhattaverivibhāgamakatvā sabbattha hitūpasaṃhārakusalo hoti.
tika-s0104t0:829_10: Tathā paññāvasena lābhālābhādilokadhammasannipāte nibbikāratāya majjhatto hoti.
tika-s0104t0:829_11: Evaṃ sabbāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ paññāva pārisuddhihetūti paññāguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t0:830_3: asamāhitena ca na sakkā attahitamattampi sādhetuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:830_5: “Nanu tayā parahitāya paṭipannena sakkaccaṃ paññāpārisuddhiyā āyogo karaṇīyo”ti bodhisattena attā ovaditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:830_6: Paññānubhāvena hi mahāsatto caturadhiṭṭhānādhiṭṭhito catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto satte niyyānamagge avatāreti,
tika-s0104t0:830_8: Tathā paññābalena khandhāyatanādīsu pavicayabahulo pavattinivattiyo yāthāvato parijānanto dānādayo guṇavisese
tika-s0104t0:830_9: nibbedhabhāgiyabhāvaṃ nayanto bodhisattasikkhāya paripūrakārī hotīti evamādinā anekākāravokāre paññāguṇe
tika-s0104t0:831_0: Tathā dissamānapārānipi lokiyāni kammāni nihīnavīriyena pāpuṇitumasakkuṇeyyāni,
tika-s0104t0:831_1: agaṇitakhedena pana āraddhavīriyena duradhigamaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-s0104t0:831_2: Nihīnavīriyo hi “saṃsāramahoghato sabbasatte santāressāmī”ti ārabhitumeva na sakkuṇoti.
tika-s0104t0:831_4: Ukkaṭṭhavīriyo pana attasukhanirapekkho ārabhitvā pāramadhigacchatīti vīriyasampatti paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t0:832_1: tassāpi vīriyassa sithilabhāvena manorathānaṃ matthakappatti na sakkā sambhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:832_2: pageva sadevakassa lokassa samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhārenā”ti ca “rāgādīnaṃ dosagaṇānaṃ mattamahānāgānamiva dunnivāraṇabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:832_6: tadovādakāritāya ca vasalassa puthujjanabhāvassa sati sambhave yuttaṃ sayameva saṃsāradukkhato nissaritu”nti
tika-s0104t0:832_7: ca “micchāvitakkā vīriyānubhāvena dūrī bhavantī”ti ca “yadi pana sambodhiṃ attādhīnena vīriyena sakkā
tika-s0104t0:832_9: kimettha dukkara”nti ca evamādinā nayena vīriyaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t0:833_0: Tathā “khanti nāmāyaṃ niravasesaguṇapaṭipakkhassa kodhassa vidhamanato guṇasampādane sādhūnaṃ appaṭihatamāyudhaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:833_12: Apica “ete sattā khantisampattiyā abhāvato idhaloke tapanti,
tika-s0104t0:833_13: paraloke ca tapanīyadhammānuyogato”ti ca “yadipi parāpakāranimittaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0104t0:833_15: bījabhūtañca kammaṃ mayāva abhisaṅkhata”nti ca “tassa ca dukkhassa āṇaṇyakaraṇameta”nti ca “apakārake
tika-s0104t0:833_16: asati kathaṃ mayhaṃ khantisampadā sambhavatī”ti ca “yadipāyaṃ etarahi apakārako,
tika-s0104t0:833_17: ayaṃ nāma pubbe anena mayhaṃ upakāro kato”ti ca “apakāro eva vā khantinimittatāya upakāro”ti ca “sabbepime sattā mayhaṃ puttasadisā,
tika-s0104t0:833_18: puttakatāparādhesu ca ko kujjhissatī”ti ca “yena kodhabhūtāvesena ayaṃ mayhaṃ aparajjhati,
tika-s0104t0:833_19: svāyaṃ kodhabhūtāveso mayā vinetabbo”ti ca “yena apakārena idaṃ mayhaṃ dukkhaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:833_20: tassa ahampi nimitta”nti ca “yehi dhammehi apakāro kato,
tika-s0104t0:833_23: kassidāni kena kopo kātabbo”ti ca “anattatāya sabbadhammānaṃ ko kassa aparajjhatī”ti ca paccavekkhantena khantisampadā brūhetabbā.
tika-s0104t0:834_0: Yadi panassa dīgharattaṃ paricayena parāpakāranimittako kodho cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya,
tika-s0104t0:834_1: tena iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “khanti nāmesā parāpakārassa paṭipakkhapaṭipattīnaṃ paccupakārakāraṇa”nti
tika-s0104t0:834_2: ca “apakāro ca mayhaṃ dukkhuppādanena dukkhupanisāya saddhāya,
tika-s0104t0:834_5: tattha aniṭṭhavisayasamāyogo mayhaṃ na siyāti taṃ kutettha labbhā”ti ca “kodhavasiko satto kodhena ummatto vikkhittacitto,
tika-s0104t0:834_6: tattha kiṃ paccapakārenā”ti ca “sabbepime sattā sammāsambuddhena orasaputtā viya paripālitā,
tika-s0104t0:834_7: tasmā na tattha mayā cittakopo kātabbo”ti ca “aparādhake ca sati guṇe guṇavati mayā kopo na kātabbo”ti
tika-s0104t0:834_8: ca “asati guṇe kassacipi guṇassābhāvato visesena karuṇāyitabbo”ti ca “kopena mayhaṃ guṇayasā nihīyantī”ti
tika-s0104t0:834_9: ca “kujjhanena mayhaṃ dubbaṇṇadukkhaseyyādayo sapattakantā āgacchantī”ti ca “kodho ca nāmāyaṃ sabbadukkhāhitakārako
tika-s0104t0:834_10: sabbasukhahitavināsako balavā paccatthiko”ti ca “sati ca khantiyā na koci paccatthiko”ti ca “aparādhakena
tika-s0104t0:834_12: sati ca khantiyā mayhaṃ tadabhāvo”ti ca “cintentena,
tika-s0104t0:834_13: kujjhantena ca mayā paccatthikoyeva anuvattito”ti ca “kodhe ca mayā khantiyā abhibhūte tassa dāsabhūto
tika-s0104t0:834_14: paccatthiko sammadeva abhibhūto”ti ca “kodhanimittaṃ khantiguṇapariccāgo mayhaṃ na yutto”ti ca “sati
tika-s0104t0:834_15: ca kodhe guṇavirodhapaccanīkadhamme kathaṃ me sīlādidhammā pāripūriṃ gaccheyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:834_16: asati ca tesu kathāhaṃ sattānaṃ upakārabahulo paṭiññānurūpaṃ uttamaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti ca “khantiyā
tika-s0104t0:834_17: ca sati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato samāhitassa sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato dukkhato sabbe dhammā anattato nibbānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:834_20: tato ca “anulomikakhantiyaṃ ṭhito ‘kevalā ime attattaniyabhāvarahitā dhammamattā yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppajjanti vinassanti,
tika-s0104t0:834_24: na cettha koci kassaci byāpāro’ti ahaṃkāramamaṃkārānadhiṭṭhānatā nijjhānaṃ khamati,
tika-s0104t0:834_25: yena bodhisatto bodhiyā niyato anāvattidhammo hotī”ti evamādinā khantipāramiyā paccavekkhaṇā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:835_8: bodhisattapaṭipattiyā ca parinipphattito”tiādinā saccapāramiyā sampattiyo paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t0:836_2: tattha ca dhīravīrabhāvaṃ vinā na dānādisambhārā sambodhinimittā sambhavantī”tiādinā adhiṭṭhānaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t0:837_0: Tathā “attahitamatte avatiṭṭhantenāpi sattesu hitacittataṃ vinā na sakkā idhalokaparalokasampattiyo pāpuṇituṃ,
tika-s0104t0:837_1: pageva sabbasatte nibbānasampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmenā”ti ca “pacchā sabbasattānaṃ lokuttarasampattimākaṅkhantena
tika-s0104t0:837_2: idāni lokiyasampattimākaṅkhā yuttarūpā”ti ca “idāni āsayamattena paresaṃ hitasukhūpasaṃhāraṃ kātumasakkonto
tika-s0104t0:837_3: kadā payogena taṃ sādhayissāmī”ti ca “idāni mayā hitasukhūpasaṃhārena saṃvaddhitā pacchā dhammasaṃvibhāgasahāyā
tika-s0104t0:837_4: mayhaṃ bhavissantī”ti ca “etehi vinā na mayhaṃ bodhisambhārā sambhavanti,
tika-s0104t0:837_5: tasmā sabbabuddhaguṇavibhūtinipphattikāraṇattā mayhaṃ ete paramaṃ puññakkhettaṃ anuttaraṃ kusalāyatanaṃ
tika-s0104t0:837_6: uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhāna”nti ca “savisesaṃ sabbesupi sattesu hitajjhāsayatā paccupaṭṭhapetabbā,
tika-s0104t0:837_8: Vimariyādīkatena hi cetasā sattesu hitasukhūpasaṃhāraniratassa tesaṃ ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā balavatī uppajjati daḷhamūlā,
tika-s0104t0:837_9: karuṇā ca sabbesaṃ buddhakārakadhammānaṃ ādi caraṇaṃ patiṭṭhā mūlaṃ mukhaṃ pamukha”nti evamādinā mettāguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t0:838_0: Tathā “upekkhāya abhāve sattehi katā vippakārā cittassa vikāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:838_1: sati ca cittavikāre dānādisambhārānaṃ sambhavo eva natthī”ti ca “mettāsinehena sinehite citte upekkhāya
tika-s0104t0:838_2: vinā sambhārānaṃ pārisuddhi na hotī”ti ca “anupekkhako saṅkhāresu puññasambhāraṃ,
tika-s0104t0:838_3: tabbipākañca sattahitatthaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ na sakkotī”ti ca upekkhāya abhāve deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ vibhāgamakatvā
tika-s0104t0:838_5: jīvitassa vā antarāyaṃ amanasikaritvā sīlavisodhanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā”ti ca tathā “upekkhāvasena aratiratisahasseva nekkhammabalasiddhito,
tika-s0104t0:838_12: upekkhānubhāvena sampajjantī”ti evamādinā nayena upekkhāpāramī paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0104t0:838_13: Evaṃ apariccāgapariccāgādīsu yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā dānādipāramīnaṃ paccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:839_0: Tathā saparikkhārā pañcadasa caraṇadhammā pañca ca abhiññāyo.
tika-s0104t0:840_2: ubhayasuddhiyā dhammadāne samatthohotītiādinā caraṇādīnaṃ dānādisambhārapaccayatā yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā.
tika-s0104t0:844_0: Avisesena hi taṇhādīhi parāmaṭṭhabhāvo pāramīnaṃ saṃkileso.
tika-s0104t0:848_0: Anupaghātā hi taṇhā māna diṭṭhi kodhu panāha makkha palāsa issāmacchariya māyā sāṭheyya thambha sārambha
tika-s0104t0:848_1: mada pamādādīhi kilesehi deyyapaṭiggāhakavikappādirahitā ca dānādipāramiyo parisuddhā pabhassarā bhavantīti.
tika-s0104t0:852_2: Visesena pana pubbe vuttā macchariyādayoti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:852_12: lokadhamme abhibhuyya yathāsamādinnesu sambhāresu acalanato lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:856_2: dhammopadesena ca bahudhā sattānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ paṭipatti.
tika-s0104t0:856_3: Tattha āmisadānaṃ abhayadānaṃ dhammadānanti dātabbavatthuvasena tividhaṃ dānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:856_6: Tattha bāhiraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālā gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ seyyā āvasathaṃ padīpeyyanti dasavidhaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:856_8: Tathā rūpārammaṇaṃ yāva dhammārammaṇanti ārammaṇato chabbidhaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:857_0: Tattha mahāpuriso bāhiraṃ vatthuṃ dento “yo yena atthiko,
tika-s0104t0:857_2: Dento ca tassa atthiko”ti sayameva jānanto ayācitopi deti,
tika-s0104t0:858_2: Mātāpitaro ñātisālohitā mittāmaccā puttadāradāsakammakarāti etesu kassaci pīḷaṃ ajanento deti,
tika-s0104t0:858_3: na ca uḷāraṃ deyyadhammaṃ paṭijānitvā lūkhaṃ deti,
tika-s0104t0:858_6: na ca phalapāṭikaṅkhī deti aññatra sammāsambodhiyā,
