tika-s0104t0:1308_5: Sahāyabhāvo pana sahabhāvoyeva nāmāti adhippāyato atthaṃ dassetuṃ “sahabhāva”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1308_8: tasmā saha ekato vattamānassa bhāvo sahabyaṃ yathā “dāsabya”nti tadeva sahabyatā,
tika-s0104t0:1308_11: tassa bhāvo sahabyaṃ yathā “vīrassa bhāvo vīriya”nti,
tika-s0104t0:1308_13: tasmā tadatthaṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1309_2: Abhibhavanā cettha pāpasabhāvena jeṭṭhabhāvena “te satte abhibhavitvā ṭhito”ti attano maññanāyevāti vuttaṃ “jeṭṭhakohamasmī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1309_4: dasoti ettha dassaneyyavisesapariggahābhāvena ca anāvaraṇadassāvitaṃ paṭijānātīti āha “sabbaṃ passāmīti attho”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1309_5: Dassaneyyavisesassa hi padesabhūtassa aggahaṇe sati gahetabbassa nippadesatā viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1309_6: deyyadhammavisesassa cettha padesabhūtassa aggahaṇato pabbajito sabbampi na dadātīti gahetabbassa deyyadhammassa nippadesatā viññāyati.
tika-s0104t0:1309_28: bhavissanti cāti bhabyā tabbānīyā viya ṇyapaccayassa kattaripi pavattanato.
tika-s0104t0:1310_0: “Issaro kattā nimmātā”ti vatvāpi puna “mayā ime sattā nimmitā”ti vacanaṃ kimatthiyanti āha “idāni kāraṇavasenā”tiādi
tika-s0104t0:1310_2: Nanu cesa brahmā anavaṭṭhitadassanattā puthujjanassa purimatarajātiparicitampi kammassakatāñāṇaṃ vissajjetvā
tika-s0104t0:1310_3: vikubbaniddhivasena cittuppādamattapaṭibaddhena sattanimmānena vipallaṭṭho “mayā ime sattā nimmitā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t0:1310_6: Atha kasmā kāraṇavasena sādhetukāmo paṭiññaṃ karotīti vuttanti?
tika-s0104t0:1310_8: Tesampi hi “evaṃ hotī”tiādinā pacchā uppajjantānampi tathāabhinivesassa vakkhamānattā paresaṃ patiṭṭhāpanakkameneva tassa so abhiniveso jāto,
tika-s0104t0:1311_8: Vaṅkachiddena vaṅkaāṇī viya onamitvā vaṅkaladdhikena vaṅkaladdhikā onamitvā tasseva brahmuno pādamūlaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0104t0:1311_10: Nanu ca devānaṃ upapattisamanantaraṃ “imāya nāma gatiyā cavitvā iminā nāma kammunā idhūpapannā”ti paccavekkhaṇā hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1311_11: atha kasmā tesaṃ evaṃ maññanā siyāti?
tika-s0104t0:1311_12: Purimajātīsu kammassakatāñāṇe sammadeva niviṭṭhajjhāsayānameva tathāpaccavekkhaṇāya pavattito.
tika-s0104t0:1311_15: ime pana purimāsupi jātīsu issarakuttadiṭṭhivasena nibaddhābhinivesā evameva maññamānā ahesunti.
tika-s0104t0:1312_5: So pana mahesakkhatarabhāvo ādhipateyyaparivārasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya viññāyatīti vuttaṃ “issariyaparivāravasena mahāyasataro”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1313_2: tena “itthattaṃ āgacchatī”ti vuttaṃ idhāgamanameva kāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:1313_3: Idheva āgacchatīti imasmiṃ manussaloke eva paṭisandhivasena āgacchati.
tika-s0104t0:1313_6: Pāḷiyaṃ yaṃ aññataro sattoti ettha yanti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1313_11: “Itthattaṃ āgacchatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ itthattassa āgamanasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1313_17: yaṃ aññataro satto”ti hi imāni padāni “pabbajatī”tiādīhipi padehi paccekaṃ yojetabbāni.
tika-s0104t0:1314_12: Tampi hi padatthasodhanāya aṭṭhakathāya sodhitaniyāmeneva gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1315_7: Yebhuyyena hi nakkhattayogena katattā tathāyogo vā hotu, mā vā,
tika-s0104t0:1315_12: Dvādasapāpadhammavigghātena hi sukhassa dhāraṇato devānaṃ bhojanaṃ “sudhā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:1315_13: Sā pana setā saṅkhūpamā atulyadassanā suci sugandhā piyarūpā.
tika-s0104t0:1324_0: Sā ca heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamā hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1324_1: taṃ yathāsakaṃ parimitadivasavasena divase divase bhuñjanti.
tika-s0104t0:1324_2: Keci pana vadanti “biḷārapadappamāṇaṃ sudhāhāraṃ te bhuñjanti,
tika-s0104t0:1324_3: so jivhāya ṭhapitamatto yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati,
tika-s0104t0:1324_4: yathāsakaṃ gaṇitadivasavasena satta divase yāpanasamattho hotī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1327_1: na pana evaṃ niyamavasena tathā khādanapivanānamaniyamabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1327_5: Teneva hi bhagavā indasālaguhāyaṃ pakatipathaviyaṃ patiātuṃ asakkontaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ “oḷārikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhehī”ti avoca.
tika-s0104t0:1327_12: Tañhi “rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccatī”ti evaṃ vuttarāgarajaphalattā sarīravācakena ka-
tika-s0104t0:1327_14: Tena sukkasoṇitasaṅkhātena karajena sambhūto kāyo karajakāyoti ācariyā.
tika-s0104t0:1327_16: Mahāassapūrasuttantaṭīkāyaṃ pana “karīyati gabbhāsaye khipīyatīti karo, sambhavo,
tika-s0104t0:1327_19: Mātuādīnaṃ saṇṭhāpanavasena karato hatthato jātoti karajoti apare.
tika-s0104t0:1327_24: Tathā asambhūtopi ca devādīnaṃ kāyo tabbohārena “karajakāyo”ti vuccati yathā “pūtikāyo,
tika-s0104t0:1328_0: Evaṃ anvayato byatirekato ca dassetvā upamāvasenapi tamāvikaronto “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:1328_6: karajaṃ mandanti vā kammajatejakarajakāyānaṃ balavamandatāsaṅkhāta kāraṇasāmaññena.
tika-s0104t0:1328_8: tasmā sabbepi devā gahetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1328_11: “Khiḍḍāpadussanamatteneva hete khiḍḍāpadosikāti vuttā”ti ayaṃ pāṭho “teyeva cavantīti veditabbā”ti etassānantare paṭhitabbo tadanusandhikattā.
tika-s0104t0:1328_13: yadi sabbepi evaṃ karontā kāmāvacaradevā caveyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1328_16: etena imamatthaṃ dasseti “sabbepi devā evaṃ cavantāpi khiḍḍāya padussanasabhāvamattaṃ pati nāmavisesena tathā vuttā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1328_21: Atthikehi pana tassa kecivādasamavarodhanaṃ ante itisaddo yojetabboti.
tika-s0104t0:1329_10: “Te aññamaññamhi paduṭṭhacittā kilantakāyā kilantacittā te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vacanato “ete cātumahārājikā”ti āha.
tika-s0104t0:1329_13: Rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjatīti upalakkhaṇamattaṃ aññehi aññatthāpi paṭipajjanasambhavato.
tika-s0104t0:1329_15: Uddhumāto viyāti pītiyā karaṇabhūtāya unnato viya.
tika-s0104t0:1330_0: Akuddho rakkhatīti kuddhassa so kodho itarasmiṃ akujjhante anupādāno ceva ekavāramattaṃ uppattiyā anāsevano ca hutvā cāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t0:1330_3: Ubhosu pana kuddhesu bhiyyo bhiyyo aññamaññamhi parivaḍḍhanavasena tikhiṇasamudācāro nissayadahanaraso
tika-s0104t0:1330_4: kodho uppajjamāno hadayavatthuṃ nidahanto accantasukhumālakarajakāyaṃ vināseti,
tika-s0104t0:1330_7: Tathā cāha pāḷiyaṃ “te aññamaññamhi paduṭṭhacittā kilantakāyā kilantacittā te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1330_9: tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo hotīti ettha kodhassa bhiyyo bhiyyo parivaḍḍhanāya eva paccayabhāvo veditabbo,
tika-s0104t0:1330_10: na cavanāya nissayadahanarasena attanoyeva kodhena hadayavatthuṃ nidahantena accantasukhumālassa karajakāyassa cavanato.
tika-s0104t0:1330_13: tathāuppajjanakassa ca kodhassa balavatāya ṭhānaso cavanabhāvo etesu devesu rūpārūpadhammānaṃ dhammaniyāmo sabhāvoti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1331_2: ante ca adassanūpagamanato vināsaṃ passati oḷārikattā rūpadhammabhedassa.
tika-s0104t0:1331_6: balavatarampi samānaṃ iminā kāraṇena na passatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:1331_7: Balavataranti ca cittassa lahutarabhedaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1331_8: Tathā hi ekasmiṃ rūpe dharanteyeva soḷasa cittāni bhijjanti.
tika-s0104t0:1331_9: Cittassa bhedaṃ na passatīti ettha khaṇe khaṇe bhijjantampi cittaṃ parassa anantarapaccayabhāveneva bhijjati,
tika-s0104t0:1331_10: tasmā purimacittassa abhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā viya pacchimacittassa uppattito bhāvapakkho balavataro pākaṭova hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1331_11: na abhāvapakkhoti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “cittaṃ panā”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1331_14: ekattanayassa ca micchāgahitattā “yadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sabbadāpi evarūpena pavattati,
tika-s0104t0:1331_15: ayaṃ me attā nicco”tiādinā abhinivesaṃ janesi,
tika-s0104t0:1331_16: tasmā tamatthaṃ “so taṃ apassanto”tiādinā saha upamāya vibhāveti.
tika-s0104t0:1333_3: so etesanti antānantikāti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “antānantavādā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1333_6: antānantesu vā pavatto vādo etesanti antānantavādā.
tika-s0104t0:1333_7: Idāni “antavā ayaṃ loko”tiādinā vakkhamānapāṭhānurūpaṃ atthaṃ vibhajanto “antaṃ vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:1333_8: Amati gacchati bhāvo osānametthāti hi anto, mariyādā,
tika-s0104t0:1333_10: Anto ca ananto ca antānanto ca nevantanānanto ca antānanto tveva vutto sāmaññaniddesena,
tika-s0104t0:1333_12: Catutthapadañhettha tatiyapadena samānatthanti antānantapadeneva yathāvuttanayadvayena catudhā attho viññāyati.
tika-s0104t0:1333_23: tathā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhati “taṃ ‘loko’ti gahetvā”ti keci pana vadanti “jhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1334_1: yuttaṃ tāva purimānaṃ tiṇṇampi vādīnaṃ antānantikattaṃ antañca anantañca antānantañca ārabbha pavattavādattā,
tika-s0104t0:1334_2: pacchimassa pana takkikassa tadubhayapaṭisedhanavasena pavattavādattā kathaṃ antānantikattanti?
tika-s0104t0:1334_4: Antānantapaṭisedhanavādopi hi so antānantavisayoyeva tamārabbha pavattattā.
tika-s0104t0:1334_5: Etadatthameva hi sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “antaṃ vā antantaṃ vā antānantaṃ vā nevantānānantaṃ vā ārabbha pavattavādā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1334_6: Atha vā yathā tatiyavāde desapabhedavasena ekasseva lokassa antavatā,
tika-s0104t0:1334_8: evamettha takkīvādepi kālapabhedavasena ekasseva tadubhayasambhavato aññamaññapaṭisedhena tadubhayaññeva vuccati,
tika-s0104t0:1334_13: Iti paṭisedhanavasena antānantasaṅkhātassa ubhayassa vuttattā yuttoyeva tabbisayassa pacchimassāpi antānantikabhāvoti.
tika-s0104t0:1334_14: Yadevaṃ so antānantikavādabhāvato tatiyavādasamavarodheyeva siyāti? Na,
tika-s0104t0:1334_16: Desapabhedavasena hi antānantiko tatiyavādī viya pacchimopi takkiko kālapabhedavasena antānantiko hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t0:1334_17: Yasmā ayaṃ lokasaññito attā ananto kadā ci sakkhidiṭṭhoti adhigatavisesehi mahesīhi anusuyyati,
tika-s0104t0:1334_22: Ayaṃ takkiko avaḍḍhitabhāvapubbakattā paṭibhāganimittānaṃ vaḍḍhitabhāvassa ubhayathā labbhamānassa parikappitassa
tika-s0104t0:1334_23: attano appaccakkhakāritāya anussavādimatte ṭhatvā vaḍḍhitakālavasena “nevantavā”ti paṭikkhipati,
tika-s0104t0:1334_25: na pana antatānantatānaṃ accantamabhāvena yathā taṃ “nevasaññānāsaññā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1335_0: Keci pana yadi panāyaṃ attā antavā,
tika-s0104t0:1335_1: evaṃ sati dūradese upapajjanānussaraṇādikiccanibbatti na siyā.
tika-s0104t0:1335_3: evañca idha ṭhitasseva devalokanirayādīsu sukhadukkhānubhavanaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t0:1335_4: Sace pana antavā ceva anantavā ca,
tika-s0104t0:1335_7: anantavā”ti ca abyākaraṇīyo attāti evaṃ takkanavasena catutthavādappavattiṃ vaṇṇenti.
tika-s0104t0:1335_9: atha kasmā “ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evamāhaṃsu ‘antavā ayaṃ loko parivaṭumo’ti,
tika-s0104t0:1335_12: Teneva hi kāraṇena tathā paṭikkhepo vutto,
tika-s0104t0:1335_17: Na hi antatāanantatātadubhayavinimutto attano pakāro atthi,
tika-s0104t0:1335_19: Kālabhedavasena ca ekasmimpi loke tadubhayaṃ no na yujjatīti.
tika-s0104t0:1335_20: Bhavatu tāva pacchimavādīdvayassa antānantikabhāvo yutto antānantānaṃ vasena ubhayavisayattā tesaṃ vādassa.
tika-s0104t0:1335_21: Kathaṃ pana purimavādīdvayassa paccekaṃ antānantikabhāvo yutto siyā ekekavisayattā tesaṃ vādassāti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t0:1335_24: Samuditesu hi antānantavādīsu pavattamāno antānanti ka-
tika-s0104t0:1335_25: saddo tattha niruḷhatāya tadavayavesupi paccekaṃ antānantikavādīsu pavattati yathā “arūpajjhānesu paccekaṃ aṭṭhavimokkhapariyāyo”,
tika-s0104t0:1335_27: Atha vā abhinivesato purimakāle pavattavitakkavasena ayaṃ tattha vohāro kato.
tika-s0104t0:1335_28: Tesañhi diṭṭhigatikānaṃ tathārūpacetosamādhisamadhigamato pubbakāle “antavā nu kho ayaṃ loko,
tika-s0104t0:1335_29: udāhu anantavā”ti ubhayākārāvalambino vitakkassa vasena niruḷho antānantikabhāvo pacchā visesalābhena
tika-s0104t0:1335_30: tesu antānantavādesu ekasseva vādassa saṅgahe uppannepi purimasiddharuḷhiyā vohārīyati yathā “sabbe sattā
tika-s0104t0:1336_4: Uddhamadho avaḍḍhetvā tiriyaṃ vaḍḍhetvāti etthāpi “cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā”ti adhikāravasena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1336_7: Diṭṭhapubbānusārenāti dassanabhūtena viññāṇena upaladdhapubbassa antavantādino anussaraṇena,
tika-s0104t0:1336_8: evañca katvā anussutitakkīsuddhatakkīnampi idha saṅgaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1336_9: Atha vā diṭṭhaggahaṇeneva “naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā”tiādīsu viya sutādīnampi gahitabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1336_10: “Antavā”tiādinā icchitassa attano sabbadābhāvaparāmasanavaseneva imesaṃ vādānaṃ pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1338_8: Tathāpavatto diṭṭhippadhāno tādisāya vācāya samuṭṭhāpako cittuppādoyeva.
tika-s0104t0:1338_13: “Macchajāti” cceva avatvā “ekā”ti vadanto macchajātiviseso esoti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:1338_14: Ito cito ca sandhāvati ekasmiṃ sabhāve anavaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0104t0:1338_18: so viyāti amarāvikkhepoti atthamāha “sā ummujjananimujjanādivasenā”tiādinā vikkhepapadatthena upamitattā.
tika-s0104t0:1338_19: Ayameva hi attho ācariyasāriputtattherenāpi sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0104t0:1338_21: Atha vā amarā viya vikkhipantīti amarāvikkhepino,
tika-s0104t0:1339_3: 1.62) sabhāvabhedavasena paṭivijjhituṃ ñāṇaṃ natthīti kusalākusalapadānaṃ kusalākusalakammapathavaseneva attho vutto.
tika-s0104t0:1339_4: Vighāto vihesā kāyikadukkhaṃ “vippaṭisāruppattiyā”ti domanassassa hetubhāvena vacanato,
tika-s0104t0:1339_9: musāvādato vā ottappena ceva hiriyā cāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1339_13: dutiyanayavasena pana amarāsadisavikkhepaṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ kusalanti puṭṭho”tiādivacanaṃ vakkhati.
tika-s0104t0:1340_1: taṃ evantipi me laddhi no hotīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1340_3: Aniyamitavikkhepoti sassatādīsu ekasmimpi pakāre aṭṭhatvā vikkhepakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1340_4: paravādinā yasmiṃ kismiñci pakāre pucchite tassa paṭikkhepavikkhepoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1340_5: Atha vā apariyantavikkhepadassanaṃyeva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kataṃ “evantipi me noti aniyamitavikkhepo”tiādinā,
tika-s0104t0:1340_6: “idaṃ kusalanti vā akusalanti vā puṭṭho”tiādinā ca.
tika-s0104t0:1340_8: niyametvā ca sassatekaccasassatucchedatakkīvādānaṃ paṭisedhanena taṃ taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipateva apariyantavikkhepavādattā.
tika-s0104t0:1340_9: “Amarāvikkhepino”ti dassetvā attanā pana anavaṭṭhitavādattā na kismiñci pakkhe avatiṭṭhatīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sayaṃ pana idaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t0:1340_11: Idāni kusalādīnaṃ abyākaraṇena tadeva anavaṭṭhānaṃ vibhāveti “idaṃ kusalanti puṭṭho”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:1340_13: Kiṃ no noti te laddhīti neva na hotīti tava laddhi hoti kinti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1340_14: No notipi me noti neva na hotītipi me laddhi no hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1341_1: Attano paṇḍitabhāvavisayānaññeva rāgādīnaṃ vasena yojanaṃ kātuṃ “ajānantopī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:1341_8: saddena yogyattā gobalībaddādinayena bhinnatthatāva yuttāti āha “chando dubbalarāgo,
tika-s0104t0:1341_15: atha kho ettakampi na jānāmi nāma,
tika-s0104t0:1341_17: Parehi katasakkārasamānavisayānaṃ pana rāgādīnaṃ vasena ayaṃ yojanā –
tika-s0104t0:1341_18: kusalākusalaṃ yathābhūtaṃ apajānantopi yesamahaṃ samavāyena kusalameva “kusala”nti,
tika-s0104t0:1341_20: tesu tathā byākaraṇahetu “aho vata re paṇḍito”ti sakkārasammānaṃ karontesu mama chando vā rāgo vā assāti.
tika-s0104t0:1341_23: so mamassa vighāto”ti idaṃ abhidhammanayena yathālābhavacanaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbanti āha “chandarāgadvaya”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t0:1341_24: Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo eva hi “upādāna”nti abhidhamme vuttā idāni suttantanayena avisesayojanaṃ dasseti “ubhayampi vā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:1341_25: Suttante hi dosopi “upādāna”nti vutto “kodhupādānavinibandhā vighātaṃ āpajjantī”tiādīsu “ubhayampī”ti ca atthato vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1341_28: Paṭighopi hi ārammaṇaṃ na muñcati upanāhādivasena pavattanato,
tika-s0104t0:1341_29: lobhasseva upādānabhāvena pākaṭattā dosassāpi upādānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1341_31: Rāgopi hi pariḷāhavasena sāraddhavuttitāya nissayaṃ vihanati.
tika-s0104t0:1342_3: sā yesaṃ te paṇḍitāti atthaṃ dasseti “paṇḍiccenā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:1342_5: Yena hi dhammena pavattinimittabhūtena yutto “paṇḍito”ti vuccati,
tika-s0104t0:1342_9: “Nipuṇā”ti iminā pana kammanibbattaṃ paṭisandhipaññāsaṅkhātaṃ sābhāvikañāṇaṃ vuttanti āha “saṇhasukhumabuddhino”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1342_18: Vālavedhīnaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo viya rūpametesanti vālavedhirūpāti āha “vālavedhidhanuggahasadisā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1342_30: saddassa ca sāmatthiyatthataṃ dassetuṃ “na sampādeyya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1343_5: tañca atisayatthadīpakaṃ pariyāyadvayassa atirekatthabhāvatoti yathā “padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ “atisammūḷho”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1343_6: Siddhe hi sati punārambho niyamāya vā hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1343_10: Ettha ca kāmaṃ purimānampi tiṇṇaṃ kusalādidhammasabhāvānavabodhato attheva mandabhāvo,
tika-s0104t0:1343_11: tesaṃ pana attano kusalādidhammānavabodhassa avabodhanato viseso atthīti.
tika-s0104t0:1343_13: Nanu ca pacchimassāpi attano dhammānavabodhassa avabodho atthiyeva “atthi paro loko’ti iti ce me assa,
tika-s0104t0:1343_14: ‘atthi paro loko’ti iti te naṃ byākareyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1343_17: na pana tassa purimānaṃ viya apariññātadhammabyākaraṇanimittamusāvādādibhāyanajigucchanākāro atthi,
tika-s0104t0:1343_19: Atha vā “evantipi me no”tiādinā pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇatthaṃ “atthi paro loko”ti iti ce maṃ pucchasīti pucchāṭhapanameva tena dassīyati,
tika-s0104t0:1343_20: na attano dhammānavabodhāvabodhoti ayameva visesena “mando momūho”ti vutto.
tika-s0104t0:1343_21: Teneva hi tathāvādīnaṃ sañcayaṃ belaṭṭhaputtaṃ ārabbha “ayañca imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1343_25: yadi ca sammādiṭṭhiko sammādassanavasenāti dvidhāpi attho vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t0:1343_28: “atthi ca natthi ca paro loko”ti ucchedadassanavasena,
tika-s0104t0:1343_30: “nevatthi na natthi paro loko”ti vuttapakārattayapaṭikkhepe sati pakārantarassa asambhavato atthitānatthitāhi
tika-s0104t0:1343_31: na vattabbākāro paro lokoti vikkhepaññeva purakkhārena,
tika-s0104t0:1343_34: Puññasaṅkhārattiko viya hi kāyasaṅkhārattikena purimacatukkasaṅgahito eva attho sesacatukkattayena sattaparāmāsapuññādisaphalatācodanānayena
tika-s0104t0:1343_38: sesacatukkattayena ca sattaparāmāsatāya codanānayo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1344_0: Amarāvikkhepiko pana sassatādīnaṃ attano aruccanatāya sabbattha “evantipi me no”tiādinā vikkhepaññeva karoti.
tika-s0104t0:1344_1: Tattha “evantipi me no”tiādi tattha tattha pucchitākārapaṭisedhanavasena vikkhepākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1344_2: Kasmā pana vikkhepavādino paṭikkhepova sabbattha vutto.
tika-s0104t0:1344_3: Nanu vikkhepapakkhassa “evameva”nti anujānanampi vikkhepapakkhe avaṭṭhānato yuttarūpaṃ siyāti? Na,
tika-s0104t0:1344_6: Tathā hi sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto raññā ajātasattunā sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho paralokatthitādīnaṃ paṭisedhanamukheneva vikkhepaṃ byākāsi.
tika-s0104t0:1345_1: nanu cāyaṃ sabbopi amarāvikkhepiko kusalādayo dhamme,
tika-s0104t0:1345_2: paralokatthitādīni ca yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhamāno tattha tattha pañhaṃ puṭṭho pucchāya vikkhepanamattaṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0104t0:1345_4: Na hi avattukāmassa viya pucchitatthamajānantassa vikkhepakaraṇamattena diṭṭhigatikatā yuttāti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t0:1345_5: na heva kho pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇamattena tassa diṭṭhigatikatā,
tika-s0104t0:1345_7: Sassatābhinivesavasena hi micchābhiniviṭṭhoyeva puggalo mandabuddhitāya kusalādidhamme,
tika-s0104t0:1345_8: paralokatthitādīni ca yāthāvato appaṭibujjhamāno attanā aviññātassa atthassa paraṃ viññāpetumasakkuṇeyyatāya musāvādabhayena ca vikkhepamāpajjatīti.
tika-s0104t0:1345_12: asaddahanena ca tabbisayāya pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇameva sundaranti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā abhinivisantassa
tika-s0104t0:1345_13: uppannā visuṃyevesā ekā diṭṭhi sattabhaṅgadiṭṭhi viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1345_14: Tathā ca vuttaṃ “pariyantarahitā diṭṭhigatikassa diṭṭhi ceva vācā” cāti.
tika-s0104t0:1345_15: Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “imepi cattāro pubbe pavattadhammānusāreneva diṭṭhiyā gahitattā pubbantakappikesu paviṭṭhā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1345_19: Natthi hi koci dhammānaṃ yathābhūtavedī vivādabahulattā lokassa.
tika-s0104t0:1345_21: tasmā sassatalesassa ettha labbhanato sassatadiṭṭhiyā etassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1347_1: Adhicca yadicchakaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ kassaci buddhipubbaṃ vinā samuppannoti attalokasaññitānaṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1347_5: adhiccasamuppannadassanaṃ vā antapadalopena adhiccasamuppannaṃ yathā “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti,
tika-s0104t0:1348_3: tena saññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā bhagavatā ayaṃ desanā katā,
tika-s0104t0:1348_4: na pana tattha aññesaṃ arūpadhammānampi atthitāyāti dasseti,
tika-s0104t0:1348_6: Bhagavā hi yathā lokuttaradhammaṃ desento samādhiṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1348_12: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1348_13: tathā “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1348_14: kiṃ citto tvaṃ bhikkhu manopubbaṅgamā dhammā,
tika-s0104t0:1348_17: nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti ca evamādīni suttāni etassatthassa sādhakāni.
tika-s0104t0:1348_18: Titthaṃ vuccati micchāladdhi tattheva bāhullena paribbhamanato taranti bālā etthāti katvā,
tika-s0104t0:1348_23: saññāvirāgāvirāgesu ādīnavānisaṃsadassāvino ca hutvā asaññasamāpattiṃ nibbattetvā akkhaṇabhūmiyaṃ upapajjanti,
tika-s0104t0:1348_26: Vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvāti catutthe bhūtakasiṇe paṭhamādīni tīṇi jhānāni nibbattetvā tatiyajjhāne
tika-s0104t0:1348_27: ciṇṇavasī hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya catutthajjhānādhigamāya parikammaṃ katvā,
tika-s0104t0:1349_0: Kasmā panettha vāyokasiṇeyeva parikammaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t0:1349_1: yatheva hi rūpapaṭibhāgabhūtesu kasiṇavisesesu rūpavibhāvanena rūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāto arūpasamāpattiviseso sacchikarīyati,
tika-s0104t0:1349_2: evaṃ aparibyattaviggahatāya arūpapaṭibhāgabhūte kasiṇavisese arūpavibhāvanena arūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāto rūpasamāpattiviseso adhigamīyati,
tika-s0104t0:1349_5: dhibbate taṃ citta”ntiādinā ca nayena arūpapavattiyā ādīnavadassanena,
tika-s0104t0:1349_7: rūpavirāgabhāvanā pana saddhiṃ upacārena arūpasamāpattiyo visesena paṭhamāruppajjhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1349_12: Yathā hi rūpavirāgabhāvanā virajjanīyadhammabhāvamatte parinibbindā (virajjanīyadhamma bhāvamattena parinipphannā dī. ni. ṭī. 1.6-
tika-s0104t0:1349_14: evaṃ arūpavirāgabhāvanāpīti vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-s0104t0:1349_16: tesañca visayapadesanimittasseva tassa jhānassa paṭipattito taṃ kāraṇaṃ passantehi pubbācariyehi catuttheyeva
tika-s0104t0:1349_19: vaṇṇakasiṇesu viya purimabhūtakasiṇattayepi vaṇṇapaṭicchāyāva paṇṇattiārammaṇaṃ jhānassa lokavohārānurodheneva pavattito,
tika-s0104t0:1349_20: evañca katvā visuddhimagge pathavīkasiṇassa ādāsacandamaṇḍalūpamāvacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1349_21: Catutthe pana bhūtakasiṇe bhūtapaṭicchāyā eva jhānassa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatīti tasseva arūpapaṭibhāgatā yuttā,
tika-s0104t0:1350_4: yo vā manussaloke jīvanakālo upatthambhakapaccayehi karīyati,
tika-s0104t0:1350_6: Asaññasattesu nibbattatīti asaññasattasaṅkhāte sattanikāye rūpapaṭisandhivaseneva upapajjati,
tika-s0104t0:1350_7: aññesu vā cakkavāḷesu tassā bhūmiyā atthitāya anekavidhabhāvaṃ sandhāya puthuvacananiddesotipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1350_11: kathaṃ arūpasannissayena vinā tattha rūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0104t0:1350_12: nanu siyā arūpasannissitāyeva rūpakkhandhassa uppatti idheva pañcavokārabhave tathā uppattiyā adassanatoti?
tika-s0104t0:1350_14: kathaṃ pana rūpasannissayena vinā arūpadhātuyā arūpaṃ pavattatīti.
tika-s0104t0:1350_17: kathañca kabaḷīkārāhārena vinā rūpadhātuyā rūpaṃ pavattatīti.
tika-s0104t0:1350_23: Apica yathā yassa cittasantānassa nibbattikāraṇaṃ rūpe avigatataṇhaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1350_24: tassa saha rūpena sambhavato rūpaṃ nissāya pavatti rūpasāpekkhatāya kāraṇassa.
tika-s0104t0:1350_26: tassa vinā rūpena pavatti rūpanirapekkhatāya kāraṇassa,
tika-s0104t0:1350_27: evaṃ yassa rūpappabandhassa nibbattikāraṇaṃ arūpe vigatataṇhaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1350_28: tassa vinā arūpena pavatti arūpanirapekkhatāya kāraṇassa,
tika-s0104t0:1350_30: bhāvanābalena catuvokārabhave arūpasseva sambhavo viya ca.
tika-s0104t0:1351_0: Kathaṃ pana tattha kevalo rūpappabandho paccuppannapaccayarahito cirakālaṃ pavattatīti paccetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1351_1: kittakaṃ vā kālaṃ pavattatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:1351_2: Tena na kevalaṃ idha ceva aññattha ca vutto āgamoyeva etadatthañāpane,
tika-s0104t0:1351_3: atha kho ayaṃ panettha yuttīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:1351_13: Kathaṃ pana anekakappasatamatikkamena ciraniruddhato viññāṇato idha viññāṇamuppajjati.
tika-s0104t0:1351_14: Na hi niruddhe cakkhupasāde cakkhuviññāṇamuppajjamānaṃ diṭṭhanti?
tika-s0104t0:1351_16: Niruddhampi hi cittaṃ samānajātikassa antarā anuppajjanato samanantarapaccayamattaṃ hotiyeva, na bījaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1351_18: tasmā kammato bījabhūtato ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi asaññībhavato cutānaṃ kāmadhātuyā upapattiviññāṇaṃ hotiyeva,
tika-s0104t0:1351_20: Ettha ca yathā nāma utuniyāmena pupphaggahaṇe niyatakālānaṃ rukkhānaṃ vidāraṇasaṅkhāte vekhe dinne vekhabalena aniyamatā hoti pupphaggahaṇassa,
tika-s0104t0:1351_21: evameva pañcavokārabhave avippayogena vattamānesu rūpārūpadhammesu rūpārūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāte vekhe
tika-s0104t0:1351_24: arūparahitā ca khandhānaṃ pavatti hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1352_0: Kasmā panettha puna saññuppādā ca pana “te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti saññuppādo tesaṃ cavanassa kāraṇabhāvena vutto,
tika-s0104t0:1352_2: Idha paṭisandhisaññuppādena tesaṃ cavanassa paññāyanato ñāpakahetubhāvena vutto,
tika-s0104t0:1352_3: “saññuppādā”ti vacanaṃ vā tesaṃ cavanassa paññāyanabhāvadassananti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:1352_5: saññuppādā vā uppādasaññā te devāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:1352_8: tadabbhantare vā pavattāya asaññūpapattiyā vasena lābhīadhiccasamuppannikavādopi lābhīsassatavādo viya anekabhedo sambhavatīti?
tika-s0104t0:1352_10: anantarattā pana āsannāya asaññūpapattiyā vasena lābhīadhiccasamuppannikavādo nayadassanavasena ekova dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1352_11: Atha vā sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgahato adhiccasamuppannikavādassa sassatavāde āgato sabbopi desanānayo yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1352_12: adhiccasamuppannikavādepi gahetabboti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ bhagavatā lābhīadhiccasamuppannikavādo
tika-s0104t0:1352_14: avassañcassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho icchitabbo saṃkilesapakkhe sattānamajjhāsayassa sassatucchedavaseneva duvidhattā,
tika-s0104t0:1353_0: Nanu ca adhiccasamuppannikavādassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho na yutto “ahañhi pubbe nāhosi”ntiādivasena pavattanato apubbasattapātubhāvagāhakattā.
tika-s0104t0:1353_4: Yadipi hi ayaṃ vādo “somhi etarahi ahutvā santatāya pariṇato”ti attano,
tika-s0104t0:1353_6: tathāpi vattamānakālato paṭṭhāya na tesaṃ katthaci anāgate pariyantaṃ passati,
tika-s0104t0:1353_8: yathāha “sassatisamaṃ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti yadevaṃ siyā imassa ca vādassa,
tika-s0104t0:1353_9: sassatavādādīnañca pubbantakappikesu saṅgaho na yuttoyeva anāgatakālaparāmasanavasena pavattattāti?
tika-s0104t0:1353_14: Atha vā sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacārena dhammassāminā niravasesato agatiṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1353_15: gatiñca yathābhūtaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditā etā diṭṭhiyo,
tika-s0104t0:1353_21: tathā ca vakkhati “tattha na ekantena kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabba”nti.
tika-s0104t0:1356_2: aparantānudiṭṭhino”tiādīsu viya aparanta –saddānaṃ yathākkamaṃ anāgatakālakoṭṭhāsavācakataṃ sandhāyāha “anāgatakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhāta”nti.
tika-s0104t0:1358_7: Evaṃ saddato nipphannaṃ atthato eva dassetuṃ “uddhamāghātanā attānaṃ vadantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1358_9: Te hi diṭṭhigatikā “uddhaṃ maraṇato attā nibbikāro”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:1358_10: “So etesa”ntiādinā assatthiyatthaṃ dasseti yathā “buddhamassa atthīti buddho”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1358_14: Saññīvādo eva vādo etesanti hi attho.
tika-s0104t0:1359_1: Rūpī attāti ettha kasiṇarūpaṃ “attā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1359_2: nanu rūpavinimuttena attanā bhavitabbaṃ “rūpamassa atthī”ti vutte saññāya viya rūpassāpi attaniyattā.
tika-s0104t0:1359_3: Na hi “saññī attā”ti ettha saññā eva attā,
tika-s0104t0:1359_4: atha kho “saññā assa atthī”ti atthena attaniyāva,
tika-s0104t0:1359_6: Na kho panetamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “rūpamassa atthīti rūpī”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1359_9: Sā hi “natthī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ parittavipulatādivisesasabbhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1359_11: atha imassa vādassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho na yujjati ruppanasīlassa bhedasabbhāvatoti?
tika-s0104t0:1359_12: Yujjateva kāyabhedato uddhaṃ parikappitassa attano nibbikāratāya tena adhippetattā.
tika-s0104t0:1359_14: Atha vā “rūpamassa atthīti rūpī”ti vuttepi na koci doso kappanāsiddhena bhedena abhedassāpi niddesadassanato yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
tika-s0104t0:1360_0: Apica avayavavasena avayavino tathāniddesanidassanato yathā “kāye kāyānupassī”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1360_5: evañca katvā attano rūpasabhāvattā “rūpī attā”ti vacanaṃ ñāyāgatamevāti vuttaṃ “kasiṇarūpaṃ attā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1360_12: Niyatavāditāya hi kammaphalapaṭikkhepato natthi tesaṃ jhānasamāpattilābho.
tika-s0104t0:1360_13: Tathā hikaṇhābhijātiādīsu kāḷakādirūpaṃ “attā”ti ekacce ājīvakā paṭijānanti.
tika-s0104t0:1360_22: Arogoti pana rogarahitatāsīsena nibbikāratāya niccataṃ diṭṭhigatiko paṭijānātīti dassetuṃ “nicco”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1360_24: Nimbapaṇṇe tapparimāṇo tittakaraso viya sarīrapparimāṇo arūpī attā sarīre tiṭṭhatīti takkamatteneva nigaṇṭhā
tika-s0104t0:1361_0: Tatiyā panāti “rūpī ca arūpī ca attā”ti laddhi.
tika-s0104t0:1361_1: Missakagāhavasenāti rūpārūpasamāpattīnaṃ yathāvuttāni nimittāni ekajjhaṃ katvā ekova “attā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1361_3: Ayañhi diṭṭhigatiko rūpārūpasamāpattilābhī tāsaṃ nimittaṃ rūpabhāvena,
tika-s0104t0:1361_4: arūpabhāvena ca “attā”ti gahetvā “rūpī ca arūpī cā”ti abhinivesaṃ janesi athetavādino viya,
tika-s0104t0:1361_5: takkamatteneva vā rūpārūpadhammānaṃ missakagahaṇavasena “rūpī ca arūpī ca attā”ti abhinivissa aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0104t0:1361_6: Catutthāti “neva arūpī ca nārūpī ca attā”ti laddhi.
tika-s0104t0:1361_9: rūpasabhāvānativattanato na ca arūpīti evaṃ pavattatakkagāheneva.
tika-s0104t0:1362_1: nevarūpī nārūpīti ettha hi antānantikacatutthavāde viya aññamaññapaṭikkhepavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1362_2: Satipi ca tatiyavādena imassa samānatthabhāve tattha desakālabhedavasena viya idha kālavatthubhedavasena tatiyacatutthavādānaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1362_3: Kālabhedavasena hi idha tatiyavādassa pavatti rūpārūpanimittānaṃ sahaanupaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0104t0:1362_5: Dutiyacatukkaṃ antānantikavāde vuttanayena veditabbaṃ sabbathā saddatthato samānatthattā.
tika-s0104t0:1362_7: tampi “amati gacchati bhāvo osānametthā”tiādinā amhehi vuttameva,
tika-s0104t0:1362_10: Kāmañca nānattasaññī attāti ayampi vādo samāpannakavasena labbhati.
tika-s0104t0:1362_12: Tathāpi samāpattiyaṃ ekarūpeneva saññāya upaṭṭhānato lābhīvasena ekattasaññitā sātisayaṃ yuttāti āha “samāpannakavasena ekattasaññī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1362_13: Ekasamāpattilābhino eva vā vasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1362_14: Satipi ca samāpattibhedato saññābhedasambhave bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇeyeva saññānānattassa oḷārikassa
tika-s0104t0:1362_15: sambhavato takkīvaseneva nānattasaññitaṃ dassetuṃ “asamāpannakavasena nānattasaññī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1362_19: iminā ca satipi saññāvinimuttadhamme “saññāyeva attā”ti vadatīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:1362_21: Evañca katvā antānantikavāde ceva idha ca antānantacatukke paṭhamadutiyavādesu saddatthamattato samānesupi
tika-s0104t0:1362_22: sabhāvato tehi dvīhi vādehi imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vādānaṃ viseso siddho hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1362_23: aññathā vuttappakāresu vādesu satipi pubbantāparantakappanabhedamattena kehici visese kehici avisesoyeva siyāti.
tika-s0104t0:1363_2: aṇumatto attā”tiādiladdhivasena paritto ca so saññī cāti parittasaññī kāpilakāṇādapabhutayo [kapilakaṇādādayo ] viya.
tika-s0104t0:1363_3: Attano sabbagatabhāvapaṭijānanavasena appamāṇo ca so saññī cāti appamāṇasaññīti.
tika-s0104t0:1364_1: sattānaṃ sukhādisamaṅgitā dibbacakkhunāva diṭṭhā nāmāti āha “dibbena cakkhunā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:1364_4: Diṭṭhigatikavisayāsu hi pañcavokārajhānabhūmīsu vehapphalabhūmiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā yathārahaṃ catukkanaye tikajjhānassa,
tika-s0104t0:1364_5: pañcakanaye ca catukkajjhānassa vipākaṭṭhānattā tikacatukkajjhānabhūmiyo nāma.
tika-s0104t0:1364_8: Nanu ca “ekantasukhī attā”tiādinā pavattavādānaṃ aparantadiṭṭhibhāvato “nibbattamānaṃ disvā”ti paccuppannavacanaṃ anupapannameva siyā.
tika-s0104t0:1364_10: Upapannameva anāgatassa ekantasukhībhāvādikassa pakappanāya paccuppannanibbattidassanena adhippetattā.
tika-s0104t0:1364_12: Ettha ca tassaṃ tassaṃ bhūmiyaṃ bāhullena sukhādisahitadhammappavattidassanaṃ paṭicca tesaṃ “ekantasukhī”tiādigahaṇato
tika-s0104t0:1364_14: Saddantarābhisambandhavasena viya hi atthapakaraṇādivasenapi atthaviseso labbhati.
tika-s0104t0:1364_15: “Ekantasukhī”tiādīsu ca ekantabhāvo bahulaṃ pavattimattaṃ pati payutto.
tika-s0104t0:1364_17: Atha vā hatthidassakaandhā viya diṭṭhigatikā yaṃ yadeva passanti,
tika-s0104t0:1364_22: “Dibbena cakkhunā disvā”ti vuttamatthaṃ samatthetuṃ “visesato hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1366_1: Atha na koci viseso atthīti codanaṃ sodheti “kevalañhī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:1366_2: “Asaññī”ti ca “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti ca gaṇhantānaṃ tā diṭṭhiyoti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:1366_5: Satipi kiñci kāraṇapariyesanasambhave diṭṭhigatikavādānaṃ anādariyabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “na ekantena kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1366_10: “saññaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti ettha vuttanayena saññaṃyeva “attā”ti gahetvā tassa kiñcanabhāvena ṭhitāya
tika-s0104t0:1366_13: sabbe eva vā rūpārūpadhamme “attā”ti gahetvā pavatto tatiyavādo,
tika-s0104t0:1367_0: Dutiyacatukkepi kasiṇarūpassa asañjānanasabhāvatāya asaññīti katvā antānantikavāde vuttanayena cattāro vikappā pavattā.
tika-s0104t0:1367_2: sabbattha vā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthāya sukhumāya saññāya atthibhāvapaṭijānanavasena paṭhamavādo,
tika-s0104t0:1367_5: Evaṃ kenaci pakārena satipi kāraṇapariyesanasambhave diṭṭhigatikavādānaṃ pariyesanakkhamābhāvato ādaraṃ
tika-s0104t0:1367_6: katvā mahussāhena tesaṃ kāraṇaṃ na pariyesitabbanti.
tika-s0104t0:1367_7: Etesaṃ pana saññīasaññīnevasaññīnāsaññīvādānaṃ sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho “arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti vacanato pākaṭoyeva.
tika-s0104t0:1369_1: Avijjamānassa vināsāsambhavato atthibhāvahetuko ucchedoti dassetuṃ vijjamānavācakena santa-
tika-s0104t0:1369_3: Vijjamānatāpayutto cesa diṭṭhigatikavādavisayo sattoyeva idha adhippetoti dassanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “sattassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1369_5: yathā hetuphalabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ satipi ekasantānapariyāpannānaṃ bhinnasantatipatitehi
tika-s0104t0:1369_6: visese hetuphalabhūtānaṃ paramatthato bhinnasabhāvattā bhinnasantānapatitānaṃ viya accantaṃ bhedasanniṭṭhānena
tika-s0104t0:1369_8: evaṃ hetuphalabhūtānaṃ vijjamānepi sabhāvabhede ekasantatipariyāpannatāya ekattanayena accantamabhedagahaṇampi kāraṇamevāti.
tika-s0104t0:1369_9: Santānavasena hi pavattamānesu khandhesu ghanavinibbhogābhāvena tesaṃ idha sattagāho,
tika-s0104t0:1369_11: anupubbanirodhavasena pana nirantaravināso idha “ucchedo”ti adhippeto yāvāyaṃ attā ucchijjamāno bhavati,
tika-s0104t0:1369_17: Apica punānuppajjamānavasena nirudayavināsoyeva ucchedo nāma yathāvuttanayena gahaṇatoti āha “upaccheda”nti. U- saddo, hi upa-
tika-s0104t0:1369_19: Niruddhato parabhāgo ca idha uparibhāgoti vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:1370_2: so pana maṃsacakkhupaññācakkhūnaṃ dassanapathātikkamanato adassanamevāti āha “adassana”nti.
tika-s0104t0:1370_7: Yathādhammaṃ bhavanaṃ bhāvoti hi atthena idha bhāva-
tika-s0104t0:1370_12: tena vakkhati “tathā ca aññathā ca vikappetvāvā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1370_13: Tatthāti “sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapentī”ti vacane.
tika-s0104t0:1370_15: Tadavasesalābhī ceva sabbaso alābhī ca idha aparantakappikaṭṭhāne “alābhī” tveva vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:1371_2: Upapattiṃ apassantoti daṭṭhuṃ samatthepi sati anolokanavasena apassanto.
tika-s0104t0:1371_4: parikammākaraṇena vā upapattiṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t0:1371_5: evañca katvā nayadvaye viseso pākaṭo hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1371_7: na jānātiyevāti natthikavādavasena ucchedaṃ gaṇhātīti saha pāṭhasesena sambandho,
tika-s0104t0:1371_8: natthikavādavasena mahāmūḷhabhāveneva “ito añño paraloko atthī”ti anavabodhanato imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhātīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:1371_10: yvāyaṃ indriyagocaro”ti attano dhītuyā hatthaggaṇhanakarājā viya kāmasukhābhirattatāyapi gaṇhātīti āha “kāmasukhagiddhatāya vā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1371_11: Vaṇṭato patitapaṇṇānaṃ vaṇṭena apaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ sandhāya “na puna viruhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1371_12: Evameva sattāti yathā paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto puna na paṭisandhīyati,
tika-s0104t0:1371_13: evameva sabbepi sattā appaṭisandhikā maraṇapariyosānā aponobbhavikā appaṭisandhikamaraṇameva nigacchantīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1371_14: Udakapubbuḷakūpamā hi sattā puna anuppajjamānatoti tassa laddhi.
tika-s0104t0:1371_16: Aññathāti takkanassa anekappakārasambhavato tato aññenapi pakārena.
tika-s0104t0:1371_17: Lābhinopi cutito uddhaṃ upapātassa adassanamattaṃ pati takkaneneva imā diṭṭhiyo uppajjantīti vuttaṃ “vikappetvāvā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1371_18: Tathā ca vikappetvāva uppannā aññathā ca vikappetvāva uppannāti hi sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:1371_21: yathā ca uddhamāghātanikasaññīvāde catutthacatukke saññīvādā ekantalābhīvaseneva desitā, nayime.
tika-s0104t0:1371_22: Ime pana sassatekaccasassatavādādayo viya lābhīalābhīvaseneva desitāti.
tika-s0104t0:1371_24: takkīvasena ca paccekaṃ desanamakatvā sassatavādādidesanāhi aññathā idha desanā katāti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t0:1371_29: Yadi hi idhāpi ca tathādesanāya nibandhanabhūto veneyyajjhāsayo bhaveyya,
tika-s0104t0:1371_32: ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ātappamanvāya…pe…
tika-s0104t0:1371_33: yathā samāhite citte sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti,
tika-s0104t0:1371_34: so dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena arahato cuticittaṃ passati,
tika-s0104t0:1371_37: So evamāha ‘yato kho bho ayaṃ attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpettikasambhavo kāyassa bhado ucchijjati vinassati,
tika-s0104t0:1371_40: Yasmā pana tathādesanāya nibandhanabhūto veneyyajjhāsayo na idha bhavati,
tika-s0104t0:1371_41: tasmā desanāvilāsena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ sassatavādādidesanāhi aññathāyevāyaṃ desanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1372_0: Atha vā sassatekaccasassatavādādīsu viya na idha takkīvādato visesalābhīvādo bhinnākāro,
tika-s0104t0:1372_1: atha kho samānappakāratāya samānākāroyevāti imassa visesassa pakāsanatthaṃ ayamucchedavādo bhagavatā purimavādehi visiṭṭhākārabhāvena desito.
tika-s0104t0:1372_2: Sambhavati hi idha takkinopi anussavādivasena adhigamavato viya abhiniveso.
tika-s0104t0:1372_3: Apica na imā diṭṭhiyo bhagavatā anāgate evaṃbhāvīvasena desitā,
tika-s0104t0:1372_5: atha kho yathā yathā diṭṭhigatikehi “idameva saccaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1372_7: tathā tathāyeva ime diṭṭhigatā yathābhuccaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇena paricchinditvā pakāsitā,
tika-s0104t0:1372_9: yesañca parikittanena tathāgatā sammadeva thomitā honti.
tika-s0104t0:1373_1: yathā ucchedavādīhi diṭṭhigatikehi uttaruttarabhavadassīhi aparabhavadassīnaṃ tesaṃ vādapaṭisedhavasena sakasakavādā patiṭṭhāpitā,
tika-s0104t0:1373_2: tathāyevāyaṃ desanā katāti purimadesanāhi imissā desanāya pavattibhedo na codetabbo,
tika-s0104t0:1373_3: evañca katvā arūpabhavabhedavasena ucchedavādo catudhā vibhajitvā viya kāmarūpabhavabhedavasenāpi anekadhā vibhajitvāyeva vattabbo,
tika-s0104t0:1373_4: evaṃ sati bhagavatā vuttasattakato bahutarabhedo ucchedavādo āpajjatīti,
tika-s0104t0:1373_5: atha vā paccekaṃ kāmarūpabhavabhedavasena viya arūpabhavavasenāpi na vibhajitvā vattabbo,
tika-s0104t0:1373_6: evampi sati bhagavatā vuttasattakato appatarabhedova ucchedavādo āpajjatīti ca evaṃpakārāpi codanā anavakāsā eva hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1374_1: Mātāpitūnaṃ etanti taṃsambandhanato etaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ santakanti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1374_7: “Rūpakāyavasenā”ti avatvā “rūpakāyasīsenā”ti vadanto arūpampi tesaṃ “attā”ti gahaṇaṃ ñāpeti.
tika-s0104t0:1376_9: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “samānepi tattha ubhayaliṅgābhāve purisasaṇṭhānāva tattha brahmāno,
tika-s0104t0:1377_3: yuttaṃ tāva purimesu tīsu vādesu “kāyassa bhedā”ti vattuṃ pañcavokārabhavapariyāpannaṃ attabhāvamārabbha pavattattā tesaṃ vādānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1377_4: catuvokārabhavapariyāpannaṃ pana attabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattesu catutthādīsu catūsu vādesu kasmā “kāyassa bhedā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1377_8: rūpattabhāve pana pavattavohāreneva diṭṭhigatiko arūpattabhāvepi kāyavohāraṃ āropetvā evamāha.
tika-s0104t0:1377_9: Lokasmiñhi dissati aññatthabhūtopi vohāro tadaññatthasamāropito yathā taṃ “sasavisāṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1377_13: Apica nāmakāyabhāvato phassādidhammasamūhabhūte arūpattabhāve kāyaniddeso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1377_15: Ettha ca kāmāvacaradevattabhāvādiniravasesavibhavapatiṭṭhāpakānaṃ dutiyādivādānaṃ aparantakappikabhāvo yutto hotu anāgataddhavisayattā tesaṃ vādānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1377_18: Dutiyavādādīnañhi purimapurimavādasaṅgahitasseva attano anāgate taduttaribhavūpapannassa samucchedabodhanato yujjati aparantakappikatā,
tika-s0104t0:1377_19: tathā ceva vuttaṃ “no ca kho bho ayaṃ attā ettāvatā sammā samucchinno hotī”tiādi yaṃ pana tattha vuttaṃ “atthi kho bho añño attā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1377_22: Paṭhamavādassa pana anāgate taduttaribhavūpapannassa attano samucchedabodhanābhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:1377_23: “atthi kho bho añño attā”ti ettha aññabhāvena aggahaṇato ca na yujjateva aparantakappikatāti?
tika-s0104t0:1377_24: No na yujjati idhalokapariyāpannattepi paṭhamavādavisayassa anāgatakālikasseva tena adhippetattā.
tika-s0104t0:1377_25: Paṭhamavādināpi hi idhalokapariyāpannassa attano paraṃ maraṇā ucchedo anāgatakālavaseneva adhippeto,
tika-s0104t0:1377_26: tasmā cassa aparantakappikatāya na koci virodhoti.
tika-s0104t0:1379_2: diṭṭho ca so sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammo cāti diṭṭhadhammo,
tika-s0104t0:1379_4: So pana akkhānamindriyānaṃ abhimukhībhūto visayoyevāti vuttaṃ “paccakkhadhammo vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1379_6: sopi supākaṭabhāvena indriyavisayo viya hotīti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1379_8: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave yathākammaṃ paṭilabhitabbattabhāvassa vācakaṃ padaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1379_13: Diṭṭhadhammanibbāne pavatto vādo etesanti diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādātipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t0:1380_1: Kāmanīyattā kāmā ca te anekāvayavānaṃ samūhabhāvato sattānañca bandhanato guṇā cāti kāmaguṇāti atthaṃ sandhāyāha “manāpiyarūpādīhī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:1380_6: Parito tattha tattha kāmaguṇesu yathāsakaṃ indriyāni cāreti gocaraṃ gaṇhāpetīti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “tesū”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1381_4: Ñātibhogarogasīladiṭṭhibyasanehi phuṭṭhassa cetaso abbhantaraṃ nijjhāyanaṃ socanaṃ antonijjhāyanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1381_10: Pasādasaṅkhāte kāye nissitassa dukkhasahagatakāyaviññāṇassa paṭipīḷanaṃ kāyapaṭipīḷanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1381_11: sasambhārakathanaṃ vā etaṃ yathā “dhanunā vijjhatī”ti tadupanissayassa vā aniṭṭharūpassa pacchā pavattanato “rūpakāyassa paṭipīḷana”ntipi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t0:1381_14: Ñātibyasanādinā phuṭṭhassa paridevanāyapi asakkuṇantassa antogatasokasamuṭṭhito bhuso āyāso upāyāso.
tika-s0104t0:1381_15: So pana cetaso appasannākāro evāti āha “visādalakkhaṇo”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1381_18: Anupasaggopi hi saddo saupasaggo viya yathāvuttassa atthassa bodhako yathā “gotrabhū”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1382_7: Tenetamatthaṃ dīpeti “khobhakarasabhāvattā vitakkavicārānaṃ taṃsahitampi jhānaṃ tehi sauppīḷanaṃ viya hotī”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1382_9: Oḷārikabhāvo hi vitakkavicārasaṅkhātena kaṇṭakena saha pavattakathā.
tika-s0104t0:1382_11: loke hi sakaṇṭakaṃ pharusakaṃ oḷārikanti vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:1383_9: Yāya nimittabhūtāya ubbilāvanapītiyā uppannāya cittaṃ ubbilāvitaṃ nāma,
tika-s0104t0:1383_11: Iti pītiyā uppannāya eva cittassa ubbilāvanato tassa ubbilāvitabhāvo pītiyā kato nāmāti āha “ubbilabhāvakaraṇa”nti.
tika-s0104t0:1384_6: Sukhena hi cittaṃ ārammaṇe abhinataṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1384_10: Ettha ca “manuññabhojanādīsu khuppipāsādiabhibhūtassa viya kāmehi viveciyamānassa upādārammaṇapatthanāvisesato abhivaḍḍhati,
tika-s0104t0:1384_11: manuññabhojanaṃ bhuttāvino viya pana uḷārakāmarasassa yāvadatthaṃ nicitassa sahitassa bhuttakāmatāya kāmesu pātabyatā na hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1384_12: visayānabhigiddhanato visayehi dummociyehi jalūkā viya sayameva muccatī”ti ca ayoniso ummujjitvā kāmaguṇasantappitatāya
tika-s0104t0:1384_15: paṭhamādijhānasukhassa santabhāvadassitāya ca paṭhamādijhānasukhatittiyā saṃsāradukkhupacchedaṃ byākaṃsu dutiyādivādino.
tika-s0104t0:1384_16: Idhāpi ucchedavādeva vuttappakāro vicāro yathāsambhavaṃ ānetvā vattabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1384_21: Dutiyādivādesu yadi paṭhamavādasaṅgahito soyeva attā paṭhamajjhānādisamaṅgī,
tika-s0104t0:1384_23: Teneva hi ucchedavāde viya idha pāḷiyaṃ “añño attā”ti aññaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1384_24: Kathaṃ pana accantanibbānapaññāpakassa attano diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādassa sassatadiṭṭhiyā saṅgaho,
tika-s0104t0:1384_26: Taṃtaṃsukhavisesasamaṅgitāpaṭiladdhena bandhavimokkhena suddhassa attano sakarūpeneva avaṭṭhānadīpanato.
tika-s0104t0:1384_27: Tesañhi tathāpaṭiladdhena kammabandhavimokkhena suddho hutvā diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto attā sakarūpeneva avaṭṭhāsīti laddhi.
tika-s0104t0:1384_28: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “ettāvatā kho bho ayaṃ attā paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ patto hotī”ti sassatabhāvañāpakacchāyāya eva tesaṃ vādadassanaṃ katanti.
tika-s0104t0:1385_2: Tassa imā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo kathitāti niyamanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1385_3: niyatānapekkhavacanaṃ vā etaṃ “yaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti āgataṭṭhāne viya.
tika-s0104t0:1385_5: Tāsu antānantikavādādīnaṃ sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgahabhāvo tattha tattha pakāsitoyeva.
tika-s0104t0:1385_10: Na hi pubbantāparantesu viya tadubhayavinimutte majjhante diṭṭhikappanā sambhavati tadubhayantaramattena ittarakālattā.
tika-s0104t0:1385_12: evaṃ sati diṭṭhikappanākkhamo tassa ubhayasabhāvo pubbantāparantesuyeva antogadhoti kathaṃ tadubhayamekajjhaṃ adassitaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t0:1385_14: sopi “pubbantakappikā ca aparantakappikā ca pubbantāparantakappikā cā”ti upari vadantena bhagavatā pubbantāparantehi
tika-s0104t0:1385_18: Aññathā hi saṅkaḍḍhitvā vuttavacanassa niravasesasaṅkaḍḍhanābhāvato anatthakatā āpajjeyyāti.
tika-s0104t0:1385_20: Ye antānantikā hutvā diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti evamādinā ubhayasambandhābhinivesino veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:1386_8: Tadubhayavasena hi sattānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhe duvidho ajjhāsayo.
tika-s0104t0:1389_0: Tañca bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ aparimāṇe eva ñeyyavisese uppajjanavasena
tika-s0104t0:1389_1: anekabhedabhinnampi “cattāro janā sassatavādā”tiādinā dvāsaṭṭhiyā pabhedehi saṅgaṇhanavasena sabbaññutaññāṇena
tika-s0104t0:1389_2: paricchinditvā dassento pamāṇabhūtāya tulāya dhārayamāno viya hotīti āha “tulāya tulayanto viyā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1389_3: Tathā hi vakkhati “antojālīkatā”tiādi “sinerupādato vālukaṃ uddharanto viyā”ti pana etena sabbaññutaññāṇato
tika-s0104t0:1389_4: aññassa ñāṇassa imissā desanāya asakkuṇeyyataṃ dasseti paramagambhīratāvacanato.
tika-s0104t0:1390_0: Ettha ca “sabbe te imeheva dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi,
tika-s0104t0:1390_3: pubbantakappikādittayavinimuttassa ca kassaci diṭṭhigatikassa abhāvato yāni tāni sāmaññaphalādisuttantaresu
tika-s0104t0:1390_6: tesaṃ ettheva saṅgahato antogadhatā veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t0:1390_7: Akiriyavādo tāva “vañjho kūṭaṭṭho”tiādinā kiriyābhāvadīpanato sassatavāde antogadho,
tika-s0104t0:1390_9: “natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā”tiādi nayappavatto ahetukavādo ca adhiccasamuppannavāde.
tika-s0104t0:1390_11: Tathā hi tattha “kāyassa bhedā ucchijjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1391_1: tathāpi sattavatātikkamena vikkhepavāditāya nāṭaputtavādopi sañcayavādo viya amarāvikkhepavādesu antogadho.
tika-s0104t0:1391_3: aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra”nti evaṃpakārā vādā pana “rūpī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā”tiādivādesu saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0104t0:1391_8: “Hoti ca na hoti ca tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā,
tika-s0104t0:1391_9: atthi ca natthi ca sattā opapātikā”ti evaṃpakārā ekaccasassatavāde.
tika-s0104t0:1391_10: “Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā,
tika-s0104t0:1391_11: nevatthi na natthi sattā opapātikā”ti evaṃpakārā amarāvikkhepavāde.
tika-s0104t0:1391_16: bahiddhā ca aññatitthiyasamaye dissamānānaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ imāsuyeva dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīsu antogadhatā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:1391_17: Te pana tattha tatthāgatanayena vuccamānā ganthavitthārakarā,
tika-s0104t0:1391_18: atitthe ca pakkhandanamiva hotīti na vitthārayimha.
tika-s0104t0:1391_19: Idha pāḷiyaṃ atthavicāraṇāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuttānatthapakāsanameva hi amhākaṃ bhāroti.
tika-s0104t0:1392_0: “Evamayaṃ yathānusandhivasena desanā āgatā”ti vacanappasaṅgena suttassānusandhayo vibhajituṃ “tayo hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:1392_5: Pucchādayo hi desanāya bāhirakāraṇaṃ tadanurūpena desanāpavattanato.
tika-s0104t0:1392_10: pucchaṃ anusandhiṃ katvā desitattā suttassa sambandho pucchāya kato nāma hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1392_12: Pucchānissitena hi anusandhinā tannissayabhūtā pucchāpi gahitāti.
tika-s0104t0:1392_17: pucchaṃ vacanasambandhaṃ katvā desito taṃsamuṭṭhāniko taṃtaṃsuttapadesova.
tika-s0104t0:1393_1: ajjhāsayena ca ananusandhiko ādimhi desitadhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā tappaṭipakkhadhammavasena vā pavatto uparisuttapadeso.
tika-s0104t0:1393_5: Tattha “evaṃ vutte nando gopālako bhagavantaṃ etadavocā”ti paṭhanti,
tika-s0104t0:1393_6: taṃ na sundaraṃ sutte tathā abhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1393_7: “Evaṃ vutte nandagopālakasutte bhagavantaṃ etadavocā”ti pana paṭhitabbaṃ tasmiṃ sutte “aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavocā”ti atthassa upapattito.
tika-s0104t0:1393_9: Gaṅgāya vuyhamānaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ upamaṃ katvā saddhāpabbajite kulaputte desite nando gopālako “ahamimaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1393_11: upasampadañca gahetvā tathāpaṭipajjamāno nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto.
tika-s0104t0:1393_13: “Kiṃ nu kho bhante”tiādīni pana aññataroyeva bhikkhu avoca.
tika-s0104t0:1393_14: Vuttañhi tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘kiṃ nu kho bhante,
tika-s0104t0:1394_2: dārukkhandho na orimaṃ tīraṃ upagacchatī”tiādinā gaṅgāya vuyhamānaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ upamaṃ katvā saddhāpabbajite kulaputte desite.
tika-s0104t0:1394_3: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti anusandhikusalatāya “kiṃ nu kho bhante”tiādivacanamavoca.
tika-s0104t0:1394_4: Tathāgato hi “imissaṃ parisati nisinno anusandhi kusalo atthi,
tika-s0104t0:1394_5: so maṃ pañhaṃ pucchissatī”ti ettakeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
tika-s0104t0:1394_9: Thale ussādoti jalamajjhe uṭṭhite thalasmiṃ ussārito āruḷho.
tika-s0104t0:1394_13: Antopūtīti vakkahadayādīsu apūtikassāpi guṇānaṃ pūtibhāvena abbhantaraṃpūtīti.
tika-s0104t0:1395_0: “Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno”tiādi majjhimāgamavare uparipaṇṇāsake mahāpuṇṇamasuttaṃ tatrāyamattho –
tika-s0104t0:1395_3: tena bhagavato yathādesitāya attasuññatāya attano aruciyabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0104t0:1395_12: Asati attani khandhānañca khaṇikattā tāni kammāni kaṃ nāma attānaṃ attano phalena phusissanti,
tika-s0104t0:1395_14: Tassa bhikkhuno cetoparivitakkaṃ attano cetasā ceto –
tika-s0104t0:1395_15: pariyañāṇasampayuttena sabbaññutaññāṇasampayuttena vā aññāya jānitvāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:1396_1: Vidvāti hi paṇḍitādhivacanaṃ vidati jānātīti katvā.
tika-s0104t0:1396_4: Taṇhādhipateyyena cetasāti “yadi ahaṃ nāma koci natthi,
tika-s0104t0:1396_5: evaṃ sati mayā katassa kammassa phalaṃ ko paṭisaṃvedeti,
tika-s0104t0:1396_6: sati pana tasmiṃ siyā kammaphalūpabhogo”ti taṇhādhipatito āgatena attavādupādānasahagatena cetasā.
tika-s0104t0:1396_9: khaṇikattepi saṅkhārānaṃ yasmiṃ santāne kammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1396_10: tattheva phalūpapattito dhammapuñjamattasseva siddhe kammaphalasambandhe ekattanayaṃ micchā gahetvā ekena kārakavedakabhūtena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1396_11: aññathā kammakammaphalānamasambandho siyāti attattaniyasuññatāpakāsanaṃ satthusāsanaṃ atikkamitabbaṃ maññeyyāti.
tika-s0104t0:1397_0: Upari desanāti desanāsamuṭṭhānadhammadīpikāya heṭṭhimadesanāya upari pavattitā desanā.
tika-s0104t0:1397_15: Tathā hi niccasārādipaññāpakānaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ vasena uṭṭhitāyaṃ desanā niccasārādisuññatāpakāsanena niṭṭhāpitāti.
tika-s0104t0:1399_7: na tu sotāpannassa sammādassanavedayitamiva niccalanti ca hi imāya desanāya mariyādavibhāgaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:1399_12: “Tadapī”ti vuttattā yena somanassajātā paññapentīti attho labbhatīti dassetuṃ “yenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1399_17: Ajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ tesaṃ bhavantānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ tadapi vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ vedayitanti sambandho.
tika-s0104t0:1400_1: Na hi saṅkhatadhammasabhāvaṃ ajānanamattena micchā abhinivisanti.
tika-s0104t0:1400_4: “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti idaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃgahitaṃ evaṃparāmaṭṭhaṃ evaṃgatikaṃ hoti evaṃabhisamparāyanti
tika-s0104t0:1400_5: yathābhūtamajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ atha vā yasmiṃ vedayite avītataṇhatāya evaṃdiṭṭhigataṃ upādīyati,
tika-s0104t0:1400_7: Evaṃ visesayojanāya hi yathā anāvaraṇañāṇasamantacakkhūhi tathāgatānaṃ yathābhūtamettha jānanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1400_10: atha kho tesaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiparāmāsoyevāti imamatthaṃ imāya desanāya dassetīti pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1401_0: Vedayitanti “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti diṭṭhipaññāpanavasena pavattaṃ diṭṭhissādasukhapariyāyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1401_5: Tañca kho panetanti ca yathāvuttaṃ vedayitameva paccāmasati,
tika-s0104t0:1401_7: “tadapi vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ vedayitamevā”ti vacchinditvā “tadapi vedayitaṃ paritassitavipphanditamevā”ti puna sambandho kātabboti.
tika-s0104t0:1401_8: Tadapi tāva na sampāpuṇātīti heṭṭhimaparicchedena mariyādavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “na sotāpannassa dassanamiva niccala”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1401_13: “Paritassitavipphanditamevā”ti hi vuttena maggaphalasukhaṃ viya avipphanditaṃ hutvā ekarūpe avatiṭṭhati,
tika-s0104t0:1401_14: atha kho taṃ vaṭṭāmisabhūtaṃ diṭṭhitaṇhāsallānuviddhatāya sauppīḷattā vipphanditamevāti attho āpanno hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1402_0: Evaṃ visesakāraṇato dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni vibhajitvā idāni avisesakāraṇato tāni dassetuṃ “tatra bhikkhave”tiādikā desanā āraddhā.
tika-s0104t0:1402_3: Tattha tadapīti “sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti ettha yadetaṃ “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti paññāpanahetubhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1402_6: avisesena samudayatthaṅgamassādādīnavanissaraṇato vā yathābhūtamajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1402_8: taṇhāya ca upagatattā taṇhāgatānaṃ taṇhāparitassitena diṭṭhivipphanditameva diṭṭhicalanameva.
tika-s0104t0:1402_9: “Asati attani ko vedanaṃ anubhavatī”ti kāyavacīdvāresu diṭṭhiyā copanappattimattameva,
tika-s0104t0:1402_10: na pana diṭṭhiyā paññapetabbo koci dhammo sassato atthīti adhippāyoti.
tika-s0104t0:1404_4: Yena hi taṇhāparitassitena etāni diṭṭhigatāni pavattanti,
tika-s0104t0:1404_6: vedayitassāpi phasso paccayoti evaṃ paccayaparamparavibhāvinī ayaṃ desanā.
tika-s0104t0:1404_13: na ettha koci sassato attā vā loko vāti evamatthantaraṃ viññāpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1404_14: Taṇhādiṭṭhipariphanditaṃ tadapi vedayitaṃ diṭṭhikāraṇabhūtāya taṇhāya paccayabhūtaṃ phassapaccayā hotīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1405_12: Sannihitopi hi visayo sace cittuppādo phusanākāravirahito hoti,
tika-s0104t0:1405_13: na tassa ārammaṇapaccayo bhavatīti phasso sabbesampi sampayuttadhammānaṃ visesapaccayo.
tika-s0104t0:1405_14: Tathā hi bhagavatā dhammasaṅgaṇīpakaraṇe cittuppādaṃ vibhajantena “phasso hotī”ti phassasseva paṭhamamuddharaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1407_0: Kāraṇehi catūhipi, na katthaci ravo yutto”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1410_3: upari ca “phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentī”ti vakkhamānattā vedayitamevettha padhānanti āha “sabbadiṭṭhivedayitāni sampiṇḍetī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1410_4: “Yepi te”ti tattha tattha āgatassa ca pi-
tika-s0104t0:1410_7: sabbepi te chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentīti hi vedayitakiriyāvasena taṃtaṃdiṭṭhigatikānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1410_10: Upari phasse pakkhipanatthāyāti “chahi phassāyatanehī”ti vutte upari phasse pakkhipanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1410_12: “Chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentī”ti iminā hi chahi ajjhattikāyatanehi chaḷārammaṇapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1411_9: Tattha ca seyyathāpi bhikkhave subhūmiyaṃ catumahāpathe mahānigrodho samantā pakkhīnaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hotī”ti tanniddeso vutto.
tika-s0104t0:1411_13: āyabhūtaṃ vā attano phalaṃ tanoti pavattetīti āyatanaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1411_15: saddo aññesu viya na ettha atthantarāvabodhakoti āha “paṇṇattimatte”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1412_8: Phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti ime phassapañcamakā dhammā upalakkhaṇavasena vuttā aññesampi taṃsampayuttadhammānaṃ āyatanabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:1412_10: Tathā hi cittuppādaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā teyeva “phasso hoti, vedanā, saññā, cetanā,
tika-s0104t0:1412_14: Tāni ca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ tesamabhāve abhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1412_15: Ayaṃ pana yathāvutto sañjātidesādiattho ruḷhivaseneva tattha tattha niruḷhatāya eva pavattattāti ācariyaānandattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1412_20: Cakkhādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭenti vāyamanti,
tika-s0104t0:1412_21: āyabhūte ca dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārenti,
tika-s0104t0:1412_23: Iti iminā nayenāti ettha ādiatthena iti saddena “sotaṃ paṭiccā”tiādipāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t0:1413_6: phasso”ti etasmiṃ sutte vijjamānesupi saññādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vedanāya padhānakāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ phassasīsena desanā katā,
tika-s0104t0:1413_7: evamidhāpi “phassapaccayā vedanā”tiādinā phassaṃ ādiṃ katvā aparantapaṭisandhānena paccayaparamparaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1413_8: dassetuṃ “chahi phassāyatanehī”ti ca “phussa phussā”ti ca phassasīsena desanā katāti.
tika-s0104t0:1414_0: “Kiñcāpī”tiādinā saddamattato codanālesaṃ dassetvā “tathāpī”tiādinā atthato taṃ pariharati.
tika-s0104t0:1414_2: Phasso arūpadhammo visamāno ekadesena ārammaṇaṃ analliyamānopi phusanākārena pavatto phusanto viya hotīti āha “phassova taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusatī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1414_5: “Chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussā”ti aphusanakiccānipi nissitavohārena phusanakiccāni katvā dassanameva
tika-s0104t0:1414_7: Upanikkhipitvāti hi phusanakiccāropanavasena phassasmiṃ pavesetvāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1414_8: Phassagatikāni katvā phassupacāraṃ āropetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1414_11: Atthasijjhanako pana taṃsabhāvoyeva attho gahetabboti dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādimāha. Yathāhu –
tika-s0104t0:1417_0: Attano paccayabhūtānaṃ channaṃ phassānaṃ vasena cakkhusamphassajā yāva manosamphassajāti saṅkhepato chabbidhaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1419_0: Tidhā nissitato dvīhi, tidhā kālena vaḍḍhitā”ti. –
tika-s0104t0:1420_1: Mahāvihāravāsino cettha yathā viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1420_3: vedanañca paccayapaccayuppannampi sasantatipariyāpannaṃ dīpento vipākameva icchanti,
tika-s0104t0:1420_4: aññe pana yathā tathā vā paccayabhāvo sati na sakkā vajjetunti sabbameva icchanti.
tika-s0104t0:1420_6: Rūpataṇhādibhedāyāti “seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto”ti pitunāmavasena viya ārammaṇanāmavasena vuttāya rūpataṇhā yāva dhammataṇhāti saṅkhepato chabbidhāya.
tika-s0104t0:1423_7: upanissaye eva pana taṃ sabbampi antogadhanti evamuddhaṭo.
tika-s0104t0:1423_8: Yuttaṃ tāva ārammaṇūpanissayassa upanissayasāmaññato upanissaye antogadhatā,
tika-s0104t0:1423_9: kathaṃ pana ārammaṇamattaārammaṇādhipatīnaṃ tattha antogadhabhāvo siyāti?
tika-s0104t0:1423_10: Tesampi ārammaṇasāmaññato ārammaṇūpanissayena saṅgahitattā ārammaṇūpanissayavasamodhānabhūteva upanissaye eva antogadhatā hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1423_12: Siddhe hi satyārambho niyamāya vā hoti atthantaraviññāpanāya vāti.
tika-s0104t0:1424_2: kathaṃ sāyeva tassa paccayo siyāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1424_3: purimataṇhāya pana upanissayapaccayena pacchimataṇhāya daḷhabhāvato purimāyeva taṇhā pacchimāya paccayo bhavati.
tika-s0104t0:1424_4: Taṇhādaḷhattameva hi “kāmupādānaṃ upāyāso upakaṭṭhā”tiādīsu viya upa-
tika-s0104t0:1424_8: Atha vā apattavisayapatthanā taṇhā tamasi corānaṃ hatthapasāraṇaṃ viya,
tika-s0104t0:1424_14: Ayampi tesaṃ viseso kecivādavasena ācariyadhammapālattherena dassito purimanayasseva visuddhimagge sakavādabhāvena vuttattā.
tika-s0104t0:1425_4: taṃ sabbampi vuttanayena upanissayeneva saṅgahetvā “upanissayakoṭiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1425_5: Yasmā ca taṇhāya rūpādīni assādetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0104t0:1425_10: Tasmā itaresampi tiṇṇaṃ taṇhā upanissayakoṭiyā paccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1426_3: Tesu upapattibhavassa catubbidhampi upādānaṃ upapattibhavahetubhūtassa kammabhavassa kāraṇabhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:1426_5: Kammārammaṇakaraṇakāle pana kammasahajātamupādānaṃ upapattibhavassa ārammaṇavasena paccayo.
tika-s0104t0:1426_6: Kammabhavassa pana sahajātassa sahajātamupādānaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena ceva hetumaggavasena ca anekadhā paccayo.
tika-s0104t0:1426_11: sahajātādike ca sahajātapaccaye pakkhipitvā tathāti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1426_13: Tena hi upanissayakoṭiyā ceva sahajātakoṭiyā cāti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:1427_0: Bhavo jātiyāti ettha bhavoti kammabhavo adhippeto.
tika-s0104t0:1427_5: Tena vuttaṃ “jātīti panettha savikārā pañcakkhandhā daṭṭhabbā”ti,
tika-s0104t0:1427_8: kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “kammabhavo jātiyā paccayo”ti ce?
tika-s0104t0:1427_10: Yathāha bhagavā “kammaṃ satte vibhajati yadidaṃ hīnapaṇītatāyā”ti savikārāti nibbattivikārena savikārā,
tika-s0104t0:1427_13: so eva ca tassa kāraṇaṃ bhavitumayutto taṇhāya kāmupādānassa paccayabhāve viya purimapacchimādivisesānamasambhavato,
tika-s0104t0:1427_14: tasmā kammabhavoyeva upapattibhavasaṅkhātāya jātiyā kammapaccayena ceva pakatūpanissayapaccayena ca paccayoti
tika-s0104t0:1427_15: atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kammapaccayaṃ upanissayeneva saṅgahetvā upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1427_17: jarāmaraṇādinā phuṭṭhassa ca bālassa sokādayo sambhavanti, nāsati,
tika-s0104t0:1427_23: Mahāvisayattā paṭiccasamuppādavicāraṇāya niravasesā ayaṃ kuto laddhabbāti codanamapaneti “vitthārato”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t0:1427_24: “Idha panassā”tiādinā pāḷiyampi paṭiccasamuppādakathā ekadeseneva kathitāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t0:1427_29: idānetarahi vijjatī”tiādīsu viya aññamaññatthāvabodhanavasena sapayojanattā, matta-
tika-s0104t0:1430_0: Ekadesenevidha pāḷiyaṃ kathitattā paṭiccasamuppādassa tathā kathane saddhiṃ udāharaṇena kāraṇaṃ dassento “bhagavā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t0:1430_1: Tena imamadhippāyaṃ dasseti “vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento bhagavā avijjā- taṇhā-
tika-s0104t0:1430_3: tesu idha diṭṭhisīseneva kathento vedanāya diṭṭhiyā balavakāraṇattā vedanāmūlakaṃ ekadesameva paṭiccasamuppādaṃ kathesī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1430_4: Etāni ca suttāni aṅguttaranikāye dasanipāte tattha purimakoṭi na paññāyatīti asukassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa,
tika-s0104t0:1430_6: na tato pubbeti evaṃ avijjāya purimo ādimariyādo appaṭihatassa mama sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi na paññāyati tatā mariyādassa avijjamānattāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1430_7: Evañcetanti iminā mariyādābhāvena ayaṃ avijjā kāmaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0104t0:1430_8: Atha ca panāti evaṃ kālaniyamena mariyādābhāvena vuccamānāpi.
tika-s0104t0:1430_9: Idappaccayāti imasmā pañcanīvaraṇasaṅkhātapaccayā avijjā sambhavatīti evaṃ dhammaniyāmena avijjāya koṭi paññāyatīti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1430_11: ‘pañca nīvaraṇā’ tissa vacanīya”nti hi tattheva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1430_22: evamidhāpi vaṇṇavikāro ca vākye viya samāsepi labbhateva yathā “jānipati tudampatī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1430_24: pabhinnapaṭisambhidena āyasmatā mahākaccāyanattherena vuttameva pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1431_10: taṃ kathaneneva bhagavā ete diṭṭhigatikā yāvidaṃ micchādassanaṃ na paṭinissajjanti,
tika-s0104t0:1431_11: tāva iminā paccayaparamparena vaṭṭeyeva nimujjantīti dassesīti.
tika-s0104t0:1433_7: “Yehī”tiādinā diṭṭhigatikānaṃ micchādassanassa kāraṇabhūtāya vedanāya paccayabhūtaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva
tika-s0104t0:1433_9: Vedanākammaṭṭhāneti “vedanānaṃ samudaya”ntiādikaṃ imaṃ pāḷiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1433_14: So hi “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti paṭṭhāne vacanato kammasamuṭṭhānānampi cakkhādīnaṃ upatthambhakapaccayo hotiyeva.
tika-s0104t0:1433_16: Nanu ca “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti vacanato sabbesu chasu phassāyatanesu “nāmarūpasamudayā nāmarūpanirodhā” icceva vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1433_19: idha pana evampi cakkhādīsu sambhavatīti visesato dassetuṃ tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1434_0: Uttaritarajānaneneva diṭṭhigatassa jānanampi siddhanti katvā pāḷiyamanāgatepi “diṭṭhiñca jānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1434_2: vimutti pana ida heṭṭhimā phalasamāpattiyo “yāva arahattā”ti aggaphalassa visuṃ vacanato.
tika-s0104t0:1434_10: tathāpi arahato ukkaṃsagativijānanavasena desanā arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhāpitāti.
tika-s0104t0:1434_11: Suvaṇṇageho viya ratanamayakaṇṇikāya desanā arahattakaṇṇikāya niṭṭhāpitāti attho.
tika-s0104t0:1434_13: pajānātī”ti etena dhammassa niyyānikabhāvena saddhiṃ saṅghassa suppaṭipattiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0104t0:1434_16: yāva āraddhavipassako jānātī”ti paripuṇṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅgho dassito,
tika-s0104t0:1435_1: “Desanājālavimutto diṭṭigatiko nāma natthī”ti dassanaṃ desanāya kevalaparipuṇṇataṃ ñāpetunti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1435_3: dabbapavesanavasena antojāle akatāpi tannissitavādappavesanavasena katāti antojālīkatā,
tika-s0104t0:1435_5: dabbavasena anantojālāpi tannissitavādavasena antojālā katāti antojālīkatā.
tika-s0104t0:1435_10: Nissitā avasitāva hutvā ummujjamānā ummujjantīti attho. Māna-
tika-s0104t0:1435_11: saddo cettha bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho appahīnena ummujjanabhāvena puna ummujjanabhāvassa lakkhitattā,
tika-s0104t0:1436_7: Aññatthāpi hi diṭṭhigatikā ettha pariyāpannā antojālīkatāva.
tika-s0104t0:1437_3: dassentoti desanākusalatāya yathāvuttesu diṭṭhigatikānaṃ ummujjananimujjanaṭṭhānabhūtesu katthacipi bhavādīsu attano anavarodhabhāvaṃ dassento.
tika-s0104t0:1437_9: Gīvāyāti ettha mahājanānanti sambandhīniddeso netīti etthāpi kammabhāvena sambajjhitabbo nī-
tika-s0104t0:1437_15: Jīvitapariyādāne vutteyeva hi puna appaṭisandhikabhāvo vutto nāma tasseva adassanassa padhānakāraṇattā.
tika-s0104t0:1437_16: “Na dakkhantī”ti ettha anāgatavacanavasena padasiddhi “yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati
tika-s0104t0:1437_17: vā sakkhiṃ vā karissatī”tiādīsu viyāti dasseti “na dakkhissantī”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:1437_21: tato uddhampi aññabuddhuppādesu pavattati eva yathā adhunā vipassiādīnaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1437_22: Tathā hi vakkhati “vohāramattameva bhavissatī”ti paññāya cettha paṇṇādesoti neruttikā.
tika-s0104t0:1439_3: Sakaṇṭako jalacārī satto idha maṇḍūko nāma,
tika-s0104t0:1439_5: tassa naṅguṭṭhe aggakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito kaṇṭakotipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t0:1439_8: Ettha ca vaṇṭacchede vaṇṭūpanibandhānaṃ ambapakkānaṃ ambarukkhato vicchedo viya bhavanetticchede tadupanibandhānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1439_9: khandhādīnaṃ santānato vicchedoti ettāvatāva pāḷiyamāgataṃ opammaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1440_4: tena “evampi nāma kathitasuttassā”ti vuttanayena suttassa guṇaṃ sambhāveti.
tika-s0104t0:1441_6: Nanti nipātamattaṃ “na naṃ suto samaṇo gotamo”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t0:1441_8: Sabbena sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhanato atthasaṅkhātaṃ jālametthāti atthajālaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1441_11: saṅgāmo cettha pañcahi mārehi samāgamanaṃ abhiyujjhananti āha “devaputtamārampī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:1441_17: Titthiyavādanimmaddanupāyattā anuttaro saṅgāmavijayoti evampettha atthayojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t0:1442_2: Apica nidānāvasānatoti nidānapariyosāne vuttattā nidānāvasānabhūtato “mamaṃ vā bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t0:1442_6: “Nidānena ādikalyāṇa”nti vacanato pana nidānampi nigamanaṃ viya suttapariyāpannameva.
tika-s0104t0:1443_1: Yathā anattamanā attano anatthacaratāya paramanā verimanā nāma honti,
tika-s0104t0:1444_0: “Diso disaṃ yaṃ taṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ;
tika-s0104t0:1445_0: Micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo naṃ tato kare”ti. ;
tika-s0104t0:1446_1: ime pana attano atthacaratāya attamanā nāma hontīti āha “sakamanā”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1447_5: Karavīkassa rutamiva mañjumadhurassaro yassāti karavīkarutamañjū, tena.
tika-s0104t0:1447_6: Amatābhisekasadisenāti kāyacittadarathavūpasamakaṃ sabbasambhārābhisaṅkhataṃ udakaṃ dīghāyukatāsaṃvattanato amataṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t0:1447_8: Brahmuno saro viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato saro yassātibrahmassaro, tena.
tika-s0104t0:1447_11: Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ abhinandantīti upagacchanti sevantīti atthoti āha “upagamanepī”ti.
tika-s0104t0:1448_1: Abhinanditvāti vuttoyevattho “anumoditvā”ti iminā pakāsitoti sandhāya “anumodanepī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1449_8: Tādinoti iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samapekkhanādīhi pañcahi kāraṇehi tādibhūtassa.
tika-s0104t0:1449_13: Kiñcāpi “katamañca taṃ bhikkhave”tiādinā tattha tattha pavattāya kathetukamyatāpucchāya vissajjanavasena
tika-s0104t0:1449_14: vuttattā idaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ nāma bhavati.
tika-s0104t0:1449_16: tathāpi pucchāvissajjanāvasena pavattaṃ suttaṃ sagāthakaṃ ce,
tika-s0104t0:1449_22: aṅgantaraheturahitassa ca niggāthakabhāvasseva anaññasādhāraṇato pucchāvissajjanabhāvamanapekkhitvā niggāthakabhāvameva
tika-s0104t0:1449_23: veyyākaraṇahetutāya dassento “niggāthakattā hi idaṃ veyyākaraṇa”nti āha.
tika-s0104t0:1450_0: Kasmāti codanaṃ sodheti “bhaññamāneti hi vutta”nti iminā.
tika-s0104t0:1450_5: atha kho dvāsaṭṭhiyā ṭhānesu akampitthāti veditabbāti.
tika-s0104t0:1450_6: Yadevaṃ sakalepi imasmiṃ sutte bhaññamāne akampitthāti atthoyeva sambhavati,
tika-s0104t0:1450_7: na pana tassa tassa diṭṭhigatassa pariyosāne pariyosāneti atthoti?
tika-s0104t0:1450_8: Nāyamanuyogo katthacipi na pavisati sambhavamatteneva anuyuñjanato,
tika-s0104t0:1450_9: ayaṃ pana attho na sambhavamatteneva vutto,
tika-s0104t0:1450_12: tathāruḷhanayeneva ca saṅgahakārena vuttoti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1450_13: itarathā atakkāvacarassa imassatthassa takkapariyāhatakathanaṃ anupapannaṃ siyāti.
tika-s0104t0:1451_0: Aparesupīti ettha pi-saddena pāramipavicayanaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Vuttañhi buddhavaṃse –
tika-s0104t0:1454_3: mahāariṭṭhattherassa vinayapiṭakasajjhāyaneti evamādīsu sāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇānīti pītivasaṃ gatā naccantā viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī kampittha.
tika-s0104t0:1454_4: Sāsanantaradhāne pana “aho īdisassa saddhammassa antaradhāna”nti domanassappattā viya yathā taṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhāne.
tika-s0104t0:1456_0: Sāgaro ca sasokova, vinadī karuṇaṃ gira”nti. ;
tika-s0104t0:1457_1: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇeti puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitassa sāṇamayapaṃsukūlassa tumbamatte pāṇe vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṃse ṭhatvā gahaṇe.
tika-s0104t0:1458_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
tika-s0104t0:1460_3: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇe yathā acchariyavegābhihatāti yuttaṃ viya dissati,
tika-s0104t0:1460_5: Vessantarajātake pana pāramīpūraṇapuññatejena anekakkhattuṃ kampitattā akālakampanaṃ nāma bhavati.
tika-s0104t0:1460_6: Sakkhinidassane kathetabbassa atthassānurūpato sakkhi viya bhavatīti vuttaṃ “sakkhibhāvenā”ti yathā taṃ māravijayakāle.
tika-s0104t0:1460_7: Sādhukāradānenāti pakaraṇānurūpavasena vuttaṃ yathā taṃ dhammacakkappavattanasaṅgītikālādīsu.
tika-s0104t0:1461_0: “Na kevala”ntiādinā anekatthapathavīkampanadassanamukhena imassa suttassa mahānubhāvatāyeva dassitā.
tika-s0104t0:1461_2: Tañhi sāsanassa ñāṇālokasaṅkhātāya jotiyā pātubhūtaṭṭhānattā jotivananti vuccatīti vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1462_2: Sayambhunā desitassa brahmajālassa yassa suttaseṭṭhassāti yojanā.
tika-s0104t0:1471_3: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ ajjhattikasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhagavato mahākaruṇā.
tika-s0104t0:1471_4: Tāya hi samussāhitassa lokanāthassa veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ udapādi,
tika-s0104t0:1471_5: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t0:1471_6: Ettha ca tividhāvatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva saddhammadesanāhatthadānehi saṃsāramahoghato sattasantāraṇatthaṃ taduppattito.
tika-s0104t0:1471_10: sattānaṃ āsayānusayādikañca yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vicitranayadesanaṃ pavattesi.
tika-s0104t0:1471_11: Bāhiraṃ pana sādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ dasasahassimahābrahmaparivārassa sahampatibrahmuno ajjhesanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1471_12: Tadajjhesanañhi pati dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇājanitaṃ appossukkataṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi.
tika-s0104t0:1472_2: yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1472_4: Sāmaññāvatthāya hi sādhāraṇampi samānaṃ mahākaruṇādivisesāvatthāya asādhāraṇaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0104t0:1472_5: bāhiraṃ pana asādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇabhaṇananti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1472_12: tathāgatassa ca katthacipi bhavādīsu apariyāpannatāya sattānamanavabodhopi bāhiramasādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1473_1: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ anupādāparinibbānaṃ vimuttirasattā sabbāyapi bhagavato desanāya,
tika-s0104t0:1473_3: etadatthā mantanā”tiādi asādhāraṇaṃ pana bāhirasamuṭṭhānato vipariyāyena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1473_4: Nindāpasaṃsāsu hi sattānanveneyyāghātānandādibhāvappattiādikaṃ imissā desanāya phalabhūtaṃ kāraṇabhāvena imaṃ desanaṃ payojeti.
tika-s0104t0:1473_5: Phalañhi taduppādakasattiyā kāraṇaṃ payojeti nāma phale satiyeva tāya sattiyā kāraṇabhāvappattito.
tika-s0104t0:1473_6: Atha vā yathāvuttaṃ phalaṃ imāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ payojetīti ācariyasāriputtattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1473_8: taṃ ākaṅkhitabbattā desanāya desakaṃ payojeti nāma.
tika-s0104t0:1475_1: samudāyena ca suttapadena yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgahito attho.
tika-s0104t0:1475_2: Āghātādīnaṃ akaraṇīyatāvacanena hi dassitaṃ paṭiññānurūpaṃ samaṇasaññāya niyojanaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1482_0: Sakalena pana suttapadena dassito iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu bhagavato tādibhāvo,
tika-s0104t0:1482_8: dasanāthakadhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādayo yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgahetvā dassetabbā atthā piṇḍattho.
tika-s0104t0:1485_4: vedanāphassāyatanādimukhena ca gahitesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu taṇhāvajjitā pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1485_7: “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”ti ca padehi samudayaggahaṇenañca pāḷiyaṃ sarūpena gahitameva.
tika-s0104t0:1486_8: tattha tattha samudayaggahaṇena cāti saṅkhepato sabbalokiyakusalākusaladhammavibhāvanapadehi gahitā dhammakilesā samudayasaccaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1486_10: Tassa pana tattha tattha vedanānaṃ atthaṅgamanissaraṇapariyāyehi paccattaṃ nibbutivacanena,
tika-s0104t0:1486_13: Tassapi tattha tattha vedanānaṃ samudayādīni yathābhūtapaṭivedhanāpadesena channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayādīni yathābhūtapajānanapariyāyena,
tika-s0104t0:1487_6: Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ payojanaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1487_10: āghātādiphalassa ca anaññasantānabhāvitā nindāpasaṃsāsu yathāsabhāvaṃ paṭijānananibbeṭhanānīti evaṃ taṃtaṃpayojanādhigamahetu upāyo.
tika-s0104t0:1487_11: Āghātādīnaṃ karaṇapaṭisedhanādiapadesena atthakāmehi tato cittaṃ sādhukaṃ rakkhitabbanti ayaṃ āṇārahassa dhammarājassa āṇattīti.
tika-s0104t0:1493_18: tassā ca līnatthavibhāvanaṃ anugantvā ayamattho viññunā vibhāvetunti na vitthārayimha.
tika-s0104t0:1494_0: “Tatra ce tumhe assatha kupitā vā anattamanā vā,
tika-s0104t0:1494_1: api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthā”ti ayaṃ anumatipucchā.
tika-s0104t0:1494_5: paccuppannavisayāti evaṃ sabbattha yathāsambhavaṃ pucchāvicayanaṃ pucchāvicayo.
tika-s0104t0:1494_9: lokiyanti evaṃ sabbassāpi vissajjanassa yathārahaṃ vicayanaṃ vissajjanāvicayo.
tika-s0104t0:1495_1: na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā”ti imāya paṭhamadesanāya “mamaṃ vā…pe…
tika-s0104t0:1495_2: tumhaṃyevassa tena antarāyo”ti ayaṃ dutiyadesanā saṃsandati. Kasmā?
tika-s0104t0:1495_3: Paṭhamāya manopadosaṃ nivāretvā dutiyāya tatthādīnavassa dassitattā.
tika-s0104t0:1495_5: api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthā”ti ayaṃ tatiyadesanā saṃsandati. Kasmā?
tika-s0104t0:1495_6: Dutiyāya tatthādīnavaṃ dassetvā tatiyāya vacanatthasallakkhaṇamattepi asamatthabhāvassa dassitattā.
tika-s0104t0:1495_8: na ca panetaṃ amhesu saṃvijjatī”ti ayaṃ catutthadesanā saṃsandati. Kasmā?
tika-s0104t0:1495_9: Tatiyāya manopadosaṃ sabbathā nivāretvā catutthāya avaṇṇaṭṭhāne paṭipajjitabbākārassa dassitattāti iminā
tika-s0104t0:1495_10: nayena pubbena aparaṃ saṃsanditvā vicayanaṃ pubbāparavicayo.
tika-s0104t0:1496_0: “Api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthā”ti imāya pucchāya “no hetaṃ bhante”ti ayaṃ vissajjanā sameti.
tika-s0104t0:1496_1: Kupito hi neva buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṃ na mātāpitūnaṃ na paccatthikānaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānāti.
tika-s0104t0:1496_4: tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyyā”ti imāya pucchāya “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”tiādikā ayaṃ vissajjanā sameti.
tika-s0104t0:1496_11: Sabbaññutaññāṇaguṇā hi aññatra tathāgatā aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhattā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā
tika-s0104t0:1496_12: santā paṇītā atakkāvacarā nipuṇā paṇḍitavedanīyāti iminā nayena vissajjanāya pucchānurūpatāvicayanameva
tika-s0104t0:1498_4: Bhikkhaveti āmantananiddeso yujjati tadattheyeva etassa payogassa dissanato,
tika-s0104t0:1498_5: desakassa ca paṭiggāhakāpekkhatoti evamādinā byañjanato ca –
tika-s0104t0:1499_0: Sabbena sabbaṃ āghātādīnamakaraṇaṃ tādibhāvāya saṃvattatīti yujjati iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samappavattisabbhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1499_2: tannimittakā antarāyā tasseva sampattivibandhāya saṃvattantīti yujjati kammānaṃ santānantaresu asaṅkamanato.
tika-s0104t0:1499_3: Cittamabhibhavitvā uppannā āghātādayo subhāsitadubbhāsitasallakkhaṇepi asamatthatāya saṃvattantīti yujjati kodhalobhānaṃ andhatamasabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1499_4: Pāṇātipātādidussīlyato veramaṇī sabbasattānaṃ pāmojjapāsaṃsāya saṃvattatīti yujjati sīlasampattiyā mahato kittisaddassa abbhuggatattā.
tika-s0104t0:1499_5: Gambhīratādivisesayuttena guṇena tathāgatassa vaṇṇanā ekadesabhūtāpi sakalasabbaññuguṇaggahaṇāya saṃvattatīti yujjati anaññasādhāraṇattā.
tika-s0104t0:1499_6: Tajjāayonisomanasikāraparikkhatāni adhigamatakkanāni sassatavādādiabhinivesāya saṃvattantīti yujjati kappanajālassa asamugghāṭitattā.
tika-s0104t0:1499_7: Vedanādīnaṃ anavabodhena vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vaḍḍhatīti yujjati assādānupassanāsabbhāvato,
tika-s0104t0:1499_9: sassatādigāho ca viparipphandatīti yujjati kāraṇassa sannihitattā.
tika-s0104t0:1499_12: tadanucchavikañca vedanaṃ vedayantānaṃ phasso hetūti yujjati visayindriyaviññāṇasaṅgatiyā vinā tadabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1499_13: Chaphassāyatananimittaṃ vaṭṭassa anupacchedoti yujjati tattha avijjātaṇhānaṃ appahīnattā.
tika-s0104t0:1499_14: Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayatthaṅgamādipajānanā sabbadiṭṭhigatikasaññaṃ aticca tiṭṭhatīti yujjati catusaccapaṭivedhabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1499_15: Imāhiyeva dvāsaṭṭhiyā sabbadiṭṭhigatānaṃ antojālīkatabhāvoti yujjati akiriyavādādīnaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1499_18: Ucchinnabhavanettiko tathāgatassa kāyoti yujjati bhagavato abhinīhārasampattiyā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu
tika-s0104t0:1499_20: Kāyassa bhedā parinibbutaṃ na dakkhantīti yujjati anupādisesanibbānappattiyaṃ rūpādīsu kassacipi anavasesatoti
tika-s0104t0:1499_21: iminā nayena atthato ca sutte byañjanatthānaṃ yuttitāvibhāvanalakkhaṇo yuttihāro nāma yathāha “sabbesaṃ hārānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1501_9: Sabbāyapi diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhupādānabhāvato sā yathārahaṃ navavidhassapi bhavassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1501_13: Vedanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samudayatthaṅgamādipaṭivedhanā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ anubodhapaṭivedho hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1501_19: Yāva vedanā taṇhāya padaṭṭhānanti netvā tesaṃ “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”tiādinā pāḷiyamāgatanayena sambajjhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1501_21: “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ettha sassatādipaññāpanaṃ paresaṃ micchābhinivesassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1501_26: Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samudayādipajānanaṃ nibbidāya padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1501_31: tesañca padaṭṭhānadhammāti yathāsambhavaṃ padaṭṭhānadhammaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo padaṭṭhānahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t0:1503_2: Tathā āghātaggahaṇena avasiṭṭhaganthanīvaraṇānaṃ saṅgaho kāyaganthanīvaraṇalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0104t0:1503_6: “Vedanāna”nti ettha vedanāggahaṇena avasiṭṭhaupādānakkhandhānaṃ saṅgaho upādānakkhandhalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0104t0:1503_10: “Ajānataṃ apassata”nti ettha avijjāggahaṇena hetuāsavoghayoganīvaraṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho hetādilakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā,
tika-s0104t0:1503_12: “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ettha phassaggahaṇena saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ saṅgaho vipallāsahetubhāvena,
tika-s0104t0:1503_16: Bhavanettiggahaṇena avijjādīnaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ saṅgaho vaṭṭahetubhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti.
tika-s0104t0:1503_17: Ayaṃ sutte anāgatepi dhamme ekalakkhaṇatādinā āgate viya niddhāraṇalakkhaṇo lakkhaṇahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t0:1505_7: tassā līnatthavibhāvanīvasena ca suviññeyyattā ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha.
tika-s0104t0:1505_8: Ye te nindāpasaṃsāhi sammākampitacetasā micchājīvato anoratā sassatādimicchābhinivesino sīlādidhammakkhandhesu
tika-s0104t0:1505_10: te kathaṃ nu kho yathāvuttadosavinimuttā sammāpaṭipattiyā ubhayahitaparā bhaveyyunti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t0:1505_12: desanābhājanaṭṭhāne ca dassitā imissā desanāya nidānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1506_1: Tattha “mama”nti etassa “avaṇṇa”nti iminā sambandhotiādinā padassa padantarena sambandho padasandhi.
tika-s0104t0:1506_2: “Mama”nti vuttassa bhagavato “avaṇṇa”nti vuttena parehi upavaditena aguṇenasambandhotiādinā padatthassa padatthantarena sambandho padatthasandhi.
tika-s0104t0:1506_4: pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādidesanā suppiyena paribbājakena vuttaavaṇṇānusandhivasena pavattā.
tika-s0104t0:1506_6: pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādidesanā brahmadattena māṇavena vuttavaṇṇānusandhivasena pavattā.
tika-s0104t0:1506_8: aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā”tiādidesanā bhikkhūhi vuttavaṇṇānusandhivasena pavattāti evaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1506_12: Suttasandhi ca tividhasuttānusandhivasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ eva vicāritā,
