tika-s0104t0:1506_14: Ekissā desanāya desanāntarehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanaṃ desanāsandhi,
tika-s0104t0:1506_17: na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā”ti ayaṃ desanā “ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t0:1506_20: na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti imāya desanāya saddhiṃ saṃsandati.
tika-s0104t0:1506_21: “Tumhaṃyevassa tena anantarāyo”ti ayaṃ “kammassakā māṇava sattā kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammapaṭisaraṇā kammaṃ satte vibhajati,
tika-s0104t0:1507_0: “Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati;
tika-s0104t0:1508_0: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ kodho sahate nara”nti. ; –
tika-s0104t0:1509_3: na cetaso ubbilāvitattaṃ karaṇīya”nti ayaṃ “dhammāpi vo bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t0:1510_0: “Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
tika-s0104t0:1511_0: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate nara”nti. ca –
tika-s0104t0:1515_3: ayampi kho brāhmaṇa yañño purimehi yaññehi appaṭṭhataro ca appasamārambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahānisaṃsataro
tika-s0104t0:1515_4: cā”ti imāya paṭhamajjhānassa sīlato mahapphalamahānisaṃsataratāvacanena jhānato sīlassa appaphalaappānisaṃsatarabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0104t0:1516_0: “Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā”tiādidesanā “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sīlavā ariyasīlena samannāgato”tiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t0:1516_1: “aññeva dhammā gambhīrā”tiādidesanā “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho”tiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t0:1517_3: abhivadanti sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0104t0:1517_7: nevasassato ca nāsassato ca, antavā, anantavā,
tika-s0104t0:1517_9: nevantavā ca nānantavā ca attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0104t0:1518_2: abhivadanti saññī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā.
tika-s0104t0:1518_5: nevasaññī ca nāsaññī ca attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā.
tika-s0104t0:1518_6: Ittheke abhivadanti sato vā pana sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapenti,
tika-s0104t0:1518_11: atthetanti iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇadassāvī tathāgato tadupātivatto”tiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t0:1518_13: vipphanditamevā”ti ayaṃ “idaṃ tesaṃ vata aññatreva saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā
tika-s0104t0:1518_14: aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā paccattaṃyeva ñāṇaṃ bhavissati parisuddhaṃ pariyodāta’nti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
tika-s0104t0:1518_16: ñāṇe asati parisuddhe pariyodāte yadapi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā tattha ñāṇabhāvamattameva pariyodāpenti,
tika-s0104t0:1518_18: “tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ayaṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1518_23: “chandamūlakā ime āvuso dhammā manasikārasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā vedanāsamosaraṇā”ti (pariyesitabbaṃ) ca ādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t0:1518_30: so evaṃ asamanupassanto na kiñci loke upādiyati,
tika-s0104t0:1518_33: “sabbete imeheva dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi antojālīkatā”tiādidesanā “ye hi keci bhikkhave…pe…
tika-s0104t0:1518_35: sabbete imāneva pañca kāyāni abhivadanti etesaṃ vā aññatara”ntiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t0:1525_16: tena ca nava ayonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā āvattanti.
tika-s0104t0:1525_17: “Taṇhāgatānaṃ paritassitavipphandita”nti ettha taṇhāggahaṇena nava taṇhāmūlakā dhammā āvattanti.
tika-s0104t0:1525_23: tena bhagavato sakalasaṃkilesappahānaṃ āvattatīti ayaṃ desanāya gahitadhammānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammavasena āvattanalakkhaṇo āvattahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t0:1527_2: Yehi pana dhammehi āghātānandādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ appavatti,
tika-s0104t0:1527_7: tathā pāṇātipātādīhi paṭivirati kusalā vā abyākatā vā,
tika-s0104t0:1527_13: aññeva dhammā gambhīrā”ti vuttadhammā siyā kusalā,
tika-s0104t0:1527_24: Visesato pana santatighanavinibbhogābhāvato ekattanayassa micchāgāho atītajātianussaraṇatakkasahito sassatadiṭṭhiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1527_25: Hetuphalabhāvena sambandhabhāvassa aggahaṇato nānattanayassa micchāgāho tajjāsamannāhārasahito ucchedadiṭṭhiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1528_9: tesaṃ “aññeva dhammā gambhīrā”ti ettha vuttanayena dhammādivibhāgo netabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1528_14: “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ettha phassassa vedanāya viya dhammādivibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1528_15: Iminā nayena phassāyatanādīnampi yathārahaṃ dhammādivibhāgo netabboti ayaṃ saṃkilesadhamme,
tika-s0104t0:1530_7: Gambhīratādivisesayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ vijjābhiññādiguṇavisesamāvahati sabbaññeyyassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhato.
tika-s0104t0:1530_8: Tathā gambhīratādivisesarahitaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ ñeyyesu sādhāraṇabhāvato yathāvuttaguṇavisesaṃ nāvahati.
tika-s0104t0:1530_9: Sabbāpi cetā diṭṭhiyo yathārahaṃ sassatucchedabhāvato antadvayabhūtā sakkāyatīraṃ nātivattanti aniyyānikasabhāvattā.
tika-s0104t0:1530_10: Sammādiṭṭhi pana saparikkhārā majjhimapaṭipadābhūtā sakkāyatīramatikkamma pāraṃ gacchati niyyānikasabhāvattā.
tika-s0104t0:1530_12: Vedanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samudayādiasampaṭivedho saṃsāracārakāvarodhamāvahati saṅkhārānaṃ paccayabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1530_16: Micchābhinivese ayonisomanasikārasahitā taṇhā anekavihitaṃ diṭṭhijālaṃ pasāreti.
tika-s0104t0:1530_18: Sassatavādādipaññāpanassa phasso paccayo asati phasse tadabhāvato.
tika-s0104t0:1530_21: tesaṃ pana tathā apariññā diṭṭhidassanaṃ nātivattati.
tika-s0104t0:1530_23: asamucchinnāya bhavanettiyā anāgate bhavappabandho parivattatiyevāti ayaṃ sutte niddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1532_16: Iminā nayena sabbapadesu vevacanaṃ vattabbanti ayaṃ tassa tassa atthassa taṃtaṃpariyāyasaddayojanālakkhaṇo vevacanahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t0:1534_4: Pīti sāmaññato pana khuddikādivasena pañcadhā paññatto.
tika-s0104t0:1535_8: “Appaccayo”ti domanassassavevacanapaññattītiādivasena ca paññattibhedo vibhajjitabboti ayaṃ ekekassa
tika-s0104t0:1535_9: dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi paññapetabbākāravibhāvanalakkhaṇo paññattihāro nāma,
tika-s0104t0:1537_18: koci jhānavasena koci maggavasenāpi paccayoti ayampi viseso veditabboti idaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamukhena otaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1537_19: Imināva nayena ānandādīnampi khandhādimukhena otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1538_3: tadupakārakadhammānañca lajjādayādīnaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanādīsu saṅgahato purimanayeneva khandhādimukhena otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1538_5: Nissaraṇānupādāvimuttiggahaṇesu pana asaṅkhatadhātuvasenapi dhātumukhena otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1538_8: satipaṭṭhānādayo ca bodhipakkhiyadhammā pakāsitā hontīti taṃmukhenapi otaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t0:1538_14: Ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādādimukhehi suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo otaraṇahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t0:1540_2: “Dhammassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”nti padasuddhi,
tika-s0104t0:1540_6: na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā”ti padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi ca.
tika-s0104t0:1541_7: “Ime kho”tiādi padasuddhi ceva pucchāsuddhi ca ārambhasuddhi ca.
tika-s0104t0:1543_2: Dhammassa vā saṅghassa vāti pakkhepi esa nayo.
tika-s0104t0:1543_10: Iminā nayena sabbattha yathādesitameva sāmaññavisesā niddhāretabbā.
tika-s0104t0:1543_11: Ayaṃ suttāgatānaṃ dhammānaṃ avikappanāvasena yathādesitameva sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo adhiṭṭhānahāro nāma,
tika-s0104t0:1545_0: Āghātādīnaṃ “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādīni ekūnavīsati āghātavatthūni hetu.
tika-s0104t0:1545_7: asaddhammassavanaṃ micchābhinivesena ayonisomanasikāro ca avisesena hetu.
tika-s0104t0:1545_16: Bhavanettisamucchedassa visuddhibhāvanā hetūti ayaṃ parikkhārasaṅkhāte hetupaccaye niddhāretvā saṃvaṇṇanālakkhaṇo parikkhārahāro nāma,
tika-s0104t0:1547_5: yathābhūtaṃ viditvā anupādāvimutto”ti ca etehi samādhisampadāya saddhiṃ vijjāvimuttivasībhāvasampadā dassitā.
tika-s0104t0:1548_1: Sassatavādādivibhāgadassanaṃ pana diṭṭhiyā pariyāyavacananti ayaṃ vevacanasamāropanā.
tika-s0104t0:1550_0: Sīlādidhammakkhandhehi samathavipassanābhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati pahānattayasiddhitoti ayaṃ bhāvanāsamāropanā.
tika-s0104t0:1554_2: sammohe ca “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā āghāto jāyati, nāsati.
tika-s0104t0:1554_6: yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādivacanehi ca taṇhāvijjānaṃ accantappahānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1554_8: “ajānataṃ apassata”ntiādipadehi ca sarūpatopi dassitānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ rūpadhammā,
tika-s0104t0:1554_10: Yathākkamaṃ samatho ca vipassanā ca paṭipakkho,
tika-s0104t0:1555_5: vipassanāpakkhiyānañca aniccasaññādīnaṃ vasenāti ayaṃ taṇhāvijjāhi saṃkilesapakkhaṃ suttatthaṃ samathavipassanāhi
tika-s0104t0:1555_6: ca vodānapakkhaṃ catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇassa nandiyāvaṭṭanayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0104t0:1557_7: Iti tīhi akusalamūlehi gahitehi tappaṭipakkhato āghātādīnamakaraṇavacanena ca tīṇi kusalamūlāni siddhāniyeva honti.
tika-s0104t0:1557_8: Tattha tīhi akusalamūlehi tividhaduccaritasaṃkilesamalavisamākusalasaññāvitakkapañcādivasena sabbopi akusalapakkho vitthāretabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1558_3: tehi pana nibbattā tesamadhiṭṭhānagocarabhūtā upādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0104t0:1558_7: kusalamūlehi ca vodānapakkhaṃ catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇassa tipukkhalanayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0104t0:1562_7: Tattha ca ādīnavānisaṃse sallakkhetvā sāvajjaṃ pahāya anavajjaṃ samādāya vattati.
tika-s0104t0:1562_11: Paññavā hi yathābhūtāvabodho samāhito ca yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti.
tika-s0104t0:1563_5: Sabbeheva diṭṭhippakāsanapadehi anattani “attā”ti vipallāsoti evamettha cattāro vipallāsā siddhā honti,
tika-s0104t0:1563_7: Tattha catūhi yathāvuttehi indriyehi cattāro puggalā niddisitabbā.
tika-s0104t0:1563_8: Kathaṃ duvidho hi taṇhācarito mudindriyo tikkhindriyoti,
tika-s0104t0:1563_10: Tesu paṭhamo asubhe “subha”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati.
tika-s0104t0:1563_11: Dutiyo asukhe “sukha”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā vuttena vīriyasaṃvarasaṅkhātena
tika-s0104t0:1563_13: Tatiyo anicce “nicca”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko samādhibalena samāhitabhāvato saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paṭivijjhati.
tika-s0104t0:1563_16: Catūhi cettha vipallāsehi caturāsavoghayogaganthaagatitaṇhuppādupādānasattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiapariññādivasena sabbopi akusalapakkho netabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1563_17: Tathā catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi catubbidhajhānavihārādhiṭṭhānasukhabhāgiyadhammaappamaññāsammappadhānaiddhipādādivasena sabbopi vodānapakkho netabbo.
tika-s0104t0:1564_7: saddhindriyādīhi vodānapakkhaṃ catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇassa sīhavikkīḷitanayassa bhūmi,
tika-s0104t0:1566_0: Iti tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohāranayadvayampi siddhameva hoti.
tika-s0104t0:1566_3: Tasmā yathāvuttanayena atthanayānaṃ disābhūtadhammasamālokananayanavasena tampi nayadvayaṃ yojetabbanti,
tika-s0104t0:1569_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ soḷasavidhe sāsanapaṭṭhāne saṃkilesavāsanāsekkhabhāgiyaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhādisaṃkilesānaṃ sīlādipuññakiriyassa,
tika-s0104t0:1569_2: saṃkilesavāsanānibbedhāsekkhabhāgiyameva vā yathāvuttatthānaṃ sekkhasīlakkhandhādikassa ca vibhattattā.
tika-s0104t0:1569_3: Aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana sāsanapaṭṭhāne lokiyalokuttaraṃ sattadhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇañeyyaṃ dassanabhāvanaṃ
tika-s0104t0:1569_4: sakavacanaparavacanaṃ vissajjanīyāvissajjanīyaṃ kammavipākaṃ kusalākusalaṃ anuññātapaṭikkhittaṃ bhavo
tika-s0104t0:1571_3: mahādhammarājādhirājagarunā katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthavibhāvanā.
